1b1(dkon brtsegs): /rgyu gar skad du/Ar+ya ak+Sho b+hU s+ya tA thA ga ta s+yA b+hu ha nA ma ma/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): yA na sU tA/bod skad du/'phags pa de bzhin gau shigs pa mo 'khrugs pa'i
1b3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas
1b4(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal//'di skad
2a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/bya rgod kyi
2a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i ri lA/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun tshon po dang /thabs gcig
2a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bzhugs te/thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa myed pa/dbang dang ldan
2a4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes
2a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/glang po chen po//bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bo ra ba/bdag gi don rje su thob
2b1(dkon brtsegs): pA/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dgra pa'i shes pas/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems
2b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang thams cad kyi ngom pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du
2b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang //rgyal
2b4(dkon brtsegs): po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /de dag las gzhan pa gzi badz+rod
2b5(dkon brtsegs): che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lho dang rA/klu dang //gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci
2b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /lto 'phye chen po dang //mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyi sa yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ches ston to//de
3a1(dkon brtsegs): nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shU radwa ti'i bu stan las lingas+yA te/chos gos phrag pa gcig
3a2(dkon brtsegs): tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas
3a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na ming
3a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi 'jug pa dang /spyod pa dang /spro ba dang /sems bskyed
3a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang gis sngon gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag
3a6(dkon brtsegs): par zhugs par gyur po'i sems bskyed pa dang /go cha dang /yon tan yongasu brjod pa legs par ba shad du gsol//btsun
3b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi las dang /sems bskyed pa dang /go cha dang /yon tan yongs su
3b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dag kyang bshe du gsol/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi don dang /
3b3(dkon brtsegs): sman pa dang /bde ba'i slad du brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu de dag gi spyod pa dang /yon tan yongasu dag pa yongasu brjod pa
3b4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang ba sha du gsol/de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten lo snying brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi
3b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang /bde bar 'gyur la/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang 'di
3b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos kyi sgron ma'i snang ba dang /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi snang bas snang bar gyis par 'gyur zhing spro ba stsal bar yang 'gyuraro//de lta lags pas
3b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyis sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi 'jug pa dang spyod pa dang /spro ba dang /
4a1(dkon brtsegs): /sems bskyed pa dang /go cha dang /yon tan yong su brjod pa dag thos na de bzhin du slob cing de bzhin du bsgrub par 'gyur//de
4a2(dkon brtsegs): dag de ltar bslabs shing de ltar bsgrubs byas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing yon tan de lta bu dag dang
4a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur nas kyang slar zhing gong nus gong du yon tAn shin tu khyad par can dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba lagasaso//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
4a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legaso//sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
4a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yong su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jug pa dang /spyod
4a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /spro ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /go tsha dang /yon tan yongasu brjod pa dag 'dri bar sems pa ni yang khyod legaso//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i phyir
4a7(dkon brtsegs): legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung zhig dang /'di lta ste 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen po rnams las brtsams te bshad par
4b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa tISh+Ti ng+yas bcom ldan 'das de bzhino//zhes gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi lhur nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'du
4b2(dkon brtsegs): skrod ces bka' stsal to//sha ri dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
4b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing bzhos te/de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to//
4b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bgyi ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
4b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos
4b6(dkon brtsegs): ston pa de phyogs gang na bzhugs shes don de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nges par zhu'o snya mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi
5a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di nas shar phyogs lcogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong tham pa na/'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de de na
5a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing ba zhes te/de byang chub sems
5a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug las brtsams te chos ston to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong zhig stan la
5a4(dkon brtsegs): langs te/chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
5a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
5a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la slob
5a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal lo//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin
5b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po des dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la dreng sang bslab par shin tu dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhu
5b2(dkon brtsegs): na/dge slong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la mi 'khrugs par bya ba dang /gu nod sems kyi sems mi skyed par bya ba'i phyir ro//shA ro dwa ti'i
5b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de la de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po de la dge slong des 'di skad ces gI stsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
5b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag dang slan chad 'di ltar g.yo ma mchis pa dang /sgyu ma mchis pa dang /mang ba'i tshig dang /gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i tshig gis bla na med pa yang dge
5b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi/bla na me rnyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 'dud par bgyi/yongasu bsngo bar yang bgyi'o//
5b6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'dus bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
5b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la 'di nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te sems
6a1(dkon brtsegs): //can 'ga' tsam la khro ba 'am/glu nang sems snum/'khrug pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gos phyogs bcu kun rgya
6a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma ma sa grangs m+b+ha mchis bsam gyis mI khyab gzhal du mi mchis pa thams ni dri na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltung
6a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/'tsho zhing banyis lnga chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar thams
6a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mi khyen pa'i sems bskyod pa rin po che 'dri bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la 'drinas
6a5(dkon brtsegs): bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par srungs la rgyus kyi bar du gal te gom pa'i 'dor ba re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i
6a6(dkon brtsegs): sam+b+has dang bral bar gyur na/de bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dbyug tu ma mchis glangs ma chi sna bsam gyis mi khyub gzhol dum
6a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tshe zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
6b1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems paskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed do/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
6b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par spangs mo rgyas kyi bran du gal te nyan thos kyi sems sam
6b3(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu mu mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhang du ma
6b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur
6b5(dkon brtsegs): cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos
6b6(dkon brtsegs): shing yong su bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par spangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
6b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom
7a1(dkon brtsegs): mdzam ma/sa a nathasam/a mthan thas na cathaSha sa nathamamama' thamamasa.a/a yaH tam/ya aHmaHtham ma
7a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun
7a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing
7a4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'am/zhe sdang dang ldan
7a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/gti mug dang ldan pa 'am/rnam par 'tshe ba dang ldan pa 'am/gnyid dang ldan pa 'am/rmugs pa dang ldan pa 'am/'gyod pa dang ldan pa'ami/rgod pa
7a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal
7a7(dkon brtsegs): du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
7a8(dkon brtsegs): dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla ni med pa yang
7b1(dkon brtsegs): dbu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te the tshom dang ldan
7b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams
7b3(dkon brtsegs): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun
7b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos
7b5(dkon brtsegs): shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te srog gcod pa dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
7b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs
7b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom
8a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i snyoms bskyod pa rin pa rgya 'di bskyod do//de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
8a2(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo mngon par rdzogs por sangs mi rgyas kyi bar du gal te ma byin par len po dang ldan pa 'am/
8a3(dkon brtsegs): mi chings par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'am/brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa 'am/phra ma dang ldan pa 'am/ngag rtsub po dang ldan pa'am/tshig kyal par smra ba dang ldan pa'am
8a4(dkon brtsegs): brnab sems dang ldan pa'am/gnod sem sa dang ldan pa'am/log par lte ba deng ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
8a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsnyem gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag dwa ltar bzhugs
8a6(dkon brtsegs): te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par ts+tsha ra cig ces byas so//sha ra dwa tI'i bu de nas dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems
8a7(dkon brtsegs): te kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge dang po sems pa skyed pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa nyid nas sems can thams cad la sems mi 'khrug
8b1(dkon brtsegs): tsIng /kun du mi 'khrug pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che'o//kye ma dge slong 'di ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te ldeg so snyam mo//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar dge slong de'i mying
8b2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur nas de bzhin gshigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po dris dge slong legaso legaso//
8b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de nyid du 'gyur la/dge slong khyod bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
8b4(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas pa nas yang mtshan 'di lta ste/mi 'khrugs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid du 'gyur ro zhes de'i ming de la rje su yid rang ba mdzad do//rgyal po chen po bzhi
8b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang dge slong leg so legaso//dge slong khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na yang ming de
8b6(dkon brtsegs): nye du gyur la/dge slong khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs pa na yang mtshan 'di lta ste mi 'khrugs po mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid
8b7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gyur zhes de'i ming de la rje su yid rang ba byaso//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po de la
9a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa mngon du gyur pa des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de
9a2(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed//de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing ljong su bre sngos la bla na me pa
9a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyus kyi bar du gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma bgyis na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi
9a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyos mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
9a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes lnga chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun po bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar tham+bis
9a6(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la blunA mang ba yang
9a7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mi rgyas kyi bar du gal te tha na gom pa 'dor bai re ri tsam dge la sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa dang ldan
9b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i semasu ma bskyod na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jog rten gyi khams dpag tu rgya mtsho sa grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis
9b2(dkon brtsegs): pu thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltararo bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzlas la chos kyi ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dog basmras par gyur
9b3(dkon brtsegs): cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cang mkhyen pa'i sems bskyang ba rin po che 'di ban+d+ha /de ltar bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chung tu
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongasu bsngos le bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshwa rabs tshe rab su khyim nas khyim ma
9b5(dkon brtsegs): mchis par yang dag par rab tu ma byung na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du
9b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
9b7(dkon brtsegs): bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen 'ang sems bskyed pa rin po che 'dir skyed de/de ltar bla na ming pa yang dag par
10a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsdus shing yang su bsdus pa/thun mod pa yang dag byar rdzogs pa'o byung chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
10a2(dkon brtsegs): bar drugal te tshe rabs tshe rabasu mngon par rab tu byung nas kyang dgon pa par ma gyur tam/bsad snyoms par ma gyur tam/phyag dar khrid par ma gyur tam/spyan
10a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig par ma gyur tam/zas phyis mi len par ma gyur tam+me/zlas rlud rnyed len par ma gyur tA ma/dur khrod par ma gyur tom/bla khab med par ma gyur ta mA~M/
10a4(dkon brtsegs): shong drung par ma gyur tam/cog pu par ma gyur tam/gzhi ji bzhin par mi gyur tam/chos gos gsum pa bar ma gyur tam/phying ba par ma gyur tam/'dod
10a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chung bar ma gyur tam/chog shes par ma gyur tam/chos 'dod par ma gyur tam/chos la dga' bar ma gyur tama~M/chosnga la gus par ma gyur tam/chos
10a6(dkon brtsegs): la rten par ma gyur tam/chos la ston par ma gyur pa nas bsgrub pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /yo byad bsnyungs pa'i yaM dam yang dag par blang ba dag
10a7(dkon brtsegs): blangs te gnas par ma gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma
10b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshos pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs to 'cha zhing bzlas la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par
10b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
10b3(dkon brtsegs): chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te tshe rabs tshe rab su mthun rab
10b4(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas kyang chos ston par me gyur tam/spobs pa chags pa med pa dang ldan par ma gyur tam/spobs pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par ma gyur na/bdag gis phyogs
10b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
10b6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar
10b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang
11a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du 'di ltar 'greng ba dang /mchis pa dang /'chag pa'i spyod lam
11a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum ma gtogs par gal te nyal bar gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi
11a3(dkon brtsegs): khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes lnga chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
11a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa
11a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
11a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar du gal te sems can 'ga' tsam le rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang ldan pa'am/rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed dam/bud med dang ldan pa'am//
11a7(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba dang ldan pa'am/de las gzhan smra ba brjod pa dang ldan pa 'am/gzhan la gnod cing spa bkong ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag
11b1(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis myi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
11b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhis la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun po bcom ldan/
11b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la blo
11b4(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te bud med la 'di skad ltar mi rtag pa'i rnam pa 'am/sdug bsngal ba dang /
11b5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam pa 'am/rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chos ston pa na yan lag las skyes pa'i rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan dgal bzang ba'i mtshan
11b6(dkon brtsegs): mar gzung nas so'i phreng ba ston tam/rgod par bgyid ngam/lag pa g.yob par bgyid na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs
11b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i
12a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed
12a2(dkon brtsegs): de de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mo
12a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bar du chos ston pa na gal te lag pa bsgyur zhing chos ston par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma
12a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal dum mo chis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston
12a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di//
12a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
12a7(dkon brtsegs): par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjesu skra dang khe spu bregs pa snod gyur pa'am/snod du ma gyur pa'ang mi bsngo ste/de bzhin gshegs
12b1(dkon brtsegs): 'i rgyul mtshan chos gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba dag mthong na de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes snyam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi 'du shes ma bskyed na/bdag
12b2(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
12b3(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams
12b4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par
12b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mthong na de drag la ston pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed na//bdag
12b6(dkon brtsegs): gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
12b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag/
13a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed do/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yong su bsngos
13a2(dkon brtsegs): la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sang som rgyas kyi bar du chos 'chad pa na chos ston pA dag la gal te mchi sa te chos ma mnyan
13a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu mo mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na
13a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig
13a5(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che'i de bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
13a6(dkon brtsegs): tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogaso par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
13a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par 'di las phyi rol du gyur pa'i dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /lha gzhan dag la phyag bgyis
13b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/bdag gos phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jog rten gyi/dmas dpag tu mya mtshos grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas btso//
13b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhus la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bsdus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
13b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la bla
13b4(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni sbyin pa stsal bar bgyi'o//'di le ni stsal par mi bgyi'o//
13b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems can la tha dad du bgyi bgyi ba'i 'du shes bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs
13b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cang mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de
14a1(dkon brtsegs): ltar blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/b+ha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
14a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te 'di la ni yon dbul bar po gyi'i//'di la ni yon dbul bar mi bgyi'o zhes de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyod par gyur na/
14a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom
14a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gong dgu da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom
14a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing
14a6(dkon brtsegs): yisu bsngos la bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mu rgyas kyi bar du gal te di lnga ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa stsal ba
14a7(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o//'di la no stsal bar mi dkye'o zhes de lta bu'i sems bskyed par gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpa gtum mchis
14b1(dkon brtsegs): grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston
14b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de//
14b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos le/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
14b4(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyas kyi bar du gal te dgum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid de mchis pa mthong na/da yongasu thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/bdag gis lus yongasu btang ba
14b5(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis bsam gyis mi khyab gzhal du ma mchis pa rnams cad na
14b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/
14b7(dkon brtsegs): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des gal te 'gum par 'os pa'i sems can la la zhig khrid mchis
15a1(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong na de yongasu thar par ma bgyis kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mI N+ya'o/
15a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes smraso//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas yang dge slong zhig 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'dris gang gi phyir
15a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur pa dang /tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa dang /glang gis de bzhin gA
15a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang du gyur pa dang /tshad mar gyur par 'jog pa de na lce dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
15a5(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang /tshad mar gyur par 'gyuraro//snyam mo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15a6(dkon brtsegs): slongs rgyas sbyin chen po des dge slong de'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong dang bzhi no//
15a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar khyod rnam par rtog pa de bzhin du/dge slong gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag dbang du gyur par
15b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyud mar gyur par 'jog pa de yang ring por mi thogs par lha dang /mi dang /lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang /chung mar gyur par 'gyuraro//dge
15b2(dkon brtsegs): slong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag go cha chen po de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag parardzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa
15b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
15b4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin chen po de la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des 'di skadaHsa gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
15b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/dri ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/
15b6(dkon brtsegs): blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs mi rgyas kyi bar du/gal dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dgra bstan dang /dge bsnyen me lhung
15b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nongs pa byung ba dag mthong na/khyod la ltung ba'i nyes pa 'di byung zhes ltung ba blangs par gyur ni/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tum
16a1(dkon brtsegs): mchi sa/grangs ma mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs
16a2(dkon brtsegs): te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag byur/
16a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ping sang+yas kyi zhi na thams cad kyi thams cad/rnam pa thaMd kyi thams cad du nyan thos rnams kyi ltung ba'i sgra tsam dag kyang ma grig
16a4(dkon brtsegs): cing /mi 'byung ba de ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing /bsgrub par bgyi'o//ci nas bdag bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
16a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongasu dag par 'gyur ba dang /bla na yon tan yongasu rdzogs pa ji snyed pa dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar brtul bar bgyi'o//
16a6(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed do/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
16a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs por sangs ma rgyas kyi bar pu/gal te tha na g.yar la mo du khu bo byung
16b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khyams dpag tu ma mchis/blangs ma mchis/bsam+b+ha gyis mi khyab/gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/sangs
16b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gi zhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa
16b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci nas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /
16b4(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang dag khyim gyi gnas nges par byung zhing rab tu byung bar gyur pa dag/tha nA g.yor lam na yang khu ba mi 'byin pa de
16b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag gis brtsal zhing bsgrub par bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed/de ltar bla na med pa
16b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par su ma rgyas kyi bar du/ga lA te bdag bla na med pa yang dag
16b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/da ltar gyi bud med dang /bud med kyi skyon gang legs pa'i bud med dang /bud med kyi skyon
17a1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/bdag kyang tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur zhing bdag gyis
17a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17a3(dkon brtsegs): 'odas gang dag da ltar bzhugs te/'tshe zhing po zhes lnga chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ongs de dag bslus par gyur cig/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de
17a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che 'di bskyed de/de ltar bla na mdo pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos shing yongasu bsngos la/bla na med pa yang
17a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/gal te ji skad smras pa de bzhin du mi bgyis na/bdag gis phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig
17a6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams dpeb tu ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/bsam gyis mi khyab/gzhal du ma mchis pa thams cad na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar
17a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par gyur cig/sa bon gyi chos 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
17b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ji lta ji ltar sems mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon par 'grub cing /de lta de ltar chos ston par yang 'gyur ro zhes gsol to//sha ra dwa ti'i
17b2(dkon brtsegs): bu de nas dge slong zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la 'di skad ces smraso//skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di gal te yang dag po'i
17b3(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yin zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur yang dag pa yin na/bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig 'dis rkang pa g.yas
17b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthe bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa chen po 'di g.yo ba dang /rab tu g.yo ba dang /kun tu rab tu g.yo ba dang /'gul ba dang /rab tu 'gul
17b5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /kun tu rab tu 'gul ba dang /ldeg pa dang /rab tu ldeg pa dang /kun tu rab tu ldeg par byos shig/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17b6(dkon brtsegs): chun po mi 'khrugs pa des de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gi bden pa'i dam bcas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa des/rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos stong gsum
17b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bya ste/g.yos rab tu g.yosaM/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab
18a1(dkon brtsegs): tu 'gul/ldog rab tu ldog/kun tu rab tu ldog par byas//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni
18a2(dkon brtsegs): skad smras pa de bzhin du byed par gyur pa yin no//shi radwa ti'i bu de lta bos na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
18a3(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'dod pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i spyad pa'i rjesu bslab par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
18a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i rjesu slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ni de 'dra ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
18a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bus
18a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de dang po sems bskyed pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na//
18a7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i ris ji snyed gcig 'dus par gyur/de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sha radwa
18b1(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa dro/dang po sems bskyod pa la yang dag par zhugs pa na/stong pa sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khrims kyi
18b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen pa bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /bdud sdig can dang /mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu ji
18b3(dkon brtsegs): skyeng ba de dag thaMd 'dus nas/thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces kye ma sngon ma thos pa'i seng+ge'i sgra chen po 'di dag byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' tshan
18b4(dkon brtsegs): po mi 'khrugs pa 'dis bsgrags pa las thos zhes smraso//sha ra dA bu de nas lha'i bu de dag dga' ba dang /yid bde ba bskyes nas/kha 'thun par 'di skad ces kyang
18b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa 'od bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
18b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lagaso//sems can gang dag gis ser
18b7(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra chen po dang /khyu mchog gi mi 'jigs pa chen po dang /smon lam chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma
19a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyalags zhes gsol to//de skad ces dka' stsal pa dang /bats+tsho m+bu wAn+da 'das lha tsho dang ldan+d+ra pA shwa radwa tI bus 'di skad ces gsapA to//brgyan/
19a2(dkon brtsegs): bu bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dbyar chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i go rje chen po ci 'dra ba gang de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu brjod pa'i go cha chen
19a3(dkon brtsegs): po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la mchis pa ra bAdug gis sngun cud ma thos lag so//de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcomu ldan
19a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa bzhin no//sha ra dwa tI'i bu
19a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dper sems dpa' chen po mu'akhrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos na/bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag mar
19a6(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa'i smon lam chen po dang go cha chen po de bgos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
19a7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang /byang chub sems
19b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bye ba khrag khrog dwa rgyu stong phrag mang po dgra ga nang na yang nyung ste/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub snyoms dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po mo 'khrugs pa do/yon tan gang dag dang ldan
19b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'i yon tan de dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
19b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug pa de la rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ong ba'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
19b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lce dang mi
19b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga da ltar
19b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur bar lung bstan pa bzhi no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19b7(dkon brtsegs): spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/stong gsum gyi stong
20a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing /sa chen po de yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/'di ltar g.yos//
20a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldog par gyur te/sha re tI byed par mya/ngas
20a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsnyes pa nA/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
20a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams thaMd snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing /sa chen po 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos por gyur te/'di ltar g.yos rab tu gla yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/
20a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gul rab tu 'gul/kun tu rab tu 'gul/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur pa bzhin//shwa radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
20a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems de ba' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
20a7(dkon brtsegs): chub tu lung bstan pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/shing ljon pa dang /rtswa dang /shing gel ba dang /sman dang /nags tshal gang
20b1(dkon brtsegs): dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po m+bu 'khrags pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logasu btud/rab tu btud /mngon par rab tu btud par
20b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa nA/
20b3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/shing ljon pa dang /rtswa dang /shing gel ba dang /sman dang /nags tshal gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis
20b4(dkon brtsegs): ngagA la de log su btung /rab tu btung /mngon par rab tu btud par gyur pa bzhino//sha ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
20b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/stong
20b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin pa dang /na mkhar lding dang /mi'am tsa dang /lto 'phye chen po
20b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gang dag 'khod pa de dag thaMd kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la ba de logasu thal mo
21a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud nas/phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur to/shA ra dwa ti'i bu dpor nu ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
21a2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/thoms cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyas pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zla dang /
21a3(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten grung dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi sa dag la bde logs
21a4(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par gyur pa bzhi no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/
21a6(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bud med sbrum mar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tsha bde zhing bkra shis par btsos par gyur to//sems can
21a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag long bar gyur pa de dag kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to//sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to//sems can smyos pa rnams
21b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur to//sems can dbang po thams cad ma tshang ba rnams kyi dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur to//sha rA dwa ti'i bu dper na dAs bla na med pa yang drag par
21b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/bud
21b3(dkon brtsegs): med sbrum par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe bode zhing bkra shis par btsos par gyur/sems can long ba rnams kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur/sems
21b4(dkon brtsegs): can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur/sems can smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed par gyur/sems can dbang po thams cadra ma tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po
21b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang ldan par gyur pa bzhin no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/
21b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems depa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pAnA/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
21b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de na de'i tshe sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshes ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa meng ngo //sha ra~M dwa ti'i bu dper na ngas bla na med pa yang dag
22a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pan+d+ha/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte
22a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams 'di na de'i tshe/sems can 'ga' tsam yang gshes ngan du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa med pa bzhino//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
22a4(dkon brtsegs): chung tu lung bstan pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der lha'i dri bsud yid 'od pa dag kyang byung bar gyur te/sha radwa tI'i bu dper nA/nges bla na med pa
22a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ni/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
22a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dir lha'i dri bsung yid 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur pa bzhi no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
22a7(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'dres kye ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni/de ltar lung bstan pa nyid na/yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur pa las na/
22b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'khrugs pa dra ni yon tan gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lagaso//de skad ces gsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
22b2(dkon brtsegs): sha radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sha ra ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des
22b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/yon tan brjod pa de dag nyi rtser yang ma zad de/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byung chub sems dpa' sems
22b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni yon tan mtha' yas pa gzhan dag gi pha rol tu phyin par gyur pa yang yin no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
22b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
22b6(dkon brtsegs): chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad sems dga'o//
22b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /sems nyams bde bar gyur te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad
23a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa de dag
23a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sems dga' ba dang /sems kyi nyams bde bar gyur pa bzhi no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa
23a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/stong gsum
23a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/sha ra dwa tI'i bu dper na//
23a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/stong gsum gyi steng chen po
23a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rje gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa bzhin no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
23a7(dkon brtsegs): yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de//bla na
23b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang
23b2(dkon brtsegs): na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa
23b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir/lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /gdug pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de log su gtor rab tu gtor mngon par
23b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor bar gyur to//sha radwa tI'i bu dper ni/ngas bra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i
23b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes brnyes pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/lce dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am
23b6(dkon brtsegs): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyis nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/lha'i me tog dang /spos dang /gdug pa dag gis ngag la bri de logs su
23b7(dkon brtsegs): gtor rab tu gtor mngon par rab tu gtor bar gyur pa bzhin//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye
24a1(dkon brtsegs): /rlu sa du sa na sa / ga spyang g+sa b+h+ya N+Ta sA mu ng+ge
24a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni/mi bye ba phrag nyi shu dang /lU bye ba phyug sum nus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nus/de dag
24a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/bla na ming po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
24a4(dkon brtsegs): d+hu rlung bstan to//shwe dU ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgye bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin chen bu des/byang chub sems do
24a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dnga'i chen po mi 'jug pa na meng pa yang dag pa rjegs du'i byang chub tu lung bskrun pa ni/slong gsum b+h+yo sbyang rten pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams
24a6(dkon brtsegs): tsad me tog ud pal dang /pad+ma dang /kun mu dA dang /da dkar po dug gris kun tu khabs par gyur te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzos
24a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/me tog yung pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar
24b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gos byang chub kyi skyong po kun tu khebs par gyur pa bzhi no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po
24b2(dkon brtsegs): des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa rA/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
24b3(dkon brtsegs): du ma dag steng kri bar snang la 'khod nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma
24b4(dkon brtsegs): drag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa ga la de log su bor nas/tshig 'di skad ces kyi ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
24b5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'khrugs pa 'di myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cig ces smras//sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ngas bla na
24b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa ni/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma
24b7(dkon brtsegs): dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/lha'i gos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag ngag la ba de log su bor ba bzhin no//sha ra dwa ti'i bu
25a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
25a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lha dang /mI dang lha ma yin du bcas
25a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du/pha ma dag bu la dga' ba ma yin te/sha ra dwa ti'i'u bu dper na/das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
25a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
25a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'jig rten dga' bar gyur pa tsam du pa mi dag bu la dga' ba ma yin bzhin no///bam po gnyis pa//sha ra dwa tI'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs
25a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/bla na med pa yang dag par
25a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/lha dang mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thaMd
25b1(dkon brtsegs): /byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa zos par gyur to//de la lung bstan pa thos nas kyang /'dod pa'i khyams kyi sems can glang yin
25b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag kyang byed de/'di lta ste/bza' ba dang /bca' ba dang /myong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag sbyin pa byin par gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/
25b3(dkon brtsegs): dper na/zla ba bzhi po ston zla tha chungs kyi zla ba nya la ku mu da'i 'du ston gyi tshe/'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams sbyin po dag sbyin zhing /bsod nams dag byed de/bza
25b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /bca' ba dang /myang ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sbyin pa gtong bar byed//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
25b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyan chen po des/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'i' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/stong gsum gyi stong
25b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can rnams kyang sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams drug byed/bzar ba dang /bca'i ba dang /myang ba rnam pa sna
25b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs ngag gi sbyin pa byed par gyur to//lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams kyis kyang /lha'i sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mngon pa rab tu krol nas/a li la zhes
26a1(dkon brtsegs): ca co dang /gzha'i sgra dag kyang phyung bar gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de lung bstan pa na/d+hi/
26a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i yon tan drag dang ldan par gyur to//de skad ces bka' sprul pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa btso//
26a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa zhib mos 'di ltar legs par gsungs
26a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni ngo mtshar te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab lagaso//bsam gtan pa
26a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/klu rnams kyi klu'i yul yang bsam gyis mi khyab/las rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa yang bsam gyis mi
26a6(dkon brtsegs): khyab lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nyid nis yon tan gyi khyad par
26a7(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu dag yongasu zin cing /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de'i lung bstan pa de
26b1(dkon brtsegs): mdzam ma/sa a mthams/a mthan thas rba taTha Sha sa nathamamamama' thamamam ma/aH ma
26b2(dkon brtsegs): yang bsam gyis mi khyu lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang //bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sha ra tI nI bu
26b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin te/de de bzhin na//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/sha rAt+na ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen b+h+yo mi 'khrugs pa de'i lung bstan pa ni bsam gyis mi khyi'o//
26b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'dri skad ces smras//btsun pa sha radwa tISh+Ti bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrug
26b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i drang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs tsam zhig mdor bsdus te/gsungs par zad kyi rgya tshar bstan pa
26b6(dkon brtsegs): na ma yin no//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smoso//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de de bzhin
26b7(dkon brtsegs): te/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' blo byang chub sem su kyi chen po myi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongapa brjod pa de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa so//
26b8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs tsam zhig bstan pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni dang po sems
27a1(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa'i glo cha'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyir tI/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de'i phyir na ltogs te/nyon cig dang /bcom ldan
27a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis rgya cher stan par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshwa dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces ga sol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/bcom ldan 'das
27a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan dang phan yon mdor bsdus te bka' stsal lags ni/btsun
27a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rje su gzung ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang /
27a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i drang po sems bskyed pa'i go tshwa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa dag shin tu
27a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par bstan cing rgya cher bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/shA radwa
27a7(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de'i dang po sems bskyed pa'i go cha'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab mod kyi/sha ra ngadwa ti'i
27b1(dkon brtsegs): na kya phyogs tsam zlog bstan par byas/de lags par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/btsun pa
27b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhino zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
27b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des/'di snyamadun mkha'i khams ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi/bdag gis dam bcas pa ni gzhan du mi 'gyur bar bya'o
27b4(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems bskyed de/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa de ni go cha chen po de lta bu'i go cha chen po bgos par gyur to//sha ra dwa ti'i
27b5(dkon brtsegs): bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pas/go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa/de lta bu'i go cha chen po dag bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpal
27b6(dkon brtsegs): nAn ngas bskol pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang na gcig kyang yang dag par rje su ma mthong ngo //sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen
27b7(dkon brtsegs): po rin po che'i tog spyod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa'i spyod ba'i chang nye bar mi 'gro ste/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
28a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des go cha chen po gang bgos par gyur pa'i go cha chen po da ni/byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang khyad/
28a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang /byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang
28a3(dkon brtsegs): med do//sha radwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mo 'khrugs pa dus/de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag par blangs pas/bla na med pa
28a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
28a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na/da ltar yang bzhugs te/'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to//sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas mngon par shes te/
28a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bya dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i skyed pa spyod pa na gang gis las
28a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'am/rkang pa'am/mgo 'am/mig gam/yan lag dang /nying lag gang yang rung bdag bslangs pa ni ma byin pa gang yang mdo//sha rodwa ti'i bu bcom ldan
28b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des/dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par
28b2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang klod pa na bar mi gyur/rlung las gyur pa'am/mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/bad kan las
28b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa 'am/'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
28b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa/de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di yang byung //sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan
28b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas myi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa sbyong pa na des tshe rabs thams
28b6(dkon brtsegs): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byos so//thams cad du yed tshongs par spyod pa spyad cing thams cad du yang 'di lta ste/mi
28b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas/de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /gang ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag mngon
29a1(dkon brtsegs): sum du bzhugs pa de dang dor skyes par gyur to//shA radwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper nA/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/kha
29a2(dkon brtsegs): bzangs kyi steng nas khungs bzangs kyi steng du 'gro yang /rkang mthil gyis so chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do//de khe ngas bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas/'dod pa'i
29a3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod cing tshe zad par 'gyu ro//shA ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag
29a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi'i khrugs pa de/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni yang /nges tshe rab sdu thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par
29a5(dkon brtsegs): byas shing /thugs byung bar ma byas so//thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod po spyad cing /thams cad du yang 'di lta ste/mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur
29a6(dkon brtsegs): nus/de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mizil
29a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed//de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston gyi/nyan thos kyi sa las brtsam
29b1(dkon brtsegs): te/chos ston pa ni nyung ngo //gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te/chos ston na yang /de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid lngas brtsams te/chos ston to//gal te rang sangs rgyas
29b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa las brtsams te/chos ston na yang /de thad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to//des pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/chos bstan pas sems can
29b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams byang chub la btul cing btsud de/rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas/de dag la yang dag par ston/yang dag par 'dzin du
29b4(dkon brtsegs): bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed/sha ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
29b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to//de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge
29b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos te/kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya bo drub mngon par
29b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dor/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dge 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /de dag
30a1(dkon brtsegs): /ngasang sa rgyas sa sa rgyas bskrun pa gyu/ts+tshag/thas nas cad 'dzin pa dang /'chung ba dang /b+hu pa dang /gan+d+ha rlub par byung bar 'gyur klo
30a2(dkon brtsegs): nan dag la yang rje rgyur yod drug pa rab tu ston par gyur cig/tshe dbas rjes nas kyang /chos de dag mi brjed par gyur cig/ci ltar bdag lta sangs rgyas
30a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing nus sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du/der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang /bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral sangs
30a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smin par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing da de dag du sems 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs b+ha'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
30a5(dkon brtsegs): posasam rgyas kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam dang mi 'brel bar gyur cig/gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnasu skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
30a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po skye ba gcig gis thog su~M par+d+ham+b+has ni mA g+had+hag so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di na ches nyid de/byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms dpa' chen po
30a7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa them po rnams ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/lus thams ma'i glo goms pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur te/sha ra dwa tI'i bu gang gi tshe/byang
30b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyid pa tha ma pa dag skye ba nas chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sen sa dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma/
30b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam pa ni 'di dag yin/rtags ni 'di dag yin/mtshan mA nI 'di dag yin te/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMde' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni ma'i mngal du zhugs pa nu
30b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang ba dring bas gos par mi 'gyur/drar yid mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor ba mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na yang na mkha' la gnaso//shaM ra dwa tI'i
30b4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste dper na/rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/khang pa brtsegs pa rgyud mor zhugs nas/bar snang gyi na mkha' la mngon
30b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phags shing spyod lam gyis gnas par byed kyang //khang pa brtsegs pa de la reg pa medo//sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma'i mngal na gnas
30b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/nA mkha' la mu ngon par 'phyags nas gnas te/mngal gyi dri ma dang mi gtsang ba dri nga bas mi gos par granas shing /drir yid la mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi
30b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i
31a1(dkon brtsegs): snad pa spyod pa na/'di snyam du snyoms ste/ci ltar bdag da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na/bdung thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur/
31a2(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du byudag/b+ha nA mI pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bi n+te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dbyang chub sems dpa' theg bya
31a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas/namo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
31a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdud dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lho rnams kyis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thad du grag sa mi
31a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongasu zin par ma gyur pa de srid du/bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod
31a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig snya ma//sho rang bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs sa m+b+hi 'khrug pA de/smyon byung
31a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/chos ston pa'am/chos nyan pa'i tshe lan dga' yang de'i lus 'ang 'a ma/sems ngal bar gyur pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhi na//sha ridwa
31b1(dkon brtsegs): dru 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sa dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/chos kyi sku rab tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir//sha radwa
31b2(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cing
31b3(dkon brtsegs): chos nyan pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa de bzhin du/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogaso par sangs

31b5(dkon brtsegs): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa yongasu brjod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po rdzogs s+ho////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
31b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/de bzhin
31b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa dag ni legs/
32a1(dkon brtsegs): par bka' stsal lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/dwa yang ngo bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
32a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa mA chis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan du gsol/de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar byang chub
32a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa po'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang /bcom ldan

32a5(dkon brtsegs): bkur bgyi ba dang /mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs pa dag
32a6(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du'i yon tan bkod pa thos na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
32a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de la blta ba dang /phyag bgyi ba dang /mchod par bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du/'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//de skad ces

33a1(dkon brtsegs): shes ma byung /skom pa'i 'du shes ma byung /mal du nyal ba'i 'du shes m+b+ha byung /lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes na byung gyi/gzhan du ni sems

33a3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs be

35a1(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na/skad cig de dang /thung cig de dang /yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams den/

37b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi shing de'i ya la ga dang /lo ma dang /yal ga phre'u dag rlung gis kun tu bskyod pa na/de dag las snyan pa dang /yid 'ong ba dang /chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra skad dag byung ba de lta bu/

38a2(dkon brtsegs): bsil ba dag las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi shing de las pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /mngon par shes pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi

38a4(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rje su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo//sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
38a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongasu brjod pa dag legs par rab tu nyon la/tshul bzhin
38a6(dkon brtsegs): du yid la zung shig dang /ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dus/bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi lhur
38a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sha re dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
38b1(dkon brtsegs): 'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ngan song gsum po dag myong /gsum grang zhon 'di lta ste/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang /gshin+da rje'i
38b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten no//drer sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lamu dang ldan pa sha stag/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems
38b3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la 'di ltar rje bo'am bran gyi bya drug tu dbye ba yang med//sha rangadwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mI rnams la bsam pa'i chos skyer len pa'i bsam pa yang med//de cir
38b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nr-i san rnams la bdag dang bdag gir yongasu 'dzin pa med pa'i phyiraro//sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi chen po thaMd
38b5(dkon brtsegs): ldolog mthil ltar mnyam la/ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde zhing /gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug la/lha'i nor bu rin po ches spras shing /pad+mo gser gyi kha dog can/'dab ma
38b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag brgya stong dang ldan pa dag gis legs par brgyan la/me tog mAn dar bya dang /mAna? de rad chen po dag mngon par bkram pa/sdong dum dang cher ma dang /gyo mo dang /
38b7(dkon brtsegs): gseg ma med pa ngam grogs dang /gad pa dang /mig tsang ba dor ba'i sa med pa/rdo ba dang ri med pa ste/sha ra dwa ti'i bus gzhi chen po de le/rkang pa bzhag na ni nems ces
