69a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa lag so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'di na/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa'i phyir mi 'ong ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub
69a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yang mtshungs pa lagaso//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'di na/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa'i dgra
69a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing drir skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang mtshungs pa lag so//de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan
69a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de skad ma zed gcig/shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang khyod de skad ma zer cig/
69b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /sangs rgyas
69b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mtshungs la/gang 'di ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mtshungs pa'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gang 'di na byang chub sems dpa'
69b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi semasA lha 'dug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang mtshungs so//de ci'i phyir
69b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsten pa yin par rig
69b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba dang /de dag ni bdud dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis/mi rdzi bar rig par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas
69b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sar mtshams sbyor ba chad par rig par bya ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du//
70a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
70a2(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/'di la gnas brtan rab 'byor
70a3(dkon brtsegs): gyi spobs pa ci 'di 'dra ba bdag gis gnas brtan rab 'byor la sadra par bya'o snyamo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smo so///
70a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag cag gis/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos
70a5(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun dang bcos pa/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dang /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
70a6(dkon brtsegs): de blta bar bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod bcom
70a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i
70b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang bcas pa de dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo lta 'am/smras pa gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag cag gis blta'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byur
70b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lnga 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gnam du bltos shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gan me du bltaso//bltas
70b3(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras//gnas brtan rab 'byor bdag gis gnam du bltas na/stong gi na mkha' thams cad dben par mthong ngo //da skad
70b4(dkon brtsegs): ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ci ltar khyod kyis steng gla na mkha' thod
70b5(dkon brtsegs): dben par mthong ba de bzhin du/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
70b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gas dang bcas pa de dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang de ltar blta bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan
70b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/gang 'di na lung bstan pa'i byang chub
71a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po dang /der smras pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poder tshung so zhes bka' stsal lags nA/brgyan
71a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom ldan 'das de mnyam pa nyid gang zhig gis mtshungs pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan+da paM shA radwa ti'i bu la 'ang
71a3(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bkar sprul to//shA radwa ti'i bu de ni chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mtshungs pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa las le'u
71a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho///de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/btsun pa bac+doMs kyis//bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
71a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus mi 'khrugs pa de/sngon byang chub sems dnga'i spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa yang bshad/de'i sangs rgyas
71a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bshad/nyen thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bshad//byang chub sems dpa'i yon
71a7(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bshad na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
71b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas rgyas mi 'jugs pa ngas mya ngan sa byu btsun pa no du mu pa sha pas/btsun pa nas spyan sa sa na/bcom ldan 'das bzhon gshegs
71b2(dkon brtsegs): byadag+sa bcom pa yang dag rdzogs 'i sangs nas rmyi la d+ha gyis ng+ge'i seM skye ngan las suM nan pa ma 'di dang /chen mji sten gi rgyu
71b3(dkon brtsegs): dag legs par bshad par rigs smras//de nas bcoMs ldan 'das kyis dang nupa shA rad+ya ti'i bu'i snyoms hU~M yangs ga pazugs kyis mthun nas/ dang ldan
71b4(dkon brtsegs): t+yA phrul 'di sa bkar stsal te/shU tI'i zla klung gi nyin ma bcom ldan 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dag rgyas pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i
71b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyus khrugs pa dI smai sa myu na sa 'dir bami nu dem+b+ha sring spyi skye ngan las 'dra ba 'gyur ba sbyin ma snad gsam rgyun du ni na dag rten gyikhams
71b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la chos ba sbyin pa'i de bzhin ga shegs pa sa rbA snrel bA sprul bar 'gyu //denas de bzhin gshegs dri'i sprul pa'i
71b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag sems can de rnams la 'di lta bu'i chos ston par gyur te/chos bstan pa de sa ng+ge rtso bstan pas sems can ji srid bsku'i bar gyur pa de pa ches kyi
72a1(dkon brtsegs): tu ma cing chos grangs myod pa'i sems can dag 'dul bar 'gyur to//de dag las sems can la la dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'dum bar
72a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//la lnga dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o//la la dag ni stobs bcu'i theg pa bla na med pa la 'dul bar 'gyuraro//shA rA dwa ti'i bu de nas bcom
72a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yongasu mya ngan 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
72a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba la/skyes bu dam pa khyod nga'i dam pa'i chos nub nas zhag bdun ldon pa'i 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par
72a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba 'drar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
72a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rigs pa dang zhabasu ldan pa byung bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyu ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi
72a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser gyi pad+ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag pararo rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyuraro//shA radwa
72b1(dkon brtsegs): tI bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bya'i sangs rgyas gser gyi pad+ma de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+d+ra tan+t+ra bkod pa phun su/
72b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan banyid
72b3(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur zhing /shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
72b4(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi prang+ga de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang bcom ldan
72b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /byung
72b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa tse 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyuraro//shU rAdwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
72b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i dus kyi tshe na/sa chen po de rnam pa drug tu g.yo
73a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/g.yo bar 'gyur/rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/kun tu rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/'grul bar 'gyur rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/kun
73a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rab tu 'gul bar 'gyur/ldog par 'gyur/rab tu ldeg par 'gyur/kun tu rab tu ldog par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten du snang ba chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
73a3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der sgra skad chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing sgra de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po dge dang /'og min
73a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha'i ris rnams kyi bar du grags par 'gyur te/de na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris de dag gis sgra de thos nas
73a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yongasu mya ngan lngas 'da' bar 'gyur/
73a6(dkon brtsegs): snyam du rig par 'gyur zhing /'di ltar rang rang gi lha'i gzhal med khang rnams la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par mi dga' bya'i 'du shes
73a7(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang skye bar 'gyur la tshig 'di skad du/kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa/
73b1(dkon brtsegs): spyan du gyur pa/ye shes su gyur pa/dadang du gyur pa/tshad mar gyur pa/snang bar gyur pa/'di shin+da tu myur bar 'jog rten du nub bo zhes rjod par yang 'gyuraro//shA

95a3(dkon brtsegs): nga yang rung bas gang ba'i bang ba gcig gam/gnyis sapa/gsum mAm/bzhi'am/ ma//shu'am/sum n+ye 'am/bzhi bcu'am/
95a4(dkon brtsegs): /bsgyangam/sto dum/'dzum ma ma/ tu mang bdag cig byung du bar byur na/debade snyam du di dgan phu ga byung ba 'dra/dngas par gyur pa n-i 'di da
95a5(dkon brtsegs): lhogs par dgyur smras nas shin tu yangs 'dzin par 'gyur// byi na ni/mug bye ra gyur po ni sems ca rnams phyogs su 'gyur ba'i rgyu/
95a6(dkon brtsegs): teni bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa 'ongs pa na/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'o chen po dag
95a7(dkon brtsegs): nimang 'i yang dgi par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgyabar 'byur haM/phrin med pa ya ga zung rdzogs pa'i bye du
95b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas kyang /dam pa'i chos kyi mu ger gyur pa'i sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos bshad pas dam pa'i chos kyi lo legs pa dang /dge 'dun gyi lo legs par byed
95b2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs ngas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shin tu yongasu bzung ba yino//shA rang
95b3(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
95b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher
95b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags bye ba khrag
95b6(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'gong la/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam
95b7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'debs par byed pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la bcom ldan/
96a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
96a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byung /klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing /gzhan drug la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byed la/
96a3(dkon brtsegs): srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang
96a4(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing mdzad de rab tu 'god na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bya ba'i phyir smon lam ma btab kyang /byung
96a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni phyir mi ldog par rig par bya zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya ste//
96a6(dkon brtsegs): dedag ni rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
96a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
96b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed/kun chub par byed cing /gzhan dag la yang rgya
96b2(dkon brtsegs): tshetshar yang dag par rab tu ston la bzung zhing bcangs la bklags shing kun chub par byas ste/gzhan dag la yang rgya tshararu yang dge par rab tu bsten nas srog chags brgya phrag
96b3(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang /srog chag sde stong phrag mang po dang /sgrog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags b+ha ba khrug khrig brgya stong phrag med pa drug kyang chos kyi rnam grang
96b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jud de 'ged la/srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyang na/de dag ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams kyi
96b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de lta de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
96b6(dkon brtsegs): myur du bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bya/
96b7(dkon brtsegs): bcing bar bya/bklag par bya/kun chub par bya ste/bzung zhing bcangs la/bklags shing kun chub par byas nas srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags
97a1(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang ba dang /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phyug mang po dag la yang bshad par bya/yang //
97a2(dkon brtsegs): dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji lta ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston
97a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las nye bar so nu bar 'gyur te/de dog shes rab chen par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis zag pa zang
97a4(dkon brtsegs): parje su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la la dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
97a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan zhing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/'chang bar

97a7(dkon brtsegs): stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig porgya stong grag meng po dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par
97b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin du 'jug cang 'dzud do/rab tu 'god pa de dag thams cad kyang lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyu ro///shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus
97b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur na/yang de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa tI
97b3(dkon brtsegs): bu de bas na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du myed par 'dod pa dag gyis bcom ldan 'das ban
97b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya zhing thos nam kyang bzung bar bya//
97b5(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/kun chub par bya/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bsten par bya zhing sreg chags brgya phrag mang po dang /srog chags stong
97b6(dkon brtsegs): phrag mang po dang /srog chags brgya stong phrag mang ba dang /srog tshugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin dug zhug
97b7(dkon brtsegs): bapar bya/gzung bar bya/rab tu dgong par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongasu bzung ba la rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams
98a1(dkon brtsegs): nI lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur bar byung //sha rA rtardza du chags kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la lnga dag yo
98a2(dkon brtsegs): tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzhan dag la dus dus su yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag ni lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par
98a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//sangs rgyus 'byung ba gnyis pa las 'da' bar ni mi gyur//shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bcom
98a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa d+man bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta dza la
98a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de lta de ltar shes rab chen por
98a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i las byed par 'gyur zhing bsogs par 'gyur ro//de dag shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa des lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom
98a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid mngon sum du byed par yang 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag lus de nyid kyi dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par mi 'gyur na yang /yang dag par//

99a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang chos kyi rnam gangs 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'jud de rab tu 'gong la/
99a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du sgrub cing rtsol 'bad nga slob cing mos na /shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni srid pa tha ma pa la
99a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'am/skye bo gcig gis thogs pa'am/skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa 'am/skye ba gsum gyis thogs pa ste/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis
99a4(dkon brtsegs): pa las 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//shA ra dwa ta'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug
99a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis thos par mi nus te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus rigs
99a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ba zhig gi rna lam du grag par gyur na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des kyang myur ba myur bar bzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag
99a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya/kun chub par bya zhing /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
99b1(dkon brtsegs): la zhig gis sems can 'ga' zhig gi don gyi phyir/kye ma sems can 'dis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa drugra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrug+sas
99b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur cig ces 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di dbyig dang gser gyis yongasu bkang ste sbyin pa byin zhing yongs btang b.ro gyur kyang /
99b3(dkon brtsegs): rang ti'i bu sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegasu pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gos pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa d+mo'i yin
99b4(dkon brtsegs): tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus//de ci'i phyir zhe nA/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos thams cad rab tu 'byed cing /rigs kyi bu dang /
99b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams srungs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir//shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
99b6(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag na granas par mi 'gyur to/
99b7(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bu gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi lag tu gnas par 'gyuraro//shA radwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mi/
100a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gro lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas bya dang /lus la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yino//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste
100a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na rin po che rin thang med pa rin po che ba gang yang rung ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas khyer te 'ongs par gyur na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/nar bur na
100a3(dkon brtsegs): po che de dang po kho nar sma'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rin po che don dang po kho nar rgyal po 'am/rgyal po'i bu rnams sam/
100a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i blon po chen po rnams kyi sug par mchi bar 'gyur lagaso//bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

100b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas na/rigs kyi bu 'am

100b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi/bklag par bgyi kun chub par bgyi zhing gzhan dag la

100b6(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di la zhugs pa ni phyir ma ldog pa'i chos nyid rje su 'thab par 'gyur ba'i sla du'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
100b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/de de bzhin//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par
101a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i///
101a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bkrug par bya/kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//shA radwa ti'i
101a3(dkon brtsegs): bu 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun po dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba yino//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du ngas 'khor bzhi po
101a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ston yongasu brjod pa'i chochos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba shing cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
101a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis
101a6(dkon brtsegs): bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/gang dag gis ston yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
101a7(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dang /nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa
101b1(dkon brtsegs): ded+ma sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam dang /rang rang gi drug pa'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dgra bskal pa bzang
101b2(dkon brtsegs): bopo 'di la sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu cu rtsa drug gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i spangs rgyas bcom ldani 'das de dag thams cad kyang dper na ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi po dag la bshad//
101b3(dkon brtsegs): cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bzhin du lhag chad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
101b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyuraro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub
101b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
101b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i ston yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya//
101b7(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bya zhing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas
102a1(dkon brtsegs): nus mngon par 'byung ba la la zhog gos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i ston
102a2(dkon brtsegs): yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /gzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /bklag pa dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
102a3(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bstan par byar mi rlung par gyur la/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas nas mngon par byung ba de la gal te la la zhig
102a4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di skad du/gal te rigs kyi bu khyod kyi khyim gyi gnas na gnas shing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed nA/de ltar na ngas khyod la bcom ldan
102a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par byed
102a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyimargya gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir
102a7(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa 'am/bzung ba 'am/bcang ba 'am/bklag pa 'am/kun chub par bya ba 'am/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par
102b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan par bya bar rnyed na/khyim gyi glan su song ste/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdung zhing kun chub par byas te/ming phyir mngon dA rA//
102b2(dkon brtsegs): byung yang byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung bar btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par ngas rjesu gnang ngo //de ci'i/
102b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'dus pa na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
102b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te grong ngam/grong khyer rame/thag
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ring por gyur pa gang zhig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i
102b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des der bgrod par bya zhing /der phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
102b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya/bcang bar bya//
103a1(dkon brtsegs): bak+Shak+sha pA m+b+ha/kun rgyub pad+maH/slong gzhan dgapa yang sa / sgyu/shA tI'i thug+sa sa tu rigs kyi bu'am/rigs bu mo gang la ny+dza
103a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs po dgra bcomI pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan mongasu brjod de'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'i
103a3(dkon brtsegs): bzung bar bya/bcang ba /klag par bya/kun chub par bya zhing gzhan drug la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa/shrI rAdwa te bu
103a4(dkon brtsegs): gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i
103a5(dkon brtsegs): yon+ta tan yongs brjod de'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brjod par mi nus kyi glegs pam du byas pa zhig lag nA srel byer gyur na/des glegs dam des bAnas te/phyir
103a6(dkon brtsegs): log nas bdag gis gle gus bam bri bar bya'o//gal te glegaskye bam bskur du mi sbyor na yang de nyid du bri bar bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
103a7(dkon brtsegs): bu mo de 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod zan bcad de 'dri ba phod na de ltar ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
103b1(dkon brtsegs): depa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes zer na yang des zan bcad de 'dug la bri bar bya'o//glal te yang 'di
103b2(dkon brtsegs): skyang 'chag cing yang bris shig ces zer na yang des 'chag cing bri bIr bya'o//ga bau ti yang 'di skad du 'greng ste bris shig ces zer na yang des 'greng ste bri bar bya'o//gal
103b3(dkon brtsegs): teyang 'di skad 'dug ste bris shig ces zer na yang des 'dug ste bri bor bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu ga lI te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig bcom
103b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i don gyi phyir grong
103b5(dkon brtsegs): dam/grong khyer du song na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bu'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod
103b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma rnyed par gyur na/de rgyal khams gzhan nam yul gzhan dag tu yang bgrod cing grang du thos par 'gyur ba der 'gro bar bya'o//der phyin nas/
103b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu ba rjod pa'i chos kyi
104a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di mnyan par bya/bzung bar bya/bcang bar bya/bklag par bya/kun chub par bya zhing /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu
104a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti ri bu de ltar gang du thos par 'gyur ba der phyin nas gol te ma rnyed na yang des 'di snyam du gang gi phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsher
104a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi'i khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos par gyur pa sa na/bdag ni bla na
104a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa yang tshwa' la/gang gis da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
104a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de'i ming bstan pa de yang bdag la phan par 'dod pa/bde bar
104a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa/don du 'dod pa/grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pas ni snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

104b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gi spangs bshud de/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis thos pa dang /gang dag thos
104b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa yin//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
104b3(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
104b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su'i mthus thos par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /
104b5(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nga 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod
104b6(dkon brtsegs): ngapa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyi mthus thos par
104b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing /ji ltar dam pa'i chos smra ba dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan
105a1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di smra bar 'gyur ba da ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang //lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang spro ba skye bar 'gyur la/byang
105a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag nyan par 'gyur ba de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pas kyang rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin
105a3(dkon brtsegs): spro ba skye bar 'gyuraro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
105a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
105a5(dkon brtsegs): ni gyon gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa lag so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA radwa
105a6(dkon brtsegs): ti'i bu de de bzhin te de de bzhino//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
105a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ston gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa yin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
105b1(dkon brtsegs): la dag 'jigs pa'am skrag par gyur na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yung dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod
105b2(dkon brtsegs): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gri 'jigs pa dang skrag pa de dag med par 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te phyogs la la zhig tu 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba brub
105b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/de 'bab pa na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
105b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan nas brjod cing /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang
105b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis klu brgya phrag mang ba dang /klu stong phrag mang po dang /klu brgya stong phrag mang po dang /klu bye
105b6(dkon brtsegs): pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag ming po dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag thar par mdzod tsong thar par mdzad nas kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongasu bsngo ste/dge ba'i
105b7(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan deng gzhan dag tutu/
106a1(dkon brtsegs): khro mo dag gis 'khor lo dog po lta bu'i sbyor ba 'bobs par byed bas/don sems can gang dag 'jigs shing skyug par gyur pa de dag badrug gis mtshan
106a2(dkon brtsegs): nas brjod par 'gyur zhing de dbadag gi mthus 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ster ba de nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces yang su bsngos pa'i bden pa dang bden de'i tshig des/bdag
106a3(dkon brtsegs): cag la 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'grub pa 'di dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam+b+ha gyis na klu rnams kyi 'khor lo lta bu'i sarU ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te/
106a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can+d+ra de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni mi gtog so//shI ra dwa ti'i bu gzhin yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 'jigs pa 'am/
106a5(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa'am/yams kyi nang dam/gnod pa byung bar gyur pa na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi
106a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa de rjesu dran par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub
106a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa skyed pa no bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang /tshig brjod pa gang yin pa'i dam bcas pa dang /tshig brjod pa de
106b1(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/da ma bcas pa dang /tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig des 'jigs pa dang ///
106b2(dkon brtsegs): skrag pa dang /yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa 'di dag nub par gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa dang /skrag pa de dag dang /yams kyi nad de dag dang
106b3(dkon brtsegs): gnod pa de dag nub par 'gyur te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag gi sngon gyi les kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogaso//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan
106b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcig bla na med pa yang dag par
106b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi/gnyis ni ma lags pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta legs pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems
106b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
106b7(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yid dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang
107a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
107a2(dkon brtsegs): ti bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te de de bzhino//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blun
107a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag
107a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam pa yang dag par
107a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyangs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu gzung ba de ltar gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
107a7(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ba dang /de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyung ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
107b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas/
107b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyang mtshungs/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs/kha dog kyang mtshungs/rtags kyang mtshungs/rigs kyang mtshungs/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu 'dzin
107b3(dkon brtsegs): par yang mtshungs/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'dus pa yang mtshungs/de dag gi rnam par grol ba yang mtshungs mod kyi/gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
107b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa tha dad par 'gyur ba dang /seng ge'i khri tha dad pa dang /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khyil 'khor tha dad pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar
107b5(dkon brtsegs): zad do//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams shar phyogasu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
107b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag 'tshol nas 'di skad/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAm thub pas gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
108a1(dkon brtsegs): byur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma 'a khrugs par smon tan yongasu brjod pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dir bshad d+ha'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
108a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshalo//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom bya
108a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tsha lo phyag 'tshal zhes lan gsum du ched brjed pa cheng du brjod do//de nas 'dod pa na spyod
108a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lce rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis m+b+ha'i me tog man dor ba dang /man der ba chen po dang /lha'i spos dag gis bcom ldan 'das
108a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gtar /mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor to//
108a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang /spos de dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi na mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen por
108a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur te//gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
108b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs bu'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma/
108b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa gal ba de log su me tog dag gis gtor bar gyur to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po
108b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang /tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
108b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ma thong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o snyam//de nas bcom
108b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongasu rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te bar snang la skyil mo grangs bcas
108b6(dkon brtsegs): te bzhugs par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang steng gi na mkhwal mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi mthus
108b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na spyod pI lha de dag dang /tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang /steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas par smang la 'khod par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
109a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad/ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'khor
109a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi po de dag dang /'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
109a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang /
109a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mthong bar gyur to//mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga steng gi bar snang la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das de
109a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
109a6(dkon brtsegs): bshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to//de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de
109a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang /'di snyam du sems te/
109b1(dkon brtsegs): 'driltar lha'i kha dog dang /mtshan ma dang /dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ce sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams/bcom ldan 'das du
109b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir
109b3(dkon brtsegs): lhags pa'i lha rnams yin nam/'on tu 'di ni ma yin snya mo//do nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/'di dag ni lha yin te/dam pa'i chos nyan pa
109b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi'i cha lugs dang /rtags 'dzin zhing /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan
109b5(dkon brtsegs): snga na 'dug go/de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang dpal dang bskal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dag lan 'ga' yang
109b6(dkon brtsegs): me mthong ma thos pa'i phyiraro snya mo//de nas bcom lda ni 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsduso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /
109b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag ni tsam dang bcas yang gnyis dang bcas par thugasu chud nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ko'u
110a1(dkon brtsegs): / du rgyu ldan dab dunan tu nan ma ga gas sa na rdzu 'ardzunas sa d+g+ha N+ya/
110a2(dkon brtsegs): da du smras pa'i mi da kunI d+ha'i kyi byer snang bye dang / kyi spyod pa dag rdzun pa min//dri nas lha'i dbyung po brgya byin 'di snyam du sams te/mau gang ngas
110a3(dkon brtsegs): sa spyongs rgyas kyang med lci'i khongs spyod spyod pa dang ldan pa'i myi de dag ni sna'i thun sumatshogs pa dang ldan pa spyi 'did bar ba sbyin na/nga
110a4(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jig rten ni khams gzhan dak+Sha dang /ng+ges rgyas zh-i g+h+ri ni dge nas shi naste/ma ldan 'das de ste ni TI ga shegs pa dgra btsam tha ma
110a5(dkon brtsegs): drug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgya sa kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'drid par bye ba yin sum//de nas tshe dang ldan pA shU t+yA
110a6(dkon brtsegs): tI'i dus m+b+ha'i dbang po brgya byin lha 'di skad ces smras//kau tshwa shi ka gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshogs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs
110a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thub pa mthong shing /ma ldan 'das dri zhin gyi shegs pa drug zin mi ma yid dge pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang mdza
110b1(dkon brtsegs): na/kau shi kra gal te do tsam gyis khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/kau shi ka gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos//
110b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/gang dag gi rna lam du yon tan yongasu brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed
110b3(dkon brtsegs): yin na/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
110b4(dkon brtsegs): to//kro'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po'i gang zag gang dgra sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na//
110b5(dkon brtsegs): ko'u shi ka dA ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//ko'u shi kA srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar sems bskyed
110b6(dkon brtsegs): na/de dag ni de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bya'o//bai com ldan 'das kyis
110b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad po nani dge slong lnga stong tsam ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge
111a1(dkon brtsegs): stong brgyad stong gis ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dUr skye bar smon lam btab bo//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs
111a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btub bo//byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa po'i dge bsnyen brgyad stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lAme btab bo//byang chub
111a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen mkhris kyangasangs kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo//'dod po na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
111a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste/de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
111a5(dkon brtsegs): der skye zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to//gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sems can
111a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur de dag kyang de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang bar lung
111a7(dkon brtsegs): ston par 'gyur te/lung bsten nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
111b1(dkon brtsegs): nA/rlos nam rnam 'a dang rgyun gyis nas sa/ngasasum byung can pa phyo sa na no/mas 'du sasan/ma pa drug tu gams to/gan
111b2(dkon brtsegs): /san tu ga tu g.yas/'grol rab tu 'gyu /kun tu ra hU~M du ma/sdig rje /na d+hA shAN+DI d+h+r-i/ thugs na la khrugs/kun tu
111b3(dkon brtsegs): khrug/ rab tu ru /san+da tu da mai d+hi ma ra hU~M/kun tu tu mchim zhing /'jig rten du snang brnyan pa
111b4(dkon brtsegs): baim+WA ///bcom ldan 'di sa de skad ces bka'i stsal pa dang /rgyu dang ldan pa shar ti'i bu dang /maud du rdzun pa kun dga' bo dang /rmi lnga byinan pa bang
111b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang po brgya byin dade/mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /dge slong de dge dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/skyedang /mi dang /snum+bu
111b6(dkon brtsegs): /dri ba de btsas pa'i ga rten yid rungaswA hU~M/btsam ldan da ga sung sa bye sa mngon par //'gags byed kyi mchog rdzogs kyi
111b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs lan stong phrag brgya ba las mi lajugs pa'i rjen pa'i le'u zhes kyiste drug pargyanas hU~M/ /shrI ma ki steng lnga brgyal ni bcu ste bam ba ldan//
112a1(dkon brtsegs): /rgyug mo ma ngan badzin mot+pa dang /gru na ba d+ho dang /rgyun rgyal mdun dam shos spros sgyur rdzo nus to gton la phab da'o//
112a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dugs pa ban ma ga tu rdzogs parten pa'i gyis myirnam skye m+b+ha 'i d+h+rU m+b+hi zug rgyu phrul g+sa / kun pa zhes bya ba thug pa chen pa'i sgrig///bam pa dang ga
112a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gci na/bcom ldan 'das rtul po'i khab byuka lan 'ad ka'i
112a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas 'ad ma'i tshol na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa shA stag dang
112a5(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/den pa bcom ldan 'das la 'khor mang po brgya sna tshad med pas yongasu bskor zhing gus pas rim gro dang /dkur bsti byas par
112a6(dkon brtsegs): gyurate//de'i tshe'i khar 'dus pa de byang chub sems 'a mams dang chen na zlas mthar yas shes byub 'dus par gyur pa de pa spyan pas 'dus nas
112a7(dkon brtsegs): gipa phrag pacig tu bzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang se la btsugs nas/skye bos btung nga byug 'tshal nos bcom ldan 'das bral ze tshogs bral mo sna
112b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das bdag la the tsom cung zad cig mchis te/de bzhin gshogs pa la zhu bar 'tshal na thugs rjes gnang bar mdzad cing bdag la bshad du gsol/de skad
112b2(dkon brtsegs): ces gsol pa dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyi tshig su bcu de gsol pa/dpa' chen skyes bu chen po ste//'jig rten dag/
112b3(dkon brtsegs): na mtshungs ma mchis//bdag ni sems can dag gi slang //the tsom cung zad zhu ba lags//seng ge'i gdan la ma bzhengs par//sku ni phyogs bcu kun du khyab//
112b4(dkon brtsegs): thAtha dang smra ba thams cad kyis//gang yang bskul bar mi 'gyur bar//mkhyen pa'i gter ni mtha' mi mnga'//stobs rnams kyang ni tshad me mchis//bcom ldan stobs
112b5(dkon brtsegs): ni re res kyang //'jig rten ma lus sgrol bar mdzad//thams cad mkhyen la rab gnas shing //stobs bcu lnga ni gang gnas pa//mi 'jigs seng ge chen po ste//rgyal
112b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bla na med pa'i gtso//ma 'dres chos ni bcwo brgyad dag/de bzhin gshegs la mnga' bas na//'jig rten rnams ni gsal mdzad cing //mu stegs rnams ni pham par
112b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//chos rnams thams cad rab mkhyen pas//de slad mtha' med mchog ces bgyi//nyams pa mi mnga'i 'dren pa la//bdag ni tha tsam zhu ba lags//ji/
113a1(dkon brtsegs): med mkhyen pa mtha' ma ba//mkhyen pa mi g.yo rgya mtsho bzhin//mkhyen pa yul la thugs mi mngar//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//bcom ldan lags
113a2(dkon brtsegs): par bsgoms pas na//lom la the tshom yod mi mnga'//bder gnas 'dren pa chen po la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//chu bo dag ni rab brgal zhing //mtshams sbyor
113a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ching ba yongs bcad pa//gdug pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs bcom zhing //nyon mongs gdung ba nyer zhi ba//shin tu
113a4(dkon brtsegs): bsil la rab gnas la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//'jigs med ye shes bla med dang //ye shes chags dang thogs med pa//chos kyi mtsho yi mkhyen pa rnams//de
113a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum brnyes//sangs rgyas yon tan tshad med pas//mngon sum mkhyen pa yongasu rdzogs//zag pa thams cung zad gyur zhing //nyon mongs lta
113a6(dkon brtsegs): bas rab bcom pa//bcom ldan yon tan tshad med pa//mang po dag ni rab tu brtsegs//bsam gyis mi byeb chos rje la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//bcom ldan
113a7(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis mkhyen pa yis//'jig rten kun ni bsal bar mdzad//chos kyi snang ba ston mdzad pas//yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' mi mnga'//'dren pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gyis//
113b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten kun du gsal bar mdzad//ngo slad 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi//chos kyi 'od zer snang ba lags//chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen//spobs bla dag ni bla na meng //brtson 'grus//
113b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab cing //rnam ngag lta la rab spangs pa//sangs rgyas spyan ni mtha' med pas//mkhyen pa'i yul yang mtha' mi mnga'//'jig rten mtshungs med gtso bo la///
113b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//chos rgyal thub pa chen po yis//sems can the tshom gcod par mdzad//'dren pa la ni bdag zhun//mos pa ji bzhin bkas bshang gsol//
113b4(dkon brtsegs): lha dang mi yi 'jig rten kun//thams cad bdag gis rab brtags na//de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs med pas//thams cad ma lus gsal bar mdzad//yon tan rnams la
113b5(dkon brtsegs): rab gnas shing //rgyan dang ldan pa'i skyes chen lags//bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyal//drang srong nang na gsal ba'o//dper na grangs ri chen po ni//rin chen kun gyis
113b6(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa'i gnas//bcom ldan chos ga na bzhugs pa yi//bkod pa dag kyang de bzhin no//rab dbyangs brtson 'grus chen po yis//yid 'ong sgra ni ston mdzad pa//
113b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag thos gyur ni//dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam dag 'gyur//bcom ldan mi yi mchog lags pas//chos kyi snang ba ston par mdzad//des na sems can zad kyi//
114a1(dkon brtsegs): /yod bzhin blo ni bde bde bar 'gyur//dus dang 'khor ni rab mkhyen zhing //gang zag mkhyen pa 'dren pa yis//chos kyi snang ba ston mdzod pas//dus mkhyen pa/
114a2(dkon brtsegs): yi blo ldan lags//tshangs skad brtson 'grus chen po yis//rnam dag gsung ni bkas bshang gsol//char chen sa la 'bab pa ltar//chos kyi byin gyis khyab par mdzod//
114a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'khor 'dus nang bzhugs te//kun tu chos kyi char phrab nas//chos 'dri la ni gang re ba//sems can rnams ni tshim par mdzod//mchog tu bde la rab gnas pa
114a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po re rab ji lta bzhin//sems can rnams la sbyin mdzad cing //mang po dag ni dga' bar mdzod//dpa' tshan rkang gnyis gtso dag gi/spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab
114a5(dkon brtsegs): pas//sems can dag ni thams cad kyis//gang yang 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro//skyes bu chen po tshad ma mchis//'khor 'dus 'thun par gyur pa dag/thub pa che lnga brten
114a6(dkon brtsegs): nas ni//sangs rgyas spyod yul tshol ba lags//bdag ni sangs rgyas spyod yul la//gzhol ba'i slad 'dir mchis na//'dren pa mkhyen pa thogs mi mnga'//ji ltar
114a7(dkon brtsegs): myur du dbye mi mdzod//bdag ni de yi mos pa yin//zhal du bltas nas zhu lags na//bcom ldan thugs rje rab phye nas//the tsom rnams ni bcad du gsol//bla med
114b1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni thos gyur na//sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur//lus ni dga' bas khyab gyur nas//the tshom dra ba chad par gyur//chos kyi rgyal po bla med gtso//thams cad mkhyen par
114b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs mi mnga'//thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad la//the tshom cung zad yong mi mnga'//rob brtson
114b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa chen po la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//bla med the tshom chad pa'o//chos la the tshom mi mnga' ba//yonA tan rgya mtsho dpag med la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lag//
114b4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba chen po dpag meng dang //yon tan chen po dpag myed dang //rnam dag mkhyen pa dpag med la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//brtson 'grus mkhyen pa dpag
114b5(dkon brtsegs): ming dang //spyod yul mkhyen pa dbug med dang //phan 'dogs mkhyen pa dpag mod la//bdag ni the tshom zhu ba ljags//bcom ldan mkhyen pa mtha' med kyang //mtha'
114b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtha' mdo rab tu spangs//the tshom thams cad gcod pa la//bau dag ni the tshom zhu ba lags//bsam gyis mi khyab chos kyi rgyu la//thugs rjes zhu ba gsan du gsol//
114b7(dkon brtsegs): gnad par mdzad ni bdag zhu na//thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol//thams cad mkhyen pa shAkya'i gtso//grangaso chen la ni zhu ba lags//gal te thugs rjes gnang //
115a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na//the tshom dra ba bcad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa//
115a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas dang khyod kyis nga'i zhal du bltas nas/sems rtse gcig tu gsol ba 'debs pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba du zhig zhu bar sems/gal
115a3(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba yod na ngas bshad par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcwa de bka' stsal pa/blo gros mtha' yas khyod kyis ni///
115a4(dkon brtsegs): nga la ci zhig dri bar sems//de bzhin du ni zhus shig dang //ngas ni rab tu bshad par bya//khyed kyis ji skad dris pa bzhin//re re las ni gsal phye nus//ji ltar mos dang
115a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun pa bzhin//myur du phye ste rab bshad//ngas ni khyod la rab bshad kyis//thams cad the tshom med par byos//ji ltar khyod kyis 'dod pa bzhin//khyod kyis zhus dang
115a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho mye bar bshud//deng khyod dus bzhin zhu bar gyis//dus dang don ni ji lta bzhin//dus bzhin du ni zhus pa'i phyir//ngas ni nges par rab bsha do//ji ltar khyod
115a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mos pa bzhin//zhu ba dag ni zhus shig dang //ngas ni thams cad rjes mthun par//khyod la rab tu bshad par bya//deng khyod dus su zhus shig dang //ras kyang dus bzhin
115b1(dkon brtsegs): bshad par bya//the tshom dra ba bcad pas nA//the tshom med pa thob par 'gyur//nga ni chos kyi rjer gyur pas//don na mthar phyin thugasasu chud//chos rnams thams cad dag la yang /
115b2(dkon brtsegs): thethotshom med pa brnyes pa yin//de ni chos rnams thams cad las//mngo na sangs rgyas pas bsam bka' yin//sems can mos pa ji bzhin du//zhus pa dag ni ston par mdzad//
115b3(dkon brtsegs): nga ni chos rnams thams cad la//thogs pa dag ni mi mnga' bas//dus bzhin du ni zhus pa la//myur du bshad par mdzad pa yin//dasA ni dus bzhini rab bshad cing //the tshom
115b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni mi mnga' bas//de yi mos pa ji lta bar//de yi the tshom gcod par mdzod//nga ni rtag tu dus rnams dang //'khor 'dus pa yi bsam pa dang //sems can dag ni
115b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi//bsam pa tha dad mkhyen pa yin//rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi//'dod pa dang ni 'dod med pa//so sor rab tu brtags nas ni//de dag gsal bar
115b6(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa yin//gal te blo dang ldan pa rnams//lcogs pa nyid du sgrub byed na//nga yi dus dang sbyar nas ni//yang dag chos ston gro bar mdzad//blo dang mi ldan de dag ni//
115b7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug dag gis rmongs bkrugs shing //de dag shes rab snang byed pas//yang dag chos la gos mi 'gyur//gal te gus pa med 'gyur na//yang dag chos ni tshel
116a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed//chos 'di thob par gyur kyang ni//snang ba chen po'i shos mi skye//gang zhig chos lnga mkhas gyur pa//tshos la mos shing tshol bar byed//
116a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te chos 'di thos 'gyur no//bar snang ye shes thob par 'gyur//theg chen dag la mos pa ni//mi yi gtso bo tshal byed pas//bar snang ye shes thob par 'gyur/
116a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab gnyir ba dag/bsim gyis mi khyab ye shes la//gzhol ba gang yin de dag ni//thos pas yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//dpag med ye shes la
116a4(dkon brtsegs): myomos dang //bsam gyis mi khyab gnyer ba dag/des ni chos ni thos gyur na//bla med ye shes thob par 'gyur//sems can dag ni la la zhig/byang chub snying po
116a5(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba dang //bla med 'khor lo bskor 'dod pa//chos 'di thos na dga' bar 'gyur//mos shing rab tu brtson pa dang //chos la gtso bor grang 'dzin pa//dri med
116a6(dkon brtsegs): chos ni thos gyur na//mos shing rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//gal te sems can la la dag/legs par bsgrub pa mos gyur pa//chos kyi 'od zer snang ba yi//bla ste//
116a7(dkon brtsegs): med ches 'di bstan par bya//khur lho rnams ni khyer ba dang //nan tan bsgrub la gang mos pa//des ni tshe sa ni thos 'gyur na//dga' bas kun tu khyab par
116b1(dkon brtsegs): sgru// dkrug rlu tums pa y-i//dge pa'i chos ni sems byed na//dA skyong bats+tsha ba dam panaganas// b+h+yo stan pa da//spyod la sogs la thugs
116b2(dkon brtsegs): /zlas pa nang yang dgangs / mug na 'a spyod hU~Mn /sa mas ga brnam
116b3(dkon brtsegs): kho tshom dag ni bstan/ mas reg sa // ma mau // da nan /skye tu bstan pasan/
116b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyum rnams ni gnad par bya//shAts+tsha trAM tshim yang gyu //de ltar 'ad m+san par gyis//ts+tsha ma~Ms bzhin na// ni shang pa gyi/
116b5(dkon brtsegs): myed byu / shin ba sa//dun rgyas zlaganas pa'aM//gal pa me sa pa tshus b+ha
116b6(dkon brtsegs): dada' sum sna dang rgyan gags smra d+hAr seMs kyis su kyis kluna'i sbyin 'dang de bzhi klu shegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
116b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ga byeng chub kyim seM 'i drug bya la du sa kyis phyogs rgyas pa drang thu gyis byi skyes kyi bya jigs pa spang sanas yang dag
117a1(dkon brtsegs): sems co gcig tu sems can rnams kyi sgra du go cha chen po bgos nas go cha chen pos rab tu brgyan pa dang /mos pa chen po bskrad nas gus par bgyod pa/
117a2(dkon brtsegs): dang /bag yod pa dang bcas pas theg pa chen po 'di la 'tshal nas shin tu rnam par dag pa chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi shul mtho dman+ta dang /ts+tsho mo dang /gseg ma dang /
117a3(dkon brtsegs): tsher ma dang /mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lta ba'i thibs po rnams ma mchis pa/zug rngu gdug pa'i sdug bsngal da /nyon mongs pa'i g.yangs ma mchis pa
117a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /'jigs shing skrag pa da /bar chud ma mchis pa dang /dra shing ma gyur ma mchis pa dang /de kho na nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi shul dang /thogs pa ma mchis
117a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shul du zhugs nas/lta ba'i thibs po rnams bcad pa dang /dra ba thams cad bral ba dang /mun nag thams cad bsal ba dang /srid pa'i mngon bzhin pa
117a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams spangs pa dang /'du 'phrong rnams spangs pa'i sku du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
117a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag don 'di'i sladu zhu bo gsal ba lagaso//skyes bu dam pa ji lta bus gi cha chen po ji lta
117b1(dkon brtsegs): bu bgosta na/go cha chen po bgos bya ngas theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas lam chen po 'dis gzhol zhing yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sam
117b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha'i bkod pa gang lags pa dang /lam la gnas pa dang /chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa lnga gnas pa geng lags pa bkrus bsha
117b3(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/chos kyi tshul mkhas pa la rab tu gnas pas ni chos rnams kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i snang ba bskyed par 'gyur la/chos kyi snang ba'i dbang gis ni gro cha mi spong bar
117b4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la 'tshal nas nur ba ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /brjed ngas pa mi mchis pa'i dbang po dang /rgyun chad pa ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi stobs
117b5(dkon brtsegs): myugyur du chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la gsal bar mkhas pa mngon par bsgrubs nas byang chub kyi snying por bgrod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams la
117b6(dkon brtsegs): yid dag par chos sbyin pa'i slad du/sems can thams cad ji ltar mos pa dang /ji ltar gzhol bu bzhin du 'khor ba las rnam par grol bar 'gyur lagaso//bcom
117b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'das sems can rnams la sman pa dang /bde bar bgyi ba'i slad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
118a1(dkon brtsegs): /rgyus lce bdag don 'di zhwa lagaso//bcom ldan 'das d+ma bzhin gshogs pan+d+ha thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa lags na//chos glang
118a2(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyu'i ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /tI nge 'dzin thob pa'i dbang gis
118a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par spangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba
118a4(dkon brtsegs): glang lags pa bkas bshad du gsel//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa dang /gzigs pa ni ngo mtshur rmad du byung ba'i chos yongs su
118a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs shing /sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyi sman rab tu mkhyen pa lags pas/de'i slad du bdag zhu ba gsol lagaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
118a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi slad //sangs rgyas chos don zab mo dag/thams
118a7(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen cing gzigs pa po//rkang gnyis gtso la bdag zhu lags//theg pa chen po rnal 'byor pa//ting 'dzin gang gis gzhol gyur pa//sems can rnams
118b1(dkon brtsegs): lan spyad du//bdag ni zhu ba gsol ba lags//ji ltar skyes bu dam pa yis//go cha dpag mod+ma bgo bar 'gyur//ji ltar go cha bgos nas kyang //ji ltar
118b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzhil bar 'gyur//ji ltar 'dun pa spang bar 'gyur//ji ltar de la sred par 'gyur//ji ltar brtson 'grus chen por 'gyur//ji ltar bag yang ldan pa
118b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//theg tshon 'di la gzhol bar bgyid//de lus 'tshal ni nI bgyid pa//dngos po 'di dag bkas bshad gsol//
118b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar thig chen po tig nas ni//byang chub sems la gzhol gyur pa//'jig rten 'dren pa'i thugs rje yis//myur du bdag la bkres bshad gsol//ji ltar
118b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag mnyam lam gyis//m+b+hanyam pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur//lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dag/gcod par bgyid la sbyin med 'gyur//spyod yul dag
118b6(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad las//ji ltar bgyis na 'da' bar 'gyur//ji ltar mnyam pa nyid dag gis//'dod chags dra ba bral bar 'gyur//ji ltar mun nig rab
118b7(dkon brtsegs): bsal nas//ye shes snang chen thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis//ji ltar bgyis na gzhol bar 'gyur//ji ltar so sor rab
119a1(dkon brtsegs): brtags pas//'tshong ba mang po spong bar 'gyur//dzaM ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//'tshong ba sbyangs nas bde bar gnas//ji ltar byang
119a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rnams//'jigs bla che las 'da' bar 'gyur//chos kyi don la mkhas gyur nas//bla med la ni gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'
119a3(dkon brtsegs): rdo lta bu'i//dpag med ge cha bgro bar bgyid//go cha de dag bgos nus kyang //theg chen la nI 'tshal bar bgyid//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//mnyam
119a4(dkon brtsegs): nyid lam la gzhol bar bar bgyid//bdag gis deng 'dir zhus pa 'ang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol//byang chub sems dpa' ji lta byar//go
119a5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa thob 'gyur dang //bla med theg chen rab brgyan pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsal//lam 'dri la ni gnas pa dang //lam de'i bkod pa gang
119a6(dkon brtsegs): lags dang //chos rnams lnga ni mkhas gyur pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkras bya shang gsol//chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rnams dang //chos la mkhas pa'i snang
119a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag/ji lta bung ni rtags gyur pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshad gsol//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//chos kyi snang ba de thos nas//chos rnams
119b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthar phyin pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bshang gsal//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//chos kyi snang brjo gyur nas//gaur+b+ha chen po mi skyong zhid/
119b2(dkon brtsegs): yi dbang gis gzhal gyur lags//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//theg cheni 'di la 'tshal nas ni//brtson 'grus ldog par mi 'gyur zhing //de yi dbang gis
119b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhol 'gyur lags//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams//bsam pa dag ni rab brtun+da zhing //'di ltar shes rab stobs dag gis//shin tu 'dul ba thob 'gyur
119b4(dkon brtsegs): lelags//ji ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi//tshul la mkhas pas thob par 'gyur//chos kyi rgyal po bsnam mi khyag/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkrus bshang gsol//
119b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar myur ba kho nar ni//byang chub snying por bgrod 'gyur nas//su yang bskor bar mi 'gyur ba//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor 'gyur lags//ji ltar g.yo ba ma mchis
119b6(dkon brtsegs): par//sngon gyi smon lam ji lta bzhin//sems can thams cad kun la ni//chos rnams yang dag ston 'gyur lags//chos rnams yang dag bsten pas na//'khor
119b7(dkon brtsegs): ba las ni bral 'gyur lags//ji ltar bgyis na sems can rnams//gtan du bde ba thob 'gyur legs//sems can rnams la sman slang//'jig rten 'dren pa
120a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag zhun//thams cad mkhyen zhing gzigs pa pos//thugs rjes bdag la bkas bshad gsol//chos ni gang dang gang dag gis//byang chub snyoms dpa'
120a2(dkon brtsegs): smin bgyid pa//chos kyi rgya mtsho thams cad kyis//ting 'dzin phyag rgya mdzad du gsol//sangs rgyas chos la rab mas shing //byang chub che la gang lta bo//chos kyi sgra 'di thos
120a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur na//lus kun khyab por dga' bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa' chen bu blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa//blo gas
120a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas khyod ston sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing ston gzhal du med pa bsags pas na chos zab mo
120a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la rab tu gdung bas mos par gyur pa dang /bsam pa rgya chen pos sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po bskyed nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu
120a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhus pa legs so//legasaso/khyod legs par shin tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan
120a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub pa dang /ji ltar blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar gyur pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
120b1(dkon brtsegs): du thos par 'tshal zhes gsol pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yasu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bla gas
120b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/go cha chen po bgos pa des sems can rnams yid
120b3(dkon brtsegs): su bsdu ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bag bar bya'o//sems can rnams tshul khrims /
120b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go tshe chen po bgo bar bya'o//semos can rnams bzod pa rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go tshe chen po bgo bar bya'o//sems can
120b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgro bar bya'o//sems can rnams bsam gtan rnam par dag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po
120b6(dkon brtsegs): bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams shes rab rnam par drag pa la dgod pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po
120b7(dkon brtsegs): bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i dngos po dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams kyi
121a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi nad kyi gnyen po bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//yon tan chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas
121a2(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//bla na med pa'i ye shes legs par yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//sems can rnams
121a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shos legs par yongasu rdzogs par rab tu bstan par 'dod
121a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang /bdud kyi pho nya dang /bdud kyi
121a5(dkon brtsegs): las la gnas pa dang /lta ba rnams kyi thibs po dang /lam la yang bar zhugs pa'i mu stegs can gyi bstan pa las rab tu byung ba thams cad dang /'jig rten
121a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyang pan dang /mu stegs can dang /'thun pa ji snyed pa dag dang /'thab pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgo bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
121a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar go cha chen po bgo zhing /go cha mi spong bar brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/sems can gyi khamos thams cad du zhugs te/bzod pa la gnas nas
121b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa rnams spangs te/mi skrag mi dngang mi g.yo mi 'khrugs par byas nas/go cha dpag tu med pa drag bgro bar bya'o//de 'di lta ste/sems can thams cad yongasu skyob
121b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha dang /lta ba thibs po thams cad gcod pa'i go tshwa dang /bdud kyi dpung rnams rnam par 'jig pa'i go tshe dang /shes rab yang dag par len pa'i go cha dang
121b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigs dpag tu med pa sogs pa'i go cha dang /khur lci ba rnams sgrol ba'i go cha dang /mngon par yid ches pa 'phel bar byed pa'i go cha dang /tshul khrims la gnas
121b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i go cha dang /las kyi kun gzhi yongasu sbyong ba'i go cha dang /thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i stobs kyi gter gyi go cha dang /thabs mkhas pa'i gter gyi go/
121b5(dkon brtsegs): cha dang /mngon par shes pa thams cad yongasu spong ba'i go cha dang /ldog pa dang 'gyed pa med pa'i shes rab kyi go cha gang yin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas/'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de'i bar du shin tu brtan pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs g.yo de med pa mi spong bar zla
121b7(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems can
122a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams//ban+d+ha b+h+yor gau rgyu byug bar bya//snyoms nAnA nam sun chung med phyir// cha bgos pa tshad med//ston pa rnam par dgu pa'i byur//thams
122a2(dkon brtsegs): nAnd rab tu dga' bar byeng //sems can la nI phan gradagos phyir//go chu 'di ni bge bar bya//tshul khrims rnam par dge ba'i phyir//'jig rten la ni phan 'dogs byung //
122a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir//go cha 'di ni bge bor bya//bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir//dpa' zhing bde la gnas par byed//sems can rnams la
122a4(dkon brtsegs): paphan gdags phyir//go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya//brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i phyir//phyir mi ldog par 'grub par byed//sems can rnams la phan gdagus phyir/
122a5(dkon brtsegs): go cha 'di ni dge bar bya//bsam gtan+da rnam par dag pa'i phyir//spyod yul dag kyang de bzhin ni//sems can rnams la phun gdags phyir//go cha 'di ni bog
122a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya//shes rab rnam par drug pa'i phyir//zug med bla na med pa yin//sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir//go cha 'di ni 'go bar bya//sems can
122a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni thams cad la//bde ba'i yo byad sbyin dgos pas//don de legs par shes pa'i phyir//go cha 'di ni bgo bar bya//byang chub sems dngo' sems can
122b1(dkon brtsegs): nanAs//phan pa'i dngos po bya dgos pas//bsdu ba rnam dag 'di bzhi yis//srid pa kun du 'jug par byed//'dod chags zho sdang gti mug nad//gnyen po dag ni bston pa'i
122b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir//sems can la ni skyon gtong bas//nang rnams rab tu sel bar byed//des ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams//go cha legs par bgos nas ni//yon tan rnams
122b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshogs dag la//mkhas pa dpag med thob pa yin//sems can 'a khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis//nyams thag shin tu mi bde bas//bdag gis yongasu bskyab snyam
122b4(dkon brtsegs): nas//go cha dpag med bgo bar bya//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med rnams//bdag gis rnam par dgrol snyam pas//sgyid lta'i dra bas glags pa dag/thams cad
122b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu gcad par bya//gang gis nyon mongs dra ba'i dri//thams cad gcod par gang nus pa//brtan pa'i brtson 'grus stobs dag gis//dpa' bo'i go cha bgos pa
122b6(dkon brtsegs): yin//sems con dag ni thams cad kun//bde ba'i lam la rab bkod cing //mya ngan 'das la gzhol ba dang //bla med bde la dgod par bya//gang zhig brtson 'grus
122b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i stobs//go cha 'di ni bgo byed pa//bdud rnams thams cad dag dang ni//rtag tu 'thab kyang ngal mi 'gyur//gang zhig lha la rab gnas nas//thibs pa
123a1(dkon brtsegs): ngag tu gang zhugs dang //'jig rten rgyang pan dag la ni//go cha bgos nas phan gdags bya//gzhan yang 'khor ni tshad meng ba//lam gal dag/
123a2(dkon brtsegs): tu zhugs pa rnams//de dgu la ni phan gdags phyir//go cha dpag med bgo bar bya//de ltar ge cha bgos nas ni//go cha chen po mi spong bar//brtson 'grus chen po'i
123a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs bskyed nas//go bgos rab brtags khyad par 'phags//sems can khoms la rab zhugs te//bzod pa la ni gnas gyur nas//brtan pa'i bzod pa sgrub
123a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pa//go bgos gong na med pa yin//'jigs pa dag ni rab spangs shing //skrag pa dag ni med par yang //go cha dpag med bgos nas ni//thams cad rab
123a5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus par bya//gang zhig go cha rab gnas pa//rtag tu yang dag rtogs gyur zhing //rab dben g.yo ba med pas na//mi 'khrugs ldog par mi 'gyur ro//da lta'i
123a6(dkon brtsegs): go cha rab bgos nas//blo dang ldan pas gzhan yang nI//sems can skyab pa'i go bgos te//bdud kyi go cha gzhom par bya//yon tan dpag med go cha dag/thams cad//
123a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bgo bar bya//dbang po shes mchog gang zag gis//bgos na bde ba thob par 'gyur//khur lci rab tu spang ba'i phyir//bla med go cha bgos nasu//sems can
123b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs bzlas nas//sdug bsngal khur las thar par bya//rnam dag dad pa 'phel byed cing //dbang po drug ni rab sdom pa//tshul khrims gang dag ldan pa ni//go bgos
