145b6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang bcas pa rnams re re nas rtogs par khong du chud par byed pa dang /nye bar len pa'i phung po'i sdug bsngal med pa rnams nan tan gyis yongasu tshol zhing mos par byed pa
145b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /'dus pa'i chos rnams yongasu spong bar brtson pa gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir chos rnam pa gsum ma ngan
146a1(dkon brtsegs): par sgrub par byung du/chos mchog tu gyur pa yang dag par bstan pan chog 'gal ba med par rgyas rgyu ngan kyi rje su mthun par spyan cing /sems la rtse dang med pa dang /
146a2(dkon brtsegs): chog 'bru dang /yi ge thams cid la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /chos thams cad yongasu sdud par byed pa gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang yang dag pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yo
146a3(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i phyir/chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed/don la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /don ji lta ba bzhin du rje su 'thun par yang
146a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /chos kyi rjesu 'thun par so sor rtog pa la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa dang /thams
146a5(dkon brtsegs): cad lnga yong mngon par zhen pa mi skyed par yang dgra par sbyor ba'i dngos po mngon par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa'o//gzhon yang yang dag pa'i lam yin lag brgyad pa yongasu bsdu
146a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos rnam pa bzhi mngon par sgrub par byed de/shin tu brtan pa'i yi ngan gyis bdag nyid bsrung zhing /ji skad bstan pa kho na bzhin sgrub par byed pa dang /dbang po
146a7(dkon brtsegs): drug la mkhas shing lam la gzhol bar byed pa dang /bsam pa rnam par dag par byed pa dang /bag yod pa la gnas par byed pa gang yin pa'o//blo gros mtha' yas byang
146b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos kyi spyod pa 'dis lam yongasu sdud par byed pa'i phyir lam gyi rje su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar
146b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir dang /ming med pa'i phyir dang /mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang /smon pa med pa'i phyir dang /skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i phyir dang /yongasu skyo bar gyur
146b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir dang /spang ba'i phyir dang /'gag pa'i phyir dang /nges par 'byung ba'i phyir chos kyi snang ba thob pa yino//skye ba rnams zad par so sor rtog pa na yang skye ba med pa la yang/
146b4(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi byed pas/de'i tshe skye ba las yang dag par 'das nas chos ma yin pa las nges par byung ba dang /rnam par dag pa'i lam thob nas/mi skye ba'i
146b5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//lam rnam par dag par gyur pa'i phyir/'du shes tha~Md las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med pa la mi gnas pa dang /lam gyi 'du shes
146b6(dkon brtsegs): bkag nas chos kyi 'du shes sbyong ba dang /ma rig pa'i dra ba las nges par 'byung zhing rig pas bsgom pas 'thob par bya ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu 'thob par 'gyuraro//rig pas
146b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pas chos gang zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhe na/'di lta ste/rig pas bsgom pas 'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa 'thob pa dang /chos thams cad la nges par mkhas
147a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob pa dang /gsang ste gsungs pa rtogs pas chos nyid kyi rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur ba 'thob par 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la me///
147a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe/yul la mi gnas shing mtshan mas bsgribs par mi 'gyur te/chos thams cad ni mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang /skye ba na mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang
147a3(dkon brtsegs): skye ba'i ngo bo nyid na mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par shes pas mtshan ma cung zad tsam gyis kyang bar chad byed par mi 'gyuraro//lam 'di shin tu rnam par dag pas gnod par
147a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa yang medo//go cha chen po bgos pas 'dzin pas 'ching bar yang mi 'gyur la/theg pa tshon po la zhen pas rmongs par yang mi 'gyur ro//sgrib pa rnams spang
147a5(dkon brtsegs): pas na mkha' lta bur gyur nas lam 'dir zhugs te/sems can rnams kyi snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur ro//blo gros mtha' yis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
147a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi lam khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma yin//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcud bka'
147a7(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa//yang dag lo ma brgyad bsdu ba'i phyir//chos spyod rnams ni smyon pa yi//lam 'di la ni gang gnas pa//de ni brtson 'grus chen po yin//dge ba'i chos kyi
147b1(dkon brtsegs): lam bsgrubs shing //dus ni thams cad dag tu yang //mI dgo'i chos ni mi byed pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor pas//nang du tshul///
147b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang byed cing //phyi rol du ni 'di byed pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' gang rtog pa//dngos po ji bzhin rab shes shing //tshul bzhin chos bzhin
147b3(dkon brtsegs): gang gnas pa//spyod pa 'dis ni la mo sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas//nang du rje su rtog byed cing //phyi rol du ni zhen byed pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud
147b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas//bdag nyid rtog med yid ches shing //gzhan dag yid ches gnas byed pa//spyod pa 'di ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub
147b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' yid ches pas//bya ba'i lam rnams dag byed cing //lam rnams la ni 'dzin byed pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' 'ching med
147b6(dkon brtsegs): pas//rtag tu sdug bsngal nyer len shes//nyer len sdug bsngal med tshol ba//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rab shes pas//'dus pa spyod pa
147b7(dkon brtsegs): spyo sgrub cing //'du 'phro dag ni gang spong ba//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' don shes pas//don gyi rjesu rab rtogs shing /chod pa med par gang ston
148a1(dkon brtsegs): ga/spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pas//tshig 'bru'i yi go zhon med par//chos rnams thams cad sdung byed pa//spyod pa 'dis//
148a2(dkon brtsegs): ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chos spyod pa//chos kyi rje su 'thun byed cing //don gyi rje su 'thun 'gyur ba//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'
148a3(dkon brtsegs): lam 'brang bas//brtan pa'i yid dam yang dag gnas//ji skad bstan bzhin gang bsgrubs pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdod 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' lam dag pas//
148a4(dkon brtsegs): yid la mos par rab sbyangs nas//chos la gnas shing bag yod pa//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du//spyod pa 'di rnams rab bsgrub//
148a5(dkon brtsegs): nas//lus dang sems ni bde thob nas//spyod pa 'dis ni lam sdud 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' yang dag dran//rnam dag lam la gang gnas pa//chos rnams stong zhing
148a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan meng bar//thams cad rab tu rtogs por 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rab brtags na//smon lam rnam par dag byed cing //smon pa med la mi gnas pas//mtshan ma
148a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni spong bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du//don tshul mnyam par rab brtags na//chos rnams skye bar mi 'gyur bas//the tshom cung zad yod mi 'gyur/
148b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan dag/thams cad chos ni rab brtags na//skyo zhing zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyir//gsal bar mthong bas gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chos
148b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas//tshul bzhin chos skye mthong bas na//skye ba la ni skye mi mthong //zad pa las ni zad mi mthong //byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ldan//de ltar so sor rtog byed//
148b3(dkon brtsegs): na//chos min pa las nges 'byung zhing //yang dag gnas la gnas par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//lam 'di rnam par dag pas na//myur du bde gnas phyin
148b4(dkon brtsegs): sems pa//bla med bzod pa 'grub par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//tshul bzhin chos rnams rtogs byed cing //'du shes rnams las gang 'ongs pa/'du shes
148b5(dkon brtsegs): med la rtag gnas 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//lam 'di rab sbyong 'gyur ro zhes//lam gyi 'du shes gang spong ba//chos kyi 'du shes la mi gnas//byang chub sems
148b6(dkon brtsegs): dbanga' blo dam pas//lam 'di rab tu sbyong ba'i phyir//ma rig dra ba dral sems pa//chos kyi snang chen thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//rig pas bsgom par
148b7(dkon brtsegs): byang bas ni//sems can rnams la ston byed pas//des na rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rig bsgom pa//chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa'i phyir//don zab
149a1(dkon brtsegs): la ni nges 'gyur zhing //thabs mkhas chen po thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rig bsgom pa//thabs kyi 'du shes kun spongs pa//gsang ba'i chos kyi rjes
149a2(dkon brtsegs): 'brang zhing //nges pa'i don ni rtogs par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//chos kyi snang ba chen po yis//'du shes tshe rab 'gog byed na//des na yang dag gzhol bar
149a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' blo dam pas//lam 'di la ni mi gnas te//lam 'di la ni mi gnas phyir//lam la yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs
149a4(dkon brtsegs): med pas//ches rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //nam mkha' dag pa ltar shes pas//mtshan ma rnams kyis sgrib mi 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi//rang bzhin nam/
149a5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' 'drar shes te//chos rnams na mkha' 'dra ba'i phyir//rnam dag dri ma med par shes//byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur//gnas pas mtshan ma bsgribs par 'gyur//
149a6(dkon brtsegs): myur du sems can rnams la ni//gdams ngag rjesu ston par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i blo dam pa'i//las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas//lam la bar chad kyi
149a7(dkon brtsegs): yang med//thogs pa med par gzhol bar 'gyur//rnam par dag pa'i lom 'di ni//byang chub chen por myur du bgrod//'dus ma byas ni mngon sum byed//mnyam pa nyid gzhol
149b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i go chen po//thog chen lam ni chen po dag/na mkha' 'dra bar thogs med cing //rnam par dag pas gzhol bar bya//thog dang lam 'di gang skyes pa//na mkha'
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa lta bur ni//mtshan ma mang po rab spangs na//mtshan ma med pas bgrod par bya//theg pa chen po mnyam pa'i theg/rgya chen na mkha' 'dra bas na//shin tu rnam dag lam 'di la//
149b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa 'dis ni bgrod par bya//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang //chos 'di la ni gus byed pas//sems can rnams ni kun gyi phyir//dpa' bos rab tu bgrod par bya//byang chub
149b4(dkon brtsegs): chen por bgrod byed cing //khyad par lam 'dir gang gnas pa//theg pa pa gnyis la sogs pas//bgrod par bye ba'i yul ma yin//byang chub sems dpe' yang dag dran//lam ni
149b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par gang byed pa//rnam par dag pa'i lam 'di yis//bla med mchog tu bgrod par 'gyur//gzhan yang blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
149b6(dkon brtsegs): ni da ltar yang dag par zhugs shing gzhol bar gyur pa'i tshe//dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang
149b7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi yan lag dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /zhi ga nas dang /lhag mthong tshad med pa rnams yang dag par
150a1(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pasmra/yon tan khyad pa 'phags pa tshad med pas brgyan nas/'jig rten pa rnams rab tu gdul ba'i phyir dang /gro cha bgos nas khams/
150a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum las nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir dang /theg pa chen po la zhan nas lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin rnams yongasu bzung bar bya ba'i phyir/lam 'di la gnas nas/bla na
150a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par gzhol bar byed do//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni go cha chen po bgos te/
150a4(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la zhon nas lam 'di la gnas pa'i tshe/gal te byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms kyis sems can kun la khyab par byed dam/sems
150a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la bdag dang 'dru bar 'phrengs par mi byed na ni/de lta bu'i go cha dang /theg bre chen po'i lam chen po 'di dag ni sa chen pos kyang theg par mi 'gyur la/sems
150a6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyis kyang ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/'di ltar sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir/go cha chen po bgos te/theg pa chen po la zhon
150a7(dkon brtsegs): nas lam 'di la gnas pa yin pas/go cha dang theg pa chen po'i lam chen po 'ang dag tu lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang bgrod par
150b1(dkon brtsegs): ci nus la//byis pa so sor skye bo 'jig rten la mngon par zhen pa dang /'jig rten na gnas par mos pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus pa yin//gzhan yang byang chub sems
150b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa yin pas/'di ltar go cha'i mthus sa dang /chu dang me dang /rlung gi khas
150b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams byin gyis brlabs pas/sa'i khams 'di g.yo zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang /sems can thams cad 'jigs pa mi skye ba dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /
150b4(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi khams rnams kyang de dag gi rje su ci rigs par bya ba rnams byed pa yin//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang po sems bskyed de/
150b5(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas dang go chu chen po 'di bgos te/theg pa chen po 'di la zhon nas rnam par dag pa'i lam gyis skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gzhol zhing byang chub kyi shing drung bgrong
150b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs par gyur gyi bar du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje las mngon par grub pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor shin tu brtan pa 'di
150b7(dkon brtsegs): gal te byin gyisu ma brlabs na/'khrug cing gA yo bar 'gyur te/shin tu brtan pa'i rdo rje las mngon par gyur pa yin yang /go cha chen po dang /theg pa chen po
151a1(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po 'di 'dogs pa'i 'o su mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can rnams la
151a2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang /snying rje chen po bskyed pa dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams thabs gcig tu bsngags pa brjod nas/gal te rdo rje chen po'i
151a3(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor chen po dang /ri rabo dang /rin po che'i ri thams cad dang /de las gzhan pa'i ri'i rgyal po rnams byin gyis brlabs par ma gyur na/go cha chen po dang /theg pa chen
151a4(dkon brtsegs): ngopo'i lam chen po 'di dge 'dregs pa'i 'o su mi 'gyuraro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi mdza'i phyir dang /de bzhin
151a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang /sems can rnams la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i phyir dang /gnod pa mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
151a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /skrag par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /'khon du mi 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /mnar bar mi byed pa'i phyir dang /nyon mongs par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
151a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams bde bo thob par bya ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos nas/theg pa chen po la zhon te/lam 'di la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
151b1(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu gzhol bar byed//blo gros mtha' yas byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams nag cha 'gos pa na/shes rab kyi go cha bgos nas/shes rab kyi mtshon tshatshogs
151b2(dkon brtsegs): /shes rab chen pos yongasu bsngo bar byed/yongasu bsngo ba'i theg pa la zhon nas shes rab kyi snang ba bskyed par byed//snang ba'i lam la gnas nas/shes rab kyi snang ba'i
151b3(dkon brtsegs): mig gis chos rnams so sor brtags to/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu gzhol bar byed do//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /sems can rnams yongs su
151b4(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
151b5(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams sgom par byed//tha~Md kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro zhing shes rab kyis mngon
151b6(dkon brtsegs): par sgrud pa dang /shes rab kyis yongasu bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
151b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab rnam pa sna
152a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs thams cad du khyab cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma mchis pa rnams yongasu sdud cing mngon par sgrub par bgyid pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar tshe lags//
152a2(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la bka' stsal pa/blo gros mtha' yas de de bzhin//de de bzhin te/khyod kyis ji skad
152a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni shes rab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun du khyab cing /chos thams cad yongasu bsdus te/go cha chen po
152a4(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te/lam chen po 'di la gnas nas thams cad kyang shes rab sngon du 'gro bas rab tu gzhol bar byed do//blo gros mtha' yas gal te
152a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ldan pa yang shes rab sngon du 'gro ba med na lam 'di la rab tu gzhol bar mi 'gyur gyi gal te shes rab dang ldan zhing shes rab sngon du 'gro bas thams cad khyab
152a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas/rdzasu 'jug pa dang /rjesu spyod pa dang /shes rab kyis yongasu bsdus shing shes rab kyis rab tu bsdams par gyur na/gdod go cha chen po bgos nas/
152a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la zhon pa dang /lus chen po 'od la gnas pa zhes bya ste/rab tu bang ba'i chos kyis 'jig rten la phan 'dogs shing shes rab kyi mig gis 'byeng//sha
152b1(dkon brtsegs): nas sa song brtags nas shes 'as gsal byu gyu sa/'ad bang rtson pa /nas ldan mang s+yAd //par rdzogs pa byang chubal brgyu la bar byud //mas
152b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bkra/bar bya ba'i go chi dang /ga cha'i bkong pa dang /banon par bya ba'i thib pa chen po dang /zag pa
152b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i bkod pa dang /bgrod par bya ba'i lam chen po dang /lam chen po'i bkod pa dang /bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur ba yin/
152b4(dkon brtsegs): nu/bla gros mtha' yas skyes bu ngom pa gang gi cha'i bkod pa dang /theg pa chen po'i bkod pa dang /lam chen pa'i bkad pa dang /yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs thams
152b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis rab tu brgyan par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ngas yongasu rdzogs par brjod par gyur na/bskul ba tshad med pa rnamasu brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur med kyi/'on kyang khyang
152b6(dkon brtsegs): sogs des rab tu rtags par bya ba'i phyir dang /mA 'angs pa'i sgras byungam pa rnams go cha'i bgrod pa dang /theg pa chen po'i bkod pa dang /lam chen po'i bkod pa dang /yana?/
152b7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa'i tshogs kyi bkod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir ngas dang 'dir phyogs cung zad tsam zhig mngar bstan par bya ste/skyes bu dam pa de dag gal te ngas bsten pa'i rgya
153a1(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur na/go cha chen po bgos nas theg pa chen po la zhon te/lam chen po 'di la gnas par 'gyur zhing yon tan gyis rab tu brgyan nas rab tu gzhol bar
153a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa//ngas ni yang dag spong ba dang //dran pa nyer gzhag rnam bzhi dang //thabs mkhas thams cad bshad pa na//
153a3(dkon brtsegs): de phyir bag yod bcas par 'gyur//yang dag dran pa phun tshogs shing //chos mkhan mtshungs par ldan pa dang //rab brtson nges par 'byung byed pas//de phyir bag yad bcas par
153a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//dbang po stobs dang byang chub phyogs//go bgos theg chen bzhon byas te//'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas//byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya//bsam gtan
153a5(dkon brtsegs): zil gnon rnam thar dang //ting 'dzin snyoms par rab zhugs te//'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas//byang chub sems dpas gzhol bar bya//snying rje byams dang dga' btang snyoms
153a6(dkon brtsegs): go bgos theg chen bzhon byas te//'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas//byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya//zhi gnas lhag mthong rdzu 'phrul rkang //cho 'phrul dag ni rdzogs bya
153a7(dkon brtsegs): ste//'di yis bsrung ba rab byas nas//byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya//tshad med ston rnams dang ni//go bgos theg tshan bzhin pas te//lam la ngal ba med byas nas//
153b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gzhol bar bya//brtson 'grus dang ni bag yod dang //go bgos thag chen bzhon byas te//dran nas de dag shes byas nas//byang chub sems dpa' gzhal bar bya//snang
153b2(dkon brtsegs): ba go cha chen po yis//'jig rten dag ni rab btul te//go cha 'di ni bgo byas pa//'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o//thams cad mkhyen la yang dag phyogs//khams gsum las ni nges 'byung phyir//
153b3(dkon brtsegs): thag chen 'di la gang zhon pa//'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o//lam chen rnam par dag pa'i lam//lha dang mi dang lha ma yin//'jig rten zil gyis mnan pa na//kun du grags pa zhes bya'o//
153b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' ni//sems can rnams ni kun gyi phyir//dus rnams thams cad dag tu yang //go cha brtson 'grus bgo bar byed//gal te byang chub sems dpa'
153b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams//byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang //btang snyoms chen po mi bsgom na//sa tshan dag ni shong mi 'gyur//gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams//sems can rnams ni de
153b6(dkon brtsegs): dag la//dus rig phan 'dogs mi byed na//sa chen dag ni shong mi 'gyur//gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams//snying rje theg chen mi zhon na//ri dang rgya mtsho chen po rnams//sa/
153b7(dkon brtsegs): chen dag ni shong mi 'gyur//gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams//byams pas sems can dran byed cing //thig chen 'di la mi zhon na//sems can gang yang bsten mi 'gyur//
154a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te go cha 'di bgos nas//byams 'od gsal bar byas pa na//go cha chen po de dag la//sems can gang yang bston mi 'gyur//go cha 'di ni rab bgos nas//
154a2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med kyis//'byung tshan khams bzhin byin brlabs pas//de 'deg 'o su gyur pa yin//sems can yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir//snying rje 'od kyis kun khyab cing //
154a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung chen khams bzhin byin brlabs pas//de 'deg 'o su gyur pa yin//sems can yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir//byang chub chen po mngon bsgrubs nas//'byung chen khams bzhin byin///
154a4(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas//de 'degs 'o su gyur pa yin//sems can mi smod gnod mi byed//go cha chen po 'di bgos nas//theg chen gyis ni nges 'byung ba//'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o///
154a5(dkon brtsegs): drabs la mkhas pa chen po yis//thams cad byin gyis rab brlabs nas//bla na med pas nges 'byung ba//'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o//des nas ni chen po 'di//mi 'bying rab tu
154a6(dkon brtsegs): mi g.yo zhing //chu dang ma dang rlung gi khams//bya ba dag ni byed pa yin//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams//go cha dpag med bgos nas ni//theg chen 'di la bzhon byas
154a7(dkon brtsegs): nas//lam gyis rab tu gzhol bar byed//tshe gcig thogs pa mngon bsgrubs pas//tha ma'i lus ni thob 'gyur nas//byang chub shing rgyal drung song ste//rab brtan sa la 'dug
154b1(dkon brtsegs): /na no//byang chub snying po de dag tu//rdo rje bzhin du rab gnas nus//rdzas dang snyoms ni ngal med par//thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du pyod//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas/
154b2(dkon brtsegs): gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na//s+yan+dan de dag go yo 'gyur zhing //zhog nas phyir yang chags mi 'gyur//sa chen khams ni thams cing kun//gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na//rdo rje
154b3(dkon brtsegs): las ni grub 'gyur kyang //mi g.yo mi 'khrugs gang yang med//byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa'i dus//smon lam chen po rab brgyan pas//sems can rnams ni de dag la//byams
154b4(dkon brtsegs): patshan pos dran par byed//mngon sum phyogs bcu'i zhing khams na//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad maldan//rkang gnyis gtso bo gang bzhugs pa//thams cad bsrung zhing dgongs
154b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//galpA te de las gzhan pa rI//ri rab rin po rgyu yi ri//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor yug ri//shin tu brtan pa gang gnas pa//byang chub sems dpa' bro ldan
154b6(dkon brtsegs): da/ byur gyi ma ma stan//rgyun po 'di bgasapa/'dage pa sa pa 'gyur// chu rnams dpa' mas//rdzu ma gas kyi
154b7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dang nis tshan po//rkyen 'dag 'os byung ba yin//kau can pa dang gatho//mas tshan byung bas//ga nan gdan song //theg po dgas
155a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhol bar bya//gaur+b+ha chen po gang bgos pa//snrums can gnod pa mi byed pas//glo cha dgu nI bsam mi khyab//theg pa dag gis gnal bar bya//go cha chen po gang
155a2(dkon brtsegs): dgos pa//sems can dag la khon mi 'dzin//sems can nad ni btsal ba'i phyir//theg pa dag gis gzhol bar bya//lo ma mchog dag ni phun tshogs pa//bla med mchog tu
155a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bas na//mi 'tsha 'khon 'dzin med pa dang //gnod pa mi byed yang dag 'das//shes rab chen po go bgos to//shes rab bsngo ba'i thig zhon pa//go cha 'dzin par
155a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bas//bsngo ba'i nang na mchog tu 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' skyabs byed pas//shes rab snang ba la gnas te//shes rab chos rnams rab brtags nas//bla na
155a5(dkon brtsegs): myed par gzhol bar byed//byang chub sems dpa'i ldum mchog dang //blo cha dang ni theg chen dag/shes rab 'od las byung bas na//de phyir sems ni rnam par dag/pha ram
155a6(dkon brtsegs): byin la rab zhon nas//byang chub chen por bgrod byed cing //shes rab yongs sdud shes rab gnong /shes rab dag ni sngon du 'gro/pha rol phyin pa thaMd kyis/shes rab
155a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sngon du 'gro/shes rab yongs spyad shes rab gtsang //bla med ye shes len par byed//byang chub sems dpa' bsemI mi khyab//shes rab snang ba bskyed byed cing
155b1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab sgron chen slar byed pas//bde bar rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur//shes rab snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir//des na shes rab mig kyang 'byed//sangs rgyas bla mong yo shes dag/gsal//
155b2(dkon brtsegs): namathong rab tu gzhol bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dag/go cha dpag tu med pa yis//tshad med par ni brgyan pa'i phyir//go cha bgos pa zhes bya'o//byang chub
155b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' blo chen dag/theg chen rab tu brgyan pas na//sangs rgyas tha~Md mkhyen pa la//gos pa med par gzhol bar byed//byang chub sems dpa' blo chen dag/lam
155b4(dkon brtsegs): tshan rab tu brgyan pas na//bsam gyis mi khyab mchog dag la//rnam par dag pos gzhol bar byed///bam po gsum pa//gzhan yang blo gros mtha'
155b5(dkon brtsegs): yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis go cha'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang /theg pa chen po'i spyod yul dpag tu med pa dang /lam chen po'i spyod yul dang /
155b6(dkon brtsegs): tu med pa dag la rab tu gzho lnga bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thams cad rje su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos tha~Md
155b7(dkon brtsegs): rjesu 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir/go cha chen po bgo bar byed//chos thams cad kyi rje su 'jug par 'dod pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhon par byed//chos thams cad kyi rje su 'jug/
156a1(dkon brtsegs): bor 'dod pa de byu rgya chen pa la rab tu gnas par byung //rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byu ba'i phyi rab tu gzhol bar byung //'an byung
156a2(dkon brtsegs): gopo che des chos cung zad tsam yang nad ngamo/phyi rol lam/rags pa'am/phra ba 'am/thag ride ba 'am/zug nye ba 'am/'das pa 'am/daltar byung ba'am/ma 'ongs pa'i//
156a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/gnas pa 'am/mi gnas pa zhes bya bar yang dag par dzA su mi dmigs//gal te go cha 'dris chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed
156a4(dkon brtsegs): mi nus par/gtan la 'bebs par mi nus sam/yongasu mi shes sam/rdza su 'jug par mi nus sam/mngon sum du byed mi nas sam/yang dag par 'da' bar mi
156a5(dkon brtsegs): nus ni/go cha chen po 'gros pa zhes bya'o//chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed dam/gtan la 'babs sam/yengasu shes par gyur tam/rjes 'jug par
156a6(dkon brtsegs): byed dam/mngon sum rnga byed dam/yang dag par 'da' bar byed na/gi cha chen po bogs pa zhes bya'o//theg pa chen po des kyang ches 'ga' tsam yang na dngam/phyi rol zhes
156a7(dkon brtsegs): byab nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesu bsngo ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /yongasu shes pa dang /rje su 'jug pa dang /mngon sum du byed pa dang /yang dag/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'da' bar byung ba sa de'i phyir theg pa 'di ni theg pa chen po dang /chos la rab tu mkhas pa'i thog pa dang /mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i theg pa dang /gong na med pa'i theg pa dang /
156b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pa'i theg pa zhes bya'o//lam chen po des kyang cung zad tsam nang ngam phyi rol zhes bya ba nas/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi lam chen por gyur nas gzhol bar byed pa
156b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag par mi dmigs shing /mnyam pa nyid kyi lam 'dis chos 'ga' tsam yang yongasu mi shes pa med pas/de'i phyir lam 'di ni bla na med pa'i lam dang /
156b4(dkon brtsegs): grangs dang /tshad med pa'i lam dang /mtshungs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya'o//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/sems can
156b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i spyod pa kun gyi rdza su yang dag par 'jug par byed//sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa spong zhing yongasu dag pa
156b6(dkon brtsegs): byed do//theg pa chen po la zhon nas/sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'phel bar byed//lAm chen po 'di la gnas nas//sems can rnams dadruge badzad
156b7(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par yang dag par bskul bar byed do//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can re re'i phyir sems can gyi spyod bai re re'i phyir
157a1(dkon brtsegs): yang 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa de srid du yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor zhing shes rab kyi sman yongasu tshol ba dang /go cha mi spong bar shin tu brtan par byas
157a2(dkon brtsegs): nas go cha chen po dang /tshad med pa'i go cha dang /bsam par dka' ba'i go cha dang /rnam par dag pa'i go cha dang /dpag tu med pa'i go cha dang /blang ba med pa'i go cha dang /
157a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi 'du shes rigs pa'i gro cha dang /sems can med par shes pa'i go cha dang /bdag med par shes pa'i go cha dang /sems can gyi rang bzhin rje su rtogs pa'i
157a4(dkon brtsegs): go cha dang /bdag gi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang /nang gi rang bzhin shes pa'i go tshwa dang /nang gi rang bzhin rje su rtogs pa'i go cha dang /phyi rol gyi rang bzhin shes pa'i go/
157a5(dkon brtsegs): cha dang /phyi rol gyi rang bzhin tsA su rtogs pa'i go tshwa dang /nang dang phyi rol gnyi gzhi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang /nang dang phyi rol gnyi ga'i rang bzhin rje su rtogs pa'i
157a6(dkon brtsegs): bo che dang /sa thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i go cha dang /chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rje su rtogs pa'i go cha dang chos thaMd dmagi su med par shes pa'i go cha
157a7(dkon brtsegs): dang /chos thod kyi rang bzhin dmig su med par shes pa'i go cha dang /chos thams cad rtogs pa'i khong du chud pa'i go cha dang /mtha' med pa'i go cha dang /dbus med pa'i'o//
157b1(dkon brtsegs): cha dang /dbus dang mtha' yang med pa'i go cha dang /'das pa ma yin pa'i go cha dang /ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa'i go cha dang /dwa ltar byung ba ma yin pa'i go cha dang /bya ba med pa'i go cha dang /byed
157b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i go cha yang dag par bge bar byed/glo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni go cha 'di la bgos par yang mi byed/rje su rtogs par yang
157b3(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/gtan la 'bebs par yang mi byed/nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed/mngon sum du yang mi byed de/go cha nyid yod pa ma yin pa'i phyiraro//go cha bgos pa gang yin pa/
157b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag rdo rje su rtogs par mi byed pa'i phyir/rjesu rtogs par byed//gtan la 'bebs par mi byed pa'i phyir/gtan la 'bebs par byed//nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa'i phyir//
157b5(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung bar byed//mngon sum du mi byed pa'i phyir mngon sum du byed//gdags par bya ba med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po la zhen par byed//theg pa chen po la gdags
157b6(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed/gdags pa med pa'i gdags pas gdags par byed kyang /theg pa chen po la ni gdags par bya ba ci yang medo//gal te gdags pa dang bcas par gyur na
157b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid gdags pa ma yin te/gdags pa de dag dmig su med pa'i phan pa'i phyir dang /bltar med pa'i phyir//zag pa yang yod pa ma yin te/theg pa la gnas pa dge/
158a1(dkon brtsegs): nu dmig su med pas/theg pa chen po la gnas par byed pas/gzhol bar byed pa spong zhing mthar phyin par yang mi byed la/mya ngan las 'das par byed par yang mi byed do//
158a2(dkon brtsegs): dmig su med pa'i phyiraro//lam ma yin pas lam med/lam la gzhal bar byed pa nyid yang dag par mnyam pa'i phyiraro//yang dag pa'i lam 'di ni gdag su med pas/su zhog
158a3(dkon brtsegs): gang du gang las gdags par byed/bya ba yang med/byed pa yang med/'dus pa yang ma yin/'dus pa med pa yang ma yin/thams cad la skyo zhing thams cad yongasasu mi 'tshe ba
158a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yang dag par mnyam pa'i lam 'di ni chos tha~Md dang gcig pa yang ma ya ni/tha dad pa yang ma yin zhing mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir//chos kyi 'du
158a5(dkon brtsegs): shes mi bskyed cing /chos thams cad spong bar byed pas/gtsang ba yang med mi gtsang ba yang medo//chos nyid kyang de bzhin te gtsang ba yang med/mi gtsang ba yang med pas
158a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir la mo 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya ste/bgrod pa med pas bgrod par byed do//yongasu bzung ba med pas yongasu bzung bar byed//lam 'di shin
158a7(dkon brtsegs): tu zab pas skye ba med pa/'byung ba med pa byed pa med pa/thob pa med pa/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/gnas med pa/sgrib pa med pa/dngos po med pa/dngos po thams cad
158b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ston pa/dngos po thams cad dpyor mod pa/dngos po'i rjesu mi 'jug pa yin to//dngos po med pa'i phyir/bla na med pa'i gnas phyin par byed pa yin//blo gros mtha' yas byang
158b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di de ltar rig par bya'o//'on kyang go cha 'dra dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di ni bltar/
158b3(dkon brtsegs): med cing shes par byar med pa dang /dmigasu med pa'i phyir su zhig go cha bgo bar byed/su zhig theg pa 'di la zhon par byed/su zhig lam 'di la spyod par byed/bltar med pa/
158b4(dkon brtsegs): shes par byar med pa/dmigasu med paso//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis ches 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngong par klog pa dang /
158b5(dkon brtsegs): kha ton du 'don pa dang /yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /chos kyi tshul dang 'gal ba med cing /rje su 'thun par bsgrubs pa dang /rab tu dga' bar mos par byed pa dang /
158b6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di'i phyir rab tu brtson par byed pa dang /chos kyi tshul nges pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa'i nus pa dang ldan par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni go cha 'di bgos te/theg
158b7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di la zhon nas lam 'dir zhugs te/chos zab mo dmigasu med pa 'di la gzhol bar byed pas/'khor ba'i mtha' gtugs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
159a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgyu bar 'gyur zhing /yon tan dpag tu med pas rab tu brgyan pas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems/
159a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos 'di la rab tu dga' bas brtson 'grus bskyed nas/bgra yod par bsgrub par bya'o//sems can la la zhig chos zab mo 'dre thos
159a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu dga' ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ngas phan pa chen po thob par rab tu bston na/gang zhig nan tan brtson 'grus kyis brag yod pa dang bcas pa dang /tshul khrims
159a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pas gzhol bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos//blo gros mtha' yas khyed kyis chos 'di shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba rnam pa du ma dang khyad par du 'phags
159a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa du ma dang /rnam par dag pa du ma dang ldan pa la ltos/ngas chos 'di la nan tan gyis bsngags pa rab tu brjod pa ni sems can rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pas//
159a6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring po'i phan pa dang bde ba thob nas yongasu skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang /rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyiraro//blo gros mthams yang khyod kyis chos
159a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba sbyin pa byed pa yin yang srid pa rnamasu dbul phongs po sna tshogs snang bar gyur pa ni sems can
159b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams chos zab mo 'di las rab tu nyams par gyur pa'i phyir/'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /'byor pa gang bde ba rnams spangs pa yin par blta bar
159b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//blo gros mtha' yas yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs bu mngon sum du bzhugs pa/chos rin po che zab mo 'di 'byor pa du ma rnyed sla bar gyur to snyam du blta bar bya zhing /khyod kyis
159b3(dkon brtsegs): chos zab mo 'di la nan tan gyis rab tu bsgrubs par bya'o//byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ngas chos rin po che 'di yang dag par bstan pa na thos par yang mi 'dod na/len po dang
159b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du bzhugs shing chos rin po che 'byor pa'i dus su yang mnyan par mos pa dang /'bri bar yang 'dun par mi 'gyur
159b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ma 'ongs de'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag par chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/sangs rgyas dang chos dkon mchog dang /chos 'dzin par byed pa rnam pa gsum du mi 'gyur
159b6(dkon brtsegs): nga'i dus su mnyan pa dang 'bri bar mos par lta ga la 'gyur/blo gros mtha' yAs 'on kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/gal te de bzhin gshegs pos legs par byin gyis brlabs
159b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na tshes rin po che zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyuraro//blo gros mtha' yas shin tu 'jigs pa'i dus de'i tshe/chos rin po che zab mo 'di yang dag par nyams shing 'grib b.ram
160a1(dkon brtsegs): zad par gyur pa mang mod kyi/'on kyang chas 'di la nyan pa dang /'dzin par byed pa med/nga'i spyan sngar sems rtse gcig tu mnyan par mos pa dang /go cha chen po bgos pa ni ma
160a2(dkon brtsegs): gtogs te/de dag de'i tshe chos 'di la rab tu dga' bas nyan pa dang len par 'gyur bso//de'i tshe sems can gang chos 'dri thos nas rab tu dang ba tsam bskyed par byed na yang ngas de dag
160a3(dkon brtsegs): chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur bar bstan pa yin na/da ltar chos 'di la yongasu dang ba bskyed nas nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/blo gros mtha'
160a4(dkon brtsegs): yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa'i go cha dang /go cha chen po tshad med pa rnams yang dag par bgos pa na/'di snyam du sems te bdag ni seMn
160a5(dkon brtsegs): dngul phongs par gyur pa 'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyis rgud pa dang /thos pas rgud pa dang /shes rab kyis rgud pa dang /rnam par grol bas rgud pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye
160a6(dkon brtsegs): shes mthong bas rgud pa de dag thams cad la chos chen po 'dis phongs pa med par bya'o//chos chen po 'dis phongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir/rgud pa zad spangs nas tshul khrims
160a7(dkon brtsegs): kyinor dang /thos par nor dang /shes rab kyi nor dang /rnam par grol ba'i nar dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i nor gyis phyug por bya'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang //
160b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /gti mug gi me rnams rab tu zhi bar bya'o//nad thams cad las sos par bya'o//bla na med pa'i sman gya nom pa btang ra bya'o//sman 'di'i dbang gis nad rnam pa sna tshogs bsal
160b2(dkon brtsegs): nas bde ba chen po thob par bya'o//lhag ma dang bcas pa gtan du spangs te/shin tu bsil ba'i ngo bo nyid bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byas nas/yid la sems pa dang /
160b3(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa'i lhag ma gcig kyang lus pa med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas thams cad yongasu tshol bar byed pa la dgod par bya'o snyam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/mya ngan
160b4(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa 'di ni mchog tu bde zhing yongasu tshol ba thams cad lus pa med pa'i phyir dang /yongasu tshol ba gtan du zhi zhing yongasu zad pa'i phyir ro//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub
160b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni go cha chen po de lta bu bgos nas/gzhan yang sems can thams cad la snying brtsa bas yongasu bsdu ba'i phyir theg pa chen po lo zhon nas//
160b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du theg pa chen po 'di la ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang chibs nas nges par byung bar gyur to//ma byin pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'dri las chibs nas nges par
160b7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gyur to//da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'di la chibs nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur kyang gshegs par gyur pa yang med la/chibs pa dang nges par 'byung ba
161a1(dkon brtsegs): yang mngartag// nan/stong ba dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /skyob mod pa dang /byed pa med pa'i pha nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yangam
161a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/nges par 'byung bayang ma yon/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin//theg pa 'di la zhon nas de ltar nges par 'byung ba de dag ni legs par 'byung ba yin te/
161a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pas chos thams cad dang 'dus pa yang ma yin/'dus pa med pa yang ma yin/'ong ba med pa/'gro ba med pa yin no//theg pa 'di'i lam gyis nges par 'byung
161a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe yang 'dus pa ma yin pas/'ong ba med pas 'gro ba med pa yin//theg pa 'di dang lam 'dis go cha chen po byas nas/nges par 'byung ba'i tshe yang 'dus pa yang ma yin pas
161a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba med pa/'gro ba med pa yin te/dmigasu med pa'i phyir//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang lam 'dis
161a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gzhol bar bya'o//gzhan yang go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'dris gozhol bar byed pa'i tshe 'di snyam du so so'i skye bo'i chos gang yin pa dang /nyan thos kyi chos blang
161a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa'i chos de dag bdag dang nye bzhig pha ma 'on te thag ring ba zhig ces yong su rtog par mi byed//
161b1(dkon brtsegs): sto ba nyid dang /mthun ma med pa dang /ston pa med pa dang /sgrub meng pa dang /mngon par 'du byab mod pa'o chos byung mi ts+tsha pa dgu bdag dang nye bzlog gam nyan tu zag ring ba
161b2(dkon brtsegs): ces yongasu ga par myi byed//yong sa b+h+rUM ba~M dang bral ba dang /'gog par 'gyur ba nas mya ngan las 'das brten pa'i bar gyi go cha de dag la yang bdag dang nye bzhig gam+b+ha/
161b3(dkon brtsegs): zag ring bzhig ces yongasu rtog par mi byed//blo gros mtha' yas go cha chen po dang /theg pa 'di dang lam 'di dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /nyan thos thaMd dang /
161b4(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /sems can thams cung gang gis kyang bskul bar mi nus pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed//blo gas
161b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni go che 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di la g.yo ba mi mdu' ba brnyes pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yin/
161b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir dang /chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /chos nyid kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa dang bral ba'i phyir dang /mtshan ma rnam par dag
161b7(dkon brtsegs): phyi dang /yongasu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang /mtshan ma dag gis so sor brtags pa dang /mchog tu so sor brtag pa dang /kun tu se sa brtag par bya ba ma yin//chos
162a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyis so sor brtag pa dang /mchog tu so sor brtag pa dang /kun tu so sor brtag par bya ba ma
162a2(dkon brtsegs): yin no//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /bstan du med pa dang /brjod du med pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces
162a3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//blo gros mtha' yas go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di lta bu 'di dag gi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin du bstan du med cing /brjod du med pa yin yang
162a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams kyis khong du chud bar bya ba'i phyir dang /chos rnams kyi snang ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir go cha 'dri dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di dag brtags pa tsam du
162a5(dkon brtsegs): mdor bstan pa yino//deng khyod kyis gal te go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di'i don gyi rje su 'jug cing spyod par 'dod na/gdags pa med pa dang /bstan du med pa
162a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /brjod pa med par don gyi rje su 'brang bar bya'o//don gyi rje su 'brang ba gang yin pa de dag la ni 'di ni spyad par bya'o zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med la 'di'i rje su 'brang bar bya'o/
162a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med pas don ma yin pa de dag gi rjesu ni 'brang bar mi byed la/don gang yin pa de dag gi rje su ni 'brang bar byed do//don gyi rje su 'brang ba'i tshe sgra'i
162b1(dkon brtsegs): mu 'brang bar mi byed//yi ge'i rje su 'brang bar mi bye//ngag gi rje su 'brang bar mi byed/rjesu mi 'brang ba de'i rjesu mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o//de la don gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste gsang
162b2(dkon brtsegs): spyi bstan pa gang yin pa dgra gsang ste bstan pa yin pas gasdang ste bstan pa rnams rjesu rtogs bur byas nas mngon par yid ches pas spyad par bya'o//mngon par yid ches par
162b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa gang yin pa de dag ni don de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed pas/rnam par mi rtog pa'i rje su 'brang bar byed de/rjesu 'brang bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni spyod pa med pa dang /
162b4(dkon brtsegs): rje su 'brang ba med pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/don de dag la spyod pa zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med la rje su 'brang ba dang /kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang cung zad kyang med/spyod pa
162b5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spangs pa'i phyir rje su 'brang bar mi byed//byang chub kyi rje su 'thun par yang mi spyod la/'khor ba'i rje su 'thun par yang mi spyod de/rje su 'thun pa dang /rje su mi mthun pa de
162b6(dkon brtsegs): dag ni yid la byed pa yang ma yin/yang dag pa'i dran pa yang ma yin te/bsam pa yongasu dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir/rjesu 'brang bar mi byed//blo gros mtha' yas khyod
162b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis don 'di'i rje su 'brang bar bya ba'i tha dad pa'i spyod pa dang ldan par mi bya'o//gal te tha dad pas rjesu 'brang bar byed na/do na brjed ngas pa yin pas sgra'i rjesu 'brang ba dang /
163a1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'bru dang /yi ge'i rje su 'brang ba dang /drug gri rjesu 'brang bar 'gyur te/tshig gi brjod pa de dag kyang yongasu spong bar mi 'gyuraro//sgra yongasu shes pa
163a2(dkon brtsegs): dwadang /tshig 'bru dang /yi ge las yang dag par 'das pa dang /chog gi brjod pa rje su rtags pa gang yin pa de dag lnga ni de ltar rje su 'brang bar mi byed pas 'khor bar 'jug par
163a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyuraro//don 'di la de ltar rje su 'brang ba dang de ltar rje su 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag la ni spyod pa cung zad kyang med de/spyod pa nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i phyir//blo gros
163a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas don gyi rje su 'jug pa'i tshe/mngon par 'du byas pa dang bcas pas don gyi rje su 'brang bar mi bya'o//gal te ma ngon par 'du byed pa med par don gyi rje su 'brang
163a5(dkon brtsegs): bar byed na/de ni 'ong ba med pa dang /phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/'ong ba med pa dang /phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag ni go cha 'di dang /theg pa 'di/
163a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /lam 'di dang /rjesu 'thun par bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa yin pa sku sems can rnams la phan pa chun po byed par 'gyuraro///
163a7(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas gang gis chos 'di ltar ston pa dang /don gyi rje su 'brang bar byed pa dang /rje su 'jug pa gang yin pa de dag ni sems phyin ci log med pa dang /the tshom
163b1(dkon brtsegs): mod pa'i mos pa yongasu bsgrub pa yin pas/go cha 'od dang /theg pa 'di dang /lam 'di yongasu ma bsdus pa gang yin pa de dag ni yongasu bsdus nas myur du gzhol bar byed pas/go cha 'di
163b2(dkon brtsegs): ma bgos par yang myur bu bgo bar bya'o//theg pa 'di lad dung zhon par ma gyur pa yang myur du zhon par byedado//lam 'di la gnas par ma gyur pa yang myur du gnas par bye //blo
163b3(dkon brtsegs): gros mtha' yas sems can de dag ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yongasu sdud pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rjesu bsrung zhing dgongs par 'gyur bas
163b4(dkon brtsegs): chos dang 'gal ba med pa dang /dge slong 'thun par spyod par 'gyur ro//blo gros mtha' yas khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshang med pa rnams yongasu bsdus pa yin pas/ma 'ongs pa'i dusu
163b5(dkon brtsegs): chos 'dis sems can rnams yongasu bsdus nas sems can rnams kyi che du khur lci ba bkur bar bya'o//des ni bsod nams kyi tshad shin tu brjod par dka' ba dag rab tu thob par
163b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//de nasA de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bca de bka' stsal pa//byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pas//de ltar go che bgros pa'i tshe//sems can rnams la
163b7(dkon brtsegs): phani gdags phyir//go cha dpag med bgo bar byed//sems can gal te phongs gyur tam//sdug bsngal chos ni med pa'i che//tshul khrims dang ni mang du thos//shes rab rnam grol
164a1(dkon brtsegs): /mod bu la//go chang dpag ma rab bgos nas//chos kyis rab tu phyug por byed//rgyas kyis phyug por gyur pa'i tshe//thams cad bango ba thob par byed//da
164a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sdug bsngal sbyangs pa'i phyir//bla mang tshus ni ston byed pas//thos pa dag ni rdul sbrengs nas//bdi lam 'di la dgod par byeng //tshul khrims phung ba rab rgyas shing //maung
164a3(dkon brtsegs): sa pa rgya mchi 'dra//shes rab mchog ni thos ngas ni//da dag 'ching ba gnong par byung //rnam grol kun tu gsal byed dang //rnam grol yang dag shes mthong ba//gang
164a4(dkon brtsegs): gos mngon sum byud pa ni//thams cad bde ba 'thob par 'gyur//'dod chags zhe sdang gauti mug mes//rtog tu bsreg tsong kun gdungs pas//des ni sems can sdug
164a5(dkon brtsegs): bsngal 'gyur//mi de bdag gis bsad par bya//sems can rnams la sman btang nas//nad rnams thams cad sil bar byed//bal+la te nang ne zhi gyur na//mya ngan 'angs
164a6(dkon brtsegs): byings phyin par 'gyur//lhag ma thams nA gtan spangs nas//bde gnas la ni zhen par byed//bde ba'i gan su bzhag pos na//sdig par 'gyur bgang yang med /2
164a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa da po thams cad la//yang su tshol bar mi byed cing //blan med pa'i bang chen dag/thams cing mngon sum byed par 'gyur//spros pa med pa'i chos dag gis//sems can/
164b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin byed pas//mthar phyin pa yi bde ba dag/thams cad rab tu 'thob par byed//de lta bur ni gang gzhol ba//lan cig song nas phyir mi ldog/gzhol ba las ni yang dag 'angs///
164b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu bde ba rtag tu 'thob//bde ba chen po dag gis ni//mos pa dang ni mi mos pa//gzhol ba dang ni gzhol med pa//thams cad rab tu spong bar byed//de ltar go cha bgos nas
164b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang //theg pa 'di la zhon nas ni//sems can rnams la snying be rtsa'i phyir//thams cad yongasu bzung bar bya//'das pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa rnams//theg pa 'di yis nges 'byung
164b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//ma byon thams cad mkhyen rnams kyang //theg pa 'di dbang nges 'byung 'gyur//de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//theg pa 'di dbang nges 'byung brnyes//de phyir theg pa
164b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni//mchibs pa ni gang yong med //'jig rten dag la mgon mdzad pas//rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kun//theg pa 'di yi nges 'byung yang //theg pa 'du shes bskyed mi
164b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//theg pa med pas thag pa mdzad//lam med pa la lam du mdzad//nges 'byung med pas nges par 'byung //de phyir nges 'byung bla ni med//theg pa 'di ni nges 'byung tshe//
164b7(dkon brtsegs): nges 'byung cung zad yang ma yin//stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang //smin med byed pa med phyir ro//theg min nges 'byung ma yin pa//de ni theg chen zhes bya'o//thams cad rab tu mnyam
165a1(dkon brtsegs): bas na//des na yang dag gzhol bar byed//thog pa 'di la 'dus pa med//ma 'dus pa yang yod ma yin//bla med lam la gzhol byas pas//
165a2(dkon brtsegs): bde ba chen po mngon du byed//theg pa 'di lnga mtshungs ldan med//mtshungs mi ldan pa yod ma yin//gnas pa med cing brtan pa med//des na rab tu gzhol bar byed//
165a3(dkon brtsegs): lam 'di la ni 'ong ba med//lam 'di la ni bgrod pa med//yang dag lam 'di gang spyod pa//rab dben yang dag gzhol bar 'gyur//ngas ni lam 'di theg pa dang //
165a4(dkon brtsegs): go cha chen po 'di dag ni//chos la brten par mi byed pas//rab dben bla med mchog tu bstan//so so skye bo'i chos rnams dang //nyan thos chos ni thams cad dang //
165a5(dkon brtsegs): rang rgyal chos rnams thams cad kyang //thams cad dmigasu med pa yin//sangs rgyas chos ni thams cad dang //dri med bla na med pa'i chos//ring ba ma yin nyi min//
165a6(dkon brtsegs): pas//thams cad dmigasu med pa yin//stong dang mtshan ma med pa'i chos//smon pa byed pa med chos kyang //ring pa ma yin nya min pa sa//thams cad dmigs su
165a7(dkon brtsegs): med ma yin//skyo bral dang ni 'gags pa'i chos//rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i chos//ring ba ma yin nye min pas//thams cad dmigasu med pa yin//theg pa
165b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dang glo cha 'di//lam 'di la ni 'dzin med cing //bla med g.yo ba med byas na//mthar ni gang yang dmigasu med//chos kyi rang bzhin thams cad dang //de kho na yi
165b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid ni//gdug su rung ba ma yin te//chos nyid rnams ni stong phyiraro//theg pa 'di dang go cha 'dri//lam 'di bstan du med pa yin//chos rnams rang bzhin
165b3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba//de ni rang bzhin de bzhin//chos rnams dag ni thams cad la//mtshan nyid rang bzhin med pa'i tshes//nga yis mdor ni bstan pa yin//chos rnams thams cad dag la ni//
165b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin mtshan nyid thams cad kun//ji ltar ngas ni bshad pa bzhin//mthar ni yod par mi 'gyur ro//theg pa 'di dang lam 'di dang //go cha rang bzhin mtshan nyid la//tshig gis
165b5(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa rab brtson na//mthar na dmigs par 'gyur ma yin//tshig ni yod pa ma yin phyir//ngo mtshar rab tu gyur pa yin//tshig gi brjod pa de dag la//dag gri mtshan nyid yod ma
165b6(dkon brtsegs): na//chos rnams dag ni gzhal du med//mchog dang kun tu gzhal du med//thams cad dpag tu med pas na//de phyir chos ni bla na med//theg pa'i de dang go cha 'di//lam 'dra yang
165b7(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin du/mtshan ma med pa de dag la//de ltar rje su 'jug par bya//sems can nams ni kun gyis kyang //yongs shes nan tan bsgrub pa dang //myur du chos snang thob bya'i phyir/
166a1(dkon brtsegs): //dI b+h+ri ngas ni de skad bstan//chos rnams lani tshig med pas//thams cad brjod du med ba yin//chos rnams de dag kun la ni//rnams cad rjesu 'jug par bya/
166a2(dkon brtsegs): chos la tshig ni med pa'i phyir//de yi rdza su 'brang bar bya//spyod kyang spyad pa cung zad med//thams cad chos ni spyod pa med//tshol ba med cing mos tshol med/'gro ba med pas
166a3(dkon brtsegs): rjesu 'brang //de ltar rje su gang 'byung ba//don lnga so sor rtog mi byed//khyod kyis yang dge bden pa'i don//thams cad rje su 'brang bar bya//sgra rnams dang ni tshig dag gi/rjes su
166a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par mi bya'o//sku rnams dang ni tshig dag gi/rje su gal te mi 'jug na//don gyi rje su 'brang byed pas//'di ni don tshal zhes kyang bya//don zhes bya ba gang zhen//gsad ste gsum
166a5(dkon brtsegs): par rig par bya//rnam rtog med la yid ches pas//don de rje su 'brang bar bya/don de gsal ba re rab rtogs na//gsang ste gsungs pa de dag la//'dzin mang zhen pa med pa dang /
166a6(dkon brtsegs): 'brang dang rje su 'jug mi 'gyur//gal te rje su 'brang byed na//mngon shes rje su 'brang bar byed//gal te rje su mi 'brang na//thams cad rje su 'jug mi 'gyur//yang dag dran pa
166a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang gis//rje su 'jug pa spong bar byed//byang chubo dang ni 'khor ba dang //gnyis ka yod ni mtshungs mi ldan//de la bsam par mi byed pas//bsam med yang da dran pa
166b1(dkon brtsegs): yon//bsam pa yong su dag pa'i phyir//rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o//'di dang tha dad sgrub byed na//bla mod \u0f7fsman stong par 'gyur//khyod kyis don de dag pa ni//ji skad bstan bzhin bsgrub par/
166b2(dkon brtsegs): bya//gal te tshig gi rjes 'brang na//de ni sgra yi rjes 'brang bas//de las yang dag mi 'dres shing //'jig rten chas dang mtshungs par 'gyur//sgra dang tshig 'bru yi ge rnams//de dag
166b3(dkon brtsegs): rje sgyu 'brang mi byed//yang dag don ni rtogs byas nas//bgrod pa med pas rjes 'brang bya//yang dag don la sgra yang med//tshig 'bru yi ge yod ma yin//tshig las yang dgra 'das
166b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//yod dag don zhes bya ba yin//don der+d+ha su 'brang byed kyang //d+hU su 'byung ban+do yang med//'brang bar bya ba zhi ba'i phyir//yang dag don zhes bya ba yin//yang dag don ni de dag
166b5(dkon brtsegs): la//'brang ba med pa 'brang med pas//de ni phyir ldeg mi 'gyur zhing //gi cha spong bar mi byed//go cha chen po theg chen dang //lam chen rjesu gang 'brang ba//bde ba'i gan su bgrod byas
166b6(dkon brtsegs): nas//sems can rnams la phan byed 'gyur//rab tu bde ba'i chos 'di dag/ngas ni khyod la rab tu bshad//khyod don rje su 'brang byed ni//khyod ni the tshom chad par 'gyur//thog pa
166b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di la gang zhon pa//zhon nas rab tu bgrad byang na//byang chub chen por myur phyin nas//blo med sangs rgyas mngon su mi byed//theg pa mchog tu gyur pa 'di//bzhon byed gang yin rgyu
167a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhon byed//lam dang go cha chen po yis//don dag kyang ni de bzhi no//bla na med pa'i chos 'di la/nan tan gyis ni gang bsgrubs pa//sems can de dag thams cad ni///
167a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgrongs par 'gyur//ma 'ongs 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tshe//khyod kyis chos 'di rab phye nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//phan pa dag ni rab tu byos//ma
167a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tshe//gal te chos 'di rab phye nas//bla med bsod nams skye 'gyur bas//de yi grangs ni gzhal mi nus//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dang
167a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bgos pa'i go cha gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po zhes bya'o//dpag tu med pa'i rgyal ba zhes kyang bya'o//bkod pa chen po dang ldan pas bzhon pa'i
167a5(dkon brtsegs): theg pa zhes kyang bya'o//de dpon chen po zhes kyang bya'o//dpag tu med pa'i 'od ces kyang bya'o//bkod pa dam pa dang ldan pa bgrong par bya ba'i lam zhes kyang bya'o//bkod pa tshad med

167b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul du'i khwa lo bsgyurU ba/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/

168a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan shing dang /ramachog tu m+ha pa'i ldan shing dang /rdorje'i ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bkung ba dang /rdzing dang /rdzing bu dang /rgyu mig dang /'bab rgya rnam
