204b1(dkon brtsegs): rlom garjom du' chug gros na pa rnam grangs pacagasasams pam sa nga chub tu du ga pa khyod du rma pa gyur bas/sa rnams la rjod pa sa na nu
204b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dben pa mchag thob par 'gyur te/phan tshun 'gal ba med par 'kho mang po'i nang du chos 'dzi'i bsngags pa brjod nas yang dag par bstan pa dang /nan ta
204b3(dkon brtsegs): brlabs pas rgyas thams dang gi d+ham 'i phyag nA'i ting 'dzin kyang rab tu 'anan par 'gyu //de ltar mngon pa de bsgrubs pas rnying ba dang bcas pad /rnang pa med pa nga
204b4(dkon brtsegs): drudu da drug thams cang lta ba rlan par gyur pa pa rmyil bkun du gnas par 'gyu//dUrgyal dang ba na med pa dag na 'thun pas yang sa byung bar byed //nges par ba shA

204b7(dkon brtsegs): na la bas sa pa rnam par dag pas rab tu gnas par bye'o//the zas mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rmi 'di la de ltar gnas pa de dag ni
205a1(dkon brtsegs): /spyod pa chung ngus chos thams cad /rgyu mtshur byad tu ting 'dzin thob nas rgyas kya d+ha mtsho'i b+hagA d+haSh+TASh+Ta 'dzin tshad mod pa'i dus ldan mod pa yang dag par rtom/
205a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar byed//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa/khyed kyis chos rnams thams cad ni//chos kyi dbyingasu 'jug pa
205a3(dkon brtsegs): ltos//chos rnams chos dbyings mtshungs pas ni//tshul ni kun kyang mnyam pa yin//gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings rnams ni/chos rnams kun tu 'jug par ltos//chos dbyings

205a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam su yang lto mi byed//chos rnams thams cad kun la yang //chos kyi dbyingasu lte mi byed//chos rnams ma gtogs sring na yang //chos kyi dbying su lta mi byed//khams ni rnam pa
205a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang //chos kyi dbyings ni sna tshogs nyid//chos 'dus rnams ni rtogs pas na//thabs mkhas gnas pa ci yang med//dus dang gnas ni thams cad//sna tshogs

205b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ni ma 'dus pa//rang bzhin gcig dang tha dang la//brten par mi byed rtog mi byed//'dzin pa med cing zhen pa med//chos rnams thams cad de dag la//'dus pa med par rtogs pra/
205b3(dkon brtsegs): na//'dus pa nying du mi sems shing //'dzin pa med cing zhen pa med//chos kyi rnam pa tha~Md kyi//gdags pa'i mtshan nyid de shes pas//sems pa med cing bsten pa med//'jigs

206a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i smra ba mi skyed cing //rtsod pa'i rgyu rkyen mi byed pa//thams cad 'gal bar mi byed pas//'di ni rjes 'thun zhes bya'o//rtag tu rtsod pa med spyad cing //rtsod pa meng dang mtshungs
206a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan po//mnyam zhing 'gal bar mi byed pas//'di ni blo ldan zhes bya'o//ches rnams kun gyi tshul dag la//rtsod par smra ba nyer zhi zhing //go bogos tshul bzhin gang bsgrub pa//

209b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mngon par zhan pa mang pa'i phyag d+ha'o skur 'jug par byar//'di ltar rab tu dban+d+ha pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin/

209b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//'di ltar rnam par phye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa
209b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams g.yo ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//'di ltar gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phya ba rgyas
209b5(dkon brtsegs): btad pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams
209b6(dkon brtsegs): cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thob pa med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//mtshan mi med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thaMng
209b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pa sgom pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas chos
210a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu zhi ba'i smon lam gyi snang ba'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//
210a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par rtog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs
210a3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor 'jug par bya'o//sgru ba med pa'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yid dag
210a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa dang mthong ba skye ba dang skyo ba med pa'i phyag rgya'i sgor 'jug par bya'o//nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub
210a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams phung po yong su srid pa'i phyag rgyar sgor 'jug par bya'o//mtshan ma zad par byed ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa
210a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba zad por dbyung ba'i phyag rgyu'i sbyor 'jug par byer//chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rnam
210a7(dkon brtsegs): bab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs pa la mokhas pa'i phyag rgya'i sgrar 'jug par bya'o//rdza su dran pa mengs/
210b1(dkon brtsegs): smyu n+d+ha rgyas pasgras nA m+b+hag+sanas btub pa so pas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa tshon po rnams yang dag bar rnam par rtog pa ma myod mnyam pa ny-id du sgyur pa'i phyug rgya
210b2(dkon brtsegs): skye 'jug par bya'o//de ba mang ba'i phyag rgyas chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab pa yin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rang bzhin thams cad yong su shes
210b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i myu r+b+huSh+Ti byug par bya//yongs myu na lus 'das pa'i phyag r+b+hamA rgyas thams cad thAg nas tub pa yin pas byung chu bsams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
210b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dgu ba dz+rI lta babazhin du 'o//'i ba dang 'gog de'i rdus khring ba ts+tshim+b+hi'i sgo 'jug par bya'o//rdzogs mtha' las 'di dag ni byang chub sems dbya' sems dpa'
210b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi thos thams cad thigs pa mung pe skr-i dang /rje sgra 'thun pa'i spyi dang /rtag pa dang /rkyong bar lta ba rnams cad las yang dag par 'ongs pa'i blo dang /mtha' mad pa'i
210b6(dkon brtsegs): dang /spyan dang phyi ma'i mtha mad pa'i sgra yin/'diltade yongs skye bar rgyu dpe'i byung dang /'gog par byed pa'i phyir dang /zhi ba dbyed ba'i rgyu dang /bsil bar byu ba'i
210b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams chos sems cing kyi rgya rgya'i blo 'di su bslab par bya/rjes 'jug par dbye/logs par brnam par bya'o/
211a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo 'di rnams kyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob par bye'o//tinge 'dzin 'di dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rje su 'thun
211a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na chos rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i shes pa yongasu sdud par bye//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo 'di legs par
211a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms nas/chos kyi rgya mtsha'i ting 'dzin thams cad la so sor rab tu rtogs par byed na/chos kyi snang ba chen po tshad med pa dpag tu med pa skye zhing rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
211a4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros mtha' yas 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni tshad med par de'i tshad gang gis kyang dpag par mi nuso//de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang gang gi kyang de'i tshod dpag par mi
211a5(dkon brtsegs): nus so//gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na chu klung thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab cing 'jug par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang chos kyi phyag rgyar 'jug par 'gyur
211a6(dkon brtsegs): bas de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ste/chos thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas chos rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar zhugs par gyur na/phyag rgya 'dis chos thams cad
211a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi phyag rgya dang mtshungs par mthong ngaso//gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na klu chen po dang /klu'i 'khor lus chen po dang ldan pa rnams ni rgya mtsho dang ldan zhing rgya mtshor
211b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par nus pas rgya mtsho chen po dang ga la glanas byung //byang chub sems dpa' sngams dnga' tshan po rnams kyang nga bzhin du bskul ba brgya stong chang mang ba skad du thug pa rnams lag+sa
211b2(dkon brtsegs): bapar bsgoms pas/ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i sgo dri 'jug par nus shing phyag rgya'i sgo 'di nyid la gnas par byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mngon du bya ba'i phyir dang /thams
211b3(dkon brtsegs): tsacad mkhyen pa legs par yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'i sgo de lta bu dag mngon par slob par byed//byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams
211b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi sgo 'di nan tan gyis sgrub par byed no//chos thams cad kyi sgo la yang dag par slob par 'gyuraro//chos kyi sgo rnams chos kyi sgo 'drir 'du bar mthong ba'i phyir/chos kyi sa
211b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams bskyed nas/chos kyi rgyu mtsho thams cad 'jug par 'gyur bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin zhes bya'o//gzhan yang 'di
211b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper ni rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che chen po rnams 'du ba'i gnas gyur pa yin//ting 'dzin 'di yang de bzhin du chos thams cad dang /chos thams cad la mkhas pa rnams
211b7(dkon brtsegs): 'du ba'i gnasu gyur pa yin//blo gros mtha' yas sems car gang la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa dang gzigs pa bla na med pa zab par bya ba'i phyir ting 'dzin 'di yongasu gas
212a1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa dang /yongasu tshol bar 'gyur ba dang /yongasu tshol bar byed pa de dag ni chos kyi rgya mtsho yongasu rdzogs pa'i shes rab thams cad yongasu tshol bar
212a2(dkon brtsegs): byud pa yin pas/don de'i phyir ngas chos kyi phyag rgya 'di khyad la gtad pa yin gyis/khyod kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la yang dag pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe//
212a3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis sems can rnams la yongasu gdab par bya'o//chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis gang la btab par gyur na/de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
212a4(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi chos yong su rdzogs par byed pas myur du byang chub kyi srung por 'gro ba dang /bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
212a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi gdung gsab pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la rjesu 'thun par gnas pa dang /bla na med pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa chen pos yongs su
212a6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyang yang dag po'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa la gzud bar bya'o//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
212a7(dkon brtsegs): po gang yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yong su sdud par 'dod pa des chos zab mo po de nan ton gyis bslab par bya zhing bag yod pa dang ldan par bya'o//gzhan ya
212b1(dkon brtsegs): zas mtha yas ngas mngon par dran tu/sngon 'das pa'i bskul pa grangs med pa yang chos grangs mad pan/nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par
212b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rig bya dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten ma khyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dal ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
212b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus rab kyi 'du las yang dge par 'das pa'i rgyal bya zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/banas bya'i mang ni dag pa la gnas pa zhis byar//'jig rten gyi/khams na yid ngas
212b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa zhes bya'o//bskal pa de'i sems can rnams tshe ring zhing tshwa'i tshang med pa dang /rab tu ba zhing 'byor pa dang ldan pa dang /dge ba'i chos la rab tu gnas pas de'i phyi
212b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal ba de'i ming dge ba la gnas pa zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yangs shing rgya che ba dang /shin tu mdzes pas mthong ba rnams yid bde zhing dga' bar byung ba dang /sras kyi
212b6(dkon brtsegs): dang dang ldan pa sgra ga tu khyab par byed bas de'i phyir 'jig n+dan gyi khams du yid dka' bar byed pa nas bya'o//de'i tshe gling bzhi las gleng gsum gyi tshang mnyan ste/de ga cid
212b7(dkon brtsegs): ni me / rin yang sring byu 'im byed pag nga na'i gling zang ni nga byu nga
213a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khra mad/grong khyer re re'i tshod kyang dpag tshad nyi shu nyi shu yod do//de dag kyang gzhal med khang brtsegs ma dang rabs 'khor bar bskor ba/gos sna tshogs
213a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i shing ldan pa dang /re sna tshogs 'byung ba'i shing ljon pa dang /me tog sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pa dang /rin po che'i shing ta la dag gis rab tu brgyan pa/yul ba zhing
213a3(dkon brtsegs): mis rab tu gang bar gyur to//de nas grong khyer mchog tu che ba dpag tshad brgya 'khor ba yod de/de yang bskyeng mos tshal nyi khris 'khor bar bskor ba/bskyed mos tshal de
213a4(dkon brtsegs): kun du yang 'bab chu dag rab tu 'bab cing me tog dang /'bras bu dag rab tu rgyas pa spros mchog dam pa'i dod ldang bas yid dga' bar byed pa dang /bya dang /ri dgas rnams
213a5(dkon brtsegs): sgra snyan pa 'byin pas rab tu gang bar gyur to//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de skyed mos tshul de gcig tu zhugs nas 'khor rnams la chos bstan par gyur to//blo gros
213a6(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi 'od las yang dag par 'das pa'i rgyal po'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa chung ngu bcu thub par gyur to//yongasu mya ngan las 'das
213a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu yang dag nga'i chos ni bskal pa chu ngu gcig gi bar du 'jig rten du gnas par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor 'dus pa lan bzhir chos bstan te/
213b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dus pa rlo ra la yang nyan thos slob pa'i sa la gnas pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga lnga yod//dgra bcom pa dang /byang chub sems dpa 'khor ni bya ba khrag khrig phrag lnga bcu lnga
213b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu yod//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis yod//gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i sde zhes bya'o//gcig gi ming ni dpa' bo'i stobs shes bya ste
213b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa yin pas/bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
213b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ji lta bu zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thams cad yong su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur legs/
213b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa des tshig gi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bston to//'di yang dag par bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i
213b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis ni chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thaMd dang /byang chub snyoms dpa'i ting 'dzin thams cad thob par
213b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to//chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin rnams mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rdzu 'phrul chen po bstan pa
214a1(dkon brtsegs): dang /'od zer chen po bkye ba dang /tshangs pa'i sgra shin tu gya nom pa bsgrags nas/snyoms can rnams la yang dag pa'i chos bstan cing yongasu smin
214a2(dkon brtsegs): par byas pas srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar gyur to//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des 'di skadadu/khyed bskal pa
214a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya 'ongs pa'i 'og tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/bskal pa re re lnga yang de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
214a4(dkon brtsegs): brgya la mchod pa dang /rim gro byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dus bar mar gsungs pa'i chos yang dag pa gang yin pa dang /dus tha mar gsungs
214a5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i cho sa yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par yongasu bzung nas sems can rnams la phan pa chen po byed par 'gyur//bskal pa re rer yang sems rtse gcig
214a6(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur zhing /rnam par g.yeng ba med pas skye ba thams cad du yang brdzus te skye bar 'gyur//skye ba thams cad du yang ting 'dzin las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /rdzu 'phrul
214a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos ston pas sems can mang po rnams yong su zlos par 'gyur//bskal pa brgya 'das nas gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya
214b1(dkon brtsegs): bal mchod pa dang /rim gro byas pas ting 'dzin dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par thar pa tshad med pa rnams la rnam par rtson par 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan to//byang chub sems
214b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang grang bar gyur pa'i tshe gcig gi ming na mya ngan med pa zhes bya'o//gcig gi mong ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ste/de bzhin gshegs
214b3(dkon brtsegs): pabade'i rje sa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can tshing med grangs med pa rnams btul te/theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu bkod pas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des
214b4(dkon brtsegs): nga 'di ste da yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu mya ngan med pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdun par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur te/da bzhin
214b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa spobs pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gsheg pa de nga su mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu rab tu gnas pa'ing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
214b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhini gshegs pa 'od zer khyod par du'i phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sa tshe'i tshad kyang
214b7(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa ri ri thob par 'gyur te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang yon tan tshad med pa bsregs pa las mngon par grub pa yin//zhes lung bstan to//byang chub sems da
215a1(dkon brtsegs): de nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lung bstan pa thob pas rim gyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
215a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas par gyur to//blo gros mtha' yas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thams cad 'thob par 'dod pas rab tu dga' ba
215a3(dkon brtsegs): dang /brtson 'grus chen po bskyed nas/lus drang srog la phangs pa med pa dang /bag yod pas mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyi du yang byang
215a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros shes bya ba 'dus par gyur pa de 'dug pa'i stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to//
215a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon rnams chos thams cad kyi ye shes la thabs mkhas pa 'thob par bgyi ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
215a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin thams cad yang dag par gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar che lagaso//bcom ldan 'das gal
215a7(dkon brtsegs): te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin rnams thob par gyur na/gdon mi 'tshal bar chos rnams kyi tshul la thabs mkhas pa thob nas myur du byang chub kyi snying por
215b1(dkon brtsegs): mchi bar 'gyur bas/yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpab tu ma mchis pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bgyid pa dang /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams
215b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams mthong zhing nan tan gyis chos yang dag par mthong bar bsgrub pa dang /dge 'dun dang spyod pa mtshungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa chen po yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang /nyan
215b3(dkon brtsegs): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'dres par 'gyur lagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don gyi blo gros la 'di skad ces
215b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal to//de de bzhi no//de de bzhin te/khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du don gyi blo gros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting
215b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin thams cad thob par gyur na/yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa tshad med pa rnams rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro//gal te chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin rnams la gnas
215b6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na/chos kyi rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin rnams la thabs la mkhas pas gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar 'gyuraro//
215b7(dkon brtsegs): don gyi blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna tshogs las mngon par grub pas/rgya mtsho chen po las dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rkyen du 'phags shing //
216a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gsal bar gnas//byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin du Sh+Tha 'dzin 'das legs par gzhol bar byed pa'i phyir/
216a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi gter gyi rgya mtsho chen po thams cad las mngon par 'phags nas lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bla na med cing gnas pas mchog tu
216a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar gnaso//gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni skyur ma'i tshogs mang pos yongasu bskor ba yin//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
216a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang de bzhin du lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad du rab tu gsal bar gnaso//don gyi blo gros khyod kyis chos 'di thos par gyur na/'di
216a5(dkon brtsegs): la su yang dga' zhing mos pa mi skye ba 'am/brtson 'grus mi bskyod pa'am/bag yod pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ba gang yang med par blta bar bya ste/sems can bsod
216a6(dkon brtsegs): nams chung zhing dman pa la mos pa ni ma gtog so//sems can+do gang shes rab dang ldan pa dag gis ni chos rgya chen po 'di mngon par bsgrub par byed la/ches rgya chen po mngon
216a7(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnam 'i yong su bzung bar 'gyur te/ngas ji skadadu gang gis chos mi nir rgya chen po 'di yongs su//
216b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni lha dang mi rnams kyis yongasu bsrung zhing rim gro byud pa dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis rjes dgongs pa
216b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung zhes bstan pa sgyu bu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//blo gros mtha' yas byang
216b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nan tan gyis bsgrub cing slob par byed pa de dag ni sems can rnams la phan par byed cing the tshom thams cad rob tu
216b4(dkon brtsegs): sel ba dang /'dud pa thams cad rab tu dgrol ba dang /bag chags rnams spong ba dang /bag la nyal po rnams gcod pa dang /srid pa'i dga' ba rnams las yang dag par 'das pa
216b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /sred pa'i rgyu mtsho las yang dag par brgal ba dang /mun nag rnams gtan du bsal ba dang /skrag cing 'jigs pa rnams rab tu spong ba dang /thabs mkhas pa dang /sems
216b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'od zer chen po bkye bas/'od zer nges 'jig rten gyi khams grung
216b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa gsal bar mdzad cing /nyi ma dang zla bo'i 'od zer thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te//'od zer bgyi nas yang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo zos mtha
217a1(dkon brtsegs): yas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//b+h+rUM gros mtha' yas byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang rgya mtsho'i phyaphyug rgyu ting 'dzin 'di la nan tan
217a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis sgrub par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul chen po rab tu ston cing 'od zer chen po 'gyed pa dang /seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags nas chos 'di yang dag par ston par
217a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas khams gsum las yang dag par 'das shing snang ba chen po byed par 'gyur te/de dang ji lta ba bzhin pas bye brag tu gyur pa ci yang mdo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
217a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas kyis 'di skad tsas gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang byin gyis
217a5(dkon brtsegs): brlabs nas slad ma'i dus kyi tshe/sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang yon tan dpag tu ma mgyis pa 'thob lnga 'gyur bar mdzad gsol//de nas
217a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yang 'od zer chen po rab tu bkye'o//gzhan yang phyug sor gcig gis stong gsum gyi stong rgyan
217a7(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rab tu g.yo bar mdzad pas sems can rnams bde ba chen po thob par gyur to//de'i tshe 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
217b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /drin dang /lA ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ni dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams k+ta'i me tog dam pa dang /lha'i gos dam pa dag gis mngon pa
217b2(dkon brtsegs): gtor nas/dus gcig tu lha'i rlol mon mas byas//lha chung med pa rnamasas kyang rtswa'i g+has rgyu nas myengon par gtor nas rnamala'akun tu gang bar gyunaH/da 'thun pam
217b3(dkon brtsegs): tsam sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ni bsom rnaMs ma khyab bo//gang gis chos zab mo 'di yong su 'dzin par byu pa dag ni sems rkyen thams cad kyis gus par mtshad
217b4(dkon brtsegs): glo byA ba'i 'os gyur par rig par bye'o zhes smras//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dupa'i snyoms dpa' chen po blo gro ste mthu' yas lnga 'di skad na smra
217b5(dkon brtsegs): sprul te/bris mtha' yas ma 'ongs pa'i nA/gang bskyed rnams chung ba'i sems nand dag gis n+ni kau N+Di k+Shi pa dang / 'dzin gyi 'a 'd-i zis pa mi

217b7(dkon brtsegs): na du rtsub par byed pa dadag ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan das kyis 'ang su 'dru bar 'gyur//tha thos mapa las ma 'ongs pa'i drus na 'jigs pachen
218a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshe/nga'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la sogs pa la yongasu gtangango //ngas bskal pa bye ba khrug khrig grangs med pa nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi gter
218a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bsags pas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang /dpag tu med pa'i bde ba thob pa gang yin pa de dag khyod kyis kyang 'thob par 'gyur gyis/sdug bsngal gyi phung po
218a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khyod kyis rab tu bstan te/yon tan gyi rgya mtsho dpag tu med pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gzhol bar bya'o//de nas byang
218a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga brgya dang /khyim bdag ma smad pa dang /tshong dpon bzang
218a5(dkon brtsegs): skyeng la sogs pa gtso bor gyur pa rnams/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams mthu ni mchis
218a6(dkon brtsegs): pos/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub chen po'i chos yongasu bzung nas/slang ma'i dus kyi tshe sems can rnams lnga phan gdags par bdag cag gsol to//de nas
218a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dug pa stan las langs te/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas lus kyi gos
218b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog dam pa phyung da mchod pa byas nas byu skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag no ga pa'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la yong su bsdus te/sems can thams
218b2(dkon brtsegs): rlung byung chub kyi phyogs kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang /slad ma'i dus
218b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe sems can zad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag yong su rdzogs par 'gyur bar smon lam 'debs lag so//de skad ces gsol po dang /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byed
218b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir tshig su brgyad bka' stsal pa/sems can thams cad kun la ni//rten pa chen po bya ba'i phyir//
218b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub chos bzung nas//chos rgyal seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing //ma 'ongs thu ma dus kyi tshe//gang zhig chos ni yongs tshol pa//rmyi chen chos 'di thos 'gyur na//thams cad bde
218b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'thob par 'gyur//ngas ni ji skrod bstanu pa bzhin//gang zhig ga pa 'di mthong bzhin//mdo sde chos 'di thos 'gyur na//ji ltar mos pa'i bde ba 'jig/blo dang ldan pa gang
218b7(dkon brtsegs): ga gis//thabs mkhas dag ni raba'i rnams te//chos mchog 'dzin thos gyur na//rjes dang sems ni rab brdar 'gyur//gang zhig 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur pa//nga yos ma
219a1(dkon brtsegs): sum bshad mthong dang //chos 'di thos par gyur nas ni//rab tu dga' ba gang bskyed pa//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//khyod kyis bsod nams tshad med pa'o//
219a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po dag ni rab bskyed cing //'khor ba mtha' med sgrol bar 'gyur//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//chos rjes rab tu gsungs pa'i tshe//chos 'di gang zhig 'dzin byed pa//sangs
219a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//nga yi byang chub chos 'dzin pa//de ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i//tha ma dus kyi chos 'dzin 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das/
219a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis chos 'di bstan pa na/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa ston par skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par gyur to//sems can tshad med pa snyed ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin

219a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
219a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/go cha'i bkod pa bstan pa'i 'dus pa ste 'dus pa bdun pa rdzog s+ho//

219b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshalo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig no/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshad mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge
219b4(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs tha dad pa nas 'dus pa khri nyis stong dang /lha'i bu thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
219b5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa sum khri nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so//de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lha'i bu ri na tshan mchog
219b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to//de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'ide snyam du sems te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
219b7(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston par bskul bar mdzad de/bskul nas kyang bshad la/ci nas kyang bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa bkod par 'gyur ba dang /bdud sdig sdig can yi chad par 'gyur
220a1(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshor gcod par 'gyur ba dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal can thams ca dang rgyal mo cing shes pa brda' sprod par 'gyur ba dang //
220a2(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor spyod pa dag 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang /'bras bu thob pa dag kyang khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi gdong rgyun mi
220a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa'i phyir/skye bo mang po dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang
220a4(dkon brtsegs): chub 'di yang yun ring du gnas pa dang //rgyas par gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs sam yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/chos bstan pa de gang dag
220a5(dkon brtsegs): bris thos par gyur pa de dag theg pa gang la mos par myur du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston na ci ma rung snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
220a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lha'i bu rin chen mchog gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa la bka' sprul pa/'jam dpal 'khor 'di khyod las chos
220a7(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa thos par 'dod kyis 'khor 'di dag la gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig la khyod spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi
220b1(dkon brtsegs): las brnams te stobs par bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin las rtsoms la khyod spobs par gyis shig/'jam
220b2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin lags pas/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin brjod pa 'amam
220b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyan par cung zad kyang rngo mi thog legasnga na/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin lus brtsams te bstun par bgyi logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

220b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can lags pas na/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni skrag par mi 'gyur ljag so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i
220b6(dkon brtsegs): bus 'dzom dpal gzhon nur gyur po la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin na/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun
220b7(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med la/rnam par byeng bar 'gyur ba yang med na/sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang ba ci las 'byung bar
221a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skyo bo 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i phyin ci log gis bskrad cing ngar 'dzin pa dang //

221a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sems las byung ba dag 'byung ste/sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos de dag gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed cing de

221a6(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du yongasu shes pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba zhes bya ste/don dam par ni dri la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang
221a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'am/gang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ci yang meng ngo //'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/dge

221b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal khyod kyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/'jam dpal chos kyi
221b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni khyod las phyad par 'byung ngo //'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin sngon bcings par gyur la/de grol ba zhig yin snyam 'am

221b5(dkon brtsegs): sems ci zhig las rnam par grol/smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos mang po btul te/de dag gi sems ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las
221b6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par grol lo//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin nam/smras pa/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/kho bo
221b7(dkon brtsegs): ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yino//smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyed kyi sems len pa med par zag pa rnams las rnam par grol lam/smras pa/'jam dpal
222a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grolo//smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci khyod kyi sems 'das pa rnam par grolam/'anra to mA 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba rnam par grol/btsun pa
222a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems 'das pa ni zad pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/sems ma 'ongs pa ni ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid yin/sems da ltar byung ba ni mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid
222a3(dkon brtsegs): yin na/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal sems 'das pa yang rnam par grol ba ma
222a4(dkon brtsegs): yin la/ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba yang ma yin//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na khyod kyi sems rnam par grol ba de gang yin/smras pa/'jam
222a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam par grol bar bstan par zad kyi don dam par ni 'di la gang bcings pa 'am grol ba'i sems dmigasu medo//'jam
222a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa tiSh+Ti bu khyod chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la kun rdzob dang don dam pa yod par 'dod dam/smras pa/'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi
222a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin la ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa demigasu medo//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pas sems rnam
222b1(dkon brtsegs): par grol bar ston/smras pa/'jam dpal nam yang sems rnam par grol ba ci yang ming ngam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te sems shig nang dag/phyi rol//
222b2(dkon brtsegs): lam/gnyis ga'i bar na dmig su yod na ni sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba zhig na/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems ni nang ngam phyi rol la ma/gnyi ga med par yang dmigasu
222b3(dkon brtsegs): med pas de la bcings pa 'am/rnam par grol ba ci yang mdo//de nas 'khor de las dge slong nyis brgyas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bston pa 'di thos pa dang stan las
222b4(dkon brtsegs): langs te dong nas tshig 'di skad ces smras te/gal te 'di la su la yang rnam par grol ba med cing su yang rnam par grol na/'u bu cag gi rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
222b5(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dngos po la don ci zhig yod/gal te nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na lam bsgom pa la don ci zhig yod ces dge slong de dag slong cing yid rjed nas 'khor de nas dong ngo //de nas
222b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag 'dul ba'i dbang rig nas lam gang nas dge slong de dag dong ba'i lam de'i mdun du sprul pa'i dge slong zhig sprul to//de nas dge
222b7(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag sprul pa'i dge slong de ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/sprul pa'i dge slong de la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa khyid gi las 'das/de nas sprul pa'i dge slong ngas
223a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bo ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ma shes/ma mos/yid ma ches
223a2(dkon brtsegs): nas kho bo 'khor de nas song ngo //de nas dge slong nyis brgya po de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces smraso//kho bo cag kyang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la ma zhugs/ma shes/
223a3(dkon brtsegs): ma mos/yid mchis nas/kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo //de nas sprul pa'i dge slong nges dge slong nyis brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dag gis 'jam dpal
223a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pa la mi mthun pa ci zhig thos nas khyed cag 'khor de nas dong /de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ni 'di la su
223a5(dkon brtsegs): yang thob pa meng /mngon par rtogs pa med/rnam par grol ba med par ston pas kho bo cag 'di snyam du sems te/gal te 'di la su yang thob pa med/mngon par rtogs pa med
223a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba med na/ bu cag gi rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po la don ci yod/'u bu cag gi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la don ci yod/gal
223a7(dkon brtsegs): te'adi la nges par 'byung ba ci yang med na/lam bsgom pa la don ci yod/snyam du bsams nas/kho bo cag 'khor de nas dong ngo //de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag
223b1(dkon brtsegs): la'adi skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa dag ci khyed cag ma mos nas dong bar zang ngam/'on te spangs shing mi snyan par brjod nas dong /de dag gis spras pa/khyo ba cag ni ma mos nas dong bar
223b2(dkon brtsegs): bad kyi/kho bo cag gis spangs pa yang med la mi snyan par brjod pa yang mdo//nga nas sprul pa'i dge sbyong de dag la ldeg so zhes bya ba byin nas/'di skad chos kyang smra so//tshe dang ldan pa
223b3(dkon brtsegs): dag rjod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi mchog yin pas mi snyan par brjod par mi bya/brtsod par mi bya'i/re shig je 'gro bar bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa dag ci sems 'di sngon pa zhes
223b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba zhig gam/ser po zhes bya ba zhig gam/dmar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/dkar po zhes bya ba zhig gam/btsong ka zhes bya ba zhig gam/shel gyi kha dog lta bu zhes bya ba zhig
223b5(dkon brtsegs): gam/yang dag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/mi rtag pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/gzugs can zhes bya ba
223b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig gam/gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba zhig gam/zhes rtogs shig/de dag gis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa sems ni gzugs can ma yin pa/bstan du med pa/snang
223b7(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/thogs pa med pa/gnas meng pa/rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o//de nas sprul pa'i dge slong des dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces spras//tshe dang ldan pa dag kyi
224a1(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin pa/bstun du med pa/snang ba med pa/thogs pa med pa/gnas med po/rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i sems de nang na gnaso zhes bya ba
224a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/phyi rol na gnaso zhes bya ba 'am/gnyi ga'i bar na gnaso zhes bya bar dmig su yod snyam 'am/smras pa/de ni ma yino//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te sems de
224a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can ma yin/bstan du med pa/snang ba med/thogs pa med/gnas med/rnam par rig byed ma yin/nang na yang meng /phyi rol na yang med/gnyi ka med par yang
224a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigasu med na/ci de la yang dag par yongasu grub pa yod snyam 'am/de dag gis smras pa/de ni ma yino//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang yang dag pa ma yin zhing yongasu grub
224a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yin zhing yongasu grub pa ma yin pa de la ci rnam par grol ba yod snyam 'am/de dag gis smras pa/de ni ma yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag de las bsams nas/'jam
224a6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nus nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang med yA/rnam par byung bar 'gyur ba yang mdo zhes bstan to//
224a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dag yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log gis bslad pa rnams la ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa yong su 'dzin pa 'byung //ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa
224b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te/rtag tu sprul rnams la spyod cing gnas pad+mo dag la no sogs pa la byung bahU~M sems 'byung na/dmigs pa zadun 'ang gyur la byung nas zhog ts+tsha n+d+hasgra gnas
224b2(dkon brtsegs): mang ngo //sems kyi dmigs pa gang go snga rab tu 'byung zhing bstan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos par 'byur ba dang /lam sgom par byeng ba'i thams doni rang bzhin gyis meng padang
224b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /byung ba ma yin pa'o//meng pa dang /yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /byung ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de la ni/skye ba yang mad/'dzeg pa yang med//gnas
224b4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang meng //gdag skye ba myed bya dang /'jig pa meng ba dang /gnapa pa mang za sa ni bde sa na snang zang /rnam pa bral ba yang rjong //de la ni zab pa yang mad//mngan pa
224b5(dkon brtsegs): gas pa yang mngadang ljon pa dag du las bsams nas 'das dpal gzhan nur gyur pas 'di thang du chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la ni kun nas nyon mangs par 'gyur
224b6(dkon brtsegs): nga mang /rnam byur byung byer 'gyur ba yang med/'di lanyis la yang bab pa zang /mngon pa rtags pa snang dang /rnam par gril pa spang meng //zhes smras//de nas sprul pa'i dge slong
224b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas bstan pa 'di ba shang pan dge slong dag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grog//de dag sems rnam par grol nas 'jam dpal gzhi nur gyur pa gal cing
225a1(dkon brtsegs): dong ste/phyin pa dang /rang rang gi bla gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mngon par bkab nas tshig 'di skad ces kyang smraso//'jam dpal khyod kyis ni kho bo
225a2(dkon brtsegs): cag yongasu bskyab so//'di ltar kho bo cag kyang dam pa'i chos spong bar ma zhugs pas de phyin chad chos 'dul ba zab me la 'jug pa las phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no//de nas tshe dang
225a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa dag gis ci zhig thob cing ci zhig mngon par rtogs na/rang rang gi blo gos 'jam dpal gzhon nur
225a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa la mngon par bkab/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor kho bo cag gis nI ni yang thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pas de'i phyir kho bo cag gis rang rang

225a6(dkon brtsegs): langs te 'khor de nas dong ngo //gang gi tshe kho bo cag thob pa'i 'du shes de dang bral bar gyur pa'i tshe slar lhag so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ci las bsams/

225b1(dkon brtsegs): ni thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa medo//btsun pa rab 'byor gang la thob pa med cing mngon par rtogs pa med pa de ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yino//tshe dang ldan pa
225b2(dkon brtsegs): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag sus btul/de dag gis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor gang thob pa med pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang gang skye ba med pa

225b4(dkon brtsegs): btul ma yin nam/de dag gis smras pa/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa le 'di skad ces smraso//

227a1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gang ma rig ma rig pa dang /srid pa'i sbed pas 'jigs shing ma rig pa las rnam par grol ba'i ro myong bar byed pa ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du shes par

231a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa brtson 'grus kyis yongasu dag pa yino//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad mnyam zhing bye brag med par
231a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur par bsam gtan byed/bsam gtan de la sems gnas par 'dzag cing gnas de la yang rnam par shes pa gnas par mi byed pa dang /des rnam par shes pa mi gnas shing //
231a3(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa nyid kyis bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sa ni/
231a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rdza su rtogs pas de ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa zhes
231a5(dkon brtsegs): bya bar rig la dris na/rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du brda sprod par byed/lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes

231a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mthong ste/ji ltar chos gang yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ba de ltar mthong zhing gang gi tshe chos gang yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba de'i tshe ci yang ma yin par
231b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro//de myi yang ma yin pa'i thob pas mi rgyu rab tu mi d+h+ya rnam par mi rgyu'o//ngas rgyu ba dang rab tu rgyu ba dang /rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par rgyun bcad pas mi 'khor ro///
231b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi 'khor ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/des gang gis 'khor bar 'gyur pa'i rab tu rgyu ba de 'di lta ste/'dod pa dang /chags pa dang /smon pa'i rgyun bcad pa'i phyir te/de 'dod/
231b3(dkon brtsegs): pa don du gnyer ba thams cad med par sems can yong su smin par bya ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsdu ba dang /dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba dang /
231b4(dkon brtsegs): dkon mA chog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir bsams bzhi ni du skye ba rnam su rgyu bar byed/de ni rgyu ba med pa nyid kyis rgyu bar byed cing /chos rnams kyi rang bzhin rnam par
231b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam par 'khrug par mi byed/de ni dri'i shes rab yin pas de shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub tu rab tu shes pa dang /byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis
231b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi rang bzhin dang /sems can gyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs shing /chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin du rab tu shes
231b7(dkon brtsegs): te/dris na chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa de nyid brda sprod par byed/lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod sra shes rab kyi mig gis

232b7(dkon brtsegs): pas dris na dran pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa brda sprod bar byed/lha'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa brda sprod pa

237b1(dkon brtsegs): mad pa dal ni 'khor ba yang mang la yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med//lha'i bus smras pa/'jam dpal de ltar na soms n+dan gang dag gis bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /

237b3(dkon brtsegs): sems/phan pa gang gis rab tu phye ba yin snyam 'am/smras pa/'jam dpal phan pa ni mngon par 'du byed pas rab tu phye ba yin//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu khyod de bani
237b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la mngon par 'du mdzad pa yod par 'dod ngami/smras pa/'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa ni mngon par 'dre mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin paste/deni
237b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas pa brnyes pa dang /'dus ma byas shing /mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' ba yin//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu khyod kyis dam bcas pa de nyid kyis ni mngon
237b6(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dus ma byas pa la ni phan pa dang gnod pa dmig su meng//lha'i blos smras pa/'jam dpal chos bsten pa 'di ni las dang po pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bya'o//
237b7(dkon brtsegs): byer zhe ni/thos na skrag par 'gyur ba dang /skrag nas kyang phyir ldeg par 'gyur du'ang ring phyir//'jam dpal byeb smras pa/lha le'u las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' smag
238a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /phyid ldog pa gang mnan dran rgya ma ldag panyid la yang dgu bar gnas pa man//sgyu'o bas smras pa/'ang mdapa la khyad kyi la stabasams te sbya na//
238a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dungul gyis smras bya/lha'i bu las dang 'a ba'i byang chub sa ses dpa'i gang ldan sa dung sangs r+b+ba m+b+ha hU~M mus sku cing /ser swA dang /'chol ba'i tshul khrims
238a3(dkon brtsegs): gnang snams dang /yal dang /rnam par gasnang ba dang /tshal ba'i shes rab dag las n+d+hi ts+tshina'adin gyi me sdug pa nyid la yang dge phyir gnas pa yin//smras pa/

238a5(dkon brtsegs): sgyusmrasmra pa/'jam dang lha las drang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' di ltar gnas pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe lngas dang ba pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mnyam
238a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshum kyi sa da nas pa / sa dang pa'isams 'i'i gnas na man//smras pa/'a la sa kyis na chub ma

238b1(dkon brtsegs): shA med pa'i chos la mos pa de'i phyir las dang po pa zhes byaro//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yun ring po nas sbyang pa yin/smras pa/lha'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo zad
238b2(dkon brtsegs): ni yun ring po nas spyad pa yin te/de dag gi 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngan pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa bsrung ba yin/smras pa/
238b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags la spyod pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir ro dod chags kyi spyad pa la spyod kyang /'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de

238b5(dkon brtsegs): dang /gAti mug la spyod pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir gti mug gi spyad pa la spyod kyang gti mug gi spyod pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang /cha mnyam pa la spyod pa yongasu smin par
238b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir cha mnyam po'i snang ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mI gnas pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa bsrung ba yino//lha'i bu byang chub
238b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gang sems can yong su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rje su 'jug kyang /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyang
239a1(dkon brtsegs): /rnam par 'khrugs par mi spyong na/datsam snun byang chub sems dpa'i sdud pa bsrung ba yi//smras pa/'jam dpal ji ltar nA byu chub sems da
239a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog pa yin/'jam dpal gyi ste smras pa/lha'i bu dag gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gang yang 'jig par mi byed/chags par yang mi byed lce/ches
239a3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings ni rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med cing /chags pa med par rtag sngo pa de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub
239a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ldog pa dang 'jug par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa yin//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dod pa'i khams yang ldog la/bsam gtan rnams la
239a5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'jug par byed pa'i phyir ro//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas ma rtog khri shing /mi rtsod pa lhur len pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa
239a6(dkon brtsegs): yin//de ci'i phyir zhe nA/des sems can gyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /bdag gi khams ma rtogs pa de mngon sum du gyur pas chos thams cad la yang phyir lko
239a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i phyir to//de'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa zhes bya ste/de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhan gyi rdzing mi 'jog cing /nem nur med la thetsham med cing som nye dang bral ba'i
239b1(dkon brtsegs): d+hir+ya/gzong ma nas dag nI dri ma med lta nyon mongs pa mad cing /shes rab kyi srung ba gsal bar gyur pas chos thams cang la dbang bsgyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
239b2(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du gyur pas der byor mi ldog pa zhes bya'o//skyes pa/'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa skye bu gcig gis thobo sa pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
239b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu glang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas skye ba thams cad skye ba med par shes shing /sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang rab tu shes la/sems can yongasu smin par
239b4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i phyir skye ba thams cad skye ba stan cing /len pa med par skye ba yong su 'dzin par byed pa dang /skye ba dang tshe rabs thams cad du len pa dang bral bas 'chi ba dang skye ba las yang dag
239b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'das pa dang /chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi 'da' zhing /yang dge bar mi 'da' ba dang /rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i don rtogs pa dang /sems can thams
239b6(dkon brtsegs): cad dang lus mnyam pa dang /sems can thams cad dang sems mnyam pa dang /sems can thams cad dang dge mnyam pa dang /sems can thams cad dang lus dang yul
239b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi yul rtogs pa dang /chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa dang /sems can gyi bsam
240a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bya ba shes pa dang dus lA blta bu dang /byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa de ni skye ba gcig gis thogs pa zhes bya ste/lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems
240a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin//de nas lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
240a3(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad dpyas med pa yin/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed pa dang /nga rgyal
240a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis byas pa dag mi byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kha na ma tho ba med cing thams cad dpyas med pa yin//lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi
240a5(dkon brtsegs): snyoms kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas bdog pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba de lta bu ni kha na mthe bo med pa yin//gang yang sar sna dang lhan cig yu~M gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa
240a6(dkon brtsegs): yin//glang gi tshe sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /bsrub pa dang /tshul khrims dang /yod mthang dang ldan pa de lta bu ni kha na mi tho ba med pa yin//glang yang 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims
240a7(dkon brtsegs): dang lhan cig mi gnos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino//gang gi tshe sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems meng pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin//gang yang brnab sems
240b1(dkon brtsegs): dang /gnod sems kyi bag la nyal dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin//gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom pa'i brtson 'grus la yang dag par spyad ba de lta bu ni
240b2(dkon brtsegs): kha na mthong med pa yin//gang yang la lo dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin//gang gi tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bu mi
240b3(dkon brtsegs): nam tho ba med pa yino//gang yang bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i ro myang bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yi no//gang gi tshe shes rab kyi rtsa ba thos pa yongasu tshol ba la brtson pa de lta bu ni
240b4(dkon brtsegs): kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang 'chal ba'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no//gang gi tshe rma phyung yang rma myi 'byin pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med
240b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yino//gang yang rma phyung yang rma mi 'byin pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino//gang gi tshe ji lta ba bzhin du smra ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang de bzhin du byed pa de lta
240b6(dkon brtsegs): bu ni dpyas med pa yin//gang gi tshe nang nye bar zhi ba de lta bu ni/na ma tho ba med pa yin//gang yang phyi rol gyi yul rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa'i no//gAng gi
240b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la bsam pa tha dad ba med pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin//gang yang theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino//gang gi tsheng dud
241a1(dkon brtsegs): las rnams rtogs pa de lta bu ni/kha na mtho ba myong ba yin//gang yang bdud kyi las rnams pa zlog pa d+mo lta bu ni dpyas myed pa yin//gang gi rje 'jig rten snang ba thob pa//
241a2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino//gang gi tshe bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma
241a3(dkon brtsegs): tho ba med pa yi no//gang yang bya ba ma yin par mi ltung ba de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yi no//gang gi tshe nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang /snyems pa thams cad dang bral ba de lta bu ni kha na mtho
241a4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa yino//gang yang ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs shing 'phags pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa de lta bu ni dbyas med pa yi no//gang gi tshe dam bcas pa brtan pa de/
241a5(dkon brtsegs): lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yi no//gang yang dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yino//gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun
241a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med pa de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no//gang gi tshe shes pa
241a7(dkon brtsegs): rab dong ye shes kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rab tu shes pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang thabs shes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag
241b1(dkon brtsegs): sdud pa de lta bu ni da byas med pa yin//gang rtsom pa thams cad la snying rje chen pos 'jug pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba mang ba yin//gang yang chos thams cad la rnam par dag par granas pa
241b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin//gang yang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin//gang yang dmigs pa'i lta ba spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa de lta bu ni dpyas
241b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin//gang yang tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor zhing chos gang yang yang dag par rdza su ci mthong ba de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yin//gang yang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du byeng
241b4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni dpyas med pa yin no//gang gi tshe chos kyi dbyings stong pa zhes bya bar so sor rtog pa de lta bu ni kha na ma tho ba med pa yino//gang yang sems can thams cad yongasu myi gtong

241b6(dkon brtsegs): sloskyong mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de lta bu ni dpyas mad pa yin//lha'i bu gzhan yang dzi tsam du tshig 'jug pa dang /tshig gis rlom semasu byed pa dang /tshig gis rtogs par byed pa dang
241b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig la mngon par zhen par byed pa de tsam du skyon yin no//lha'i bu ji tsam du chos thams cad la da snyad du med pa nyid dang 'jug pa med pa nyid dang /rlom sems med pa nyid dang /
242a1(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa med pa nyid dang /'phro ba med pa nyid dang /brjod du med pa nyid dang /sems can yongasu mi btang ba'i phyir gtan du yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da' ba nyid
242a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de tsam du kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas med pa yino//lha'i bu gang la kha na ma tho ba ming cing /dpyas med pa de ni yig med pa yin//gang la yi ge med pa de ni brjod du med
242a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/brjod du med pa'i don la ni kha na ma tho ba med cing dpyas mdo//lha'i bu de lta bas na brjod med pa'i don la ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rang gi sems gtso bor
242a4(dkon brtsegs): byed pas khA na ma thob med cing 'phags pa rnams kyis dpyas byar med pa yino//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lag s+ho//
242a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byin te/'jam dpal legaso legaso//khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa dang dpyas med pa de legs par smraso//'jam dpal gang gi

242a7(dkon brtsegs): bston to//bstan pa 'di thos nas 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/de dag thaMd kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs
242b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag tu steng tha dad pa'i de bzhin ga shegs pa dag tu 'gyur zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu
242b2(dkon brtsegs): kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di yun ring po ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/'di'i
242b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji skad ces bya bar 'gyur snyamo//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos

242b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur/byang chub thob pa'i ming ni ji snyed ces bgyi bar 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
242b6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//kun dga' bo lha'i bu rin chen mchog 'di ni bskal pa 'bum 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin chen 'byung gi nas shes bya ba la sher
242b7(dkon brtsegs): phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa
243a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba btang
243a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang 'byur ba dang rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /lha dang mi rnams kyis kun tu gang ba dang /me khom pa dang /dran song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur//kun dpa'

243a4(dkon brtsegs): gser gyis sbrus shing blta na sdig la/gser gyi dra bas kun nas bkab par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /nye bar spyod pa ci 'dra
243a5(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du mi de dag gi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams der ni bza' ba dang btung ba dag kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par
243a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//'jig rten gyi khams dor ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gi ming yang 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang chos kyi dga' ba sna tshogs dang /chos
243a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam par grol ba sna tshogs dang /bsam gtan dang /ting 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa sna tshogs dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa sna tshogs dag gis ngag
243b1(dkon brtsegs): mgur spyod par 'gyur te/chos kyi rab tu dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba dag gis dga' bar 'gyur ba ma gtogs par tshor ba gzhan dag myong bar mi 'gyur bas/de'i
243b2(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur ro//de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun byang
243b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cur 'gyur//de'i byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa na dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa
243b4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen bkod pa de gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos ston par 'gyur pa de'i tshe/steng gi bar snang l-i ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te//
243b5(dkon brtsegs): steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams skyil mo dkrung gcig gis khyab par byas nas 'od zer brgya stong dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dar snang bas khyab par byas shing /lha'i me tog dang /
243b6(dkon brtsegs): spos dang /phye ma'i char dag mngon par rab tu phab nas lha'i sil spya na dang /pheg rdob pa dang /glu dbyings brgya stong dag gi sgra phyung ste/thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de smras
243b7(dkon brtsegs): go bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di lta ste/mi zad pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo'i chos ston por 'gyuraro//de la mi zad pa'i gzungs kyi sgo gang zhe na/'di
244a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste lus dang sems dben pa nyid du ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi dben pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi nges par rtog pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams
244a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la so sor rtog pa'i sgra dang /chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi bo ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi kha na mo tho ba med pa ston
244a3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi sgo da /chos rnams kyi shes pa'i snang ba ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi snang ba'i sgra dang /chos rnams b+h+rUM b+h+yo blag
244a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi zhi gnas kyi sgo dang /
244a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi 'gal ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi lhag mthong gi sgro dang chos rnams kyi 'khrug pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos tha~Md kyi nges par
244a6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi mi brjid po nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi dran pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi don rtogs pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad
244a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtogs pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi yid rnam par dag pa ston por byed pa chos thaMd kyi blo gros kyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
244b1(dkon brtsegs): bskyon pa spyod bcos ma sbyong ba da slod du/sa na sa rgyun pa byud pa spyod pa rgyas mas da nanas ma gyu na dang /rgyun rnams kyi na thams
244b2(dkon brtsegs): dag po gcong pa stan pa byu ba N+DI sa rnams cad sbyi pa sa 'i dang /rgyus mas na nga na dang /snrel bzhin du 'anas pams pang gyi mngan pa
244b3(dkon brtsegs): bu med pa'i sgo dang/chos rnams kyi mngon par 'grub pa me bstod pa spyod pa rgyas byams kyi n+d+he ba meng po'i nga /chos rnams myig N+DIs myang pa'i chos nyid kun par byed do
244b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /chos rnams kyi smos pa meng pa nyid ston par byung ba chos thams cad kyi nga chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi mdzan sum
244b5(dkon brtsegs): b+h+rUM shes pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams gnyis dang bral ba ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi gnyi su med pa nyid kyi sgo dang /chos rnam
244b6(dkon brtsegs): sdigayo ba med pa nyid ston par byed 'chos thams ca 'i rten pa med pa'i sgo dang /rjes rnams kyi sems can mnyam pa nyid spyod par byung ba rjes rnams cad sems can mang pa rgyad
244b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi 'gyur ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad mi byed pa med pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi skying pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad
245a1(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba myed pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi gzhi med pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi lhag par/
245a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i sgo dang /chos thams cad kyi 'bras bu 'grub pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi rgyu'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi mi
245a3(dkon brtsegs): brjed pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi mngon par brtson pa'i sgo dang /chos rnams kyi kun nas ldang ba med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba'i sgo dang //
245a4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams kyi ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ston par byed pa chos tha~Md kyi de bzhin nyid kyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi dbyer med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgo

245a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi sgra dbyangs dang /tshig go lam gyis brjod pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid ston par byed pa chos tha
245a7(dkon brtsegs): brjod med pa'i don gyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba nyid ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi bsam gtan gyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi gang zag med pa nyid ston par byed pa
245b1(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi sgo dang /chos rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa ston par byed pa chos thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sgo de/kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin
245b2(dkon brtsegs): chen bkod pa de na mkha'i dkyil de nyid las ma bzhengs par byang chub sems dpa' de dag la mi zad pa'i sgo'i gzungs kyi sgo de dag rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te/de yang
245b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub se de'i dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gar
245b4(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i yis gzigs
245b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lhun gyis grub cing mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' bas
245b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i yis gzigs pa 'jug pa de ni ma 'dres pa yin//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha'i bu rin
245b7(dkon brtsegs): chen mchog la 'di skad ces smraso//lha'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed/lha'i
246a1(dkon brtsegs): bus smras pa/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di la ni gang lung bstan pa'i chos gang yang dmigasu medo//nga ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas
246a2(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang lung bstan du med pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas rnam par shes pa yang lung bstan du
246a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas sa'i khams kyang lung bstan du med pa dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams byang chub sems

246a7(dkon brtsegs): yang lung bstan du med pa dang /'byung ba dang 'jig pa byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa yang lung bstan du med pa'i phyir//btsun pa kun dga' bo byang chub
246b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni brda'i gzhi'i tshig bla dgas yon//de ni nyo bar zhi ba'i bzhi yin te/chos gang shin tu nye bar zhi ba de la ni lung bstan pa gang yang medo//btsun pa kun dga' bo

247a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to//gtam 'di brjod par gyur pa na bdud sdig can dpung dang bcas/bzhon pa dang bcas/'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das gA la
