250b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bdud sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog dang gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing se ng+ge'i khri la 'dug nas zab mo'i gnas 'di lta bu 'di dag
250b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa ni ngo mtshar to//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu kho bos ni sems med pa'i dngos po shing dang rtswa dang nags tshal 'di dag la de lta de ltar byin gyis
251a1(dkon brtsegs): brlabs na yang 'di dag kyang de lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyur//kho bos gnas brtan sha radwa ti'i bu nyid la ngo lta
251a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar byin gyis brlabs na yang gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spobs pas chos ston par 'gyuraro//de nas
251a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan par byin gyis brlang snga nas nyan
251a4(dkon brtsegs): zlothos ston pa'i gzugasu gnas pa ni mi mgum pa yin pas bdag 'khor 'di nas mi snang bar bya'o snyam du bsums pa dang//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs
251a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis des mi snang bar byed ma nuso//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/tshe dang ldan pa sha
251a6(dkon brtsegs): radwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan zhing /seng+ge'i khri la 'dug par thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis mthong bar byin gyis bslab so//de nas
251a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston par mdzad pa de bzhin
251b1(dkon brtsegs): du 'dud sdig can dang lhan cig tu ston cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa tI'i bu sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang sku'i mtshan dang ldan pas bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang
251b2(dkon brtsegs): mor+g+haM ni dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smra so//sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni ni zhig gis rab tu phye ba yin/skyes pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangaste rgyas
251b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yino//chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis med par rdzogs pas rab tu phye ba yin//
251b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dbang bskur bsu rab tu phye ba yin no//sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rtogs pa tsarab tu phye ba yino//dngos po dang dngos po
251b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa thams cad rtogs pas rab tu phye ba yino//dngos po rnam par 'jig pas rab tu phye ba yino//bsgom pa dang dngos po med pas rab tu phye ba yin te/rab tu phye ba yad ma
251b6(dkon brtsegs): yin rab tu ma phye ba yang ma yin/rgyud med pa rgyu ba dang bral ba rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par chud pa ste/'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa yi no//de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshe dang
251b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smra so//btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/sdig can de bzhin
252a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa yin//mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med pa la gnas pa yin//lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kying
252a2(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa yino//nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas la gnas pa yi no//chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba rtsa ba'i gnas la gnas pa yino//
252a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gnyi su med pa'i gnas la gnas pa yino//gnas thams cad la mi gnas pa la gnas pa yin te/sdig can de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu la
252a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa yino//tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso//sdig can byang chub gu las btsal bar bya/bdud kyis smras pa/btsun pa sha ra dwa tI'i/
252a5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la gnas pa dang /ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa kun tu sbyor ba dang /phyin ci log gis kun nas dkris pa dang /sgrib pa dang tshed pa drug
252a6(dkon brtsegs): las btsil bar bya'o//smras pa/sdig can khyod ci las bsams te de skad sten/smras gtsun pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu chos de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa gang yin pa
252a7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid byang chub yin pa'i phyir//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong brgyad brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol//sha ra dwa ti'i bu la dad pa'i lha'i
252b1(dkon brtsegs): bu rnams dang /bdud kyi ris la dad pa'i lha'i bu rnams la srog chags sum khri nyid stong gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed//lha'i bu de dag 'dul//
252b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dbang gi phyir 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdud sdig can dang gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /sku'i mtshan gyis brgyan par byin gyis
252b3(dkon brtsegs): brlabaso//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyis brlabs de phyir bsduso//de nas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang bdud sdig can yang rang rang gi gzugs kyi mtshan dang /
252b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag lhags shing 'dus te de dag na mkha' las
252b5(dkon brtsegs): babs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
252b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur te//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
252b7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag cag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer ma mchis pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i slad du 'dir mchis pa lags te/
253a1(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gos chos go nam grangs 'dug zung bar bcu/bcang bar bsngo//bklag par bcoM//kun chub par bcoM slong /dam pa'i tsha
253a2(dkon brtsegs): yangasu gzung ba'i sla gzhan dgal rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bsten par bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
253a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas 'dir mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas
253a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi nga ba dad pa dag nas 'dus pa te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongasu smin par byas shing chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
253a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid kyis yongasu smin par byas pa dag yin pas/'di dag ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'od la byas pa bza ba dang /byas pa tshor ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la bskye
253a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /phyag bya ba dang /bstan po kun bya ba dang /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la yang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang rjes su yid rang bar bya
253a7(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'dir lhags//kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni nga yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi
253b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di 'jam+bu'i gling du rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro//kun dgra' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag gis dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin
253b2(dkon brtsegs): pa la mngon par brtson pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor de na brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bac+doMs
253b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa dang /rags kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag dang gzhan dag la yang rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyi zhing /kun
253b4(dkon brtsegs): tu bsrung ba dang /sba ba dang /'tshe ba ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du brtson par bgyi lagasaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba
253b5(dkon brtsegs): da dag la legaso zhes bya ba byin te/grogs po dag khyed cag dam pa'i chos yongasu 'dzin pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kun tu bsrung ba la brtson par zhugs pa ni legs lags///
253b6(dkon brtsegs): gang dag dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba la brtson par byed pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang mchog
253b7(dkon brtsegs): pa byas pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod kyis ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i
254a1(dkon brtsegs): dus na 'dzam+bu'i gling na rgya cher spyod par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs shig/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper 'gyis na/
254a2(dkon brtsegs): bsreg pa'i bskal pa byung bar gyur na na mkha'i khams mi tshig par bgyi ba'i slad byin gyis brlab par bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyang na mkha'i khams
254a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin lags pas/de dag ni skye ba yang mi mngon 'gag pa yang mi mdze na lags te/gang la skye ba ma mchis shing 'gag pa ma mchis pa de la ni byin gyis brlabs kyi rang /
254a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ci yang ma mchis lagaso//bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni byin gyi brlabs ma mchis lags pas de dag gi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de nyid byin gyis brlabs lagaso//
254a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'on du lags kyis kyang gang dag chos la gus shing chos las nges par byang la mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gnon par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dge/
254a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag gi slad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab du gsol/bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges
254a7(dkon brtsegs): phar bcom zhing bar chad ma mchis pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'dza m+bu'i gling na spyad par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di byin gyis brlab tu go mo la/de nas
254b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ang zer gyis kha dog lta bur snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i 'od dag sku las rab tu phyung //de nas bcom
254b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'di thams cad rjesu song ba de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang
254b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos la shes pa dang /bsam pa ma nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
254b4(dkon brtsegs): bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/tshangs shig lhogs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig dang /
254b5(dkon brtsegs): de lta na khyed kyis 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro//kun dga' bos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
254b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos kyi dbyings
254b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/lha'i bu rin chen mchog gis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i man ngag zhes bya bar yang
255a1(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang 'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rin
255a2(dkon brtsegs): tshan mchog dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te btso
255a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las/chos
255a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i le'u ste/brgyad pa rdzog s+ho//shA lo ga drug brgya lnga bcu bam po gnyis so////rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya da sha
255a5(dkon brtsegs): d+harmA kau nA nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa chos bcu pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo////bam po dang 'o//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
255a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la phyi ge 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun
255a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med
255b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyi 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po spyan
255b2(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lteng pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom
255b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
255b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig lngas brnams te zhu lagaso//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
255b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la rtag tu skabs phyes/ci dang
255b6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /des dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstun pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems
255b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dge
256a1(dkon brtsegs): grong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na dge slong theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/
256a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag pa bzhugs pa lags par 'dogs par mdzad/don gang gis nu theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba
256a3(dkon brtsegs): lagasade skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam dag rin chen zla 'od rgyal po la legaso zhes
256a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba byin te/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lhag par g.yo ba ni bzang ba yin/yongasu dpyad pa yang bzang ba yin/dris pa lung bstan pa la spobs pa yang bzang ba yin te/rig
256a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu khyod 'di lta ste/skye ba mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams la phran pa dang /bde ba'i phyir zhugs
256a6(dkon brtsegs): /khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de lta bu yong su dro ba rA sems pa ni legs legaso//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad

256b3(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa yin/chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin/nga rgyal drang chu ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yin/dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin/nyan

256b6(dkon brtsegs): po'i rang bzhin can yin+da tAM/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub la yang mngon par yid che sa/de baN+Din
256b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes skad cig gcig la dus gsum dang ldan pa la yang mngon par yid ches /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dga' ba med pa dang /'chi ba
257a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang /zad pa med pa dang /'god pa med pa dang /'chad pa med pa la yang mngon par yid ches/yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /chos kyi dbyings dang //thams/

257a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyan dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu phun sum tshogs pa dang /'od 'dom gang ba nyid la yang mngon par yid ches/nyan thos kyis bshad pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi
257a5(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa 'am/byang chub sems dpes bshad pa'am/de las gzhan pa drang srong chen po dag gis smras pa/legs par bshad pa la yang mngon par yid ches/'dzi na 'di dang 'dri//
257a6(dkon brtsegs): rten pha rol la yang mngon par yid ches/dge sbyong dang bram ze yang dag par song ba rnams dang /yang drug par zhugs pa dag la yang mngon par yid ches/dge ba'i
257a7(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang /dga' ba dang /yodu 'ong ba lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i dbang po 'am/mi rnams kyi nang du mi'i dbang por 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la yang mngon/
257b1(dkon brtsegs): pAr yid ches/mi dge ba'i las rnam par ston pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dag sa rnams kyi nang du mi 'dod pa dang /mi sdug pa dang /mi dga' ba dang /
257b2(dkon brtsegs): yid du mi 'ong ba dang /mi bzad pa dang /drag pa dang rtsub pa dang /tsha bar 'gyur ba la yang mngon par yid che so//de de ltar mngon par yid ches pas chos gsum spangs pa
257b3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/gsum gang zhe na 'di lta ste/nam nur dang /yid gnyis dang /the tshomo//rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rje su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar

257b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren rnams nges par 'byung //de phyir blo gros ldan pa'i mis//dad pas rje ste 'brang nyid la brten//'jig rten drube na dad pa mchog/dang ldan rnam par nyams pa med//de lta
257b6(dkon brtsegs): bsta nu mkhas pa'i mis//dad pas rjesu 'brang ba bstan//dad pa med pa'i mi la nI//dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste//me yis sa bon tshig rnams la//myu gu sngon po rje
257b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi no//rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nan tan snying por byed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sgo dang kha spu bregs /gas ngur
258a1(dkon brtsegs): smig dag bgos nas/dad pas khyim nas khyim med par log par kho nar rab tu byung //rab tu byung nas kyang nyan thos kyi bslab pa dang /cho ga dang spyod yul dang
258a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu spyod pa dag la yang slob par byed/rang sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang /cho ga dang spyod yul dang /kun spyod pa dag la yang slob par byed//de de ltar slob pas lus dang dgra
258a3(dkon brtsegs): dang sems dang ldan pa'i gnas ngan len dag thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad sbyangs pa yin//de la lus dang ldan pa'i gnas ngan len gang zhe na 'di
258a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/srog gcod pa dang /ma byin par len pa dang /mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /dbyig pa dang /mtshon cha dang /bong ba dang /ldag pa dag gis gzhan la gnod par byed pa
258a5(dkon brtsegs): dang /lag pa rgod pa dang /rkang pa rgod pa dang /rgyug pa dang /drakyu ba dong /mchong ba dang /mgyogs par 'gro ba dang /rgyal ba ste de ni lus dang ldan pa'i gnas ngan len zhes
258a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//de la ngag gi gnas ngan len gang zhe na/'di lta ste/brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /ngag rtsub po dang /tshig kyal pa dang /nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang /mdo sde
258a7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo zab mo dag spong bar byed pa dang /mkhan po dang slob dpon dang /tha ma lta bu rnams dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la mi snyan pa brjed par byed pa ste/de

258b2(dkon brtsegs): sna dang /rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /grags pa 'dod pa dang /shes kyi khe 'dod pa dang /rigs kyis rgyags pa dang /gzugs kyis rgyags pa dang /lang chos rgyags pa dang /nang

262a1(dkon brtsegs): tu byung ba dag gi spyos sam/brgyad bkag gam/brdegs sam/btsogs sam/bcings sam/gau ranu bcug gam/zhus sam/rnam par gcas
262a2(dkon brtsegs): na yang bzod par byed dang du len par byed de/de ltar bzod pa bsgom par byed do//bzod pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed la/bzod

264b6(dkon brtsegs): mes kun tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa yino zhes cher sbyin yin par 'du shes bskyed par byed cing /de chos kyi rgyu dang /chos kyi gzhi dang /chos kyi tshad kyi

265a1(dkon brtsegs): drugs/ma pa yang 'du ba stod pa zhan pa ba dag ma thong na yang 'dod pa'i soms bskyod par mapyod par de'ong snyam du sems to//dag la dam pa'i rnas
265a2(dkon brtsegs): mAnyan paSh+Ti snang ba 'char bas na/bdag ni 'jig rten na 'de ba yin snyam du sems te/dargyu de dang /rkyen de dang /gzhings mya ngan mi byed/smre sngags mi 'angan cing sdug bsngal ba dang /

265a4(dkon brtsegs): rlig gcig tsam gyi phyir yang skal pa 'am/skul pa las lhag par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gan ba sde'o snyam pa de lta bu'i sems skye bar 'gyur zhing /de de ltar
265a5(dkon brtsegs): yid yongasu spyo pa yod pas na/bsgrim pa mi dgos pa kho nar rnam pa tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par sgrub par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams kyang zab par byed
265a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te/rigs kyi skye m+WA na byang chub sems dang 'tshas 'dod pa med//de nas btsam ldani 'das kyis tshigs brkyang du 'di dag kAr stsal to//rgyal ba'i sgos
265a7(dkon brtsegs): shes ma che//chosa'i dri par ni myong sa rnams//dam chis yid su tshal ba ni//spyi baspyad pa mi byed//gus pas dri ma chos yongs tshol ba'o//rgyal ba'i thugs las sus
265b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams//sems kyis 'dzin par byed pa dang //nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa yin//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la bya
265b2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nye bar rtog par byed /chos thams cad ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun tu rmongs par byed pa'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rmi
265b3(dkon brtsegs): lam lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir rku zla lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni sems can med pa'i phyir mig yor lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa
265b4(dkon brtsegs): kun brtags pa'i phyir gzugs brnyan lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba'i phyir brag cha lta bu'o//chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir
265b5(dkon brtsegs): byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba yino//chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yino//chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'i phyir ma 'gags pa yin no///
265b6(dkon brtsegs): /chos thams cad ni byed pa po med pa'i phyir bcos ma ma yino//chos thaMng ni gos pa med pa'i phyir na mkha'o lta bu yino//chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis kun tu 'bar ba ma yin pa'i
265b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhi ba yino//chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir bzod ma nas yong su dag pa yi no//chos thams cad ni dri ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/
266a1(dkon brtsegs): /dri ma med pa yino//chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir gzod ma nas yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa yino//chos thams cad ni nges par snang ba ma yin
266a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir gzugs can ma yino//chos thams cad ni lus med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa yino//chos thams cad ni gnas yang dag par bcom
266a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin//chos thams cad ni rje su chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa'i phyir rnam par shes par bya ba ma yino//chos thaMd ni nyon mongs pa'i spyod yul las yang
266a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra pAr 'das pa'i phyir gnas med pa yino//chos thams cad ni thabs la mkhas pa'i rig pa dang bral ba'i phyir sbrul gdug pa lta bu yin no//chos thams cad ni snying po med
266a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir chu shing gi sdong po lta bu yino//chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis nyams chung ba'i phyir lbu ba rdos pa lta bu yin zhes nye bar rtog par byed pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de
266a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la nye bar rtog par byed pa yino//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//chos kun sgyu ma lta bu ste/
266a7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rnams kyi sems rmongs byed//yang dag ma yin rmi 'dra bar//de ltar ltos shig dge slong dag/chos rnarang chu zla lta bu ste//mig yor gyis ni kun nas bslang //chos
266b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzugs brnyan lta bur ni//mkhas pa su zhig rtog mi byed//rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rje su 'thun pa'i chos la zhugs pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di
266b2(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtago zhes yang dag par rjesu blta zhing gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi byed par chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor
266b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par byed cing /de dag gi mtshan ma rnams dang legs par bshad pa rnams dang /legs par mtshan btab pa rnams
266b4(dkon brtsegs): legs par zin par byed/mtshan ma dang legs par bshad pa dang /legs par mtshan btab pa dang /legs par gzung ba de dag las de'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lam rtsol ba med pa

266b6(dkon brtsegs): phyir chos kyi dbyings mngon sum du mi byed par chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor gyi chos rnams yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis legs par rtogs par byed cing /de dag gi mtshan ma dang
266b7(dkon brtsegs): legs par bshad pa dang /legs par mtshan btab pa de dag legs par zin par byed la/mtshan ma dang /legs par bshad pa dang /legs par mtshan data
267a1(dkon brtsegs): ba legs par gzung ba de dag la de'i chos kyi dbyings kyi lam rtsol ba med pa kho nar 'jug pa dang /mi rtag pa la ji lta ba bzhin du sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /
267a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag med pa la yang de bzhin te/de gzugs bdag mdo zhes yang drag par rje su blta zhing gzugs bdag medo zhes yang dag par rje su blta ba na/gzugs kyis mi skrag mi dang zhing
267a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bar mi 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i yong su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir//
267a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bdag medo zhes yang dag par rje su lta zhing /rnam par shes pa bdag medo zhes yang dag par rje su blta
267a5(dkon brtsegs): ba na/rnam par shes pas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa yongasu rtog pas kun nas bsrung ba yin la/
267a6(dkon brtsegs): des de yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyiraro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta skye dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis skye bo phal po che'i mdun du smra/
267a7(dkon brtsegs): mar byas pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste/glang po che'i tshogs sam/rta'i tshogs so ma/shing rta'i tshegs sam/dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag mngon par sprul te bstan par
267b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can ni dri mthong na ma skrag mau nga pa zhing dang bar mi 'gyu ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/des de ni sgyu mar byas pa ste/yang dag pa ma yin pa dang /yod pa ma yin pA na//
267b2(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa dang /slu bar byed pa'i rjes yin par rlig cing kun tu shes pa'i phyir//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang gzugs bdag medado zhes yang dag par rje su lta bra ni mi
267b3(dkon brtsegs): smyugli mI de dang zhidi/dang bar mi 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni yang dgu pa ma yin pa yong su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba yin la/des de yang yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes

268b1(dkon brtsegs): dudus mye la bkur bsgyu stod/blam+bA byed /ri myor byung //mchod par byung /logs bAr ro mgro byed kyang de 'di snyam du dag gis mo 'dul bkur bstir byas/tha mar byas/ri ma

269a1(dkon brtsegs): /dpas ni/'khor ba kho nar gnas par bya ba yin//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems rapA ra 'a khur ba sgo//dor ba'i tshe/'khor d+ha'i stan

270a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dbyar sems dpa' chen ba na ras no drug brgya ba byas pa lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de de bzhin te/ji
270a2(dkon brtsegs): smras pa de de bzhin//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//grags chen thabs skye mkhas pa dang //shes rab khyad par 'phagro

270b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni de dag dang bral bas na de'i phyir nga rgyal dang /che ba'i nga rgyal dang bral ba zhes bya'o//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//nga

270b7(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gsheg pas dgongs te gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab
271a1(dkon brtsegs): mo gang dag yin pa de dag la sgra ji bzhin kho nar mngon par zhen par mi byed pa yin te/de la de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa de dag kyang gang zhen
271a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes gsungs pa ni de ltar mi blta'o//kun dgra bo ni ro rgyab
271a3(dkon brtsegs): na'o zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//nga ni rgas 'khogs te gtugs pa yin gyis nga'i bsnyen bkur ba tshol cig ces gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//mo'u dag la
271a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi bu khyod song la sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gan nas sman long shig dang bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzhan du mu stegs
271a5(dkon brtsegs): can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dag dang /lhon cig tu tshig gis rtsod par byed//zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal
271a6(dkon brtsegs): pas zug go zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa lhas byin ni yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang /gtsug can dang /phyir
271a7(dkon brtsegs): rgol ba dang /dgra bor gyur pa yin no//zhes gsungs po yang de ltar mi blta'o//de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir bram ze'i grong sa la can du ji ltar lhung bzed
271b1(dkon brtsegs): bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung zhes gsungs pa yang de ltar mi blta'o//bram ze'i bu mo drug sems shing gi gzhong bu lto bar bcings te/de bzhon gshegs pa la bsrung

272a2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas/de phyis bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngar slob par byed la/sngar bslab par bya ba gang yin pa de ni phyis slob par byed na/rigs kyi bu 'di ji ste ma du sems/de gzhi des

272a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rigs dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rtul po yang bsgom pa'i lam gyis sngar nyon mongs pa rnams zad par

272a6(dkon brtsegs): mi rgya'o//zhes bya snyam mam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gang 'dod cen pa ma gtogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes de skad mchi ba'i sems can de
272a7(dkon brtsegs): ni lha dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na yang dag par rje su ma mthong
272b1(dkon brtsegs): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dpe gzhan yang nyon cig/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa
272b2(dkon brtsegs): zad nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gam/'on te ma zad pas 'dug snyam mame/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bos nas mchis lag so//bde bang gshegs pa bas nas mchis lagaso//
272b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de gzhi des mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya snyam mAm/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs
272b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya lag so//bde bar gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di la yang de dang 'dra ba bAny+dza bAr bya'o//gsol
272b5(dkon brtsegs): pA/bcom ldan 'das kun dga' bo nga ni ro rgyu ba na'o zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bur bgyi lagase/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ngas phyi m+bu'i skye bo de bzhin ga
272b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sku rdo rje ltar sra ba yang sku ro rgyab skud na/gzhan drug lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na/de la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin
272b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku ro rgyab snyung zhi'o zhes sgra ji bzhin kha nir 'dzin par byed de//de dag ni rang yang nyams par byas la/gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yin te/de bzhin gshegs//
273a1(dkon brtsegs): bsdu de la dgongs nas de skad ces gsung so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das pa/ni rgas 'khyogs te gtugs pa yin gyis nga'i bsnyen bkur bu tshol cig ces gsungs
273a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de ji lta ba bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtse bas nga'i nyan thos rgas 'khogs to/gtugs
273a3(dkon brtsegs): pa gang dag gi lus la bsnyen bkur ba dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas N+ye su mA gnado zhes phongs par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad
273a4(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs te/de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas/de skad gsungs pa yin na/de la mi blun po kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa rga sI 'khyogs te/gtug gau zhes
273a5(dkon brtsegs): sku ji bzhin kho nas 'dzin par byed do//de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la gzhan yang nyams par byed pa yino//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod song la
273a6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi gnas nas/sman long shig dang bza' bar bya'o//zhes gsungs pa de ji lta ba bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de
273a7(dkon brtsegs): yid ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la thugs brtsi bas/nga'i nyan thos gang dag la sman dgos pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dang //de bzhin gshegs pas rje sum gnango zhes pa
273b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de skad gsungs te/de bzhin gshegs pas de las dgongs nas de skad gsungs pa yin na/de la mi blun po kha cig sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyi
273b2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong mo'u dgal gyi bu la zhes med pa dang /gus par bsgrim pa med pa ma yin par bstun cing dris na/yang rings pa rings pa kho nar snyun gsos smon bstan pa las ni///
273b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku la snyun mnga' ba yin no//snyam pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la yang nyes dmigs dag snang ste/chos mthong ba rnams la yang de lta bu'i
273b4(dkon brtsegs): bag med pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur na/so so'i skye bo rnam dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos shes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed/de dag kyang rang yang nyams par byas la/gzhan
273b5(dkon brtsegs): yang nyams par byed pa yin//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dag dang lhan cig tu tshig gos rtsod par
273b6(dkon brtsegs): byed//zhes gang gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de yang ngas phyi ma'o skye bo dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la
273b7(dkon brtsegs): yong dgra bo dang phyir rgol ba dag yod na bdag cag la lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pa dag la thugs brtse bas de skad gsungs pa yin na mi blun po de dag de bzhin
274a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la yang drug bo dang phyir rgol bu dag yod do zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed//rigs kyi bu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba
274a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang ldan pa la yang dag bo dang phyir rgol ba dag med na/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams kyi rgyu ba chen po dang ldan pa lham+b+ha spros kyang dgos/gsol pa/bcom
274a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhabs la steng ldeng gi tshil bas zug go zhes gsungs pa d+mode ji lte bar bgyi legaste/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyib
274a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni las bdug gir bya ba nyid sten par mdzad/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang sngon byas pa'i las dge yod na/gzhan dag la lta smos kyang ni dgas
274a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rgyu de dang rkyen de dang /gzhi des sdig pa'i lastsa la mi dga' zhing dga' bar mi 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang de gzigs pas na/de bzhin gshegs pa las bdag gir
274a6(dkon brtsegs): banyid ston par mdzad pa yin no/de lce mi blun po de drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pas zugo/zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed//gsu
274a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa yin pa skyes sbyin ni yun ring po nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ge shad ma dang btsugs can dang /phyir rgol ba dang dgra bor gyur pa yino//
274b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gal te skyes bu dam pa lhas sbyin med par gyur na/de bzhin gshegs pa la
274b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gcig kyang yod par mi mngon te/rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir skyes bu dam pa ltos byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la brtsad pa dang /basbyin pa dang //
274b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir brgal ba dag bstan pa de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i bdag nyid dag yod par mngon no//rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i tshig gis skyes bu dam pa lhas sbyin
274b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'dis de bzhin gshegs po rnam par 'dzem par bya'o snyam nas/grong bar gyi dbus nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la glang po che nor skyong spyad par gyur pa gang yin pa de/de
274b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas btu' cing rnam par btul nas/dul bar mdzad de/skye bo phal po ches de mthong nas/ngo mtshar du 'dzin cing rma du byung por 'dzin pa//dkon mchog gsum po
274b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog la skyabasu dong ste/de yang skyes bu dam pa lhas sbyin ni skyes bu'i rtsa lnga yin par lta
274b7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o//de la blun po de dag ni kye ma lhas sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i go shed ma dang /gcugos can dang /phyir rgol ba yin no//zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin par byed
275a1(dkon brtsegs): do//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshe rlabs lnga brgyar skyes bu dam bA lhas sbyin ni gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa de yang byung
275a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad bstan par bya ba'i phyir byas pa yin na/de lta mi blun po kho cig kye ma lhas sbyin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gshed ma dang /go d+hag
275a3(dkon brtsegs): can dang /phyir rgyalta ba yin no zhes sgra ji bzhin kho nar 'dzin te/de dag ni gzhi des lus zhig nas/sems n+dan dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnamasu skye
275a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar skyes bu dam pa lhas byin ni tshigs shin tu bsags pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsags pa/rgyal ba du ma la lhag par bya ba byas pa/
275a5(dkon brtsegs): bi'i rtsa ba bskyed po/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/byang chub chen po la gzhol ba/byang chub chen po la 'bab pa/byang chub chen po la byab pu/blo na med pa yang
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye ba yin pas na/de la snang ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag ni/lus zhig nas sems can dmyal po dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
275a7(dkon brtsegs): dgas rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhini gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir/bram ze'i grong sa la can du ji ltar lhung bzed
275b1(dkon brtsegs): bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/rigs kyi bu de yang ngas phyi ma'i skye bo rnamasal
275b2(dkon brtsegs): bltas te/de lta bu bstan te//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rags kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med pa'i phyir te/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pos phyi ma'i
275b3(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams la bltas nas/de lta bu bstan te/dge slong bsod snyams pa kha cig bsod snyoms kyi phyir/grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdol dang /ldangs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal
275b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i pho brang 'khar dag tu zhugs pa'i tshe/bdag nyid bsod nams chung bas/bsod snyoms ma rnyid pa na/de dog de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas nas/'di skad
275b5(dkon brtsegs): ces de bzhin gshegs po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/de nyid kyang ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus pas zhugs pa bzhin du phyir byung na/bdag cag dge ba'i
275b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/bsod snyoms ma rnyed pa 'di bdag cag yongasu gdung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ba'i don gyi dbang 'di gzigs
275b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms kyi phyir/bram ze'i grang sa la can du ji ltar lhung bzed 'grus pas zhugs pa bzhin du/phyir byung bar bstan to//gzhan yang
276a1(dkon brtsegs): /bdud sdig can gyis/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams byin gyis brlabs pas na/de ltar bsod snyoms mi ster to zhes zer na/de yang de ltar mi ba'o//
276a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/bdud sdig can gyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms kyi bar chad byed par mi nus pa'i phyir te/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs
276a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis bdud sdig can gyis bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kun tu byin gyis brlabs pa yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med de/sems
276a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag nyid yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa thabs la mkhas pa de lta bur ston par mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pas zhal zas bcad cing
276a5(dkon brtsegs): chad pa de na/bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang /lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang /nyanra thos dag yid mi bde bar mi 'dug gam/zhes de bzhin ga sh+ye
276a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs la sems par byed/de dag nyin mtshan du de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i thugs
276a7(dkon brtsegs): la sems kyis sems par byed pa na/thugs kyi gnas gcig tsom la yang mtho ba med cing dma' ba med la/sngon ji lta ba bzhin du/phyis kyang de bzhin/phyis
276b1(dkon brtsegs): de ba bzhin du/sngon yang de bzhin te/yid mi bde ba med par yang dag par rje su mthong nas/8tshan//b+ha'o bdun khro 'dus par gyur pa dag gis/de bzhin gshogs
276b2(dkon brtsegs): la rab tu btud pa dang /de bzhin gshegs bsdu kyang /de dag lnga ji nas kyang /de dag thams cad chos rnams la/chos kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bshad de/
276b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i skye bo la gzigs pa yin gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi sgrub pa yod pa ni ma yin no//gsol pabacom ldan 'das bram ze'i
276b4(dkon brtsegs): bu moM dregs sam/shing gi gzhong bu lA~M bAr bcings te/de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab po zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar bsdu bar bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsab
276b5(dkon brtsegs): /rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni/las kyi sgrub pa'i nyes pa med de/de bzhin gshegs pas bram ze'i bu mo dregs mi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phang ba
276b6(dkon brtsegs): yang spyod mod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pas thabs la mkhas pas/las kyi bya ba snyan te/nga'i bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba la skur pa btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag yang dag pa ma
276b7(dkon brtsegs): yin po'i skur pas skur bar 'gyur bas/de dag 'gyod pa can du gyur pa'i tsho/de dag skur pa btab pa na/'di skad du/de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa
277a1(dkon brtsegs): des kya re shog mngon sum du/skur pa rnyis par gyur na/bdag cag gI wA ts+tsha'i byir+ya mi rnyed ces zer zhing /de dag de'i tshe nA sgyur pA de zil gyis mnan nas/tshangs par spyod
277a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yongasu dag pas yongasu byung ba spyod par 'gyur ba dang /nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro//bram ze'i bu mo dregs ma ni/re shig sdig pa'i las kun tu rgyus pa yin pas
277a3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam na yang /de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs par byed pa yin te/shi 'phos nas kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin
277a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas/de kun tu bsrung bar spyod do//zhes mkhyen par gyur na ni/da kun tu bsrung bar yang mdzad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'ga' yang
277a5(dkon brtsegs): yongasu ma gtang ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs med kyi ljongasu dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa na/zla ba gsum du lta chas
277a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas dag gsol to//zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu ngas bram ze dang /khyim bdag de dag de bzhin
277a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa spyan drang bar mi sems par shes te/shes bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa der dbyar gnaso//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
277b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas par zla ba gsum gyi bar du gang dag gi rta chas stsol ba'i rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa sha stag
277b2(dkon brtsegs): yin te/de dag sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du song nas/sdig pa'i las byas pas las des de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes te/rta lnga brgya po de dag gi nang na rta cang shos gang yin pa/
277b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba smon lam gyi dbang gis bsams bzhin du der skyes pa yin la/rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i snying po de nyid
277b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin pas/de dag yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir der smyos te/rta cang shes de nyid kyi mthus rta lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe
277b5(dkon brtsegs): rabs rje su dran par gyur cing de dag gi byang chub kyi sems de yang sngon du gyur pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/de bzhin gshegs pa rta lnga brgya po de dag la thugs
277b6(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba'i phyir dbyar der gnas so//na rta tsong shos kyi chas kyi nas gang dag yin pa de dag los phyed ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul lo//rta lnga brgya po de dag gi chas kyi nas gang
277b7(dkon brtsegs): dag yin pa de dag las phyed phyed ni dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la 'bul zhing /rta cang shes de rta'o skad de rta lnga brgya po de dag sdig pa 'chagasu bcug cing /sangs rgyas la sogs
278a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dge slong lnga brgya po dag la phyag 'tshal du yang bcug go/rigs kyi bu de nas zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas rta lnga brgya po de dag shi 'phos te/dga' ldan gyi lha
278a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes nas/lhor gyur pa de dag gis yang de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur stir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas pa dang /de
278a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas kyang de dag la ci nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to//rta lnga brgya po de dag 'dul
278a4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'tsho bar byed pa'i rta rdzi gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rang sangs rgyas rab tu sems dul zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//zhes lung bstan to//rigs kyi bu de lta
278a5(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas gang yin pa de la ni mi bsod pa cung zad kyang med/rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas shing dang /bong pa dang /gseg/
278a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /gyo mo la sogs pa yongasu longs spyad par gyur na yang /shing dang bong ba dang /gseg ma dang /gyo mo la sogs pa de dag gi ro de lta bu dang /ro bro ba'i mchog
278a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag yin pa de lta bu dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yang mdo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas skyes bu chen
278b1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mtshan ro bro da'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rnyes pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rnam grangs des na/khyod chos 'di ltar blta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal
278b2(dkon brtsegs): zas thams cad ni bsod pa yin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dag slong kun+da dgu'i blo 'di snyam du/de bzhin gshegs pas khar los sgyur ba'i tshul spyad sbyangs
278b3(dkon brtsegs): nas+thA/rna chas kyi nas dag gsol bar mdzad pa lta zhes skyong rje bar gyur pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pas de'i sems la rnam par gzigs nas kun dga' ba 'di ci'i
278b4(dkon brtsegs): yin/shis sam zhes nus kyi 'bru gcig byin pa dang /des de zos nis ngo mtshur du 'dzin par gyur te/nga la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyal po'i khyimadu
278b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes shing rgyal po'i khyim du legs par rgyus pa lags na/bdag gis ro 'di lta bu ni sngon chud ma myong lagaso//zhes zer te/de'i byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dgo'
278b6(dkon brtsegs): sa mi pa'ir dgra' blong /bde bas 'gro bdun 'das par gyur to//rigs kyi blo de'i phyi rnam grangs dus khyud kyis 'di stor m+b+ha ste/de bzhin gshegs pan
278b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la yang las kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba yin pa rig par bya ste/sems can gang dag dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge mgron du gter la zas 'drul
279a1(dkon brtsegs): /bar mi byed pa de dag gi ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa nyid kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/las kyi rgyud de lta bu nye bar ston par mdzado//rigs kyi bu glang
279a2(dkon brtsegs): gis de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs la/zhal zas ma gsol ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pa sna log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i cho su lung bstan pa'i de bzhin
279a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i bdag nyid kyi khyud par la ltos/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang /thabs gcig tu
279a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag las dge slong bzhi bcu ni 'dod chags kyi spyod pa dang /sdug pa'i mtshan
279a5(dkon brtsegs): mo la spyod pa yin pas gal te/de'i tshe na de dag gis zas bsod pa dag zosngo par gyur na 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog po shin tu shas chen po dag skye bar
279a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba zhig na de dag gis zas ngan pa zos pa des 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag srab mir gyur nas/de dag gis zhag bdun gyis dgra bcom pa
279a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid mngon du byas so//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsungs pa nges par rtogs pa des ni legs pa kho nar nges par rtogs/
279b1(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa yin//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su//
279b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i bdag/bkri don gsungs pa gang yin dang //nges don gsungs pa gang yin pa//legs pa kho nar rtogs
279b3(dkon brtsegs): bar byed//brtan pa dgongs la mkhas gyur pa//nying mtshams sbyor ba spangs pa rnams//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan gyis//gsungs pa khong du chud pa yin//rig/
279b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu de la ji ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang //rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yong su mya ngan las 'de' bar mi 'dod pa yin zhe na/rigs kyi bu
279b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dag gam/dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dag gram/y-i dwags kyi sdug bsngal dag gis kun tu gdung shing
279b6(dkon brtsegs): tsha bar gyur kyang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas mya ngan las 'dra'i bar 'dod pa mi skyed cing /e ma'o e ma bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams
279b7(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol bar gyur cig ces don nyung ngur mi byed de/bya ba nyung ngur mi byed cing don nyung po nyid dang bya ba nyung ba nyid la brtson par mi byed kyi/de ni sems
280a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyi dge ba'i las bya ba dag la grogs 'gyur zhing /sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/
280a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dgo' bar byed de/rigs kyi bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i theg pas yongs//
280a3(dkon brtsegs): mya dran lus 'da' bar mi 'dod pa yin no//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig suM bcad pa 'di dag bkra' stsal to//snying rje bidag nyod can dge ni//ri 'dra'i sems
280a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis spyod byed la//sems can don la mi skye zhing //byang chub las ni phyir mi ldog/byang chub sems dpa' sems can la//pha ni pur 'dod pa skyo mi byed//sems can
280a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan lo phan pa'i phyir//bag med pa yang mi byed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba dri med rnam drag rini tshon zla 'od rgyal pos
280a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos gang dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags pa'i chos bcu po de dag ni bcom
280a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lags na/don gong gis na theg pa chen po 'di la theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lag so//de skad ces gsol/
280b1(dkon brtsegs): dag/rdzum sa nas sa smra sa smra na po smrang nga sa na na nu sgyu du sgyug 'gyus s+ho//nas du ra rgyu
280b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis sgyu bzhin na r+b+hu sh+lo kA/gas kyi de ts+tsham+b+ha sa m+b+ha/ rgyal bo d+ha kau rgyagasas n-i ga n+tu dang /sbyin cig mog

280b7(dkon brtsegs): tshig pa gang na ma ba zhes bya/ga pamam tha ma panas bya/thogasamamanyam pa thong kyi ma marnam pa nis rgya b+h+yo/rigs kyi phyir/
281a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'dri la theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po ni bzang ba lagaso//bde bar gshegs pa theg pa chen po ni bzang ba lag so/
281a2(dkon brtsegs): dedri nas bdud sdig can+d+ra 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong gaun+na ta ma ni bdag gi bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das shing /gzhan dag kyang yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yin
281a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis/badrug dpung gi tshogs yin lag pani dang bcas te/dge sbyong go ru tA mai de dang /chos kyi rnam grangs de la po tsam du 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo//de nas bdud sdig can
281a4(dkon brtsegs): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa go gyon nas rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen po gral ba dang /bya rgod kyi phung po'o rig lnga ba de log su song ba dang /byang chub

281a6(dkon brtsegs): btsum pa dang /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par bya ba'i bsam pas 'ong bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par byas te/
281a7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byab/mngon par 'du bya bas/bdud sdug can dpung gi tshogs yon log rje ni dang bcas pa rgya mo po'i kha kyi grong khyer chen pa
281b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ldum po rgyu dang 'am srang gi bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dag tu sgyu sgrogs par byed/dbyangs brjod par byed cing //'di skad nas rgyal po khyab kyi mi khyod cag shes par gyis shon

281b3(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams dang /gzhan mu stegs can rnams la tshangs par spyod pa thog mor dge bo bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba don bzang po/tshig 'bru ba zang po/me 'dres pa yongasu rdzogs pa/ling

281b6(dkon brtsegs): rdordul gyi mi dang /yul gyi me rnams bdud sdig can gyis bskul ba na/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng dang /byug pa dang /phyi ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang

282b6(dkon brtsegs): bshags par 'tshal zhing slan chad kyang sdom par 'tshal lags ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi nongs pa la nongs par bshags pa de legs par rje su gzung bar gsol
282b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes/nyes pa la nyes pa'i sgo nas bshegs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/sdig can 'di lta ste/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo nyes pa byung na/rnam par dag

283a3(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag rtsub po ni thams cad kyis thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi thams ca du mi dge ba'i las kyi lam du gdags pa ma mdzad lags sam

283a6(dkon brtsegs): kun shes par 'gyur ba dag yod pas dpe nyon cig/sdig can 'di lta ste dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag phyug po no ro myang ba longs spyod tsha ba zhig la bu sdug pa 'dod

284b6(dkon brtsegs): mustegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu tho ba tsam pa'i bsam pa can dog lhags te/lhags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam gras 'di thos nas legs so legs par gsungaso bya
284b7(dkon brtsegs): chog ni rjod kyi/de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems dang ba dang /dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba ni ma thob bo//de dag hUM nga rgyan des bskal pa drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du lha dang
285a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams skyes pa ma gtogs byur nam yang sems can dmyal ba rnams dang /dud 'gro rnams dang /yi dgas rnam sum skye so//de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la sems du
285a2(dkon brtsegs): gdaga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba mthob pas ni tshe rabs gzhan de dang de dag tu dge bai rje ba~M shrIs gnyen dang bral ba du gyur to//kun dge' ba de'i ched 'dus nu gzhan mu stuH/
285a3(dkon brtsegs): tsAn spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyur gyur pa de dag gzhan dag ci yin snyam du khyod nem nur dang yid gnyis dang the tsom za bar gyur na kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//
285a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/rigs kyi blo 'dra nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu de dag tu gyur pa'i phyir//kun dga' bo 'di dag de ni de bzhin gshegs
285a5(dkon brtsegs): po la sems dang ba skyes shing dga' ba yang skyeste/mchog tu dga' ba yang skyes pas/de de bzhin ga shegs pas 'od dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang rgyu
285a6(dkon brtsegs): tu lung ston par yang mdzod do/de nas gzhan mu stegs nan spyod pa pa kun tu de dag lung bstan pa'i mod la skyes pa'i dang ba dang /dga' bya da /mchog tu dga' bo de ny-id
285a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//chos kyinam grongs 'di ba shed ba na/srog chags khro nyis slong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul ming ci
285b1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba rnam par dag go/snron sems ma bskyod pa'i sgrog chags ny+dzi dz+ra sa ni bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed//de nas btsom ldan 'das la//
285b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'dral rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu ma gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang //'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /gzhan
285b3(dkon brtsegs): drag le yang rgya tshar yang dag par ston par bgyid pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bai rigs kyi bu 'am
285b4(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa de bas ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
285b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed pa de bsod nams ches grangs
285b6(dkon brtsegs): med par chos mang du spyod//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dren por byed pa yin pa'i phyiraro//kun dag
285b7(dkon brtsegs): pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang chos spro ba de la sdang ba'i sems bskyod par bgyid no//bcom ldan
286a1(dkon brtsegs): gas ma rlogs ba mau bas ngan pasas 'ag+sas bud+d+han sa zlog sbyong bang rgyu stsa smra/sngu na sa steg+sa s+yA /na nga
286a2(dkon brtsegs): gas kyi smra pa/gas ma gang gag gis sesmras rkyen sa spyod kyi nga rgyur bye pos ni rigs mi rigs rgyu myi gang gis rjes kyi
286a3(dkon brtsegs): glus nga ces sma du snang ba'i sems snadang ba byud pa nga nams pa smin pa sa skyes me pa skyes ma skyed pa //'i r+m+ma na
286a4(dkon brtsegs): spre'u di sa sbyi sa ste 'din snyam rkyen sa ng+ge U byung ba yin //kun sa kyi hrI shrI/
286a5(dkon brtsegs): 'drin ma dang pan mas kyi mdun de brjo byar mi bsgri lag so//de ci'i smya sbyin na/ rlom ldan 'ad sa sems can thams cad rjes kyis 'a'ongs par byung ba'i du
286a6(dkon brtsegs): /sa ga/smre skyes pa'i ga tu sams spyan du myal bar 'i sa skye ra nasu slong m+b+ha / sa kyi
286a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba na 'i sa kyi ngas gru sa dag gi sudus su su sa sa skye khru
286b1(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro//kun dga' bo sa gastsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/'di

293a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang //'gro ba'i sgra ni brjod pas na//'gro bas 'gro ba med shes pas//dri zas ting 'dzin bstan pa yin//'jam dpal de ltar na dri za'i gzugs ting 'dzin du

293a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas mi 'am+ba tsI'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/byas mIn+d+ra byis pa'i lus rnams kyis//mi'am
293a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kun du bskyed//'di dge skye bo med shes pas//mi 'am ci yis ting 'dzin bstan//'jam dpal de ltar ni mi 'o ma ci'i gau zuk+Sha ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam
293b1(dkon brtsegs): dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ming gang gis ni chos 'di dag/'jig rten dag tu sna tshogs gzhags
293b2(dkon brtsegs): chos de 'di la yod mo yin//med las thams cad kun du brtags//kun du brtags pas kun shes nas//ngo bo nyid kyis kun rtogs med//ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni///
293b3(dkon brtsegs): lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis bstan//'jam dpal de ltar na lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub seMs/
293b4(dkon brtsegs): dngos sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/rdul dang bral zhing rdul med gsog/de la byed po 'ga' yang med//rang gi rtogs pas
293b5(dkon brtsegs): kun bskyed//rtog pa de yang yod ma yin//dmyal ba dri med dri bral zhing //dgra dang yang dge 'od gsal dang mtshan nyid med cing mtshan med par//byang chub snying
293b6(dkon brtsegs): por ngas shes te//mtshan nyid med cing byung med de//no mkha' 'dra bar shes pas na//ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni//sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs kyis bstan//'dzem dpa'
293b7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar na sems can dmyal ba'i gzugs ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i gzugs ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya
294a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe nA/dperA na ji ltar sprin gyi gzugs//kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ba dag/de la khwa dog yod min yang //mi mkhas pa dag rmongs par byed //de bzhin/
294a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dang med pa'i phyir//sprin gyi gzugs dang mtshungs 'dra yang //dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnamasu ni//rnam pa sna tshogs lus kyang ston//las ni sgyu mi'i rang bzhin
294a3(dkon brtsegs): dang //byung m+led mtshan nyid med par shrIs//ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni//dung 'i gro'i gzugs kyis bstan pa yin//'jam dbul de ltar na dud 'gro'i skye gar+tha
294a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi gzugs ti 'dzin+da du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpes gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/
294a5(dkon brtsegs): nag po dang ni dkar po yi//sdig dang kho na mtho dang //kha na ma tho med pa'i las//rab 'bring tha ma 'dres byas pas//gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal zhing //tshol bar kun
294a6(dkon brtsegs): dutu khor ba yin//de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten med//de la ngo bo nyid kyis stong //rmi lam na ni myong ba bzhin//'jug pa med cing grub pa med//gshin rje'i 'jig rten
294a7(dkon brtsegs): yod min pas//des na ting nge 'dzin du bstan//'jam dpal de ltar na gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gzugs ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la rje
294b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyud+hA/ rgyabs nas pas 'dod drug tung dzin dunags pa stan na/nga sa rdzogs su 'ad klas rlung //rnags pa dal 'ang byung ba nang //'byung ba ma mya ga sa pa mang//
294b2(dkon brtsegs): de yi gnas kyang rnyed mi 'gyur//gnas myed gnas pa yid mun pas//'dod chags na mkha' 'dra ba yin//byis pa bskrad par gyur rnams kyis//kun nas nyon mongs yongasu brgya
294b3(dkon brtsegs): kun nas nyon mongs med chos de//'dod chags shes bya'i ming gis brjod//phyogs bcu dag du 'askal byas kyang //de yi dngos po rnyed mi 'gyur//'dod chags dngos po med pa 'i
294b4(dkon brtsegs): byis pa rmongs pa 'jigs byed//'jigs med 'jigs po'i 'du shes can//de dag la ni bde ba med//ji ltar skyes bu sa la dag/mkha' la 'jigs par 'du shes nas//skrag
294b5(dkon brtsegs): cing bdag gis na mkha'i ni//mi mthong bya zhes 'bros byed kyang //na mkhas kun tu khyab pas na//su yang de las myi thar te//byis pa bslad par gyur rnams kyis//phyin ci lo
294b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par brtags//de ltar chos rnams mkha' 'dre ba//shes par ma gyur byis bya rnams//dngos po med pa'i 'dod chags lo//yongasu spang bar mngon par 'dod//'dod chag
294b7(dkon brtsegs): ni mkha' 'dra bas na//su yang de las 'grol ba med//grol zhing rnam grol phun sum tshogs//chos rnams mya ngan 'das dang 'dra//sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang //'dren pa ga
295a1(dkon brtsegs): dag bzhugs pa dang //gang dag 'byung 'gyur rdzogs sangs rgyas//de kun spyod yul 'dod chags yin//'dod chags stong par shes gyur na//chags las grol ba
295a2(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med//gang dag chags la 'jigs 'du shes//de dag chags las grol bar sems//ci yang med pa'i mtha' 'di ni//'dod chags mtha' ste 'od gusal zhing //mtshan /
295a3(dkon brtsegs): ma med la rtag mnyam par//byang chub snying por de yis mthong //dngos por 'du shes sems can gang //de dag 'dod chags 'bri bar 'gyur//yod pa min pa yongs brtags
295a4(dkon brtsegs): pas//de dag gis ni spong ba rtogs//bdag gis 'dod chags spang bya zhes//de 'dra'i 'du shes skyes nas ni//de la spangs shes brjod par bya//'gro ba 'di dag 'du shes tsam//
295a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags mtha' ni bsam yas te//mtha' de 'jig pa med paso na//yang dag mtha' dang don mnyam pas//de las grol bar mi rtog shig/gal te chags las grol
295a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur na//stong pa nyid las grol bar 'gyur//'dod chags dang ni stong pa nyid//de gnyis gnyi su yod ma yin//'di ltar skye bu med pa la//de dag skye bar rnam btags
295a7(dkon brtsegs): bas khyis pa gnyisu shes rnams la//ngas ni spong ba rab tu bstan//'dod chags de ni skye med na//'dod chags shes byi'i ming du brjod//ming rnams kun tu chags med/
295b1(dkon brtsegs): pas//ming la su yang chags pa med//'dod chags chags pa med shes shing //mtha' las 'das pa'i stong mthong na//'dod chags rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//thur pa mkhas
295b2(dkon brtsegs): pas mi mthong ngo //'dod chags sangs rgyas chos mtshungs shing //mya ngan 'das pa 'dar shes nas//rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin//'dod chags sgras ni ngas bstan to//zhi ba'i
295b3(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la rten pa yin//'dod chags rab tu zhi shes nas//mkhas pa rnams la nga yis ni//ting 'dzin 'dod chags sgrar bstan to//'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpas
295b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/spongs las zhe sdang kun tu 'byung //
295b5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa yang rkyen las skyes//bdog med pa las byung ba'i bdag/mang po'i tshogs las skyes pa ya ni//rku ba pa'i sgra las zho sdang ni//dug rnon lta bu kun tu byung //sgra ni nga
295b6(dkon brtsegs): re'i rang bzhin paso//shin tu yod pa ma yin no//ji ltar tshogs pas gtsub shing dang //gtsubo bstan las ni mi 'byung ste//tshogs dang bral bar gyur na no//de na med yang
295b7(dkon brtsegs): yong min ltar//de bzhin yid du mi 'ong ba'i//sgra las zhe sdang gsog byung zhing //gsog gi sgra la yengs brtags ni//de la zhe sdang rnyed mi 'gyur//zhe sdang sgra las ma byung zhing //
296a1(dkon brtsegs): nang na gnas pa'ang ma yin la//zhe sdang phyi rol nas 'ongs te//byung ba med pas gsog yino//rgyu rnams phan tshun 'dus pa las//zhe sdang kun tu byung ba yin//
296a2(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun bral bar gyur na ni//de lta ni snang rnyid mi 'gyur//ji ltar ni dang 'o myal//skyes bus brtul te srub shing gis//bsgrub pa byas pas rkyen rnams las//maran
296a3(dkon brtsegs): kun tu 'byung ba ltar//de bzhin yid mi 'thad pa'i//sgra las zhe sdang ga srog 'byung zhing //yongs su brtags pas de'i gnas la//mi khas pa dag rab tu 'bar//kun
296a4(dkon brtsegs): tu brtags pas n-i sngang ni//shin tu dngos me shes bstan//ting 'dzin zhib brjod pani//zhesnang smra smos rab tu bstan//sdang yang dag mtha' mnyam dang //de banan
296a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid la rten pa yin//chos kyi dbyings dang 'drar shes pas//des na ting nge 'dzin ces bstan//'jam dpal de ltar na zhe sdang ting nge 'dzin
296a6(dkon brtsegs): du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas gti mug ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/ma rig pa las gauta mug b+hud //me rig pa yang
296a7(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin//gong dag gti mug yod min pa/de nas gong yang rmongs pa med//rmongs mings ni rmongs gyur zhing //chags med chags par 'du shes pa//ji ltar byas pa na mkha' 'a//mdu
296b1(dkon brtsegs): khor ba gsog bzhino//yod pa ma yin chos rnams la/kun nas nyon mongs rnams brtags pa//byis pa rnams kyi 'di mtshar to//ma chog tu shin tu bya bar dka'o//ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig/na mkha'
296b2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jal byed cing //bskal pa bye bar gzhal byas kyang //de la phung po mi rnyed ltar//de bzan rmongs nga sa byis pa yi//sngon gyi mtha' ni bsam mi khyad//gI to mug phung por 'byung med//
296b3(dkon brtsegs): des ni ci yang bkang ba med//ji ltar na mkha' gau zhal byas kyang //de la sngon gyi mtha' med cing //da ni ci yang bkang ba med//gzhal ba nus pa med pa ltararo//de bzhin bskal ba stong rnamasu//
296b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rmongs pas dgang byas kyang //de la bkang ba ci yang med//ngoms pa'ang cung zad yod ma yin//ji ltar skyes bu la la yis//skud pa stong bud pa byas shing //gzhag nas sdud pa
296b5(dkon brtsegs): rnyings pa na//de yi nang ni rnyed min ltar//de bzhin 'khor/srung 'dra ba//kun tu rmongs pas spyod par byed//de ni ngoms par mi 'gyur te//phyir zhing 'dod pa tshol bar byed/
296b6(dkon brtsegs): gti mug yod pa mang zhes brjod//rtsa ba chad cing dngos/bo med//rtsa ba med cing gnas kyang maud//de na gti mug zad pa med//'di lta ro gti mug ma zad pas//de yi
296b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma rnyed mi 'gyur//de phyir sems can thams cad la//zad par bya bar ngas mi nus//gal te dpe tsam brjod bya na//bskal pa bye
297a1(dkon brtsegs): /bA bsam yas su//nga yi chen gnas gyur la//nyon gcig bzhin du nyin ro la//stong glusam+b+ha sems can ji snyed pa//thams
297a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mya ngan bzlos byas shing //thams cad de ltar byas kyang ni//sems can khams lnga zad pa med//gti mug gis ni bskyed pa'i khams//sems
297a3(dkon brtsegs): can khams le mtshan nyid med//gti mug de ni sgyu ma 'dra//des na de yi mtha' mi rnyed//sangs rgyas gti mug mnyam pas na//de dag gnyis
297a4(dkon brtsegs): su med par bstan//rmongs gyur byis pa de dag gi sa//'dir ni sangs rgyas rnam par brtags//thams cad mkhyen nyid gti mug mnyam//gti ru/
297a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yod ma yin//gti mug sems can kun drung mnyam//sems can kun dang bsam mi khyab//bsam mi khyab dang gti mug ni//sems
297a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa yis rnam par brtags//sems kun bsam gyis mi khyab ste//de yi tshad ni yod ma yin//gaN+DI mug de la tshad med pas//de yi 'byung
297a7(dkon brtsegs): ba rnyed mi 'gyur//'byung ba yod pa ma yin na//skye ba yod par ga la 'gyur//gti mug skyes pa ma yin na//de yi rmongs byed ci 'dra zhig
297b1(dkon brtsegs): de yi rmongs byed ci 'dra ba//sangs rgyas kun kyang de dang 'dra//tha dad dbye ba med shes na//chos rnams thams cad gnyis su med//ting 'dzin zhi ba
297b2(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa ni//gti mug sgra yis rab tu bstan//gang tshe nga yis mnyam nyid shes//de na de dang gti mug mnyam//de dag thams cad mnyam shes nas//
297b3(dkon brtsegs): ting 'dzin de ltar shes par gyis//'jam dpal de ltar na gti mug tinge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas
297b4(dkon brtsegs): mI dge ba thams cad ti nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na//'dod chag su spyod pa'i rtogs gang drang //zhe sdang spyod pa'i g.yo ba dang //gi tiM mug spyod pa gang
297b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa//thams cad ting 'dzin shes par gyis//nyon mongs kun gyi rdo sgrub pa ni//ting 'dzin yin par mos par gyis//brdzun dang yang dag ma
297b6(dkon brtsegs): yin par//thams cad de bzhin bsgom par gyis//'jam dpal de ltar na mi dge ba thams cad tingange 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam dpal
297b7(dkon brtsegs): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas dge ba thams cad ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na/sems can rnams kyi ji snyed dge/sems dang spyod pa ci 'dra
298a1(dkon brtsegs): ba/spyod pa thams cad spyod gcig ste//de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis//sems can kun gyi spyod pa dag/bsgrub pa gcig tu shes
298a2(dkon brtsegs): pas na//ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni//kun gyis sgra yis bstan pa yin//'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba thams cad ting nge 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//'jam
298a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas thams cad ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na//'du byed thams cad 'du byed min//de dag bkrung
298a4(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gzhal byas na//gzhal du med cing dpag tu med//de ltar ting 'dzin shes par gyis//dpag tu med par shes nas ni//lus med dngos po yod
298a5(dkon brtsegs): min pas//ting 'dzin zhi ba brjod pa ni//'du byed kun gyis bstan pa yin//'jam dpal de ltar na 'dus byas thams cad tingange 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//
298a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas 'dus ma byas thams cad ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya zhe na//chos 'di rang bzhin zhi bas na//de la grang po ni/
298a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa yin//ma rig pa yis bai sgrub zhi ba//ting 'dzin gyis bsgrub par bstan//'dus byas kun la brjod med cing //bsgrub pa med pa shes nas ni//
298b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag brjod la chags//de dag rnams la de ltar bstan//'jam dpal de ltar na 'dus ma byas thams cad ting 'dzin du rtogs par bya'o//tshigasu
298b2(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na//byang chub sems dpa' drug khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
298b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do//dge slong sum khri drug stong ni len pa
298b4(dkon brtsegs): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grolo//dge slong ma drug stong nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
298b5(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen sa ya brgyad 'bum gyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//dge bsnyen ma sa ya phrag bzhi dang nyis 'bum gyis
298b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jom dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//byang chub
298b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' dbang po rnon po gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis ting 'dzin rnams kyi ming thos na thams cad la snang ba 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams
299a1(dkon brtsegs): /cad dang gang zag dmigs pa'i lta ba can rnams kyis thul bar dka' ba dang /yi ge gcig gis yi ge thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /yo go thang
299a2(dkon brtsegs): yi ge gcig rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pas sems can thams cad la chos ston pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /chos zab mo la ba
299a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod par 'gyur ba dang /spyod pa thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs shing so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis mun pa ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i ti nge 'dzin rnamasakyi
299a4(dkon brtsegs): gling bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal de'i phyir
299a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad//'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin zhes gsol te bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyam pa dang /
299a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jam dpal mtha' yas dri mu med ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do//ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa'
299a7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs thams cad yong su dag par ston to//'jam dpal mgyogs par 'gro ba zhe bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do//ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zlag
299b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'od zil gyis gnon par byed do//'jam dpal 'od zer 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod dra/ti 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin dang tshangs pa dgra gi
299b2(dkon brtsegs): gzi brjid kyi gnon par byed do//'jam dpal yul ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin dri thob na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyi
299b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug zhi bar byed do//'jam dpal 'od zer thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin yo/tingange 'dzin dri thob na byang chub sems dpa'
299b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od zer gyis snang bar byed do//'jam dpal chos thams cad mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin do thob na byang chub sems
299b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa thams cad 'dzin cing gzhan la yang ston par byed do//'jam dpal seng+ge'i sgra mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs yidadu 'ong ba rje su sgrogs pa zhes
299b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgyus mngon par go bar byed do//'jam dpal dga' ba dang mgu ba dang tshim
299b7(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de//ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs
300a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par mgu byed do//'jam dpal lta ba chog mi shos shing mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do//ting 'dzin du thobA/
300a2(dkon brtsegs): na byang chub sems dpa' lta ba dang mnyam pas chog mi shes par 'gyur//'jam dpal yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'byung gnas shes rab kyi yul rin po rgya/
300a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung khungs rgyun cig pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpo' rdzu 'phrul bstan pa tha~Md ston pa dang /son rnaMs
300a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar byed//'jam dpal sgra skad tha~Md kyi brda'o zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin yod//ting 'dzin de thob ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad dang brjod pa dang /brda' thams
300a5(dkon brtsegs): cad rtogs shing yi ge thams cad kyis yi ge gcig ston pa dang yi gcig grisu yi ge thams cad ston par byed//'jam dpal las kyi rnar smin pa las byung ba'i bsod
300a6(dkon brtsegs): nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams nAd stsogs shing ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin dri thob na byang chub sems dpa' cang mi smra bar snyoms par
300a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs te/yi ge tsam yang mi brjod par sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /nyan thos kyi sgra dang rang sangs
300b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus kyi sgra dang /byang chub sems drapa'i sgra dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thos par byed do//'jam dpal gzungs thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal
300b2(dkon brtsegs): po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la 'jug pa khong du chud par 'gyuraro//'jam dpal
300b3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ting 'dzin de thob na byang chub sems de pa' yi ge thams cad laM spobs shing sgra skad thams
300b4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang /dbyangs thams cad dang /brjod pa thams cad la yang spobs par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
300b5(dkon brtsegs): to/rta bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan pharjod pa'i khyad par la spobs lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'jam dpal khyod
300b6(dkon brtsegs): spobs par gyis shig/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag nam nur ma mchis pa dang /the tshom ma mchis pa'i sems kyi
300b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par bgyid pa de tshe 'di nyid la gdon/
