317a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin//de la sogs pa thams cad kyang //yongasu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//me tog man+da ra ba dang //mu tig rin chen la sogs pa'i//char phab
317b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rab tu byas//de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni//lha tshan mthu dang gzi ldan pa//bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu spyad//myedo sde 'dun zlos pa na//rab tu dgu' bu'i
317b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas//byang chub chen por smon lam btab//ma 'ongs pa yi dus kyi tshe//'od zer 'di 'dri thob par shog/de bzhin gsheg sru pas de yi tshe//
317b3(dkon brtsegs): de yi bsam pa thugs chudade pas//mi 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur thos//byang chub tu ni lung yang bstan//de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni//brgya byin
317b4(dkon brtsegs): yi dbang po dang //tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa yang //bye ba phrag ni brgyad cu snyed//'od zer rab tu ston pa yi//mdo sde 'di ni tho sra bas nr-i//
317b5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas//ma 'ongs sangs rgya smra 'igrub 'gyur tos//byang chub tu ni lung yang bistan//de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni//klu ni bye ba
317b6(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag/brgyad du snyed ni 'dus pa dag/mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na//byang chub tu mi sems bskyed pas//lung bsgom pa gang thob par 'gyur/
317b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi che na gzhan yang ni//gser 'dab rgyal po bye ba phrag/brgyad cu snyed ni dadus pa da //mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na//ska bsaman ni rabs spungs te//lung
318a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur//de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni//dri za'i rgyal po bye ba phrag/brgyad cu snyed ni 'dus pa dag/mdo sde 'dra/
318a2(dkon brtsegs): ni thos pas na//rol mo brgya stong rnams byas te//sgra snyun dag ni rab phyung nas//bcom ldan de la mchod byis pas//lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur//
318a3(dkon brtsegs): de yi tshe na gzhan yang ni//gnod sbyin rgyal po khrag khrig snyed//mdo sde 'di ni thos pas na//sangs rgyas ye shes dag la ni//shin tu dang ba skyes par
318a4(dkon brtsegs): gyurardzade dag thams cad kun gyis kyang //byang chub lung bstan thob par 'gyur//zla 'od 'di ltar shes par gyis//de tshe rgyal po sgra mos pas//mchod
318a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//bcom ldan de la mchod byas pa//gzhan yin snyam du mi blta ste//de ni khyod bdag nyid yin no//khyod ni sngon 'das dus
318a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe//mdo sde 'di ni thos pa'i rgyus//dri lta bas ni dang 'dir yang //'di nyid smra de yang zhus pa yin//nga ni mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og/gang yang rung
318a7(dkon brtsegs): su zhig gis//dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dag/rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe//chos kyi bstan pa 'di dag la//dang ba'i sems kyis gang bskyed
318b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu yi mdo sde dag/rgya cher yang dag ston par nus//ma 'ongs mdo sde 'di ni gang bstun pa//des ni nga yi chos 'dzin bskyang bar byed//de ni 'gro mang /
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ded pa'i ded dpon 'dra//rin chen gter 'dzin bsrung ba zhes kyang bya//me 'ongs des tshe mdo 'di gang thos nas//skad cig tsam du mos pa bskyed byed pa//de ni
318b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yin//'jam dpal byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya//des na sangs rgyas meng po mthong gyur pas//g+has bo'o ches gtang
318b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rna bor gyur//sems can gang dag sems drang mnyen nges shing //rtag tu sangs rgyas rim gro byed la brtson//bdag med sgom zhing byams dang bzad
318b5(dkon brtsegs): bskrad pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig rtag tu mi dga' sems mtshang shing //rnyed la gdu zhing chog mi shes pa dang //rab dben
318b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mos par mi 'gyur ba/des ni mdo sde 'dril mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi chod dang //dam chos zab mo legs par
318b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa dang //sangs rgyas yang dag ye shes yod ches pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig sems g.yengs dang ba'i sems med cing //rtag tu
319a1(dkon brtsegs): sgrog gcod 'dul bar rab dga' dang //'dod pa'i yul rnams kyi ni bran byed pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig rtag tu
319a2(dkon brtsegs): dgon gnas rab mos shing //gcig bu dben par 'dug cing sems zhi dang //rnyed dang gnyen la mngon par zhen pa med//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par
319a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//gang zhig grogs ngan dag gi rjes 'byung zhing //bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba 'jig byed dang //tshul khrims ting 'dzin dag ni cher nyam pa//des
319a4(dkon brtsegs): ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig yid mos shin tu rnam dag cing //rtag tu shes rab chos rnams rab 'byed dang //dge ba'i bshes gnyen
319a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis rab bsrungs pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig nyin gyis khyim la rab chags shing //me tog 'bras bu byin na dga'
319a6(dkon brtsegs): byed dang //sems la drang po med cing sgyu 'chang ba//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyuraro//gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas drin dran zhing //dge ba'i
319a7(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba mchog la mos pa dang //byang chub bsngo zhing g.yo sgyu med gyur pa//de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig chung me bu mo sred chags shing
319b1(dkon brtsegs): gos mchog sna tshogs dag gos rab brgyun nas//rtag tu bad+mo dang lhan cig brtsa smon pa//des ni mdo sngo 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig sems zab
319b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pha med gyur zhing //'dod pa'i yul gyis gos pa med pa dang //zas sgyu ma dag gis g.yo sgyu mi bskyed pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur/
319b3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig skye dgu rnams la 'di skad du//'dod chags spyad kyang nyes med gang zer ba//dus gsuM sangs rgyas dag la skur ba yin//des ni mdo sde
319b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la mo sa mi 'gyur//gang zhig yid ches rtag tu rab brtan zhing //nan tan bskyed nas chos rnams tshol ba la//skyob med cing brnyas par mi byed pa//
319b5(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig chung ma bu mo mngon zhen cing //rtog tu 'dod pa'i yul ni rjes dran dang //shes rab ma bsgom rgya cher
319b6(dkon brtsegs): phan mi 'dogs//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig ri dang nags khrod rab gnas shing //shas rab bsgoms nas shin tu dga' 'gyur
319b7(dkon brtsegs): dang /rna mtsho ba'i yo byad dag le 'dod med pa//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mge sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha'//rtag tu rmongs
320a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ya mamatham mthamamapacas samamams masamamacathas macanas mamathamamasaya yamasam ma mamayas ma yam ma

320a3(dkon brtsegs): sngon drang phyi ma'i mtha'//rtag tu rtogs shing rmongs pa med gyur pa//de ni bdud kyi bcings las grol bris na//des ni me do sde 'di lA mos par 'gyur///
320a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa la//rtag tu rmongs nas khong du ma chud pa//de ni gti mug bdud kyis bcings pas nA//des ni mdo sde 'di la
320a5(dkon brtsegs): mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig mtha' yod dang med pa dag/rtag tu rto gas shing rmongs pa med gyur pa//des ni bdud kyis bcings las grolnga bas
320a6(dkon brtsegs): na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid la//rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud bya//de nI gti//
320a7(dkon brtsegs): mug bdud kyis bcings pa na//de sa ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig gnas 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dag/rtag tu khong du chud cing
320a8(dkon brtsegs): rmongs med pa//de ni bdud kyis bcings las grol bas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//rna ba sna dang lce lus yid dag dang //gzugs
320b1(dkon brtsegs): sgra dri ro reg bya chos rnams dang //sa chu me rlung ngo bo nyid dag dang //dngos po thams cad sdug bsngal phung po dang //khams drang 'jig rten skye sgra ming bden dang //
320b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal srid//'chab rgyags ser sna phrag dog g.yo sgyu dang //khro sogs pa yang de gzhin rig par gyis//gang zhig mig zad
320b3(dkon brtsegs): zad mtha' ni de dge la//rtag tu rmongs shing khong du mi chud pa//de ni skye bo'i spyo dra par lhung bas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig
320b4(dkon brtsegs): mig zud mthu' ni de dag la//rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs med po//de ni skye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//
320b5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig migi 'jig pa de dag la//rtag tu rmongs shing khrod du ma chud pa//de ni skye bo'i rdo spyod par lhung bas ni//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//
320b6(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gri 'jig pa de dag la//rtag par khod du chud cing rmongs med pa//de ni skye bo'i spyod dang brel bas na//dI sa? ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//
320b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig mig gi rab dben de dag la//rtag tu rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa//de ni skye bo'i spyod par lhung bas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig/

321a6(dkon brtsegs): byapar 'gyur/gang zhig mig la bdug med ma rtogs nas//bzod pa'i gnas lnga rtag tu rmongs gyur pa//de ni skye bo'i spyod par ltung bas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la

321b1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad dro bo ma rtogs pa//de ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub mi nus//me gnas tshul khrims mngon par mi bsrub pang
321b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur/grang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa//de ni mi gnas tshul khrims bsgrub par nus//mi gnas tshul khrims ma don
321b3(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrub pas na//des ni rad sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mig zang ngo bo ma rtogs pa//des ni thig med tshul khrims sgrub mi nus//zag med
321b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khri mas mngon par mi bsgrub pas//debs mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa//des ni zag mid tshul khrims
321b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par nus//zag med tshuli khrims mngon par bsgrub pas na//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa//des ni zag
321b6(dkon brtsegs): modado shes rab bsgrub mi nus//zag med shes rab mdon par mi bsgrub pas//des ni mdo sde 'di la mos mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad dro bo rab rtogs pa//
321b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni zag med shes rab bsgrub par nus//zag med shes rab mngon par bsgrub pas na//de de ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma
322a1(dkon brtsegs): ga d+hA rgyug tu nga rgyun na rgyu sa nas sa// sa du rgyu nas /
322a2(dkon brtsegs): nga zhig mig bdang ba shA sa pa sbyong rnyed ni rtag pa rto gas pa de'imang //des nA gan+d+ha 'dzin ye shes rab bskyed pas//mang hU~M 'di la ra
322a3(dkon brtsegs): mas par 'gyur//gang zhig mig zang ngo ba brdzogs pa//des ni kun 'dzin ye shes bsgrub pa ni//bla med mchags mo shes rab bsgrub pas//mad sde
322a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dri la rab tu mos par 'byung //gang zhig mdo sde 'di lam smras pa//mig zad ngo ba nyid la rtag tu rmongs//de ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na/
322a5(dkon brtsegs): bla med ye shes thob par shin tu dkar//gang zhig nad+mo s+t+waM 'di la rab myos shing //mi dad ngo ba nyid ni mngon+ta rtogs bya//dan+ti tIng 'dzin mngon pur bsgrub pas
322a6(dkon brtsegs): med mi shes don byed d+he/ ba da//gang shi m+b+hig 'ang sbyi gas shing //bdug med bu mi mtshan nyid da'i rtogs bya//dus ni ta
322a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos pasan//mngon po med ches the tshom me 'i 'jog/gang zhigs gzang de zi nad sems shing //nyin mtshan rab brtson ma sa mar gyur pa/
322b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni kun 'dzin spobs pas mngon bsgrubs nus//mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur//gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed pa//'od zer 'byin pa'i ye shes
322b2(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par 'gyur//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rab ston cing //mig stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//gang gis mchod rten brgya stong rab byas shing //
322b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa byas bya bas//gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na//'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags//gang gis rol mo brgya stong rab
322b4(dkon brtsegs): byas nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pa bas//gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur na//'di yi yon tan de bas khyad par 'phags//sangs rgyas
322b5(dkon brtsegs): skyon gyis gzigs pa'i sems can rnams//bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par//de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par rab mchod pas//mdo sde 'di gzung bsod
322b6(dkon brtsegs): noms khyad par 'phags//gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig bzhi po'i//tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na//de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen po yi//gtso
322b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya//da ni 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong du//srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe//sangs rgyas dag ni tshad med pa rnams la//
323a1(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di yi phyir ni rim gro bya//res 'ga' mar me brgya stong chud med pa//snying po ra re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam//sbar nas mdo sde 'di la rang dbang dag
323a2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par bya phyir 'dren pa rnams la mchod//res 'ga' me tog tsam pa ka dang ni//sum na dang mya ngan med pa yi//phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugs ni sna tshogs kyis//de bzhin /
323a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchod pa byas//nga sngon 'khor ba'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe//slong du 'ong bdag la sbyin btang ste//res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang/
323a4(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' zam pa khron pa chu mig btang //res 'ga' glang po che dang bzhon pa dang //res 'ga' rin chen rta dang chung ma btang //res 'ga' gser gyi khri dang rin tshun gur//
323a5(dkon brtsegs): res 'ga' se mo do dang phreng ba btang //de bzhin bskal pa brgya stong rdzogs par ni//mdo sde 'di phyir sems la ser sna med///bam po gnyis pa//
323a6(dkon brtsegs): nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bsrungs//ting 'dzin shes rab rtag tu bsgoms//sems cani rnams la sbyin pa btang //nga sngon mdo sde 'dri yi phyir/
323a7(dkon brtsegs): gtum pa dag gis brgyad bkag dang //de tshe nga ni snying brtse bas//de la gnod pa yod ma byas//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//slong du 'ongs pa dag la ni//ji ltar mos bzhin rab
323b1(dkon brtsegs): btang bsdu//thams cad rab tu dga' bar byas//nga sngon mad+mo sde 'dri yi phyir//gzhal med khang chen rnams la ni//rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas//sangs rgyas rnams la yongasu phul//nga sngon
323b2(dkon brtsegs): mdo sde 'di yi phyir//rin chen rnam pa sna tshigs dang //yi de bzhi nor bu rin po ches//sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//drin yod rnams ni rtag dran byas///
323b3(dkon brtsegs): tha na tshigs bcad gcig nyan pa//de la yang ni bkur bsti byas//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//tshul khrims ldan la ra ba~M bkur bas//tha na 'chag pa'i tshe na yang //de la rtag tu gus
323b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bskyed//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i tshe//drin ni cung zad yod pa la'ang //de la rtag tu drin du bzos//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//rnyed pa
323b5(dkon brtsegs): ma bcol chos ma slar//nye bshes sen rnams la ni//snying brtse dgra ni rab tu bskyed//nga sngon mdo ste 'di yi phyir//mang thos legs bshad ldan pas ni//chos lo mngon par
323b6(dkon brtsegs): zhen byed cing //bshes pa'i khyim la ser sna med//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//mi dge'i sems ni skyes gyur na//myur ba nyi dur bshags pas//'phel bar yang ni yong ma byas//nga
323b7(dkon brtsegs): sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//rgyal po'i bur ni gyur pa na//rin po che dang byug spos dang //spos kyi phye ma ji snyed pa//dang bi'i sems ni ngas bskyed nas//sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing
324a1(dkon brtsegs): phul du nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//khri mon btsun la snying brtse bas//sdug bsngal sna tshogs gang myong ba//lum gyi skyes pad dang du blangs//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/
324a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon lnga spangs nas//rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe//sdom pa dag ni rab tu blings//de sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgoms pas/tha na chung ma dag la
324a3(dkon brtsegs): yAng rdzu 'dod pa'i ser sna yong ma bskyed//de sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//dbul phongs drug ni thaMd kun//bde ba dag ni thob bya'i phyir//nor dag gis ni phyug por byas//nga sngon mad sde
324a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di yi phyir//dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang //skye dgu rnam pa sna tshogs kun//thaMd dag ni rab tu bsdus//nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir//thaMd kun la phan gdags phyir//rtag tu
324a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin badrog cher byaso nas//slong ba dag la yongasu btang //res 'ga' me tog 'bras bu dag/gzhan dge co du mi bzhugs par//sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing //
324a6(dkon brtsegs): yod bzhin du ni tsho pa du byas//nga sngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe//sems ni rtag tu snyoms pas ni//tshul khrims stoni ldan pa dang //tshul khrims 'tshalnga dang ngo tsha med//rdzu 'phrul chen
324a7(dkon brtsegs): bo thob pas na//so so'i skye bo'i bar dgo la//ngo mtshar bsam pa'i sems bskyed nas//gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang /de smon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe//sems la mtho dman med/
324b1(dkon brtsegs): dA sa na//sdug bsngal 'gro ba mi tshol zhing //mdo sde 'di la rtse gtsub mos//res 'ga' yul khams drug tu ni//phyir rgol thams cad med byas shing //klu rnams su ni rab btul nas//dus
324b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin char ni rab tu phrab//zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis//ngas ni tshe rabs dpag med nas//mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir//dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spyod//bskal pa brgya stong skyed du ni//
324b3(dkon brtsegs): brjod kyang mthar thug mi 'gyuraro//yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//yang dag dran pa'i sems bskyed la//mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis//ngas ni sangs
324b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas spyan dag gis//ma 'ongs dus na gsal gzigs pas/spyod pa sna tshogs ji lta ba//tha di rab tu mkhyen pa yin//dge slong dag ni gang zhig gis//bla med ye shes btsal ba'i/
324b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir//shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni//mdo sde 'di ni gang ston pa//gang dag de dang phyogs rnams kyang //thams cad ma lus thugasu chud//ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi tshe//mdo 'di thos
324b6(dkon brtsegs): nos gang mos pa//bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang //thaM ma lus thugasu chud//dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis//mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas//chos bstan pa la skur 'debs pa//
324b7(dkon brtsegs): thad ma lus thugasu chud//dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang //dge slong ma ni gang zhig gis//mdo sde 'di ni thos gyur nas//shin tu gdung bas gdung byed pa//de ku na ngas ni lung
325a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan nas//rgyal ba'i gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur//zla 'od chog gyis shes par gyis//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//gang dag yid ni dag pa dang //gang dag gis ni
325a2(dkon brtsegs): ma dag dang /than mos pa gang yin pa//thaMd ma lus thugasu chud//seMn dag ni gang dag gis//rab zhi dben la rtag mos shing //ting 'dzin rnams la rab gnas nas//'khor
325a3(dkon brtsegs): ba dag la ma chags pas//tha na bag chags rnams kyang ni//gtan nas rab tu gang spangs dang //de la sogs pa'i ston rnams//thaMd ma lus thugasu chud//sems can dag ni
325a4(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig gis//mi bden chos la zhen pa dang //se naM dag ni gang zhig gis//sangs rgyas la ni rab mos shing /ma 'ongs dngos po 'di lta bu//thad ma lus thugasu chud//
325a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag ni gang zhig gis//'jig rten bde la rab chags pas//sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag/legs pa nyi du mi bskyed pa//rgyu dang rkyeni de yi phyir//sbyor
325a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams ni nyams par 'gyur//su yang rung bya gang zhig gis//byang chub sa bon rtogs gyur nA//gang zag de yis nges pa ni//rnam dge 'od zer dpag me dA tho'o//
325a7(dkon brtsegs): zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bu//'od zer 'di la sogs pa yi//rgyun du rkyeni re re kun//so so tha dad nyi du ltos//khyod kyi shes rab stobs kyis ni//tha~Md de ltar rig par bgyi//
325b1(dkon brtsegs): zhig mi dge ri grogs spangs te//dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas//tshul khrims rnam dag grang bsrung ba//sangs rgyas 'od zer bsgrub par 'gyur//khyod kyis dang po rab bsrungs/
325b2(dkon brtsegs): la/ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs//dge ba'i chos ni rab sgobs la//sa ni rnams ni bsrung bar gyis//khyed kyis rtsod pa rab spongs lo//stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis//rnyed pa dag
325b3(dkon brtsegs): la me gdub//mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis//khyod kyi rnyed ma dag la ni//mi gtsang lta bur blta bar gyis//rnyed pa'i dri ma dag gis ni//rnam dag sems ni spags ma byed//
325b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba btsal bar byos//bla med rnyed pa thob par 'gyur//khyod kyis sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la//sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos//chos kyi sgron ma rtag spar l-I/Shid+d+he/
325b5(dkon brtsegs): ku ni snang bar gyis//khyod kyi sems ni ri rgya ltar//mi g.yo nyi du rab tu byos//kha ngan dang ni brdeg po yang //thams cad bzod pa dang du long //khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi phyir/
325b6(dkon brtsegs): dge ba shes yang dag rab tu byos//dman pa'i sems ni yongs spongs la//rnam dag las ni rtag tu bsgrubs//khyod kyis sems la brtan byos la//bla med chos ni rab tu ston//mdo
325b7(dkon brtsegs): sde dam pa 'di lta bu//brtse bcan la sbyin par gyis//bla med yis gang tshol ba//'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed//des ni sdig pa rnam spangs nas//phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur//
326a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyer na blo dang ldan pa dag/mo la spyod pas mkhas pa gang //ro rnams sna tshogs skyon byed kyang //mos ni bsreg par yod mo 'gyur//gang zhig blo dang /
326a2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan pa//thabs dag la ni mi mkhas paste//me khyer lhag mthil gang bzhag pa//mai hA ni rab tu bsreg por 'gyur//ji ltar mi zhig drug drag gis//sems ni 'khrugs
326a3(dkon brtsegs): nas myos pa gang //me la rab tu bsngos nas ni//de yi rgyu yis sos par 'gyur/zla ba 'od kyis shes par gyis//blo ldan pa yang de bzhin du//yid brtan yid ni stong par rig/de
326a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'khor byar gnas kyang ni//mig brten mig ni stong rig pas//mig la mngon par zhen pa med//gal te de ltar rab shes na//mig la gnas kyang nyon mongs med//gal
326a5(dkon brtsegs): temig nyid stong rig na//yang dag ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur//yang dag ye shes thob pa'i phyir//'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//gal te mig nyid stong rig na//'dod
326a6(dkon brtsegs): chags dag ni gtan nas slongs//'dod chags drug ni med pa'i phyir//'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//de bzhin ni sdang gti mug dang //ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang
326a7(dkon brtsegs): sar sna phrag dog ngo cha med//mi bzang sems ni mthob dang //rgyags dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang //gso sbyi dang ni bag med dang //rtsa gyu la sogs par du yang //thams cad
326b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags bzhin du bshad//yang dag ye shes 'thob 'gyur na//mig ni zhi bya nyid du rtogs//zhi ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir//'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//yang dag ya //
326b2(dkon brtsegs): shes thob 'gyur na//sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas//tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir//'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//yang dag ye shes thob gyur na//sangs rgyas thabs pa
326b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur//thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir//'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur//yang dag ye shes ma bsgrubs par//sgrib pa dag ni gtan spongs shing //'od zer 'byung
326b4(dkon brtsegs): ba bsgrub par ni//nga sngon ma thos ma mthong //yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs nas//sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan spong zhing //spyod pa 'di rjes gang 'brang ba//'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob
326b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i spyod pa yongs tshol zhing //mdo sde 'di la bslab byas na//de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa//yang dag ye shes thabs thob 'gyur//yang dag ye shes
326b6(dkon brtsegs): gang bsgrub pa//sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis//'od zer 'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur//lag mthil 'bras bu ji bzhi no//mig la bdag med gang rmongs pa//dge sbyong chos
326b7(dkon brtsegs): ni nyams par 'gyur//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i//'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur//mig pa bdag med gang rtogs pa//dge sbyong chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur//gang zag de yis de
327a1(dkon brtsegs): //'di spyo du d+ma / sa d+ma bad da na shA / la/
327a2(dkon brtsegs): d+d+har+m+ma sa //g+ham+b+ha mi ni brtad sa sa dag /sa pa ma na /
327a3(dkon brtsegs): dag //legs pa nyid du mi shes pas//gang drug seMs de lta dru//nga zeng pa na ba Sh+T+ri 'gyur//gab tu mun k+She bskyed//mtha ni y-im+b+ha b+h+r-i shes snang
327a4(dkon brtsegs): kun m+bu ba'i mtha de byung //lags d+ha hU~Mzhes /ga bag d+ha ma sa dat+ta 'i//'di ba gyung pa 'a par 'gyur//gal te m-ig ga nani
327a5(dkon brtsegs): mapa ni mngon sums shes na//mig ni bya ba'i mama'i dag kyag//mdzin sum nyid du mi shes pa'o//gang bag de lab de lta bug/'ang zer bgyid pa' ba mi
327b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te mog gi nga ba nyid//mtha' ni mngon sum shes gyur na//mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang /mngon sum nyid tu rab shes pas//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i//'od zer 'gyed pa
327b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur//gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid//mtha' ni legs par mA shes na//mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang //yongasu shes par mi 'gyur pas//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i//
327b3(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob mi 'gyur//gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid/mtha' ni legs par shes gyur na//mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang //mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas//gang
327b4(dkon brtsegs): zag de yis de lta bu'i//'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur//gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid//rnam dag legs par ma shes na//rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa//legs pa nyid du mi shes
327b5(dkon brtsegs): pas//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i//'od zer 'gyed pa 'thab mi 'gyur/gal te migi ngo bo nyid//rnam dag legs par shes gyur na//rna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa//legs pa nyid du
327b6(dkon brtsegs): rtogs 'gyur bas//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i//'od zer 'gyed pa 'thob par 'gyur//de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus//yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang //reg bya ches dang sa chu dang //ma
327b7(dkon brtsegs): rlung dag gis dngos po dang /'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang /khams dang 'jig rten skye mched dang //sgra dang ming la sogs pa dang //thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis//de nas
328a1(dkon brtsegs): /bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'dra skad myos bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu sems can gang thog pa chen po la yang dag par
328a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhol zhing 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongasu rdzogs par bya ba 'dod pa des dge ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rnam pa brgyad cu gang
328a3(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can yongasu bsrung zhing rjesu dran pa dang /gnod sems med pa dang /tshul khrims yongasu dag pa bsrung zhing /nyams par mi byed pa dang /sems
328a4(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mnyam pa dang /g.yo sgyu med pa dang /ser sna med pa dang /phrag dog med pa dang /'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang /smra ba'i bsam pa med pa dang /theg
328a5(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa dag la mngon par yid ches pa dang /dbang phyug dang /rgyags pa la zhen cing sred pa med pa dang /bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa
328a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang /bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag par gyur pa dang /dgon pa na gnas pa dang /'khor rnams la mi brten pa dang /rnyed pa
328a7(dkon brtsegs): la mi brten pa dang /grags pa la mi brten pa dang /bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang 'od zer gyi ting 'dzin rab tu ston pa dang /tshul khrims dang ldan
328b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /sgyu med par rim gro byed pa dang /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la mchog gi bsam pa bskyed pa dang /chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon la shin tu bkur
328b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang /mdo sde'i don rab tu rtogs pa dang /yang dag par bston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang /tshi go smra ba rnams la mi bden pa med pa dang /yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa
328b3(dkon brtsegs): dang /dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang /rtag tu sbyin pa gtong ba dang /bdud kyi mas rab tu rtogs pa dang /dbang po rnams dam du bstong pa dang /tshig rab tu brtags pa dang //
328b4(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa'i bden pa la mkhas pa dang /sa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang /gzugs zad mi shes pa yongasu tshol ba dang /lus dang srog la phangs pa med pa dang //
328b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi po dag la rjesu ston par byed pa dang /'jig rten pa'i bsam pa yong su bcad pa dang /'jig rten phyi ma'i chos mdo zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams spangs pa dang /
328b6(dkon brtsegs): dA dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i mtshan ma mi smyon pa dang /gang bslab par gyur pa dag la ci nus kyi rnam par phye nas rab tu ston pa dang /glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pa
328b7(dkon brtsegs): mi brjod pa dang /brgyan dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang /mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /genyid rab
329a1(dkon brtsegs): tu spangs pa dang /yang dag pa'i chos yong su tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa dang /sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
329a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i las yongasu spang pa dang /bslab pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson pa dang /chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la brten par byed pa dang //
329a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongasu tshol ba la skye ba med pa dang /rab tu 'byung ba la shin tu mos pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos bsrung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /sdig
329a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i las mi slod pa dang /bstan pa rnams la the tshom med pa dang /dpes ston pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang /gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas ston par byed pa dang /byang
329a5(dkon brtsegs): chub chen po yongasu tshol ba la ngal ba med pa dang /mdo sde yang dag par gzung ba rnams brjed par mi byed pa dang /rang gi bslab pa mi spong ba dang /pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshor
329a6(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa dang /nges par 'byung ba'i lam yong su tshol pa dang /spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang /chos kyi ye shes de dag la sems nges par gyur pa dang //
329a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang 'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa dang /srid pa gsum po dag la chags pa med pa dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang /mngon par yid
329b1(dkon brtsegs): chos pa dag la gnyen po rnam par gzhag nas ston par byed pa dang /mA 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i bye brag rtogs par khang du chud pa dang /sngon gyi mtha' lags
329b2(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa dang /gzhan gyi dring la mi ltos pa dang /yongasu spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa dang //sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /dpe byad kyi bkod pa
329b3(dkon brtsegs): dag phun sum tshogs par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni brgyad cu zhes bya'o//gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos brgyad cu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyuraro//chos lnga gang
329b4(dkon brtsegs): zhen 'di lta ste 'khor ba shes pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang /nyon mongs pa zad pa shes pa dang /mchog tu gyur pa shes pa dang /bsod nams kyi 'brang bu shes pa
329b5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang zla 'ong gzhon nu chos lnga po de dag ni chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyuraro//gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste sems yongasu dag pas rab tu brgyan pa dang /
329b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs yongasu dag pas rab tu brgyan pa gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos gnyis po de dag ni chos gcig gi nang du 'jug par 'gyuraro//gcig gang zhe na 'di lta ste/
329b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba mngon par grub pa gang yin pa'o//gzhan yang zla 'od gzho nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod/de dag gis de
330a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ga shegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa m+bu mda' ba'i rnam par grol ba legs par yong su rtogs par byed//rnam pa brgyad na gang nyon 'di lta ste/
330a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /shes rab tu chen por gyur pa dang /tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongasu bsgrub pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i gdong pa dang bral po dang /nga rgyal rab tu 'dzi
330a3(dkon brtsegs): bo dang /tshig mnyen pa dang /dngos po sna tshogs rab tu gas pa dang /dge ba'i grags pa pang su shes pa dang /zag pa chen po'i snang dag par gnol pa dang /btsun 'grus/
330a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyurgya gro cha bgos pa dang /spyad lam gyis sems can 'dul ba dang /nyon mongs par srung ba rnams kyi thatshom rab tu gcad pa dang /mi dge ba rnams la spyod cing mchis dkur
330a5(dkon brtsegs): po rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang /mi dge ba'i grogs po dang mi 'grogs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa la yongasu skyo ba med pa dang /byang chub tu sems bskyed
330a6(dkon brtsegs): parnyed/brtson 'grus rab tu bajam pa dang /bdud rtsi dngos pa rab tu rtogs pa dang /bden pa rnams mngon du gyur pa dang /nga dgu pa kho nar mchad pa byung ba dang
330a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom yongasu gcod pa dang /sems bgyis rtag tu sems can yongasu mya ngan las zla bar sangs pa dang /sring pa rnams pa mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /sems kyi/
330b1(dkon brtsegs): yongasu bskyed pa dang /sems can mi dag pa rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang //gti mug rab tu spong ba dang /
330b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i phan pa yongasu mi tshol ba dang /sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mchos pa dang /'phags pa rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang //
330b3(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po la gnas pa dag la brten cing rim gro byed pa dang /thag pa dman pa dag gis bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag thag ring du spong ba dang /phyir

330b6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed pa dang /ches yong su tshol ba la le lo med pa dang /don zab mo yang dag par ston pa dang /gzungs chen po dang ldan pa dang /chos yang dag par ston par byed kyang
330b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /chos rgya cher spel bar byed pa dang /yongasu 'dran pa la chog shes pa med pa dang /spyod pa rnams yong su rdzogs pa dang /gzi brjod chen po
331a1(dkon brtsegs): po dang ldan pa dang /spobs pa rdzogs pa med pa dang /mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /mi dge ba rnams kyi bsngags pa mi brjod pa dang /

331a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'das pa dang /spyod yul ma yin pa yongasu spangs pa dang /yongasu dang ba bskyed pa dang /yang dag pa'i lam la gnas pa dang /theg pa chen po la rab tu dga' ba
331a4(dkon brtsegs): dang /mnyam pa nyid du yong su sdud par byed pa dang /bdag med pa la mngon par ma chags pa dang /'khor ba la yong su skyo ba med pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu chos
331a5(dkon brtsegs): bal mos pa dang /'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang /rtag tu bsod snyoms slong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang /ji tsam rnyed pa de nyid kyis chog par 'dzin pa
331a6(dkon brtsegs): dang /ngo tsha med pa dang /khrel med pa spungs pa dang /sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang /dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /bdag gi zla ma yin pa
331a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rab tu spong ba dang /so so'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba dang /sems can gyi spyod pa dang 'thun par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas la shin tu dang ba dang /snod ma yin
331b1(dkon brtsegs): ba yongasu spyong ba dang /mi mthun pa rnams la tshig sbyin par mi byed pa dang /gsol ba mi 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang /gsol ba 'debs bzhig//
331b2(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs na tsa rigs par ston par byed pa dang /zas lo snyoms par gyur pa dang /rtag tu gtong zhing mnyam pa nyid du gtong ba dang /sgo chen po phye nas gtong bar byed pa gang
331b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag ni gzhon nu chos rnams pa brgyad cu zhes bya ste/'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byed//de'i tshe zla 'od
331b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba chos de lta bu thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshig su bcad mngon par bstod pa//de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad mtha'
331b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas//de slad rnam dag ye shes ston pa lags//rnam dag ye shes ston par mdzad pa lags//rnam dag 'od zer phun sum tshogs pa lags//de bzhin gshegs pas
331b6(dkon brtsegs): migo bdag med mkhyen pas//de slad rnams dag dbyangs ni ston mdzad lags//rnam dag dbyangs ni ston par mdzad pas na//tshangs dbyangs mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa
331b7(dkon brtsegs): lags//bcom ldan sngon ni sems can phan btags pas//de sad rnam dag gsung ni rdzogs pa lags//rnam dag gsung ni yongasu rdzogs pas na//'jog rten tshad med
332a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid stong mkhyen pas//de slad kun 'dzin mkhyen pa rdzogs pa lags//kun 'dzin
332a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa yangasu rdzogs pas na//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med skyon//de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi byed par mkhyen//mig khyad par dag kyang mtha' ma
332a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis//mkhyen pa'i ming ni dpag tu ma mchis pas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston//sangs rgyas yi ge khyad par sgo mkhyen pas//mig stong yi ge
332a4(dkon brtsegs): bral bar rab tu mkhyen//mig stong yi ge bral bar mkhyen pas na//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer dpag med ston//gang zhig mig la bdag med rab sems pa//sangs rgyas
332a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung ni bden pa nyid du rtogs//sangs rgyas gsung ni bden par rtogs pas na//de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer nges par ston//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul mchog ni yongasu
332a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pas//mig 'jig pa dpag med thugasu chud//mig gi 'jig pa rab tu mkhyen pas na//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan 'dags mdzad//thugs rje chen po rkang
332a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa//migi skye ba dpag med rab tu mkhyen//ji ltar bcom ldan mig skye mkhyen pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/de bzhin rna ba sna dang lce
332b1(dkon brtsegs): lus yod//gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya dag dang chos//'jig rten skye dang sgra dang ming la sogs//thams cad la yang de bzhin rab tu mkhyen//thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
332b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//sbyin pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs ji ltar bcom ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin sheg/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog
332b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//tshul khrims rnam dag pha rol byin dang ldan//ji ltar bcom ldan tshul khrims pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis
332b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog gyur pa//bzod pa'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan bzod pa'i pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang
332b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mchog gyur pa//brtson 'grus pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan brtson 'grus pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring po mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen
332b6(dkon brtsegs): po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//bsam gtan pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs/ji ltar bcom ldan bsam gtan pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje
332b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//shes rab pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan shes rab pha rol phyin//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje
333a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//chos sku'i pha rol byon pa phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan chos sku'i pha rol byon//bdag kyang ring por
333a2(dkon brtsegs): mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//rnam dag gzugs ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag gzugs ldan pa//bdag
333a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//rnam dag yid ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan rnam dag yid ldan pa//bdag/
333a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//yon tan mchog ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan yon tan mchog ldan pa//
333a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ring por me thogs de bzhin shig/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//gzugs kyi mtshan ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom ldan gzugs
333a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan ldan pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//rnam dag sgra ni dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar bcom
333a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan rnam dge sgra ldan pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//rdzu 'phrul chen po dpag med phun sum tshogs//ji ltar
333b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thags de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//sems can 'dul skyang srid pa gsum na bzugs/
333b2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar bcom ldan sems can 'du ba mdzad pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thags de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//'khor ba'i spyod pa dpag med dag la
333b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan 'khor ba'i spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//'dod chags spyod pa dpag
333b4(dkon brtsegs): med dag las 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod chags spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//zhe sdang spyod pa
333b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag med dag las 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan zhe sdang spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//gti mug spyong
333b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dpag med dag las 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan gti mug spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//'dod cha/
333b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang spyod pa dpag med 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod tshogs spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shig/thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//
334a1(dkon brtsegs): /zhe sdang gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan sdang rmongs spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog/thugs rdza
334a2(dkon brtsegs): chen po rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//'dod chags gti mug spyod pa dpag med 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan 'dod rmongs spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin shog
334a3(dkon brtsegs): thuzugs rje chen pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa//cha mnyam spyad pa dpag med yang dag 'das//ji ltar bcom ldan cha mnyamo spyod 'das pa//bdag kyang ring por mi thogs de bzhin
334a4(dkon brtsegs): shog/'dren pa 'dod chags dag las yong su 'das pas//'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad//ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan 'dugs pa//bdag kyang de 'dun
334a5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes grub par shog/'dren pa'i sdang dag las yongs 'das pas//'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzangad //ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'degs pa//bdag
334a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/'dren pa gti mug skyed pa phongs 'das pas//'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad//ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten pan//
334a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dags pa//bdag kya nga drarje tshigs grub par shig/'dren pa 'dad cags na rdzang spyod 'dab pan//'jig rten kun pa shin tu pan 'dags mdzad//ji ltar btsam
334b1(dkon brtsegs): ga tan pa 'dags pa//bdag kyad du 'dra' ye shes grub par shog/'dun pa na snang gti mug spyod 'das pas//'jijog rten kun la shin tu phan 'dog sa mdzad//dz+hit+tAr
334b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'jog rten phan 'dogs pa//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shi//'dren pa 'dod tshogs gti mug spyod 'das pas//'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs
334b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//ji ltar bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/'dren pa 'dod tshogs gti mug spyod 'das pas//ji ltar bcom ldan
334b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/'dren pa 'dod chags gti mug spyod 'das pa//'jig rten kun la shin tu phan 'dogs mdzad//ji ltar
334b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub par shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//lha tshogs mang po thams cad 'dul bar
334b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//lha mi'i kha lo bsgyur ba'i ston par shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//klu tshogs mang po thams cad
334b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dul bar mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//lha mo'i kha lo sgyur ba'i ston par shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//gnod sbyin mang ba
335a1(dkon brtsegs): /thams cad 'dul bar mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i yo shes grub gyur nas//sgyu ma kha lo bsgyur ba'i ston par sha//de bkod gshogs pa mthun pamang//
335a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa//dri Ta mnas cad rab tu 'dul mdzad cing /de sbrul bus dpa ga d+hAm mchis pa//'khar bcus ji snyed rab tu 'dug mdzad//bdag kyang de dra' gro gas grub
335a3(dkon brtsegs): ma lal bsgyur ba'i spyan pani gshegs pa sa sbyin pas jug rdzun dus/dus rnams pang du denan du rgyu ste// de

335a6(dkon brtsegs): gru gyur nas//'jog rten myed mi bachom ma mchis shog/de bzhin ga shegs pa ma byin pa mchog ldan pa sa//'jig rten gnas dang gnas med rab tumabyon ga kyang de dri legs rmu
335b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan pagyid shag/de bzhin ka shegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//'jig rten lngas dang 'bras bu rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i yo \u0f7f/
335b2(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phani 'gyid shig/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//'jig rten rang bzhin sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang
335b3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni pan+d+ha bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//thams cad kun tu 'gro ba'i spyod pa mkhyen//bdag
335b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang de 'dra'i ye shIs grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//'jig rten mos pa sna tshogs rab tu mkhyen//
335b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin tha~Md
335b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//bsam gtan spyod pa
335b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin ga byingamakhyen pa mchog ldan pas/rnam par thar pa'i
336a1(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa
336a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pas//cha mnyom spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs
336a3(dkon brtsegs): pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//snyoms 'jug spyod pa dag ni rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/
336a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba rab mkhyen pas//'khor ba nyon mongs rgyu las skyes par mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan
336a5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad rab mkhyen pas//'jig rten phan 'dogs dpe zla yod ma mchis//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig
336a6(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin rab gnas pas//khyad par thabs kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub
336a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//sngon gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dpag med mkhyen//bdag kyang
336b1(dkon brtsegs): da 'a shA zlab b+har nas//'dog rten thams cad ldan phan brgyad gag/de blazhin gshegs pa ma ston pa mchog ldan pas//'tsho' bo sgrub dpag med rab tum khyen/
336b2(dkon brtsegs): bdag sa 'a gas skye ban+d+ha nas//'jig rten rnams rgyud ldan phan pa med /de bzhin ste/shegs pa saSh+Tan pa mchog ldan pas//nyon mangs zad pa rnams ca
336b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//bla med byang chub
336b4(dkon brtsegs): dag mngon sangs rgyas//bdag kya nga 'dri'i mi shes gyur gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad lan phan bskyed shig/de bzhin ga shegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas/
336b5(dkon brtsegs): mangs pag chags dang ni rlub tu byung/'de de 'dra'i sa pa'i rgyu nas//'dzeg rgyun thams cad la na dz+nyAn pa den gshegs pa mkhyen pa mche ba ldan
336b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ang ba dus 'byung chos ni rab tu ma rkyen/bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grwa ba myur nas//'jig rten thams cad ldan pan bskyed shig/de bzhin gshegs pas tshas ngan
336b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas//sems can dpa ga mdo rnams ni ga par mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes gru gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad lani phan dpyid shig/de bzhin gshegs
337a1(dkon brtsegs): bas chos nyid sgyu ma dang /rmi lam smig rgyu lta bur rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid/
337a2(dkon brtsegs): shog/de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi//yi ge ngag dang brjod pa rab tu mkhyen//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni
337a3(dkon brtsegs): phan bgyid sheg/de bzhin gshegs pa spobs pa mchog ldan pas//dam chos zab mo dag ni sten par mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig rten thaMd
337a4(dkon brtsegs): la ni phan bgyid shig/de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsung thugs 'dul bas//thams cad ye shes rjesu 'brang bar mdzad//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'jig
337a5(dkon brtsegs): rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum rab mkhyen pas//'dzin dang chags pa mi mnga' thogs mi mnga'//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes
337a6(dkon brtsegs): grub gyur nas//'jig rten thams cad la ni phan bgyid shog/de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang //shes rab bsgrubs pas de las ldog mi 'gyur//
337a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam grol rab bsgrubs pas//rnam grol mkhyen
337b1(dkon brtsegs): dang gzigs pa ldog mi mnga'//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/de bzhin gshegs pas zhig nas lhag
337b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bsgrubs//lha mi'i 'jig rten dag na mtshungs ma mchis//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur cig/de bzhin
337b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mkhyen pa mchog ldan pas//'jig rten chos rnams la ni zhen mi mnga'//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//khams gsum thugs rje chen po'i gtsor gyur
337b4(dkon brtsegs): cig/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen ldan pas//'gro ba sna tshogs dag ni gsal rab gzigs//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'gro ba de la the tshom
337b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas//de sla de la rmongs pa yang mi mnga'//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//skye zad nyid la the tshom
337b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshegs pas rib zhi mtha' mkhyen pas//de slad de la rmongs pa yong mi mnga'//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//rab zhi de la the tshom
337b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor ba'i mtha' mkhyen pas//de slad de la rmongs pa yod ma mchis//bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//'khor ba de
338a1(dkon brtsegs): mtho tshom ma mchos shog/de can na gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen//de skang slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan//bdag kyang de 'dra'i
338a2(dkon brtsegs): shes grub gyur nas//snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshogs pas skyon bzlog mtha' rab mkhyen//de skad slob dpon ma mchis mkhyen dang ldan//
338a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//skyon bzlog de la the tshom ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshegs pas sngon dang phyi mtha' mkhyen//mig rtag chad dag la 'dzin mi mnga'o//
338a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//snga phyi'i mtha' la the tshom ma mchis shog/de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha' mkhyen pas//mig rtag chad dgu la 'dzin mi mnga'/
338a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas//spyi zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/gang zhig sngon dang phyi mtha' ma rtogs papa//de ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed//de bzhin ga
338a6(dkon brtsegs): bas de ni rab mkhyen pas//ji skad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'//gang zhig yod med mtha' ni mi rtogs pas//des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed//de bzhin gshegs pas ngan la
338a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas//de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'//gang zhig zang dang ma zad ma rtogs pas//des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed//de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas//
338b1(dkon brtsegs): de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mi mnga'//gang zhig 'jug dang mi 'jug ma rtogs pa//des na 'dod pa dag la zhen pa bskyed//de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab mkhyen pas//de slad 'dod
338b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dag la zhen mi mnga'//zhe sdang gti mug khong khro 'chab pa dang //g.yo sgyu phrag dog nga rgyal khengs pa dang //sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //bsam gtan shes
338b3(dkon brtsegs): rab dag kyang de bzhin//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzho nung gyur pa'i sems kyi rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/'dzum pa mdzad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu
338b4(dkon brtsegs): tu bkye'o//'od zer des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas te/'jig rten gyis khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas bac+doMs la lan gsum bskor ba
338b5(dkon brtsegs): byas te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid thim par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig la bzar te pus mo ga
338b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasnga la mgu bos phyag byas te/gus papa thal mo sbyar nas tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag mngon par bstod de bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba
338b7(dkon brtsegs): gus pa/'brug rang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing //ka la ping ka'i sku phyung nas//chos rnga chen po sna 'byin pas//ci yi brad du 'dzum pa mdzad//nyi ma stong pas khyad ngar 'phags//rnam
339a1(dkon brtsegs): dag sgra rab dag dang ldan+da//yon tan ngo mtshar rlab mnga' ba//ci srad 'od zer bkye zla mdzad//sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus//bsam gtan
339a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rab brgyan pas//thams cad dge ni yongs rdzogs pa//ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad//de bzhin gshegaso pa dbyangs snyan pas//ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs///
339a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can nad ni legs gso ba//ci slad 'od zer bkye ba mdzad//thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso//mig ni rtag tu stong dben mkhyen//rnam dag tshangs pa'i dbyings mang
339a4(dkon brtsegs): bas//sems can rnams la ston pa mdzad//rna ba sA lce lus dang yod//sgra dang ming la sogs pa nas//kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dog dang //ye shes bzod pa'i bar de
339a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin//thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso//mig zad skye bo'i mtha' dag dang //rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag/thams cad stong dben nyid du mkhyen//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//
339a6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri re reg bya nas//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//thams cad kyang ni de bzhi no//gzhan yang rten cing 'bral 'byung tshes//tshod dang rtag pa yongs bral nas//
339a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas//rkyen mang las byung nyid du gsungs//res 'ga' rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis//sdug bsngal bzhi ni ston pa mdzad//res 'ga' ngan ni
339b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyis//sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad//res 'ga' tshig ni sna tshogs kyis//rab dpon chos ni ston mdzad cing //gang zag srog dang bdag med dang //sems can//
339b2(dkon brtsegs): me pa nyid du ston//'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med kyang //bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis//tshig su bcad pa brgya stong gis//de 'dra'i chos ni ston par mdzad//de bzhin gshegs
339b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yon tan chos//yang dag nyid ni dz+nyAn mdzad kyang //brjod dang brjod bya mi mnga' bas//badz+rad mdzad chos kyang ying mi mnga'//bcom ldan yang dag tshus gsung zhing //skye dgu rnams
339b4(dkon brtsegs): n+ya go mdzad pas//sgra rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur//lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang //mos pa dag ni rnam par dag/ming ni mang po tshang mod kyang //
339b5(dkon brtsegs): tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur//'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rdzogs//zhe sdang gti mug rnam par bshig/srid dang nga rgyal ma rig dang //g.yo sgyu phrag dog stongs pa nas//sdug bsngal
339b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po la sogs pa//thams cad kyang ni yongasu spangs//'di la sogs pa tshig gi ngan//mtha' ni kun kyang rnam par dag/de bzhin gshegs pas chos gcig la//sna tshigs ming
339b7(dkon brtsegs): ni rab mkhyen pas//grangs ni brgya stong mang po rnams//bsam gyis mi khyab rab tu ston//sangs rgyas tshad med mang po las//de 'dra'o chos ni legs bslabs pas//chos kyi dngos po
340a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig las kyang //brjod pa thugs pa med pa ston//de bzhin gshogs pas chos rnams kyi//rnam grangs sna tshogs rab mkhyen pas//ming tshig dang rdo
340a2(dkon brtsegs): bar ma dang //tha ma rnam 'byad rab tu mkhyen//tha dad tshig ni sna tshogs dge/thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na//don mchog dag ni gya nom pa//ston pa dag la rab tu mkhyen//
340a3(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i dbyangs ni rnam dag pa//rgyu rkyen tshogs pa las byung bas//lce 'ba' zhig la brten pa nas//lus sems par la brten pa'ang min//sa ni rnam pa drug tu gasngos//phyogs
340a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'khor ni yongs 'dus nas//thal sbyar bcom ldan zhal bltan//the tshom dag ni bsal du gsol//de bzhin gshegs pa mig zad dang //skye mtha' dang ni rang bzhin
340a5(dkon brtsegs): gyis//rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang //'gro 'ong med par rab tu mkhyen//bzhugs dang gnas ni mi mnga' ba//yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs//bcom ldan spyan ni thogs mi
340a6(dkon brtsegs): mnga'//de skad dang bdag zhu ba lags//de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid kyi//sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag dang //zad dang ma zad 'khor ba ni//rab bzhin stong dben rab mkhyen
340a7(dkon brtsegs): pas/chos kyi don rnams rab phye nas//'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad//thub pa dbyangs snyan rab mnga' bas//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan sngon dang
340b1(dkon brtsegs): dang//an tad/ na rgyun //rgyum rgyas rgyag dang chus pa gas na//rgyu rgyud drus bstan pa ma da// ma na chug no ga ma dang // nga rdzog
340b2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis//rtag tu steng dben ma ldan lags na//sgyid 'dum pa ston par mdza //baHsa ldan da dang skye che dang //mig nyid stong nyid dbu mkhyen cing //nan mongs rnams ni
340b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas//sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa ban+ti sa//grag pa po mchog ni bun tshogs pa//ji srid 'dzum po ston par mdzad/com ldan mun ring ba sgrims bslabs pas//bsam gyis
340b4(dkon brtsegs): oM khyud ston par mdzad//mig nyid snang pa nyid du mkhyen//dri bral rtag tu rnam par dag/sems kyi spyod pa tshad myed rnams//dgongs pa gcig gis thams cad mkhyen//'od rjed
340b5(dkon brtsegs): 'drog rten rlung mdzad pa//'di ni gang gi swA d+ha gas lags/na pa mdun pas rgyag//rkang gi gci hUM myed par 'a'ags//na po dag ni rab bsal 'os//drugapa
340b6(dkon brtsegs): na//de bzhin pa shegs par rkyen mjug gis//mig 'a ba ni nga rgyu bas ts+tshin ni kau da//dadu 'di mdzum pa rnyan pa //nubs kyi ma
340b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul drug da ni//sgra dngas ma rdzogs pa'i bar//thams ca //gi com ldan mig la bdag med ni phyin// mi rtag nyid rkyen gyis/ nyid byung /
341a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen//ci spyad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan snrel bdag med mkhyen//sgyus kyung mi rtag nyid du rtogs//sems yid stong par rab mkhyen na//
341a2(dkon brtsegs): ci smad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen//sgra yid mi rtag nyid du rtogs//dri nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
341a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan rol bdag med mkhyen//reg bya mi rtag nyid du rtogs//chos nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan sa la bdag med mkhyen//chu yang
341a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag nyid du rtogs//me nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//ci srad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan rlung la bdag med mkhyen//ngo bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs//dngos nyid stong par
341a5(dkon brtsegs): rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen//sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs//drang po stong par rab mkhyen na//ci skad ra
341a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen//'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs//skye nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom
341a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan sgra la bdag med mkhyen//ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs//lam nyid stong par rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan ye shes bdag med mkhyen
341b1(dkon brtsegs): rab dben mi rtag nyid du rtogs//sems can stong par rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med//bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen/
341b2(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ston pa rab mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//'khor ba bdag med nyid du gzigs//rtag dang mi rtag pa yang mkhyen//mya ngan 'das pa stong mkhyen na//ci slad
341b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnam grol//grags pa khams gsum kun du yang //brgya byin mi yi dbang po dang //klu rnams la sogs kun gyis mchod//
341b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang //skye mtha' rab dben mkhyen lags na//ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//sangs rgyas sras ni tshad med pa//'khor 'dir thams cad rab
341b5(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dus//sangs rgyas gsung las skyes po dang //chos las sprul te gang byung ba//thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis//gus pas thal mo rab sbyar lags//'khor 'dus
341b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag slad du ni//'od zer rgyu rkyen 'od zhu lags//de bzhin gshegs pas mig nyid ni//stong zhing bdage mdo mkhyen pas na//khyim na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa//thAd las ni
341b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'das//de bzhin gshegs pa chos rnams ni//bye brag med cing mnyam mkhyen pa//bcom ldan dgongs pa rab mkhyen gyi//rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin//
342a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan mig go bdug mod na khyem//ngo ba nyid stong 'gro'ang med//rnam dag mkhyen pa tshad mod mdzes//ci spyod 'dzum pa ston par mdzad//
342a2(dkon brtsegs): bam pa gsum pa/de bzhin gshegs pa sgo mtha' mang za la//thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten kun sto ba sna dang //chos rje mchog gyur mi yi gtsor gyur te// smyud 'dus
342a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bskrun mdzad bshad du gsol//byang chub sems dpa' chen po ched ma mchis//gzhan yang tshogs gauni byin che ba rnams//mkha' la gdugs ni dam pa dgra kyang phyogs/
342a4(dkon brtsegs): 'don ba tugapas par rnas ni de na gshegs pa la sa//sman dang na tshas ni gang bsgrubs /mnyam par dga'i mang thugs chen pa
342a5(dkon brtsegs): rbad 'dum pa sbyin ma dang ba zhinag ts+tshagarten nas su na sa dzim na dag rab babyung ba//dren par nga mchog T+wA~M ga na du gyur
342a6(dkon brtsegs): spyod 'dzum pa basbyin mdza pa 'a bats+tshan/ma ldan gcung nim ba dku ba drungs//rgyul dang pa zhin du dat+ta ma shAd+d+haH//smre snyun chad yang drung g-i nga gis
342a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'a zer 'dis rgyab gdugs sa//tshigs pa cang rgyab tshangs pa sa//rdzas 'dun gsung gi 'phrogs pa brjod 'gyur zhing //kun ci la sgra skangs kyi
342b1(dkon brtsegs): ljoldan pa//rdo skad 'od zer bgro ba pa shadu gsol//'brug sgra zab mos chos ni bstan pa'i sgyus//'jig rten brgya sbyor dpag med grags gyur pa//zugs rjes chog rtsub yang na 'ja
342b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa//ni slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog byakye//spyi dang mi skye zad dang mi zad mkhyen//mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ang med par rtogs//'jig rten snang mdzad bdud rje'i glog gyur pa/
342b3(dkon brtsegs): ci slad 'od zer gser gyi kha dog bkye//mgo byung ba rtag tu stong dben dang //'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa ma mchis dang //smig tu chu bur lta bur rab mkhyen pa//rgyu rkyen gang gi slang
342b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad lags//de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs sgra dri ro reg byas chos rnams nas//sgra dang snying la sogs pa'i bor du yod//thams cad de bzhin du ni rig par
342b5(dkon brtsegs): /rdo rje drug pa'i sku dang mi 'jig skye//mtshan mchog brgya snying dag ni phun sum tshogs//sku la 'phrul 'khor mi mnga' g.yo mdzad pa//rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzum mdzad pa bdu gsol//
342b6(dkon brtsegs): byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rtid pa yangs//phyal gyi mtshan ma me ganga' seng ge 'dra//lci ba shin tu zab cing skyed rgyas pa//rgyu rkyen gang skad 'i dzum mdzad bshad du gsol//gser skya
342b7(dkon brtsegs): rnanam ngag rdul dang dri ma spangs//bsku re re kha dog mthon mthing ldan//gal su 'khyel zhing spos kyi ngang ldang ba//rgya rkyen gang phred 'dzum mjed par dadu gsol//sku mchog dab pa yongs
343a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs rtag gnas pa//dper na n+ya gr-i tA li shing rgyal bzhin//yon tan thams cad kyis ni rab tu brgyan//gsung dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar
343a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//dpung ba zlum zhing phrag pa sdug la mdzes//gtsug tor yongs rdzogs ga ya su 'khyil bar gda'//zhing ni brgya stong dpag med rgyu bar mdzad//sems can log dang yang
343a3(dkon brtsegs): dag lam ston mdzod//tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra//ljags mtshan sring ring zhal ni kun tu khebs//'gram pa seng ge 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho//thams cad thabs
343a4(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam dag thugs las skyes//ut+pa la yi gsung ni zhal nas 'byung //tsan dan dri dag sku ni kun du khyab//sngon ni byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pas nas//rnam dag mos pa rtag
343a5(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyun mi 'chad//de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs mthil rtag tu mnyam//sa la reg kyang rdul ni gos mi 'gyur//gom pas seng ge glang po che 'dra bas//'jig rten thaMd las na
343a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag 'das//'khor lo rtsibs stong mtshan gyis legs par brgyan//khyad 'phags 'od zer dag ni rtag tu gsal//dge ba dag gis skye dgu phan 'dogs pas//gang gis
343a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang ba rab tu skye//sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas//sangs rgyas zhing ni dpag med snang bar mdzad//sngon ni dge sbyong mang po rab bsgrubs pas//mtshan gyi bkod
343b1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs 'di brnyes legs//gzugs sku yangs rdzogs dpe zla yong ma mchis//zhal mtshan rab mdzes shin du khyad par 'phags//rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa/
343b2(dkon brtsegs): ci srid 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pa shadu gsol//byin pa ri dgas e na ya dang 'dra//sku dbyibs mi sku seng ge ji lta bzhin//'jig rten byung nas 'jig rten snang mdzad pa//ci slad 'dzum pa
343b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan mdzad pa shadu gas la//cang shas bzhin du mtshan sbas rdul mi mnga'//phyag mthal mnyam rgyas phyag ni pus maM 'das//mai ya~M seng ge ngo mtshar khyad par 'phags//ci slad 'dzi
343b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan mdzad ba shadu gsol//sku la 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing //kha dog gya nom rab zhi rtag gsal zhing //rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad//mdo sde tshad med pa
343b5(dkon brtsegs): dag ston par mdzad//rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis//de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags//gang gis mthar lha rnams ni rab spangs na//bcom ldan rnam dag
343b6(dkon brtsegs): sku ni myur thob 'gyur//lha rnga 'brug sgra'i gsung ni kun grags shing //ka lan da ka'i dbyangs snyan rab tu gsal//lha li klu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa//ci slad 'od zer bkye
343b7(dkon brtsegs): zoshi du gsal//'dren pas gsung gcig tu ni chos bstan pas//'tshal pa'i tshul khrims can dag rgyun yang bcad//de bzhin gshegs pas dbyangs rab gang gsungs pa//

344a4(dkon brtsegs): gsus du na ges drug kun tshogs//mya dag 'dabang dpag sad rkyen mdzad pa//seM smad 'am pa bstan mdzad pa du gsopa//bcom ldan rjod na ga dwag+sa

344b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa dpag med snyed//ting 'dzin mchog drag la ni rab thugs pas//mig gi skye mtha' zad pa'i mtha' mkhyen na//ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad pashad gso//'das pa dang ni ma

344b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo la bzhag nas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal pa//gzhon nu shin tu

344b7(dkon brtsegs): rjes dran zhing //mdo sde 'di ni bzung bar gyis//gang zhig dad par rab 'jig cing //'du 'dzil ni mos gyur dang //nyin mtshan gnyid la gang dga' ba//mdo sde 'di la mos mi
345a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/nga yi bstan pa dag las ni//rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang //mya ngan 'das pa'i chos dag la//mos pa dag ni mi skye ba//skyes bu blun po de dag ni//

345b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa//thams cad gti mug rmongs pa yi//rgyu dang rkyen las byung bas ni//nyon mongs rjesu 'jug byed cing //rang dbang dag ni thob mi 'gyur//yang dag chos ni spong byed cing //chos ma
