345b6(dkon brtsegs): dang rkyen dag gis//byos pa'i las kyi rje su ni//rnam smin myong ba skyabs med par//de ltar khong du mchud pas//'jig rten drang srong pa brten nas//dge ba'i grogs po yin
345b7(dkon brtsegs): skams sems//de nas rang nyid 'di snyam du//stong pa nyid ni yang bsgom pa//'dus ma byas ni rtogs snyam nas//chad par lta ba bskyed par byed//lus ni snod chag pa dang 'dra//
346a1(dkon brtsegs): /sems kyang rje su 'gug 'gyur zhes//phal tshur kyal pa'i tshig dag la//mos pa nyid du rab 'gyur zhing /'di la mngon par zhen pas na//phan pa
346a2(dkon brtsegs): don ni ci yang med/gal te sbrul ni gdug pa yis//gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang //nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams//ngan 'gro dag tu ltung mi 'gyur//blun pa gang zhig chos
346a3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas//skya dgu mang po tshad med snyed//sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed//khyed la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa//'di lta bur ni blta bar gyis//dang
346a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dir nga yi spyan sngar ni//zla 'od gzhon nu gang 'dus pa//'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi//sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das//tshad med gang+gA'i klung bye snyed //mchod pa rim gro rab
346a5(dkon brtsegs): byas shing //shin tu brtan par yongs bsgoms nas//bla med ye shes btsal bas na//srid pa dag ni thams cad la//sems kyis gnas pa ci yang med//migi skye mtha' gtan du ni//
346a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa shes pas na//spros pa dag ni yongs spangs nas//mngon par shes pa ci yang med//sems can dag ni chad med pa//phan pa dag ni bya ba'i phyir//bla med 'od zer
346a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa yi//mdo sde dag ni ston par byed//skyes bu blun po gang yin pa//chos 'di slob par mi nus pas//rnal 'byor bsgoms pa dag la ni//skyon nyid du yang lta bar byed//de/
346b1(dkon brtsegs): bas na blun po dag/thag rnying ba ni yang spangs nas//de dag la ni ston mi byed//de yi chos kyang mi slob bo//skyes bu blun po gang yin pa//rtsod pa'i sgra bsam pas na//rtsod sgra med pa'i spyod
346b2(dkon brtsegs): pab la//nan tan sgrub par mi nus pas//skyes bu de dag rnams la ni//tshul bzhin sems ni ci yang med/de lta bas na de dag la//bsnyen bkur mi bya ba sngags mi brjod//skyes bu blun po gang
346b3(dkon brtsegs): yin pa//le lo snyoms las la gnas pas//rtag tu lus dang ngag yid kyi//mi dge'i las ni spyad pas na//de la tshul khrims dag pa dang //shes rab mang thos ci yang med//rtag tu 'dod/
346b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yul sems shing //'du 'dzi dag la mos par byed//khyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de//rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni//dman pa yin par rab tu ltos//khong khro bka' blo mi bde
346b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing //byad bzhin dag ni mi sdug la//gal te dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang //lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur//bdag tu 'du shes la zhan pas//yang dag don la rmongs par 'gyur//blo
346b6(dkon brtsegs): gros dgon mi ldan pas//tshi ga bye brag 'byed mi nus//rang bzhin stong pa'i chos thos kyang //de la mos pa skye mi 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das//yun ring po nas
346b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa'i//tshi gi spros pa gang yin pa//thams cad rab tu spangs pa yin//so so'i skye bos 'di dag la//shin tu zhen cing chags pas na//ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yang //rtogs
347a1(dkon brtsegs): shing khong du chud mi 'gyur//tshul khrims bsngags pa brjod byed kyang //tshangs par spyod pa bsgrub mi byed//kha nas chos ni ston byed kyang //lus kyis chos
347a2(dkon brtsegs): min spyod par byed//rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang //rtag tu 'dul min spyod par byed//sangs rgyas slob ma dag la ni//kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos gyon gsungs//'chal
347a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i tshul khrims can dag gis//gos 'di rab tu bgos gyur kyang //nga rgyal dag ni bag med pa'i//sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed//dad pas byin pa ci zos pa//thu lum
347a4(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba med pa 'dra//de ltar khyim gyi gnas spangs nas//'dod pa lnga yi bde ba'ang med//gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la//mchog gi bde ba mthob nas//spyod pa 'dres
347a5(dkon brtsegs): ma mos byed pas//mtha' gnyis dag ni spong mi 'gyur//yid kyi mos pa ji snyed pa//thams cad kyang ni dag mi 'gyur//de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni//'khor mang nang du gnas kyang
347a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur//dper na ji ltar wa skyes dag/seng ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin//de ltar rab tu zhi ba yi//chos ni yang dag bstan byas kyang //de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i don//rtogs shing
347a7(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas//'khor mang dag la bstan bsngags kyang //khengs pa'i sems ni bskyed par byed//ston pa chen po ma dran pas//ngo tsha dman pa'i sems kyang med//mi gtsang dngos
347b1(dkon brtsegs): na byad kyang //rid bzhin nar bu thub pa bzhin//shin+da tu dka' bas 'dzin byung pas//sems kyis cung zad ka /dang mi byud//'di sgyu sa ma ma rabs drug//khyim nas rab tu byung nasan+ne/
347b2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag kyang bsrungs pa dang //tshes gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang //cha byad tsam dang ldan pas na//yang dag shes rab ci yang med//kha spu dag ni bregs gyur kyang //sdig pa'i
347b3(dkon brtsegs): sems ni mi spong zhing //dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos//log lta rtag tu lhung gyur na//rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam//de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur//dge sbyong mngon 'du bya ba
347b4(dkon brtsegs): yi//'bras bu dag kyang 'thob mo 'gyur//ma rig nyon mongs rnams kyang na//rdul tsam nyams par mi 'gyur//grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing //rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang //
347b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu blun pa blo med pas//yang dag bgrod pa shes mi 'gyur//sems kyi 'dun pa ci yod pa//de dag thams cad mi dge yin//rnyed pa 'dod pa'i rgyu yi phyir//dgon pa dag na gnas
347b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi//mya ngan 'das pa yang dag rgyu//bsgrub pa'i phyir ni ma yin//rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu gdu//lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas//rtag tu de lta'i bsos po dag/bsgrub pa la nI mos
347b7(dkon brtsegs): par byed//dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag tu//lo ni mang por gnas byed kyang //phyin log lta bar gyur pa'i phyir//mya ngan 'das lam ster bas na//nams kyang dge sbyong la ma dag gis//
348a1(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dag ni thob mi 'gyur//yang dag lta ba rab nyams shing //tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas//gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan par//de la
348a2(dkon brtsegs): shin tu sred par 'gyur//'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni//rtag tu sred pa skye bar byed//gal te grong khyer zhugs na yang //nga rgyal mtshan ma ston byed cing //lus kyi las ni mi srung bas//
348a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod lam dag la gnas mi byed//res 'gre' grong khyer zhugs nas ni//rgyu tshe rang nyid 'di skad du//dgon pa'i gnas ni de dag ni//ri phug dag ni gang yin pa//khyed rnams 'di ltar
348a4(dkon brtsegs): shes par gyis//de ni bdag gi gnas yin te//mthon dman ran par lta ba dang //'gro go mi rgyal lha gnaso zhes//tha dad mtshan ma'i tshig brjod//dgra bcom pa yi rtags
348a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas//khyim pa dug ni ji snyed pa//phan tshun du ni 'di skad du//dgon pa'i dge slong gang yin pa//yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer//res 'ga' dgon pa de dag na//
348a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas par gyur pa de yi tshe//gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na//'di lta bu ni ston par byed//bdag ni dkon gnas 'di dag tu//nyin mtshan 'chags par byed ce'am//yang nA
348a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam gting nas ni//'dir ni 'dug par byed ces zer//res 'ga' grong khyer zhugs gyur nas//khyim pas der ni phyin pa'i tshe//g.yo spyanan tan 'di ska du//bda'am zhes ni
348b1(dkon brtsegs): bar byed//'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam//rgyal po'i chom tun la sogs pas//sna tshogs dag ni brjod par byed//res 'ga' tshugasu pa'i sems dag gis//bud med rnams tu
348b2(dkon brtsegs): mdun dag tu//thabs ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//rang gi yon tan brjod par byed//bdag ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi//bsod nams zhing ni chen por byed//bdag ni rgyal thabs rab spangs na/
348b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas lam bsgoms yin//btsun mo dang ni sras rnams kyang //mtho ris skye bar gyur zhes zer//de dag de skad thos nas ni//shin tu gus pa rab bskyed//gos zas dang ni btung ba
348b4(dkon brtsegs): dag/sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par byed//btsun pas thugs rje rab dgongs shing //bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer//ro zhim dag la zhan chags shing //nyes dmigs rnams ni ma
348b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pas//bdud kyis glags kyang rnyed 'gyur te//rus sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra//dgon par gnas pa dag la yang //rnyed pa dag gis bsgrims par byed//dge slong brtson 'grus
348b6(dkon brtsegs): can dag la//brnyes shing skur pa 'debs par byed//rnyed dang grags pas sems tshangs pas//yang nas yang du zhen pa bskyed//lus ni yongasu gso ba'i phyir//rtag tu g.yo sgyu
348b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas na//lus dang ngag gi ming de'i las//yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed//gal te sbyin bdag drad pa yis//dang ba'i sems kyis mchod na yang //la lo snyoms las dbang
349a1(dkon brtsegs): gis ni//de yi bsod nams 'bri bar byed//skyes bu blun po de dag ni//rtag tu mi dge'i 'dod bskyed pas//stong pa nyid kyis chos 'di la//rjes 'thun
349a2(dkon brtsegs): bzod sems mthon mi 'gyur//gang dag nga yi bstan pa la//nyes dmigs de dag rab spangs nas//nan tan bag yong sgrub byed na//chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur//rnyed pa
349a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ni mi rnyed dang //bstod smad sdug bsngal bde la sogs//'jig rten chos kyis mi g.yos pas//chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur//lus la 'du shes mi gtsang dang //
349a4(dkon brtsegs): phung po rma yi 'du shes dang //zas ni ma bskus 'du shes dang //chos 'di thos par dka' mi 'gyur//gos bzang dag ni thob gyur kyang //dregs pa dag ni mi skye zhing //ngo tsha dag
349a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir gyon pa//chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur//gzugs dang stobs ni mi bsnyems shing //zas la chags pa med pa dang //srog gnas phyir ni gang za ba//chos 'di
349a6(dkon brtsegs): thob par dka' mi 'gyur//sred pa rnams ni stong shes nas//'dod pa dag la blang dor med//rtag tu stong dben gang spyod pa//chos 'di thob par dka' mi 'gyur//dpag
349a7(dkon brtsegs): ched gcig 'das ri khrod du//gcig pu 'dug nas mnyam gzhag cing //'dus byas bdag med gang rtags pa//chos 'di theb par dka' mi 'gyur//mig zang skye ba'i mtha'
349b1(dkon brtsegs): dag dang //mig 'jug mtshan nyid rtogs byed cing //mi gtsang lam ni gang bsgrub pa//chos 'di thob par dka' mo 'gyur//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas//
349b2(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang ming gi bar du yang //thams cad kun kyang de bzhino//de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe//dge slong dag ni tshad med snyeng //brtson pa dang ni le lo can//thams cad de bzhin shes par
349b3(dkon brtsegs): kyigyis//dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag/sgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa//yid ches pa dang yid mi ches//thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//dge dang mi dge'i grogs po dag/mig
349b4(dkon brtsegs): zad lam ni gang yin pa//sgrub pa dang ni mi bsgrub pa//thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing //zla gcig gnyis gsum 'das nas ni//dus gzhan
349b5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni gang ldog pa//thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis//gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas//mos pa'i sems ni gang skyes pa//gal te nyams par gyur na yang //slar ni dang ba thob
349b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas//bag med spong bar mi byed na//mdo 'di sangs rgyas dka' ba yin//do snyam du ni sems par 'gyur//gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur
349b7(dkon brtsegs): nas//bdud kyis yongasu gang bzung ba//dang po dad pa skyes gyur kyang //phyis ni rab tu spong bar 'gyur//gang zhig chos la mamo pa//mi bden grags dang rnyed pa tshol//grong khyer
350a1(dkon brtsegs): grong brdal rangab rgyu zhing //gzugs rnams dang ni ting 'dzin dang //kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod dang //de yis yang dag rtogs mi 'gyur//
350a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang //'jig rten las ni 'did tshol ba//brjod pa dag ni rtogs byed pas//stong nyid bsgom la skur pa 'debs//dran dang shes rab
350a3(dkon brtsegs): sems med pas//tshe tshang bar du ngan med 'das//blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba//de ni tshul khrims gegs byas pas//mnar med dag tu ltung bar gyur//rnams
350a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mtho ris yod mi skye//gang gis skad cig gcig la ni//mchod rten stong ni byas pa bas//gang gis mdo sde 'di thos nas//tshig bzhi tshogs bcad gcig
350a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin 'phags//me tog phreng ba brgya stong dag/sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas//gang zhig mdo sde 'di thos nas//tshig bzhi tshigs bcad sems pa 'pha//
350a6(dkon brtsegs): glang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/gang gA'i bye snyed byas pa bas//gang gis tha na skad cig tsam//mdo sde 'ang sems khyad par 'phags//sangs rgyas
350a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing ni 'bum phrag brgya//me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas//gang gis tha na skad cig tsam//mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags//chos gos 'bum
350b1(dkon brtsegs): byug brgyan med bo//sangs rgyas rnams la phum+b+ha pa byas//gang gis tha na skad cig tsam//mdo sde 'di sems khyad par 'phags//sangs rgyas stan ni rnam dag 'phags/
350b2(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhyen mi gzigs gang yang med//gang gis mang sde 'di mos na//sangs rgyas spyan ni thob par 'gyur//'das pa'i bskal pa grangs mo //sangs rgyas mA
350b3(dkon brtsegs): me mdzod pa byung //nga ni drang srong khye'ur gyur//me tig thogs nas mchod pa byas//shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba//byang chub snying po la 'dug nas//mdo sde 'di
350b4(dkon brtsegs): ni skyon 'gyur zhes//ngal byang chub lung yang bstan//khyod ni de tshe gzhon nur gyur//nga srong bstan pa thos gyur nas//dgra' zhing dang ba'i sems
350b5(dkon brtsegs): bskyed de//thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad du//gal te bram zla khye'u no//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas tshe//bdag ni de yi grogs gyur nas/
350b6(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu yang /ches kyi mdo sder ba 'dzin cing //bsrung bar shig ces smyan lam bdag//sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de yis/
350b7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i mda'adzin//ji skad gsung bzhin maSh+Ta/bram ze'i khyi'u gzhan nu gnyis//sogs par nyan nga yongs su bzung //de sngon 'ad
351a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus kyi tshe//me tog ut+pa la dag gis ni//sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas//dri cha khyod kyang der 'dug ste//'di skad du ni
351a2(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab//nga yi bskrun pa tha ma la//mdo sde 'di ni rab bzung nas//rgya cher ston par shog ces smras//gang gis chos 'di thos gyur nas//zhe sdang sems
351a3(dkon brtsegs): ni mi bskyed par//gzung 'dzin klog cang gang 'don pa//de ni skyes bu dam pa yin//khyod kyis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe//thos dka'i chos 'di rab gzung nas//sems
351a4(dkon brtsegs): can dag la don gyi chul//rgya cher dbye zhing bstan par bya//nges kyang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe//yang dag chos ni nub pa na//'od zer bstan pa'i mdo 'di ni//
351a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can dag la rgya cher bstan//blun pas nan tan mi sgrub pas//'di la skur ba 'debs par byed//ngas ni de skad thos gyur nas//zhe sdang dag ni bskyed
351a6(dkon brtsegs): mi byed//nga ni rtag tu bzod bsgoms nas//'jig rten rnams la phan 'dogs byed//bzod pa'i stabs ni rdzogs pas na//mtshan dang dpe byad dag gis brgyan//gzhonu
351a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis sangs rgyas sku//gya nom yongasu rdzogs gyur cig/gser gyi kha dag rnam dag 'thags//bzod pa'i stobs las byung bar ltos//nga yi zhabs ni sa reg nas//
351b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan chad med g.yo byud kyang //sems can rnams ni mi ltung ba//bzod pa'i stobs las thams cad sgyus//nga yi sgyu khung gcig nas ni//'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas//thang
351b2(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar gang byed pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //srin po shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs//srog chags gzi brjid 'phrog byed pa//nga la rtag tu gus pa

351b4(dkon brtsegs): las byung //rol mo'i sgra ni brgya stong dag/'khor 'dus chen po'i nang dag tu//sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags brjod pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //klu yi rgyal
351b5(dkon brtsegs): po brgya stong dang//rab tu gdug cing 'jigs rung ba//sangs rgyas mthong na dga' ba yang //thams cad bzad ma chog stobs las byung //srin pa gnod sbyin la sogs pas//
351b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog phreng brgya stong thogs//'ongs nas ngal mchod byed pa//thams cad bzad mchog la stobs las byung //zhing ni brgya stong tshad med par//bzhugs pa'o de bzhin gshegs
351b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams//nga yi yon tan bsngags pa yang //thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //lto 'phya dang ni lus srul po//brgya stong dag ni 'dus gyur nas//me tog gtor nas nga
352a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs la sa byung //gnod skyon rgyal po la sogs pa//b+h+yo ba brgya b+hag drug cu rnams//'ongs nas ngal glang
352a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa//thams cad bzod ma tshig N+DI ba swA~M lngas byung //kun ya k+Sha sa rgyal ba ni//myini byu ga la sogs pas//mu tig dmor bsti mi rgyad pa//thams cad brjod
352a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog stobs las byung //du mu ru da shi khyi ba'o//brgya stong snyed ni'i dus gyur nas//rol mo dag gis de mchod pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //lce
352a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ni lus srul po//brgya stong snyed ni 'dus gyur nas//me tog spos kyis ngamachud pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //sa chen 'dzin pak+Sha ya~M rgya
352a5(dkon brtsegs): lus phyed dag ni rab bstan nas//thal sbyar ngal gus pa yang //thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //lus phyed sgra gtson 'dzin la sogs//bye ba phrag ni brgya stong
352a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams//dang ba'i sems kyis nga mtshad po//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //gzhon nu khyod kyis 'di ltar ltos//sangs rgyas 'od zer gang reg pa//sdug
352a7(dkon brtsegs): bsngal bral nas bde thob pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //sa mu ti dang rlung gi lha//brgya stong na mkha' gang ba ni//spos kyi sa char 'bab mchod pa//thaMng bzod
352b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog skabs las byung //lha yi 'khor n+ya bar+b+ha snang dag/m+b+ha yim tog gtar mchod//srod sbyangs sangs rgyas bskyon byung po//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //khyod kyis
352b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul dang //sbyin dang tshul khrims rab bsgrags nas//thams cad kun tu thos mdzad po//bzod mchog stobs las byung bar ltos//phung po khams kyi sgra dag dang /
352b3(dkon brtsegs): bden pa bzhi yi sgra dag gis//thams cad kun tu go mdzad pa//thams cad bzod mchog stobs las byung //nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' la mig zang
352b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dag dang //rab zhi'i sgra ni thos gyur to//skye ba'i mthu' yang de bzhin no//nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las mig ni rgyu dang rkyen//de las skyes dang 'gro 'a
352b5(dkon brtsegs): meng//de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//d+hA yi rdzu 'phrul sgribs kyis ni//mkha' las mig zhi rtogs byed ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyang de las skyes//de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//nga yi dz+ha
352b6(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' la mig zung mtha' zhi bas//sangs rgyas rnamapa ni de la sa skyes//de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las
352b7(dkon brtsegs): migo bdir bzhi pas//sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes//de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//nga mo rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las mig skyes mtha'i//pos/sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes//
353a1(dkon brtsegs): de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las mag 'jug rab zhe na//sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes//de skad//
353a2(dkon brtsegs): du ni thos par 'gyur//nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las mig ni skye zhi bas//sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes//de skad du yang thos par 'gyur//
353a3(dkon brtsegs): nga yi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//mkha' las mig dben rab zhi bas//sangs rgyas rnams ni de las skyes//de skad du ni thos par 'gyur//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//
353a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya nas//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no//'dod chags gti mug khong khyo dang //'chab dang phrag dog
353a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu dang //khengs dang nga rgyal la sogs pa//rgya cher bshad pa'ang de bzhin no//de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de ltar bu'i chos khyad par du 'phags pa thos
353a6(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu dka' bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar te//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sang gi bdugs la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
353a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor mang po dang bcas par gdugs tshad la spyan 'dren ni thugs brtse bar dgongs te//bdag gis sbyar ba'i gdungs gsol bar ci gnang //de skad ces gsol
353b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa de'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /sems can tshad med pa rnams la yang phan gdags par 'gyur bar thugs
353b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen nas/thugs brtse bar dgongs te/cang ma gsung bas gnang ngo //de ras zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgu
353b3(dkon brtsegs): byos phyag byas te/lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/rab tu dga' bsnga rang gi khyim du song ste/rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /lha dang glu dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin
353b4(dkon brtsegs): po dang /lto 'phyo la sogs pas rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor ngar gyi lding khang bres te/lding khang de yang shin du mtho zhing rgya che la thams cad kun du khyab
353b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/gser gyi cod cod dra bas bres pa/nor bu rin po tsha'i phreng ba sbyangs pa/seng ge'i gdan dang /gser gyi phreng ba lu gu rgyud can 'bum phrag brgya stong sna tshogs kyis
353b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan/gzhan yang rin po che'i me tog kha dog khyad par du 'phags pa'i phung po dag chal du bkram mo//me tog tsam pa ka dang /a ti mug ta la sogs pa rnam pa
353b7(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi phreng ba tshad med grangs pa yang rin po che'i lding khang gi nang thams cad dang 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun du khyab par sbyangs shing /rgyan du bres so//gzhan
354a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i nang du khri stan rnams bshams nas rin po che'i spos kyi byi lI kA dang /du ma tsa dang /snron dang /gur gum rnam par dag cing yid dga' bar/
354a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa sna tshogs bsregs so//de bzhin du sbyar spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyang mchod po'i yo byad du sbyar to//gzhan yang spos kyi chus lam srang rnams kun du khyab
354a3(dkon brtsegs): bar chag chag btab bo//sa gzhi kun du me tog sna tshogs cal du bkram mo//de'i tshe lha'i bu mo dang /lho ma yin gyi bu mo dang /sgra gcan 'dzin gyi bu mo grangs mang tshang med
354a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yang rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/byang chub kyi rgyu mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir der 'ongs nas/grong khyer chen po de'o nang du 'phags pa de rab tu brgyan to//
354a5(dkon brtsegs): do nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas grong khyer de kun du khyab par brgyan zhing yongs su dag pa dang /gdugs tshod la bab por rig nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
354a6(dkon brtsegs): to//bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sman par mdzad pa rwa slad du grong khyer chen por gshegasu gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor med po dang thabs gcig tu grong
354a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer ru gshegs nas/sgo'i thim pa la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu grong khyer chen po de'i sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'bum phrag brgya stong
354b1(dkon brtsegs): tshad med pa yang rab tu g.yos par gyur to/de'i tshe long ba dag gis ga ba mthong bar gyur/sdug bsngal ba rnams ni bde ba thob par gyur/'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos par/
354b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur/byung bzhin mo sdug pa rnams ni byad bzhi ni bzang po thob byar gyur/nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/bu med pa rnams ni bu yod par gyur/gro med pa rnams
354b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gos thob par gyur/rin po che med pa rnams ni rin po che thob par gyur/nye ba shes med pa rnams ni nye bshes dang ldan par gyur/lus kyi rgyan thams cad kyis phongs
354b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni lus kyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan par gyur to//gzhan yang dad ba dang /khrung khrung dang /ne tso dang /rma bya dang /ka ri ka la sogs pa bya'i tshogs mang po rnams
354b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshebs pa mthong ba dang rab tu dga' ba'i sems ni bskyed pas/sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba mchog dam pa phyung ste/gang gis sgra de thos pa yang yid shin du bde bar gyur to//
354b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsam pa ka'i ljon shing tshad med pa snyed mngon par sprul paso/sems can brgya stong mang po rnams me tog yongs su
354b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa de dag dang /gzhan yang spos mchog dam pa thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pa byas so//gzhan yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo dbang phyug thob
355a1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgya stong du ma mu tig dmar po dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma thogs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu dga' bas mngon par gtor to//lha ma yin
355a2(dkon brtsegs): mang po dang /gzhan yang lha mang po rnams rin po che'i gdugs gser dang dngul gyis rab tu brgyun pa thogs nas bar snang la 'dug ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du khebs
355a3(dkon brtsegs): par g.yogs so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis tsan dan gyi ljon shing dang /gser gyi ljon shing dang /rin po che'i snod dang /gos la sogs
355a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ljon shing tshad med dpag tu med pa'i rin po che rnams kyis brgyan pa/me tog dang /lo ma phun sum tshogs shing rgyas pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi rnam
355a5(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa'i 'bras bu thun mong du mngon par grub pa/rlung gi ngad langs pa tsam gyis spos mchog dam pa'i dris sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa rnams kun du khyab par
355a6(dkon brtsegs): gang bar mngon par sprul to//sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyis kyang dus gcig tu mu tog thogs nas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//
355a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du sems can dang /sems can ma yin pa tshad med pa rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mngon par sprul pa sha stag go/gang dag
355b1(dkon brtsegs): ci dang ci smon par byed pa de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang gis de dag gi bsam pa spyi ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'khor
355b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa thams cad na mkha' las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sgras bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par ston pa'i sgra thos par gyur kyang de gang nas byung ba shes par yang ma gyur la/
355b3(dkon brtsegs): tshigasu bcad pa brgya stong du mas kyang chos rnams yang dag par bstan par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par
355b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur//'dod chags zad mthar stong dben gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha'
355b5(dkon brtsegs): lngas s+thA ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//'dod chags skye mtha' stong dben gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das ni zong
355b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di snyed grags par 'gyur//'dod chags mtha' ni stong dpon gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur
355b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//'dod chags 'jug pa stong dben gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs
356a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das na grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//'dod chag
356a2(dkon brtsegs): med cing stong dben gang rtogs po//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags
356a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//'dod chags med cing stong dben gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//
356a4(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//yang dag nyid rtog byang chub thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni
356a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad grags par gyur//'dod chags skye med stong dben gang stod pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub thob par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe///
356a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//'dod chags rab 'gog stong dben gang rtogs pa//yang dag nyid rtogs byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//zhe sdang gti mug
356a7(dkon brtsegs): khong khro 'chab ser sna/g.yo sgyu khengs dang nga rgyal mya ngan dang //sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog pa lam sems can//khye'u dang bu mo bud med gang dang ni//skyes pa
356b1(dkon brtsegs): gso ba dag dang dbang po drug/yul drug 'byung chen bzhi yi dngos po dang //'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po khams rnams dang //'jig rten skye sgra ming sogs kyang de bzhin//
356b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rje dam pa'i chos ni bstan pas na/sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//lha yi 'jig rten kun kyang thos gyur nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg la gnas
356b3(dkon brtsegs): par mos//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad lpags par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das sbyin stobs dag la rab mos pa//sbyin
356b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad blugs par 'gyur//bcom ldan tshul khrims
356b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dag rab mos pas//tshul khrims stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' las sgra ni 'di skad glegs
356b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//bcom ldan bzod pa dag la rab mos pas//bzod pa'i stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//
356b7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag la rab mos pos//brtson 'grus stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das
357a1(dkon brtsegs): ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//bcom ldan pasam gtan dag la rab mos pas//bsam gtan
357a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das ni grong khyer zhugs pa'i tshe//mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad grags par 'gyur//bcom ldan shes rab
357a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la rab mos pas//shes rab stobs kyis byang chub brnyes par 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul mngon shes yon tan gnas shas stobs//thabs dang gzugs kyi stobs
357a4(dkon brtsegs): dang grags pa'i stobs//las dang rten 'byung yon lag dad dang thos//gtong dang 'thun pa'i stobs dang rab zhi stobs//rab dul yang dag mtha' dang bden mkhas
357a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs//'jigs dang dga' dang phan 'dogs la mos dang //byams dang snying rje dga' snyoms bzod 'tshe med stong dang mtshan ma med sogs kyang de bzhin//stobs bcu
357a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i mnga' bdag lha yi gtso//yon tan grags pa dpe zla ma mchis pa/grong khyer mchog gshegs zhabs ni bzhag pa'i tshe//sems can rnams
357a7(dkon brtsegs): la rgya cher phan pa mdzad//sngon chad srid gsum las dge rab bsgrub pa//lha yi dge ba sna tshogs 'phel bar mdzad//'jig rten thams cad kun ni rab tu
357b1(dkon brtsegs): bkur/nga yi bstan pa 'di thos thams cad dga'//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs nas zhabs bzhag tshe//grong khyer sa tshon dab ni rab tu g.yos//bcom ldan rnam
357b2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'od zer mthong bas na//ngo mtshar mi 'dzin mi dga' gang yang med//bcom ldan grong gshegs phan che re ma mdzod pas//lha mi'i 'khor rnams sems ni dga' bar
357b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur//sa dang mkha' 'gro dag gis srid gsum na//bcom ldan shin du bde zhes bsngags par gyur//bcom ldan zhabs kyi 'khor lo sa gzhag ste//rnam dag 'od zer kun
357b4(dkon brtsegs): gsal ngo mtshar gyur//rte ni cang shes glang khyer sgra snyan phyung //bya tshogs dag kyang mkha' la rab tu dga'//gzhan yang rang dang bud med mang po yi//lag dang rkang
357b5(dkon brtsegs): gi gdub 'khor phreng ba dang //de bzhin rin tshon rgyan ni sna tshogs los//ma bkrol bar yang rang nyid sgra snyan byung //so sor phan tshun dga' ba'i gtam brjod cing //
357b6(dkon brtsegs): skad 'thun bkra shes mchog gi bsngags pa brjod//'o ni long dbang po ma tshang dbang po thob//thams cad bcom ldan khyad 'phags 'bras bu dbang //bcom ldan grong
357b7(dkon brtsegs): khyer gshegs tshe kun dga' bas//lha mis me tog kun gtor mchod pa byas//mkha' las sgra snyan kun du byung bas na//lha tshogs tshad med rab tu dga' bar gyur//
358a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang sems can dran pa nyams pa dang //smyos 'khrugs rab zhi phan tshun gtam snyan brjod//bud med gang sgyum mya ngan 'jigs gyur pa//
358a2(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer sbyin gyis bde ba thob par gyur//skyes pa bud med ngo tsha khrel bcas pa//dri ma spangs pa'i chos dag rab bshad pas//thams cad dga' nas dgu pa'i
358a3(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de//thub mchog zhabs la spyi btud phyag byas nas//kha cig bcom ldan bla med lam mchog tshol//kha cig byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos tshul//
358a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer mchog tu gshegs byos na//bcom ldan zhal du blta zhing reng nyid dgar//bcom ldan mkhyen pas sa yi spyod rtogs pas//'jig rten
358a5(dkon brtsegs): rjes 'thun phan pa rab tu mdzad//chos kyi nor mchog byang chub sems dpa' byi ni//rin chen mchog ni sems can rnams la btang //bcom ldan grong khyer
358a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshe//mkha' la sgran 'di skad byung //gang zhig mig zad mtha' sreng ba//sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i
358a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe//mkha' la sgra ni 'di skad byung //gang zhig mig skye mtha' sred pa//sangs rgyas la ni gus pa yin//gang zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa//sangs rgyas yid ches
358b1(dkon brtsegs): mI 'jigs thob//mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na//shin du dang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad//gang zhig mig zad mthar sred pa//chos lnga yid ches mi 'jigs thob//mig zad mtha'/
358b2(dkon brtsegs): ni lta bas na//shin tu drang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad//gang zhig mgro zad mtha' sred pa//dge 'dun yid ches mi 'jigs thob//mig zad mtha' ni lta bas na//shin tu dang ba'i
358b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyun mi 'chad//gang zhig mig zad mtha' skyed ba//tshul khrims 'dzin med thob par 'gyur//mig zad mthar ni blta bas na//shin tu dang ba'i rgyun mi 'chad//gang
358b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa//ngan 'gro'i 'dod chags spong bar 'gyur//mig zad mtha' ni blta bas na//'dod chags rgyun ni spong bar byed//gang zhig mig zad mtha'
358b5(dkon brtsegs): sred pa//ngan 'gro'i zhe sdang spong bar 'gyur//mig zad mthar ni blta bas na//zhe sdang rgyun ni spong bar byed//gang zhig mig zad mtha' srod pa//ngan 'gro'i gti mug spong
358b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur//mig zad mthar ni blta bas na//gti mug rgyun ni spong bar byed//gdo zhig mig zad mtha' sred pa//byang chub ye shes dag la gnas//mig zad mthar ni blta
358b7(dkon brtsegs): ngas na//byang chub ye shes rgyun mi 'chad//mig skye mtha' dang mig gi mtha'//'jug pa dang ni rab dben dang //yod pa nyid du mi 'gyur dang //mi skye rab tu zhi ba dang //
359a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la sogs pa'i sgo rnams kyang //thams cad mig za 'dra bar bstan//gang zhig mig zad mthar srong ba//da ni rtag tu tshum med/
359a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur//gang zhig mig gi mtha' sred pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir/
359a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'a thob par 'gyur//gang zhig mig gi 'jug skyed pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul
359a4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig mig gi 'jug sred pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar tha tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig
359a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye sred pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thub por 'gyur//gang zhig mig mi skye snyed pa//da ni rtag tu
359a6(dkon brtsegs): tshom medo//de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig mig med la sred pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar the tshom
359a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig mig gi zhag sred pa//de ni rtag tu the tshom med//de ltar the tshom med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rdzu
359b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur//rna ba sna lho lus dang yid//gzugs sgra ro rAg bya nas//skra dang mang gi bar du yang //thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//mig skye dpag med gang bskyed
359b2(dkon brtsegs): pa//ye shes dpag med bskyed par byed//ye shes dpag tu med pa'i phyir//chos 'di bstan pa'ang de bzhin no//mig zad dpe mdo gang shes pa//mig la sgrib pa med
359b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thogs med thog/rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs sgra dri ro rig bya nas//sgra dang ming gi bar du yang //
359b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mkha' las chos bshad sgra thos nas//sangs rgyas
359b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan the tshom med//kho cig 'dod chags sems byung yang //sangs rgyas ye shes 'jigs mi byed//gang zhig 'dod chags sems byung yang //sangs rgyas yi
359b6(dkon brtsegs): shes stong mi 'gyur//kha cig 'dod chags sems byung yang //bla med ye shes tshol byed cing //ma 'dres chos ni bsgrub pa dang //nyan thos theg pa mos mi byed//
359b7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa bsam gtan bsgom byed kyang //bsam gtan bde la mos pas na//mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab rnyes nas//dge slong 'bras bu thob snyam sems//byis pa bsam
360a1(dkon brtsegs): /gtun bsgrul byung byung //mog zang mna' nu shes yodan//bskul ba brgya spyad bsgom byed kyang //da la rnam grol ci yang med//skye ba lan
360a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad ni//de la zhen cha gos bskyed par byed//gal te skye zhing stong rig na//mthong ba rnams ni rnam dgo 'gyur//gang zhig pasam gtan bani bsgrubs kyang //
360a3(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' shes med gyur na//bskol po brgya stong lon kyang ni//bsam gtan yongs su dag mi 'gyur//gang zhig nyer 'dogs thob gyur kyang //zad mtha
360a4(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'thob mi 'gyur//zad pa thob pa ma shes bya ro//zad pa thob pa drug tu spyo//gang zhig 'du shes zhen byed pa//'du shes zad mtha'i shes pa med//'a
360a5(dkon brtsegs): shes zad pa ma shes phyir//rtag tu 'du shes za la spyod//gang zhig 'jig rteni rgan chags pa//'jig rten na mtha' shes pa dang //'jig rten zad mtha' ma
360a6(dkon brtsegs): shes phyir//rtag tu 'jig rten zag la spyod//gang zhig zag bcas sems la gnas//sems zad mtha' ye shes pa med//sems zad pa ni ma shes phyir//
360a7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sems ni zag la spyod//gang nig zig bcas chos la gnas//chos zad mtha' lo shes pa med//chos zad pa ni ma shes phyir//rtag tu zag bcos chos
360b1(dkon brtsegs): laspyod//sbyangs pa'i chos la gnas rgyud kyang //mig zad mtha' ye shes med na//mi zad pa ni mi shes phyi//yang dag sbyangs la gnas ma yin//kha dog bsgyur gos dan/
360b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang //mig zad mtha' ye shes me na//mig zang ba ni mA shes phyir//yang dag chos gos bgos ma yin//ya rangs rig su skyes gyur kyang //mig zad mtha'
360b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes med na//mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir//de ni dag pa'i rigs ma yin//'khor mang dag ni bdog gyur kyang //mig zang mtha' ye shes med na//myur du
360b4(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'gror ltung 'gyur te//'khor dag gis ni skyob mi nus//sgra yi rigs pa mkhas gyur kyang //mig zad mtha' yi shes med na//mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir//
360b5(dkon brtsegs): sgra yi rig pa rtogs ma yin//bzo rnams la ni mkhas gyur kyang //mig zang mtha' yi shes med na//mig zad pa ni ma shes phyir//de ni bzo la mkhas ma yin//dri ba mang
360b6(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas gyur zhing //yi ge gcig rnam 'byed kyang //mig zad mtha' yi shes med na//de ni don mthun bshad ma yin//mkhas pa'i rjes su slob byed kyang //gsang
360b7(dkon brtsegs): dang gsang min mi shes shing //mig zad mtho'i ye shes med na//chos ni rtogs par ma 'gyur ro//brjod pa sna tshogs rgyang pan dang //chos rnams rab tu shes gyur
361a1(dkon brtsegs): byu //nam+mA gas mdun//wA sh-ing+tha mug por myu gA // dum pa mkhas rgyu dang//dge dung mo ga d+hA ga
361a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang //tshig 'bru ya gI sgra skad dang //klog dang 'don pa'i mthar thug dang //mi gzad mtha' ni ma shes ni//de dag rnams ni shes med na//de dag rnams ni shes
361a3(dkon brtsegs): med yin//bud mod dag gi mtshan ma dang //tshig mkhan rmongs par byed pa dang /lus nyenyis dal sos chos rnamaste dang //mkhyud dpyang dag la mkhas gyur kyang //
361a4(dkon brtsegs): mig zad mtha' rnam shes na//de dag rnams ni shes med yin//gzhung lugs brgya mang ston byed cing //yi ge 'bru gtsog mo brjid kyang //migo zud mthar
361a5(dkon brtsegs): ni ma shes na//bshad pa de ni don med yin//de bzhin mig skye mtha' dag dang //mig mtha' dong ni 'jug pa nas//rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang //de bzhin
361a6(dkon brtsegs): dri ni rig par gyis//rdo tresAm+b+hi khris med//gzugs/drir rig byinas//sgra dang ming gi ba du yod//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//sgra mi
361a7(dkon brtsegs): rig pa klog 'don cing //de yi don ni rtogs gyur kyang //mig zad mtha' nom shes na//de ni nams kyang dman pa yin//sbyang bzhi dag ni 'don byed cing //
361b1(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags dag ni rtogs gyur kyang //mig zad mtha' ni ma shes na//de ni nams kyang dman pa yin//de bzhin mig gi skye mtha' dag/mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas//
361b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang //de bzhin nyid du rig par gyis//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs sgyu dri ro reg bya nas//sgra dang ming gi bar du yang //thams cad
361b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o///bam po bzhi pa//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//sems can dag ni tshad med snyed//mkha'
361b4(dkon brtsegs): las chos bstan sgro thos pas//mig zad mtha' ye shes pa thob//bcom ldan grong khyer gshigs pa'i tshe//sems can dag ni tshad med snyed//mkha' las chos
361b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan sgra thos pas//mig gi rang bzhin rtogs par gyur//stong dang bdag med rab rtogs pas//thams cad rnam dag mig thob gyur//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs
361b6(dkon brtsegs): sgra dr-i ro reg bya nas//sgra dang ming gi bar du yang //thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//'dod srung gti mug khong khro dang //nga rgyal khengs dang g.yo sgyu nas//
361b7(dkon brtsegs): bag med pa yi bar du yang //de bzhin du ni rig par gyis//bcom ldan grong khyer gaushags pa'i tshe//sems can dag ni tshad med snyed//steng gi nam kha' dag
362a1(dkon brtsegs): lus ni//sangs rgyas mtshan ni sna tshogs thos//kha cig 'dod chags 'jigs pa yi//dpe zla med pa'i mying yang thos//kha cig zhe sdang
362a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs byed cing //'jig rten phran 'dogs ming yang thos//kha cig gti mug rab rtogs shing //nga rgyal 'dul ba'i ming dag thos//kha cig 'jig rten dge
362a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni//rab zhi ston pa'i 'dren mying thos//kha cig shes rab dag bstan nas//'jig rten phran 'dogs ming dag thos//kha cig thabs dag rab bstan nas//
362a4(dkon brtsegs): sems can phan 'dogs ming dag thos//kha cig bdud ni rab btul kyang //kho na 'dzin med pa'i ming dag thos//khwa cig gsung rab chos dag gas//rnam grol
362a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i ming dag thos//kha cig sems can sdug bsngal ba//rgya cher sgrol ba'i ming dag thos//kha cig ma yi gtso bo yis//'jig rten sgrol ba'i
362a6(dkon brtsegs): ming dag thos//ming ni de dag thos gyur nas//thams cad rnam dag ming thob gyur//nam mkha' dang ni rgya mtsho'i chu//ri rab lhun po'i bar du yang //thams
362a7(dkon brtsegs): cad gzhal du rung srid kyi//sangs rgyas mkhyen pa thugs mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig zad nges pa thob gyur na//chos sku mngon par grub pa dka' mi 'gyur//
362b1(dkon brtsegs): ga nog chos su nan kun gyur na//kun+d+ha 'dzin ma shes dpag med thub pa gyu //gang sh+log kun 'dzin yo shes dngagra mo klog//des ni ma steng ngag ma go ba
362b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//gang zhig mang sdeng dpag me ga gyur pas//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa da/ mi 'gyur//gang zhig mig skye nges pa 'thob byur na//chos sgyu mngon
362b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub pa dka' mi 'gyur//gang zhig chos sku mchog ni grub gyur na//kun 'dzin ye shes dpag med 'thob par 'gyur//gang zhig kun 'dzin ye shes
362b4(dkon brtsegs): dpag med thob//dus ni mdo sde dpag med go bur 'gyur//gang zhig mdo sde dpag med go gyur pas//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob par dka' mi 'gyur//de bzhin
362b5(dkon brtsegs): na bA sna lce lus dang yid//gzugs sku d+hi ro rAg bya chos dag nas//sgra rnams dang ni mag gi bar du yang //thams cad de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya//de tshes chen dag
362b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu g.yos//rgya mtsho ri rnams kyang ni de bzhin no//lha ma yin dang lha ni mang po rnams//thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes par gyur//bdud dang bdud dpung
362b7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu rab btsam nas//thams cad sangs rgyas bkod pa sgrub par mos//lha rnams so sor gzhal med khang zhugs nas//phan tshun dga' bo'i gtam ni
363a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad smras/'dun pa dang ni 'jig rten byung bas na//l+h+wam thams cad lan ldan pa mdang //sA rba lta 'a khor gzhal med khang dang /
363a2(dkon brtsegs): nas//drang ba'i sems kyis dga'i nas 'di skad de//'dren pa 'jig rten dang byung shin tu legs//'jig rten kun bder rgyu ni rab tu mdzad//mkha' spyod pa
363a3(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams de thos nas//thams cad dgra'i nas rab tu dang bskyes//khyud 'phags sku spyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas//'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan
363a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad zer//rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lce na de thos nas//thams cad dko nas shin tu dang ba skyes//khyu 'phags skye spyan sa sa rgyas bsngags brjod nas/
363a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pan mdzad zer//sum cu rtsa gsum lha ni de thos nas//thams cad dgu' nas shin tu dang ba skyes//khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs
363a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bsngags bstod nasa'adren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan mdzod zer//'thab bral lha dag de skad thos nas ni//thams cad dga' nas shin tu dang ba skyes//
363a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsdigs brjod nas//'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten pon mdzad ni /bdag cas byang chub sems 'di rab bskyed nas//
363b1(dkon brtsegs): spyan ma da ldan pa ma ma rdug sa smra smra smra/sam can mas cad rnam padang nanas byung//dang rgyun na rnams don thugs
363b2(dkon brtsegs): bak+kul m+b+ha 'das len dad// de'i sbyi pa m+pu rje po sa de 'i skyes// sa sbyinas
364a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang //thams cad dpa' nas shin tu dang ba skyes//khyad 'phags sgra snyan sangs rgyas bsngags brjod nas//'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten
364a2(dkon brtsegs): phan mdzad zer//de bzhin gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos pas//tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' nas 'di skad du//'dren pa byung bas 'jig rten phan pa mdzad//
364a3(dkon brtsegs): bdud dpung 'jigs skrag mya ngan byed ces zer//srid pa'i mtsho'i lha yi bar du yang //sangs rgyas byung nas 'jig rten phan mdzad thos//de bzhin sgra ni kun du grags
364a4(dkon brtsegs): pas na//lha ma yin dag 'gribs shing lha rnams 'phel//bdud kyi khang pa dag ni yongs stongs shing //lha rnams 'khor ni rab tu rgyas par 'gyur//mi 'dzag
364a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis log tshogs rab btul nas//byang chub chen po'i mchog ni nyams brnyes//de bzhi ni skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis//bcom ldan byung nas phan mdzad
364a6(dkon brtsegs): thos gyur pas//'jig rten 'dren par mdzad pa shin tu legs//zhes dag ming ni sems can sbyin zhes zer//bcom ldan grang khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//
364a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas yongs su gdungs pa rnams//mi gtsang bsgom pa bshad thos pas//'dod chags zhi ste ma lus spangs//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/
364b1(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dag gis gdungs pa rnams//byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas//zhe sdang ni snyam lus sbyangs//bcom ldan grong khyod gshegs pa'i cha//gti mug dag das
364b2(dkon brtsegs): gdungs pa rnams//shes rab chos ni bstan thos pas//gti mug zhi ste ma lus spangs//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//nga rgyal dag gis gdungs pa
364b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams//nga rgyal spangs pa'i chos thos pas//nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus spangs//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//phrag dog dag gis gdungs pa rnams//
364b4(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu spangs pa'i rgyas thos pas//phrag dog zhi ma lus spangs//bcom ldan gleng khyer gshegs pa'i tshe/khong khri dag gis gdungs pa rnams/
364b5(dkon brtsegs): khong khro spangs pa'i chos thos pas//khong khro zhi ste ma lus spangs//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//srer sna dag gis gdungs pa rnams//ser
364b6(dkon brtsegs): sna spangs pa'i chos thos pasdu//ser sna zhi ste ma lus spangs//gang zhig dul ba'i spyod grub pa//dpag med chos ni 'di thos pas//mang du thos pa'i mtshar
364b7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pas//kun 'dzin sgo ni sgrub par byed//gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas//me tog dag gis sangs rgyas mchod//yon tan khyad par 'phags
365a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub cing //snying rje chen po'i rdzu 'phrul ston//gzhan yang mkha' las sgra thos pas//bcom ldan sku dang skye gnas dang //gdung
365a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyud dang ni gsung sgra rnams//khyad par 'phags pa'i bsngags po brjod//sems can 'gro ba ji lta bar//rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci rogs bshad//mig dang
365a3(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus//gzugs dang sgra dra la sogs dang //bskum pa dang ni brkyang ba dang //ston par mdzad pa khya par 'phags//bcom ldan 'jig rten 'das
365a4(dkon brtsegs): pa na//'jig rten sgron ma rab mdzad cing //gzugs ni mang po ston pa yang //thams cad sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul yin//snod dang snod min de rjes su//mi
365a5(dkon brtsegs): mthun chos ni ston mdzad pas//sems can tshe rabs tshad med nas//sangs rgyas mchod par ma byas shing //dmu rgod gdul bar dka' ba la//sems
365a6(dkon brtsegs): can dmyal ba bshed mar mdzad//gang zhig las la rmongs gyur zhing //blta la brten nas spros dga' ba//bcom ldan de drag blte ba dang //spros pa zhi
365a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra thos mdzad//gzhan yang mkha' las ngo bo nyid//nges pa nyid du stong pa dang //'gro 'ang med cing mtshan med dang //ci yang med pa'i sgra yang thos//
365b1(dkon brtsegs): glazhan yang sems can+d+ra brgya skyong dag/mkha' las shA dwang shas rab smyan//de bzhin chos kyi spyan par du//yang dag ston pa'i sgra yang thos//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi
365b2(dkon brtsegs): ni//tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra//ni rdo rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra//ston pa dag kyang thos par gyur//sems can dag ni ji snyed la//de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rab bstan
365b3(dkon brtsegs): nas//ji ltar rjes 'thun sgra skad kyis//yang dag chos ni bstan par mdzad//sems can la la gang zhig gis//sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod bsgrub mos//rdzu 'phrul
365b4(dkon brtsegs): mos pa ji lta bzhin//sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sgra ston//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//sems can dbang po ji lta bzhin//rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad
365b5(dkon brtsegs): pas//len 'jani ston la dgod par mdzad//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//phung po khams dang skye mched kyi//bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang //sa yi gan+da
365b6(dkon brtsegs): skabs bye brag gi/mtshon nyid ston pa thos par 'gyur//gzhan yang swa dang ye shes kyi//'od zer tshad med ston pa dang //nyon mongs bag chags spang ba dang /
365b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs min ston pa thos par gyur//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni//lha dang mi yi ngo bo nyid//las dang 'bras bu mi mtshungs pas//skye len tha dad thos
366a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chugs skyel ba mang // ba /na tu b+h+ya hU~M/ banadu/ na sgron man/
366a2(dkon brtsegs): mau dgul bu dang 'od srung dang /kapa ning dang kun dga' dang //'od srung chen podon //kun shis kroru dI nA la seMnas//de dag mos pa ji bsnyen du/
366a3(dkon brtsegs): nyan che me sbyin thos par 'gyur de ni snyam min//gno d+hI ni meng po po ga/ni ng+gA dang brgyas//snrel dum dag ni tsho ma
366a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams//bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stongs kyis ni//gzungs sngags sa par gyur// ts+li/bi dis/i ra su m+b+hi rI/mi na mi/
366a5(dkon brtsegs): me na si/u khI Sh+NI/a khaM tsI lA man mi/da ni shwA ni mi b+h+r-i/i mi man dz+hi/ni ha ra//a prung /dri d+he nor/a khI tsa ra/bi la ki ri ya te/
366a6(dkon brtsegs): e ba tsir zer mo te/ka la nyin/seMm pa zhin du shes dang /pa shes pa tu ma //b+h+yA maM/a ma b+har/a
366b1(dkon brtsegs): laswo r+d+han shany+dza tsa tu/ba ma ta/tsAd ta a nan tu/oM ba ra/h+yA ba ma~M tA/b+hu naMn mnak+Sha nAM/A ka naM/baib+hU mr-i tA/shwa ro b+hASh+Ta/a ma la ni ma la/
366b2(dkon brtsegs): b+h+ra 'i ti na ra shr-IH/hA ha ng+gi/ma ma lI/b+ha raNI/tish+ma/ts+li/ni /ud+hi ra ta baN+Di/an tA ri/kA ta rI/katuM/su ke/tu su ba
366b3(dkon brtsegs): nau/ka ra ni/ku su ma ni r+the/ka kaM kha rau/u pal+lIn+ti /tau shwa daR+sha nau/nA ga ni hwA draM/ba ra la te/a te bai ra sa te/an tA ra/
366b4(dkon brtsegs): d+hun tAM/an tu rI tA ba N+Dihes ri/mkha lI/i no s+thAsad+haraM/sa /ku b+hA la tsi te/gtsun yang rgyal po rnam sa /
366b5(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor bsrung ni la sogs pas//khyud 'phags sgra ni grangs med kyis//bden pa'i sngags tshig rab tu smras//tshad med sgra ni de dag kyang //byed gsheg
366b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dbang gis byung //rdzu 'phrul dag ni tshad med pas//bstan pa drag kyang tshad med de//res 'ga' sangs rgyas med zhing du/rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i stobs
366b7(dkon brtsegs): dag gis//'khor bskor sangs rgyas sku ston pa//de ltar mthong ba de bzhin no//bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu//sprul pa tshad med ston mdzad pa//bltams
367a1(dkon brtsegs): nas gom pa bdun gshegs dang //rgyal sring spangs nas rangab byung dang //byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas//brnyes pa'i chos dag
367a2(dkon brtsegs): rab dgongs te//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dang //mya ngan 'das pa ston par mdzad//rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs dag gis//sna tshogs chos ni ston mdzad
367a3(dkon brtsegs): pas//sems can dag ni tshad med rnams//khyad 'phags ye shes grub par mdzad//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs
367a4(dkon brtsegs): bskor nas//byams chos bsgom pa bshad bstan nas//byams pa'i sems ni 'phel bar mdzad//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//lha rnams kyis ni
367a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi bshad bstan pas//bsdu ba'i dngos bzhi 'phel bar mdzad//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//klu rnams kyis ni
367a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas//zhe sdang sems ni spangs par gyur//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//gnod sbyini rnams kyis
367a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//rnam 'chi'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas//rnam 'tshe'i sems ni spangs par gyur//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//lha ma yin gyis
367b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te//bzod pa bsgoms pa'i bsngags pa brjod//de cha thugs rje chen po yis//nA mkha' lding gis
367b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//'gal byas skyes dmigs bshad bstan te//'dum pa'i sems kyi bsngags pa brjod//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//dri za'i 'khrir gyis
367b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//dga' bo'i tshig ni dpag med kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bsten//de tshe thugs rje chen po yiste/lto 'phye'i 'khor gyis
367b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas/mu stegs chos la spyod mdzad cing //bcom ldan gsung rab bsngags brjod pa ste ni//de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//'dri srin 'khor gyis
367b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs bskor nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mchog/brgya chere bsngags pa bsten par mdzad//thugs rje chen pos sprul bstan pas//sems can+da dag
367b6(dkon brtsegs): nibad+ma smad snyed//mrig zad mtha' bstan thos pas na//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag r+b+he
367b7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong snyed//mig skye mtha' ni brnyan thos pas//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni
368a1(dkon brtsegs): /stong snyed//migo go mtha' ni bstan thos pas//mthur phyin don ni rtogs par 'gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstanas//sems can
368a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni brgya stong snyed//mig 'jug bstan pa thos gyur pas//mthar phyin de ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni
368a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong snyed/mig dben bstan pa thos pas na//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thub rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//
368a4(dkon brtsegs): mig la skye med bstan thos pas//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya skyong skyed//mig med bstan
368a5(dkon brtsegs): pa thos pas na/mthar phyin don ni rtogs por gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mig ni nyer zhi bstan thos pas///
368a6(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mag la bdag med bstan thos pas//mthar
368a7(dkon brtsegs): phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mig la gang zag med thos pas//mthar phyin don
368b1(dkon brtsegs): ni rtags par gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag nu brgya stong skyed//myig la sems can mod thos pas//mthur phyin don ni rtogs par
368b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mig la srogs med thos pas na//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs
368b3(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//sems can dag ni brgya stong snyed//mig la gso ba med thos pas//mthar phyin don ni rtogs par gyur//thugs rje chen pos
368b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bstan pas//sems can rnams la rgya tshar ni///'jig rten zhen pa rab smad de//zhen pa mi bskyed nyid du mdzad//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas//
368b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//'jig rten rnyed pa rab smad de//'dus ma byas kyi bsngags brjod mdzad//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas///sems can rnams
368b6(dkon brtsegs): la rgya cher ni//zag bcas shes pa rab smad de//zag med shes rab bsngags pa mdzad//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan pas/hrI/sems can rnams la rgya cher
368b7(dkon brtsegs): ni//'jig rten bsam gtan rab smad de//'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 'dzin bsngags//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//
369a1(dkon brtsegs): bag bcas tshul khrims rab sdud do//zag med bsgrub gnas bsngags par mdzad//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can
369a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la rgya cher ni//sems rgya chung ngu'i skyon brjod de//sems rgya chen po'i yon tan bsngags//thugs rje chen po'i 'phrul bstan nas//lus kyi tshul khrims
369a3(dkon brtsegs): sems shes rab//zag med brten pa mad po yi//bsngags pa dag ni brjod par mdzad/thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam
369a4(dkon brtsegs): bsngags shing //spros la dga' zhing zhen pa dag/sangs rgyas smad pa rab tu bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems chen rnams la rgya cher ni//
369a5(dkon brtsegs): mig 'chang skyon ni rab 'byed cing //rab ni mtshan nyid bstan par mdzad//rnaMbasna lce lus dang yod//gzugs spyi dri ro reg bya nas//sgra dang ming gi
369a6(dkon brtsegs): yang //thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//dang la bab cing gzhon pa la/
369a7(dkon brtsegs): nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul ba stan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//tshe rigs dag ni bsnyems pa la//nyes
369b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//longs spyod bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs
369b2(dkon brtsegs): dpag med yod par bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//rang dbang bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med
369b3(dkon brtsegs): yod par bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya tshar ni//gzugs kyi bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod
369b4(dkon brtsegs): par bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//bud med bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//
369b5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//gos kyis bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//thugs
369b6(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya rjer ni//chung gis bag med gyur ba la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//thugs rje chen
369b7(dkon brtsegs): pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//rgyal po bag med gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par bstan//thugs rje chen pos
370a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//tshul khrims bsnyems par gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
370a2(dkon brtsegs): bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can rnams la rgya cher ni//shes rab bsnyems par gyur pa la//nyes dmigs dpag med yod par
370a3(dkon brtsegs): bstan//de bzhin rtogs dang rdzu 'phrul dang //bsam gtan mkhas pa'i nga rgyal dang //nor dang ba sha dang rigs dang 'khor//rol mo glu dang lce
370a4(dkon brtsegs): cad dang //grags pa phun tshegs bsngags pa dang //bkur sti dang ni rnyed pa dang //mdzes dang g.yo sgyu nga rgyal dang //ngo tsha med dang khrel med dang //khengs
370a5(dkon brtsegs): dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang //bag meng 'dod chags de bzhin no//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can gang zhig sems dang yid//dman par
370a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag la//khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can gakang zhig rab zhum zhing //rtsol bar mi byed
370a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag la//brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad//thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//sems can gang zhig nor rnams la//chags par gyur pa de dag lo//
370b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyag gos rgyas na ston par mdzad//smra rgyum smras dog da //mu ga dag gi gnal myod 'ang //khang pa rdzog sa ma ga la nus//sprul pa sa sa
370b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs par bskrun//gzhan yang g+ha yi bu mo rnams//me tog tsam pa'i khang pa ni//gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas//me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bsgyun//
370b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang lha mon bu mo dag/me tig mal khang pa na//gnas pa lus phyed bstan sprul nas//me tog phreng thogs mchod byed bstan//gzhan yang lnga yo bu mo rnam
370b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa'i khang pa na//gnas pa lus byed bskrun sprul mo//sangs rgyas yin tan bsngags pa bstan//kunan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha//gser gyi ga
370b5(dkon brtsegs): me 'ang ban//gnas pa las kun bstan basmos na /sgra stan sangs rgyas bcugs pa bskrun//gzhan snang sgra ma bum gru/sna tshogs rgyun gyis lus brgyan dang /
370b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyun ni nA tshu nA rag pa las//sgyu gan dag ni rab byung nas//'dus byas rnams kyi chos danan+de/'gyung zhing mi brtan yin na yang //byis pa myi bden rtogs pa yis//
370b7(dkon brtsegs): yod dag /ji bzhin mi shes zer//rkyen gyi smani de dag kyang //lus dngango sems las byung ma yin//'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med//phyogs kyang yod pa ma yin te//gtsu
371a1(dkon brtsegs): dang sems kyi bar du yang //thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//byis pa rnams ni mi sems pas//'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur//
371a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyi rnam pa de dag las//sgra snyan byung ba de yis ni//sangs rgyas zhing kun grags paso na//sems can tshad med grol bar 'gyur//de lta bso na khyed rnams
371a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis//'dren pa rang byung ye shes dang //yon tan dpag med sku dag ni//sred pa'i spros las 'das pa dang //rab dben skyon med pa dang //lta thal sems ni
371a4(dkon brtsegs): rab sbyangs dang //mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang //sku dang thugs ni dag par ltos//khyed kyis bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//gom pa dag ni
371a5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge 'dra//gshegs stangs ngang pa glang chen 'dra//sems can raM ba skong bar mdzad//bsod nams khyad 'phags yongasu rdzogs//yang dag mtshan gyis
371a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu brgyan//sems can dag ni thams cad kun//blta bas mi ngoms nyid du ltos//khyed kyis rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni//thugs rje chen
371a7(dkon brtsegs): po ldan pas na//dngos po chung ngus mchod byas kyang //yon tan tshad med 'thob mdzad pas//sems can dag ni mang po rnams//bskal pa brgya stong ma
371b1(dkon brtsegs): bar no//mya ngan 'das pa thob bar du//rnam smin thugs pa med par lto ste//khyod kyi rkang gnyis gtso mchog ni//zag mod tshul khrims rdzogs pas na//sems
371b2(dkon brtsegs): can dag ni mang po rnams//gus pas spyi bos phyag byed dang //lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams//so sor gzhal med khang spangs nas//rtse ba dag la chags med
371b3(dkon brtsegs): par //'dren pa la ni ston byed ltos//khyed kyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor//bcom ldan 'das la dad bskyed nas//gser gyi rlung yab dag thogs te//ga
371b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang //bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yas//lha yi me tog yid 'ong bas//de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas//bla med ye shes tshol
371b5(dkon brtsegs): la ltos//'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni//bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pas na//de ni bcom ldan phrad gyur nas//so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin//
371b6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dag ni tshad med kyis//de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod//de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu//sred pa spangs pa zhes bya ba//thog mar bcom ldan
371b7(dkon brtsegs): bsngags brjod nas//mig zad mtha' ni shes par 'gyur//mig gi skye mtha' shes pas na//rab zhi'i mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs//gzhan yang mig la sogs
372a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//ming don tshig ni dpag med rtogs//des ni tshig mkhas dag gis ni//sems can rnams la yang dag bstan//min
372a2(dkon brtsegs): dang don rnams la yang ni//zhen pa the tshom med pas na//'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing //blang dor med pa nyid du gyur//rang bzhin dag ni stong dben
372a3(dkon brtsegs): pas//yi ge rnams ni spangs pa dang //len dang gzungs dang klog pa dang //kha don 'don cing sgrub med rtogs//'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//
372a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan//btags pa'i ming tsam yin pas na//yang dag brjod du ci yang med//rang bzhin stong pa de dag ni//phung po khams dang skye mched
372a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das//brdzun pa med cing bden pa'ang med//gnas dang gnas pa yod ma yin//tshig gis smra ba lam chad cing //sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi//skye
372a6(dkon brtsegs): po mtshan ma myed pa'i phyir//bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs par mthong //bcom ldan mtshan ma yongs spangs kyang //byis pa yang dag ma yin rtog/
372a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe//gang zhing dga' ba skye 'gyur ba//de ni mchin mar rtog pa ste//mya ngan gdungo dang bcas par gyur//gang gi
372b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i rtogs smras pa//grong khyer gshegs pa mthong myi 'gyur//gshegs shing bskyod pa'i mtshan ma la//rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab thob//gang gis mtshan
372b2(dkon brtsegs): mar sangs rgyas mthong //des ni grong khyer gshegs pa mthong //skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la//rnam par rtog pa bskyed par byed//gang gis sangs rgyas
372b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mar mthong //dga' ba dag ni skye 'gyur pa//de ni bdud kyi spyod la gnas//bdud kyi spyod yul snang ba yin//gang gis mtshan mar sangs rgyas mthong ///
372b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin//de ni mya ngan gdung bcas pas//mkhas pas snying brtser bya ba yin//chos la thob par gang lta ba//de la chos stor mya ngan yod//
372b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la//mya ngan 'das nga'i sdug bsngal yod//bskal pa mang por gang bsgoms pa//mtshan ma thams cad rtogs pas na//grong khyer
372b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs par mi rtog cing //mya ngon 'dar ba 'du shes med//sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pas//sangs rgyas spyod la gnas pas na//grong khyer gshegs
372b7(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog cing //mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med//gang gis de ltar rab shes pa//sangs rgyas rnam ni mthong 'gyur zhing //ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pas/
373a1(dkon brtsegs): sma na sgyu na rgyun du/ du pa rgyu //smra pan smra smra /jananan ngas sbyin/
373a2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis mchad du byab//gang gis skye kau d+ham du ni/ 'dus pa na sems /tshad ma rna mas ni snod rtogs na//drin mas nga
373a3(dkon brtsegs): nA sa d+ha sa 'ag hU~M na sa /ma dus che mdzad sgyu ra dang /seMn ga ma dang 'jug pa sa/
373a4(dkon brtsegs): rang tu ni de'i bar du med//de bezhin du ni dag pa /rnab mus naskadang mngag bar dri yad//
373a5(dkon brtsegs): sna de bzhin sgyu ba sh+tsa//denas dem bcom ldan 'as/gling khyer dri na gi shegs //zhebasan sa la reg tsam rnaMs//san kun tu sa//
373a6(dkon brtsegs): rin mas ga yon kyang /thams cad bcos ldan 'das la byongs//skyem danan phyir//thams cad 'das nas sus mas spya//de nas
373b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das//gling khyer du ni gshegs pa'i rgyu//lnga yi dbang po ma yi rgyu la//ldum yin ni mang po dang //gnod sbyin dag nI mang po rnams//rang gi grong khyod spangs
373b2(dkon brtsegs): nes ni//bcom ldan sbyin sngar 'dus gyur te//rab tu dgar byas mchod pa byas//de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das//grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//gzhan
373b3(dkon brtsegs): yang rnam pa dad ci//bye ma tshigs ni tshad med pa//ni co nim //kA la~M bid//b+h+ya sa rnams/btsum nA de bzhin//shegs pa ya~M//
373b4(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni mthong bas na//thams cad na mkhar dag la ni//rab tu dga'o bas rnam par rtse//thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis//skye snyan dag ni rab tu byung /
373b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de tshe bcom ldan las//grong khyer da ni gshegs pa'i tshe//bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang //rdzu 'phrul gyi na stobs dag gis//sems can tshad med pa rgya
373b6(dkon brtsegs): stong snyed//long ba dag ni mthong bar gyur//'on pa rnams ni thos par 'gyur/dbang po mtshangs gang yin pa//thams cad dbang po tshangs par gyur//sngun
373b7(dkon brtsegs): dz+wal la ni gnas pa dag/thams cad bde ba tho bar byer//de nas ngo tsho bcom ldan 'das//grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//namakha' bang snang dag mas/
374a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad smra ba blo smra bar gyur//gang gis mtshan ma rnams kyis ni//de bzhin gshegs pa rtogs byed pa//de yis bcom ldan
374a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das lnga nI//mchod pa byas shes brjod mi bya//myig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyid//rtogs par yang ni mi 'gyur ro//mtshan ma rnams ni gang sbyangs pa//yon
374a3(dkon brtsegs): tan+t+ra gzhi ni bsags pas na//mig zung mthe'i yi ngo bo nyid//rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur ro//'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i mthu'//rab tu rtogs par gyur
374a4(dkon brtsegs): bri'i phyir//sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan yang //rab tu rtogs par khong du chud//mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag la//mi 'dzin sbed pa med pa dang //
374a5(dkon brtsegs): mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la//brten cing gnas pa med pa dang //mig ni rab tu dben pa la//g.yo ba'i bsam pa med gyur pa//dus ni de bzhin gshes
374a6(dkon brtsegs): bya rnamaso//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//mig ni skye ba'i mtha' dag la//rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /mig gi mtha' ni gang yin pa//de lta yid
374a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs med dang //mig ni rnam par 'jig pa la//bstan par bya ba med byung ba/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//
374b1(dkon brtsegs): mig ni med par 'gyur ba la//mngon par zhen pa med pa dang //mig ni skye ba med pa la//yongasu sdud pa med pa dang //mig ni rab tu zhi ba la//'dzin pa dag ni mar gyur pa//
374b2(dkon brtsegs): des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//mig ni zad pa med pa'i phyir//mtshan rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang //mig gi mtha' ni shes
374b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//dbang po dag ni nges gyur dang //mig ni skye ba shes pa'i phyir//dbang po rang dbang thob gyur pa//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur
374b4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin//mig ni med par rtogs gyur nas//gzugs ni khong du chud pa dang //mig ni 'jig par rab shes nas//chos la so sor rtogs pa dang /mig ni skye mad
374b5(dkon brtsegs): shes gyur nas//lam ni bsgrub par gang byed pa//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//mig zad mtha' ni gang yin pa//yang dang ji
374b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/las kyi bye brag tha dad pa//de yang rab tu rtog par gyur//las kyi bye brag tha dad pa dang //rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir//des ni de bzhin
374b7(dkon brtsegs): bra shegs pa rnamaso//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur pa yin//mig skye mtha' ni gang yin pa//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir/sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa//de yang
375a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs par gyur//sdug bsngal bye drag tha dad pa//rab tu rtogs par byur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//
375a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//mig gi 'jigs pa gang yin pa//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa//de yang rab tu rtogs
375a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//sdug bsngal 'jigs pa gang yin pa//rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//
