375a5(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa//rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//mig gi skye med gang yin pa//
375a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa/de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//bag chags spangs pa gang yin pa//rab tu rtogs
375a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//gzhan yang mig gi mi rtog nyid//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs
375b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir//sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa//de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//sgrib pa spangs pa gang yin pa//rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshes
375b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yini//gzhan yang mig la yi ge med//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag kyang /rab tu rtog
375b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba yin//sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni//rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba
375b4(dkon brtsegs): yin//gzhan yang mig gi ngo bo nyid//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//'dod rnams spangs pa gang yin pa//de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//'dod rnams/
375b5(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa gang yin pa//rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom
375b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /yang dgra ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir//nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa//de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//nyon mongs spangs pa gang yin pa//rab tu
375b7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//mthong ba nyid du 'byung ba yin//gang zag des ni de bzhin du//mig gi mngon mtha' shes pa
376a1(dkon brtsegs): //sod kun ngas na nga/mnan rgyu sa du/ sa ng+yas nas thos pa dang/ga da pa gas pa/
376a2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ba 'gyus shes pa sa g+h+ra/rjem ye shes shes pa dang /tshul khams rnam /shes pa dang //
376a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzus ng+ge shes pa drung //rnam ngan phyogs pa dang //dgag rnam pa shes pa nga //rdum dan sems kyi shes pa hA//gnas kyi bye brag shes pa dang/
376a4(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang //sems skyon shes pa'i shas bA dang //rnam dag las kyi shis pa dang //sems kyi sdom pa shes pa ngong //nyes dmigs
376a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang //rnam dug rgyu ma shes //zung zur skye zhes pa //phung po'i rgyu rkyen shes pa dang //mig de yongs shes shes pa dang /
376a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzu rgyug rgyu ba de shi ng+ge dang //smra / du// nga //stu rna
376b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen bcu gnyis kyi//spyod dang bcas pa'i shes pa dang //spyod pa med pa'i shes pa dang //mtshan ma dang bcas mtshan ma med//'dus byas dang ni 'dus ma byas//
376b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhag dang yongs sdud dang //bdag dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa//yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang mig zad skye mtha' med//mig gi mtha'
376b3(dkon brtsegs): dang rab dben dang /6/'jug sA dang ni med pa dang //mi skye ba dang nyer zhi nyid//yang dag ji bzhin shes pas na//sems can dag ni mang po rnams//rnam par
376b4(dkon brtsegs): drag pa'i ye shes dang //mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang ///brtson 'grus ye shes thob par byed//gzhan yang gcig dang tha dad shes//sems can dag ni thaMd
376b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi//mos pa'i shes pa gang yin pa//yang dag de bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang sems can thams cad kyi//mos pa khyad par 'phags pa dang //rnam
376b6(dkon brtsegs): dag sems kyi shes pa dang //las dang rnam smin shes pa dang //dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang //sems kyi 'gyur pa shes pa dang //shes rab mos pa shes pa
376b7(dkon brtsegs): dang //shin tu rnam grol shes pa dang //spobs pa mchog gi shes pa dag/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang sems can ma rungs dang //chos la
377a1(dkon brtsegs): mos bya med b+hu ba//yang dag/ji bzhin shes pas na//masgru pa shes pa bskyod par spyod//kuzhan yang don gyi tshul dad no//yang k+sha rdza
377a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhon shes byas na//le lho med po ni shes pa dang /'du shes sgrub par byed pa yin//gzhan long rdzu 'phrul stobs dag gyis//chos rnams rab tu 'byed
377a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //thogs pa med pa'i ye shes bya//yang dag /ji bzhin shes pa do ni//gzhan yang rgya chen don dag nga //tshig gis bstan pa gang yin po//
377a4(dkon brtsegs): rjes su shes pa'i shes pa de//yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang grogs mtha' ngan gnas byeng /glus dang zas dang btung ba dag/tshod shes pa
377a5(dkon brtsegs): ni shes pa rnams//yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang bya ba med pa yi//gzugs kyi chos ni gang yin pa//nan tan bsgrub pa'i shes pa dag/
377a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing //sgro 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas/bla mr-i da ye shes gang tshul
377a7(dkon brtsegs): pa//yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stongs danan//namakha bar snang dag las ni//sprul pa'i sku ni rab bstan nas//sa
377b1(dkon brtsegs): tsun dkun du/skyong snod//yongasu smon par mdzad pas na//thams cad+hA ra t+yA da/ gyur nas//dang ba skyes par shes pa dang //de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang //mas
377b2(dkon brtsegs): shing bus pa shrI paM da'i//'dod chags spangs pa'i chos dag la//rab mos sgrib pa'i shes pa dang /'phags pa'i dge 'dun cho gas la yang //mchod par mos pa'i shes
377b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang //byang chub chen po dag la yang //rab mos bsngo ba'i shes pa dang //gzungs rnams kyi ni sgo dag la//rab mos ston pa'i shes pa dang //mos pa rnams ni gang
377b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa//so sor rab rtogs shes pa dang //'phags pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa//legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang //bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la//nges pa
377b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byed pa'i shes pa dang //dpag tu med pa'i sems dag la//legs par 'jug pa'i shes pa dang //tshigs su bcad pa tshad med rnams//yang dag ston pa'i shes pa dang /
377b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i mtshams sbyor gang yin pa//rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang //'gro ba dman pa de dag tu//ltung bar me byung shes pa dang //mi dge bshes gnyen gang yin pa//
377b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spongs byed shes pa dang //dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang yin pa//bsten par byed pa'i shes pa dang //'dri zhing lan ldon dang yin pa//rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa
378a1(dkon brtsegs): dang //gnas dang gnas min gang na pa//lags par rtogs pal shes pa dang //sadangs mon gang yon pa//logs par rtanas shes
378a2(dkon brtsegs): bAdang //rab 'bring tham gang yin pa//rnam par 'ad kyi shes pa dang //'dus byas shes pa gang yin dang //'dus ma byas kyi shes pA dad//dngos po dang ni rdzas
378a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi shes/dngas dang rdzas min shes pa dang //yongs su sdud byed shes pa dang //oM su spyad min shes pa dang //mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang //mngon par
378a4(dkon brtsegs): bsgyu ma ni shes pa dang //yang dag bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang //yang dag bsgrub min shes pa dang //mig dang mig min shes pa dang //mig dang lhan cig shes pa dang /
378a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi bye brag shes pa dang /mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang/yang dag ji bzhin shes pa dang //rna bsdu lca lus nas ni//sgra dang mau la sogs
378a6(dkon brtsegs): dUr//chos ni rnam pa nyi za wa//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//gang zhig mig gi rgyu rkyen nyid//yang dge sbyong zhing den pa dang //mthar ni bag yod ma
378a7(dkon brtsegs): yin pas//sems par byed pa nis sbyin pa//gang zag des ni de bzhin du//yang dag ngas pa oM na ni//sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa//yongs su rdzogs pa
378b1(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur//glang zhig mig rten 'brel dang //myig mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang //nges pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur//sems par byed pa gang yin pa//gang zag das na
378b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du//mig gi rgyu rkyen gang yin pa//mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur//rna ba sne lce lus nas ni//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//
378b3(dkon brtsegs): chos na rnam pa nyi shu lnga//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das//grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//zhabs ni sa la reg tsam gyis//dngos po ngo mtshar rab bstan pa//
378b4(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dir bdag gis mdor bsdus nas//yon phyogs ni cung zad cag/sems can dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir//yang dag par ni bstan par bya//de tshe lha mi 'dren pa yis//spu yi khung bu gcig nas
378b5(dkon brtsegs): ni//'od zer brgya stong tshad mdo snyed//rab tu bkye bar gyur pas na//'od zer dag ni re res kyang //zhing ni tshod med gsal mdzad nas//sems can mang po kun gyi phyir//sangs rgyas mdzad pa
378b6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mdzad//gang zhig 'das pa'i dus su ni//sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang //yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dang //mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa//de lta bu yi gang zag dag/
378b7(dkon brtsegs): des ni ji skad bstan pa yi//rdzu 'phrul dngos po thos gyur na//rab tu dga' bar mos par 'gyur//gong zhig sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul rnams//nyon thos dang ni rang rgyal gyi//spyod yul min par
379a1(dkon brtsegs): rab shes na m+b+ha//de wA gu kyA g+h+nA ni//des ni rgyud bstan y-i//b+hU b+h+yas+yA ng+tha/ni sa gyur na//myos pa dag ni sgyu 'gyur no//de mtshar 'dzin pa nu
379a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang rnyed//lcu da mi ni/dzin sa/som gyis mi mthu na nos// lta bu ma tshog sa pa ma//rdzu 'phrul tshogs rab so//sems can danan 'a
379a3(dkon brtsegs): da maud kyi sa myed pa rnams//de bzhin rdzoshogs pa rnam //tsun nu ma r+g+ha ste//lcu ni na //
379a4(dkon brtsegs): drinag//da ste dgu ni brgya nga//da mid kyi mi med ra sha ngas//sems can dag ni mang po nas/bstan pa de ni thos skye nA//rlung dngas
379a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rab tu dbye' bar gyus na c+doMs ldan d+hA//blong khye dun gshegs pa'i tshe//rdzu 'phru gyi ni mthu dag gis//nam pa' las na 'di snyed du//ma
379a6(dkon brtsegs): 'a ni shA pa gyur//man mi ny+dzApa ni ga //myig na /'grob me cing 'di meng nga //mithar ni snang shes par sa//
379a7(dkon brtsegs): ma gyu/ kyi sa sa ni// sa ma tshong//tsha ni ma shes //nga de bzhin sgyu / chen tsam ldan
379b1(dkon brtsegs): dudun du rgyu// da s+ho//sgyu smra rgyu / dun rgyud ma/ rgyun pa rgyu nan//
379b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyum+b+ha n+d+he//nga 'di m+b+hi Ta m+b+ha r+d+han//sl-i p+na b+h+ya ba //ba chags sa //shAd+hA dis nas shes byeng //du ltar dz+nyAn
379b3(dkon brtsegs): /oM y-i ste ga gang yin pa//mtshan ni 'ad chag sa gzhom pa dang //ni ma nga tshus kyi rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta ba yi mya tsha ni//thos par gyur pa d+ma dag ni//'dod pa'i 'drid na
379b4(dkon brtsegs): glang yin swA/tha~Md rti bar 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//mi ya~M seng gi gang yon pa//mtshan ni zhi sdang gzhom pa dang //na mdza chos kyis rgyal zhes bya//gang gi
379b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan//zlos par da ga// nga na shing ma ga/ byu d+d+ha byed//du ska ga gas pa 'i//ma yis dge nga //mtshan tu na
379b6(dkon brtsegs): da // mdzu sa kyi rgyas nas bya//gan pa du su mchen//bas pa dgyur ba dag no//ti drug /ni zhing yin pa//thed phreng bar 'byur nas zer/ myu sbyin sa /
380a1(dkon brtsegs): yi seng ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni nga rgyal gzhom pa dang //zhe mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//nga rgyal dag ni gang yin//
380a2(dkon brtsegs): pa//thang spong bar 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//me yi seng ge gang yin pa//mtshon ni khong khro gzhom pa dang //zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta
380a3(dkon brtsegs): yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni/khong khro dag ni gang yin pa//thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//mi yi seng ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni phrag do//

380a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//mi ye seng+ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni mo bden gzhom pa dang //zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//mi bden dag ni gang yin pa//

380b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa d+ma dag na//spros pa dag ni gang yin pa//thad spyong bar 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//mi ya~M sing+ge gang yin pa//mtshan

380b6(dkon brtsegs): phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//pha rol phyin drug gang yin pa//yong su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig

381a1(dkon brtsegs): kun//rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa lnga//mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yin//'od zer kun 'dzin

381a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yi//mi li seng ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni kha dog dag pa yin//'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//khyad par

381a5(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs sku dag/yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig
381a6(dkon brtsegs): rten bzhugs pa yi//mA yi seng gra gang yin pa//mtshan ni gdung nyid dag pa yi//'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//glang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag
381a7(dkon brtsegs): ni//khyad par 'phags pa'i rus rigs rnams//yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugaso pa yi//mi yi seng ge gang yin pa//mtshan ni rgya cher
381b1(dkon brtsegs): grags pa yi//'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//thos par gyur pa de dag ni//rgya cher grags pa'i grags pa rnams//yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/

381b6(dkon brtsegs): zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//mi yi seng ge gang yin po//mtshan ni bdag med rdzogs pa yi//chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yan//gang gis
381b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu yi mtshan//'dzin par byed pa de dag ni//skye 'gag med don gang yin pa//yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer//da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//mi yi seng+ge gang yin pa//
382a1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ni spyan nyid dag pa yi//kun 'dzin chos kyi rje zhes bya//gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//'dzin par byed pa de dag ni//mig zad mtha' don gang yin pa//
382a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes zer//rna bA sna lce lus nas ni//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang //me tog phreng ba spos dag dang //mar me gdugs
382a3(dkon brtsegs): dang gos rnams kyang //thams cad de bzhini sbyar bar bya////bam po lnga pa ste tha ma'o//de yi tshe na bcom ldan 'das//grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'i tshe//bsam gyis/
382a4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa dag gi/rdzu 'phrul gyi ni stobs rnams kyis//na mkha' bar snang dag las ni//sgra brnyan dam pa rab byung ste//gzungs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs dag/yang dag par ni
382a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pas na//'khor ni 'dus pa chen po rnams//'di lta bu yi tshig thos te//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis//mig ni zad mtha' gang yin dang //skye mtha' dang ni mtha'/
382a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang //rab dben dang ni 'jug pa nas//nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi//chos rnams gang yin de dag gis//mthar phyin gnas ni gang yin pa//thams cad rab tu rtogs
382a7(dkon brtsegs): par byed//sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis//thar ni gang dag sdud pa dang //tshul khrims stobs ni gang dag gis//mthar ni gang dag 'grub pa dang //bzod pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis//
382b1(dkon brtsegs): mthar ni gang dag bkod pa dang //brtson 'grus stobs ni gang dag gis/mthar ni gang dge slong ba dang //bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis//mthar ni gang dag 'jog pa dang //shes rab
382b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs ni gang dag gis//mthar ni gang dag ston pa dang //yi ge rnam dag brjod pa dang //sgra skad rnams ni spangs pas na//gzugs dang sems gyi bar du yang //mthar ni rnam dag nyid du
382b3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs//zag dang bcas dang zag med dang //don rnams dang ni phan pa dag/thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang //mthar ni rnam dag nyid du rtogs//srid pa dag ni thams cad la//rten cing gnas/
382b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed dang //gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni//rab tu dben par gnas par byed//'gro ba med cing 'od med dang //dge ba ma yin mi dge min//lung du mi ston pa yang min//bdag
382b5(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i//de lta bu yi mtshan ma rnams//thams cad yongasu dag pas na//dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang //gnas par yang ni mi byed do//nyan thos dang ni
382b6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo dang //sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos la yang //gnas par yang ni mi byed do//mig ni zad pa'i mtha' dag dang //skye mtha' dang ni mtha' rnams nas//nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi//
382b7(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dag ni gang yin pa//thams cad yongasu zhi bar byed//skye ba dang ni mi skye dang //sdug bsngal ba dang bde ba dang //bstod pa dang ni smod pa dag/thams cad yongasu spong zhes zer//
383a1(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin snang ba gang yin dang //stong pa'i gzugs ni gang yin pa/thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa//'di nyid sangs rgyas spyod yul la//rab tu gnas par
383a2(dkon brtsegs): byed pa yin//'di nyid sangs rgyas rol pa yi//gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin//'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la//rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin//'di nyid sangs rgyas mkhyen
383a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la//rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin//mig zad mtha' yi stobs dag la//de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang //mi skye mtha' yi stobs dag la//de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang //migi mtha
383a4(dkon brtsegs): yi stobs ngag la//de bzhin du ni gnas pa nas//nye bar zhi ba'i stobs kyi bar//de la rab tu gnas pa dang //rna ba sna lce lus nas ni//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//chos ni rnam
383a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyi shu lnga//thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis//de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs//khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa//yongasu rdzogs /
383a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed ces zer//gzugs ni gang yin 'di dag gis//gzi byin mthu stobs de lta bu//yang su rdzogs par byas nas ni//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//gnas kun la ni
383a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//spyod yul kun la gnas 'gyur bas//'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun//lha ma yin gyi tshogs dag la//bstan par 'dzin
383b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems spangs nas//tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed//gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med dang //grul bum dag ni tshad med rnams//de dag thams cad kun kyang ni//rab tu dga' ba
383b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par byed//dri za'i 'khor ni gang yin dang //srin bu'i 'khor ni gang yin dang //tshad med grangs med de dag kyang //rab tu dul la dga' bar byed//gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams
383b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis//sgra snyan ngag ni dam pa yi//tshig dang don ni brjod byed kyang //yang dag bstan par mi nus te//sems las phyung ba'i chos rnams kyis//dpag par bya ba ma yin dang //
383b4(dkon brtsegs): snyems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyis//gzung bar bya ba min zhes zer//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni//mig gis dmigs par bya ba min//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni//
383b5(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi bar gyis dmigs bya min//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag ni//mig gis dmigs par bya ba min//mig gi spyod yul bar gyis kyang //dmigs par bya ba ma yin te//rna ba
383b6(dkon brtsegs): sna lce lus nas ni//sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i bar//chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga//thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer//gzhan yang mig gi zad mtha' dang //mig rnams kyi ni skye
383b7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang //mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas//nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag la//bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang //sems can dang ni srog med dang //de bzhin gang zag med pa dang //mtshan/
384a1(dkon brtsegs): /ma med cing byed med dang //'grob med ning 'od mod dang //'do lta bu la sogs pa'o mtshan//thams cad d+hogs par 'gyu ba nas nong //gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyi/
384a2(dkon brtsegs): mig ni rtogs par 'gyung zhes zer//gzhan+d+ha yang 'di skad chos rnams las//grub pa'i myig ni gang yin dang //ye shes mig dang shes rab mig/tshangs pa'i mig dang lha yi mi/
384a3(dkon brtsegs): rdungs par skye gnas slob mig dang //l+yA yI hU~M gnas thab mig dang //tshangs pa'i rnam smin mig dag dang //mA mo rnam smin mig dag dang //tshangs pa'i rgyu las skye mig dang /
384a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyi rgyu las smyos pa'i mig/ 'phrul mog drug dang //lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig//dben par skyes pa'i mig dag dang //khyed daphags skyes pa'i chog dgu dang /gnin
384a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig na gang yin pa//oM su srangs de'i mig dag dang //klu dang gnod sbyin mig dag dang //grul bu mo rkyen ming+ga dag dang //ya sme gdung bcu sna mig dag dang //yongs su
384a6(dkon brtsegs): gzung min mig dag dang //rnam par dag pa'i mig dag dang //rnam par drug mi mig dag dang //mi tshul ste nang chung mig dadung sa nyan thos pagi pa'i mi dag dang //byas ma gtan
384a7(dkon brtsegs): yi mig dag dang //nga 'dzin gyi mig dag dang //spyod yul las byung mig dgu dang //'dzunas las byung mig dashi dang //'dod tshogs las byung mog dag dang //'ad chags la/
384b1(dkon brtsegs): dz+haiMd+hi m-i dag dang //rgyu las rgyud bu zlog dag dang //rgyu don las byung zlog dag dang //mdzungam par ldan pa'i mig dag dang //mtshungs pad+ma ldan mon mag dag dang //rten las
384b2(dkon brtsegs): mig dgu dang //sgyu las b+h+yo min mig dge dang/sbyin las byu mig dag dang //rgyu sgo lhas rmyi sa mig dag da //las grub min mig dag dang //ye shes rnam par dag
384b3(dkon brtsegs): dang //yod pa min pa'i mig dgu dang //dmigs maung mgri ni gang yin pa//thams cid rtogs por byed ces zer //rtsub sna lce lus nas ni//sgra dang mi la sogs pa'i bar/
384b4(dkon brtsegs): nirnam pa nyi shu lnga//khams cad bzhin skye nasmra me//de ma tshon bcom ldan 'das//namakha' bar snod dag las nA~M//gau na yang dadrug tu med pe ste//sgra spyan dam pas
384b5(dkon brtsegs): d+hU nas//byung bye 'gags pa gardzas kyi nos//'di ska ni bka' stsal te//'di yang de basbyin gi glegs pa y-i//rdzu 'phru dgu gis sprul pa yin//'di ste ste/stsal
384b6(dkon brtsegs): l-Im le/saud ti/A na saM nai kyA lu ni/smr-i ku lpA mA krA na te/Al+yAnA~M/oM sA l+ye/si si li t+te/su si le/si las m+bi/khyi /a b+hU la/s+yA rba tsan/d+h+r-i na mr-i nI ka na~M
384b7(dkon brtsegs): li/su ka la dz+wa ya/shin rnaM a rnam mo 'o// la mo//su b+ha marmoT+Te/a shai ri li/sar ma pa ra//phun te/par ba he/d+hAr Ni/b+hiT tsa ha/su d+hi/a tsan/skye bo ga ga nang /
385a1(dkon brtsegs): kung bA no/b+hA sa b+hA sa nang /pa na rib+hU/ri ya/ni ba ri ki no ni/ma nang b+hA/sU ru tsi ti/pa na a ra/a d+h+ye ya baiR+Ya/pa ti sh+ma ha/d+hArA ni/a sri tA/lau nau b+hi//gzungs
385a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yin 'di dag ni//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes//mthu chen dag ni phun sum tshogs//shes rab dag ni tshad med kyang //'dzin pa dag ni yongasu spong //bran pa dag
385a3(dkon brtsegs): ni dag par byed//gzugs med 'gro dang 'ong ba med//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa min//mtshan ma med cing brjod dang bral//spros pa ngag las yang dag 'das//byang chub
385a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sgrub byed na//mthar ni bsil ba thob par 'gyur//tshig su bcad pa bye ba phrag/brgya stong mang po dag gis ni//tshig gcig tsam ni rab bstan kyang //mtha' ni dmigra
385a5(dkon brtsegs): par yod mi nus//'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags//rnam par dag cing zhen pa med//'khor 'dus mang po thams cad kyis//shin tu gus pa bskyed par gyis//gzungs
385a6(dkon brtsegs): ni gang yin 'di dag gi/dge ba'i chos kyi mthu stobs kyis//nyon mongs rab bcom nyer zhi nas//khyad 'phags pan yon thob par byed//yon tAn dang ni shes rab dag/shin tu rgya
385a7(dkon brtsegs): tshe rgya mtsho 'dra//bzod pa dag ni sgrub par byed//sems ni rab bde g.yo med 'gyur//byang chub sems dpas rtag tu bsgoms//mkhas pa dag gis rab tu bsngags//dbul
385b1(dkon brtsegs): phongs dag ni spong byed cing //nor dang rin chen 'thob par byed//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis//yon tan rnams ni 'phel bar byed//rtag tu stong nyid la sogs pa'i//bden tshig/
385b2(dkon brtsegs): drag gis rab tu brgyan//yi ge dag ni spangs pas na//stong pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya//sems dang rnam shes spangs pa ni//chos kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya//gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis///
385b3(dkon brtsegs): dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed//yang dag ye shes la gnas nas//phan pa sna tshogs ston par byed//sems can dag ni mang po rnams//dga' zhing dang ba bskyed par byed//gnod sbyin
385b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ni tshad med dang //grul bum 'khor ni gang yin pa//'di la sogs pa'i yid btags rgyal//dga' ba chen po bskyed ces zer//gzungs sngags gang yon 'di dag ni//rab tu zhi
385b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing spros pa med//sems can dag la byams pas na//kun la bde ba sbyin par byed//bskal pa mang po brgya stong du//'gro ba rnamasu rtag gnas shing //phan pa tshad med rab byed kyang //
385b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag cing gos pa med//tshig su bcad pa brgya stong gis//bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab bstan nas//sems can ngag ni tshad med rnams//dga' ba chen po bskyed par byed//sngon gyis
385b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshad med rnams//shin tu rnam dag mos pa yis//gzungs 'di la ni bsten nas su//rtag tu chos nyid dngongs par mdzad//tshangs dang brgya byin lha rnams dang //klu ya/
386a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po lta ma yin//gzungs 'di thos par gyur nas kyang //sems kyi dga' ba skyed ces zor//gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams//gang du gnas pa
386a2(dkon brtsegs): yul der ni//rtag tu gnod dang 'khrug pa dang //nad dang sdug bsngal mya ngan med//sems can dag ni thams cad kun//so so dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas//gzungs 'di rtag tu
386a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gi/sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs//gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni//lus dang sems dang rkan dag dang //kha mchu dag la gnas gyur na//yon tan/
386a4(dkon brtsegs): dpag med bskyed par byed//gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na//yon tan tshad med thob gyur nas//sems can mngal phan 'dogs shing /thams cad dga' ba thob ces zer//gzungs
386a5(dkon brtsegs): sngags gang yon 'di dag gis//sdig pa rnams ni rab spong zhing //dam chos dag ni ston byed pas//thug pa med pa'i spobs pa thob//sems can dag ni brgya stong rnams/
386a6(dkon brtsegs): tshom dag ni rab bsal nas//nga rgyal rnams ni rab bcom ste//yon tan dpag med thob ces zer//shin tu zab cing gsang ba'i chos//gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni//
386a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas rtag tu sems byed cing //nan tan gyis ni sgrub par byed//shes rab go cha gang bgos nas//nyon mongs rab tu 'joms par byed//yon tan sems ni 'phel
386b1(dkon brtsegs): byu ba//rab tums shing skyo ba med//gzungs sngags gang yin de dag ni//grags pa chen po phran chags pas//zang pa dang na mi zad par/sgyu dang mi sgyu mtha' rab rtogs//'drar
386b2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab sna tshogs kyis//bdag nyid rab tu brgyan pas na//de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong rnams//shin tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad//do 'dra'i gzungs ni gang yin pa/
386b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis rkang gnyis byed//ting 'dzin mchog la rab gnas nas//byang chub lam la gzhol bar byed//zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing //ngag med shes rab rtogs par byed//rab dang /
386b4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po stobs kyis ni//lag gnyis yongasu grub par byed//brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa yis//dum gnyis mi grub par byed//shes rab par mi phyin pas ni//sI gots+tshag mtshan
386b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu byed//mdo sde dag gis skud byas nas//so so rig bzhi phrang pa brgyus//sngon ni mngon par bsgrub pa yi//yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs dang //dpen tshad ming ji snyed pa/
386b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu brgyan zhes zer//gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag ni//yon tan tshadadi med dran tshogs sa//mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang //zang dang ma 'ad mtha' dag dang //skye ba dang
386b7(dkon brtsegs): na mi skye dang //mtha' dang tha min gang yin dang //dben pa dang ni med ben dang //'jug pa dang ni 'jug min dang //ci yang med dang mi 'byung dang //nye ni dang ni bag med dang //gang zag mau dang /
387a1(dkon brtsegs): srog med dang //sems can med pa'i bar dag dang //'di la sogs pa'i tshad med sgo//thams cad rab tu rtogs par gyur//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//yul drug
387a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni 'byung chen bzhi//'jig rten skye ba'i ming bar du//thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer//gong du bsngags pa brjod pa yi//gzungs mchog dam pa gang yin pa//rab dben yon/
387a3(dkon brtsegs): tAn mchog ldan zhing //sangs rgyas spyod yul yin pas na//gzungs don yon tan gang yin pa//yi ges brjod bye ma yin yang //'jig rten pa yi rjesu ni//btags pa'i ming
387a4(dkon brtsegs): gis brjod pa yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon pa dang /gdan bshams pa la rab tu bzhugaso//de'i tshe zla 'od
387a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs par rig nas/bdag nyid mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pa thogs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dang /'khor
387a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus pa chen po rnams la rab tu phul te/mchod pa de yang bsam gtan dang /ting 'dzin dang /bsam gtan gyi yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /bsam
387a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu las mngon par grub pa sha stag go/de ltar mchod pa phul yang //bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir ma yin gyi/sems can tshad med pa thams cad bla na med pa'i
387b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la gnal zhing ldan pa chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod cing 'phrul bas na/mchod ba des kun tu khyab cing thams cad rab tu tshim par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das
387b2(dkon brtsegs): gdugs tshod gsol ba'i 'og tu 'khor 'dus po mang po'i mdun du zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la'adi skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang lal zhig theg pa chen po
387b3(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas/sbyin pa'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu dang ldan par 'gyur//rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can
387b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu smin par byed cing tshig snyan pas yong su sdud par byed pa dang /mtshan gya nom pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang /dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa dang /'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan
387b5(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa mngon du byed pa dang /nyon mongs pa rnams zad nas dbang phyug mchog thob pa dang /yon tan phun sum tshogs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang /'khor
387b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dag pa dang /gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang /shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang /spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa mchog mngon par sgrub pa dang /spyad pa bla na med cing
387b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa med pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang /bag chags yang dag par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang /lus dang ring
388a1(dkon brtsegs): bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba dang /ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul bas mi'i rgyal
388a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang /lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding gi rgyal po dang /tshangs pa'i rgyal po rnams yongasu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /mthu chen po dang ldan
388a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang /mdo'i sde dang /tshig su bcad pa dang /lung du bstan pa dang /ched du brjod pa dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /rtogs pa brjod pa dang /gleng gizhwa dang /da ltar byung ba dang //
388a4(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i rabs dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /rmad du byung ba dang /gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde'i bar len pa dang /'dzin pa dang /yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba dang //
388a5(dkon brtsegs): sems la le lo med pa dang /chos la ser sna med pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi lam la yang dag par gnas pa dang /'jig rten gyi mchog tu 'gyur zhing ming dang gzugs yongasu
388a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi sku mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang /mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /mu stegs can rnams
388a7(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis gnon pa dang /skyes bu dam pa'i chos phun sum tshogs pa dang /sdig pa can gyi spyod pa spong bar 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rgyu las mngon par yid
388b1(dkon brtsegs): chos pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud par byed pa dang /bdud mang po pham par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos bden pa dag la the tshom dang nom nur mod pa dang //
388b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ngan pa rnams rab tu bcom pa dang /gzi byin chen po dang ldan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu 'phrul khyad par du 'phags pa
388b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /skye shi skyong bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can yongasu smin par byed pa dang /spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsdigs pa brjod pa dang /yon tan rnams
388b4(dkon brtsegs): yongasu spyad par 'gyur ba dang /sems can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang /chos kyi dga' ba la yongasu spyod par 'gyur ba dang /sbyin pa gtong ba mngon par sgrub par 'gyur bar
388b5(dkon brtsegs): ye shes chen po'i sgor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /dro bar gyur pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /rigs nges pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi bzod pa sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
388b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi lam la bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o//gzhon nu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum gang la la zhig sbyin po'i tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed na/yon tan khyed
388b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag phun sum tshogs shing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/byang chu
389a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' blo chen gang //sbyin pa'i tshogs dang ldan pa la//phan yon mchog ni brgyad cu yod//ngas mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin//gzhan yang dpag med
389a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam dka' yi//yon tan dgra ni gang yin pa//thams cad sbyin pa las skye ste//deng 'dir cung zad bstan par bya//khyod kyis 'khor 'dus mang po la//mnyam pa'i sems//
389a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gang mchod pa//sbyin pa'i tshogs ni de dag la//mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya//sbyin pa 'di yis bsags pa yi//bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab//
389a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang dpe byad lus brgyan pa//thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur//skye gnas dang ni rus rigs dang //yul rnams dang ni khyim dag dang //brags pa yi ni gzug
389a5(dkon brtsegs): dang sems//thams cad yongasu dag par 'gyur//lha rnams rdzu 'phrul dngos po dang //gzhal med khang dang lha mo dang //rnam dag thogs med spobs pa yang //sbyin pa
389a6(dkon brtsegs): las ni byung ba yin//sbyin pa'i tshogs mchog gang yin pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du//'di ni dang por byang chub rnams//gnas pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags po mdzad///
389a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can//sbyin pa the tshom mang ba dag/nges pa'i sems la rab gnas nas//sbyin pa nan tan bsgrub par gyis//sbyin pa'i sems ni gang
389b1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis//bsod nams mchog ni rdzogs byed pa//byang chub sems dpa' sgrub byed na//sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur//sbyin pa'i mthu yi sbrebs kyis ni//rdzu 'phrul
389b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni rdzogs byed pas//zhing ni byi ba bskul byas nas//sems can rnams lo gnad mi 'gyuraro//sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na//rnam dag tshul khrims mang thos dang //yang dag
389b3(dkon brtsegs): yid ches brtson 'grus dang //ting 'dzin zag med shes rab 'dren//sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis na//dbang po stobs dang yang dag dang //yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang //bag/
389b4(dkon brtsegs): chags spong ba 'dren par byed//sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis ni//rnam dge sgra snyan dag gis ni//zhing ni bye ba brgya phrag tu//dpag med chos ston 'dren par byed//yongasu dang bas/
389b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin btang bas//rdzu 'phrul rnams ni myur du 'thob//rdzu 'phrul yongasu rdzogs bya'i phyir//nan tan sbyin pa btang bar gyis//lha ni mang po tshad med rnams//lha ma yin dang klu/

389b7(dkon brtsegs): sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams//sbyin la brtson pa mthong gyur na//thams cad langs nas bsu nas ni//stan gding mchod pa dag kyang byed//sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa//gzi
390a1(dkon brtsegs): byin chen po phun tshogs shing //rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas//lha rgyal rnams na bsdud par byed//grul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams//thams
390a2(dkon brtsegs): cad skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur//dri za'i 'khor bcas rnams kyis kyang //rol mo dag gis mchod par byed//chom rkun dag ni byams sems bskyed//ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro//
390a3(dkon brtsegs): nor rnams nyams par mi 'gyur te//bang mdzad dag ni gang bar 'gyur//sbyin pa yongasu btang ba'i phyir//tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas ye shes thug
390a4(dkon brtsegs): bar du//mu stegs chos ni spyod mi byed//de la na ba yod med de//gzungs rnams yongasu bsrung bar byed//khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnams kyang //sbyin pa las ni byung ba yin//
390a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sbyin pa gang gtong ba//byang chub lam na sgrub par byed//mi dga'i bshes gnyen phrad mi 'gyur//spyod mthun grogs po thob par 'gyur//gzhan yeng byang chub sems
390a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams//sbyin pa'i tshogs ni sogs byed pas//bsam gyis mi khyab gzungs dag dang //shes rab yongasu rdzogs byed pas//tshig su bcad pa tshad med kyis//kun
390a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin yang dag ston par byed//thams cad la ni thogs med pas//ngo bo nyid don stor mi 'gyur//byang chub sems ni rgya tsha la//mos pa'i sems ni brtan par 'gyur//tshul
390b1(dkon brtsegs): khrims dag pa phun tshogs shing //bdud kyi las rnams spong par byed//'dod pa lnga la zhan med cing //rtsagacig yang dag dran pa tshal//sems la rtag tu rmongs med pas//'dod pa/
390b2(dkon brtsegs): dkyi la sred mi bskyed//zhe sdung nyon mongs gang yin pa//yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs//spyod yul drug ni thams cad la//zhen pa med cing chungs pa med//gang zag dus ni
390b3(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnams//lags pa nyid du rtags par 'gyur//rgyu dang rgyan ni 'dus pa las//nyes dmig sa rnams ni skye ba nas//sangs rgyas chos kyi bar dag gis//rgyu dang d+hA yi rgyu nyid dang //
390b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyu mi bya ba rnams//thams cadu rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//des ni mi ga zang mtha' yi rgyu//gang yin la tu rtogs pas na//rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas//
390b5(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par nyon mi 'gyur//ngas ni migi skye mtha' dang //mtha' dang rab tu dben pa dang //'jug pa dang ni mad po dang //me skye ba nas nyu na'i bar//'di la sogs pa'i
390b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang //rab tu rtogs par 'gyur bas na//rmongs pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas//mig la mngon par zhen mi 'gyur//dus nI mig gi sngon mtha' yi//brjod pa'i 'jig tu
390b7(dkon brtsegs): rjesu ni//btags pa yin pas de la ni//yang dag ci yang med par rtogs//des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi//brjod pa'i 'jig rten rjesu ni//brtags pa yin pa de la ni//
391a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ci yang med par rtogs//des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi//brjod pa'i 'jig rten rdza su nI//brtags pa yin pa de la ni//yang dag ci yang med par rtogs
391a2(dkon brtsegs): des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang //mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang //ci yang med dang skye med nas//nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang //'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams//'jig/
391a3(dkon brtsegs): rten rje su btags pas na//de la yang dag med par ni//rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin//des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi//brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las//byung ba nyid du//
391a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas na//de la zhen pa ci yang med//des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi//brjod pa rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las//byung ba nyid du rtogs pas no//de la zhen pa ci yang med//des ni
391a5(dkon brtsegs): mig gi skye mtha' dang //mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang //ci yang med dang skye med dang //nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang //'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams//rgyu dang rkyen ni 'dus/
391a6(dkon brtsegs): pa las//byung ba nyid du rtogs pas nA//de la zhan pa ci yang med//des ni mig gi sngon mtha' yi//brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par//rab tu rtogs par gyur pas ni//
391a7(dkon brtsegs): de la zhan pa ci yang med//des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi//brjod pa rang bzhin bstan med par//rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na//de la zhan pa ci yang med//des ni mig gi skye
391b1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' dang //mtha' dang rab dpon 'jug pa dang //ci yang med dang sgyu med nas//nya bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang //'di la sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams//rang bzhin gyis ni bstan med par//rab
391b2(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs par gyur pas na//de la zhen pa ci yang med//rna ba ste lci lus dang yid//yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi//'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/
391b3(dkon brtsegs): des ni 'dod chags sangs rgyas lam//rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni//rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na//'dod chags la ni zhon pa med//sangs rgyas lam ni thams cad kun///
391b4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs las ni btsal bar bya//rang bzhin dbyer mdo rab shes na//kun 'dzin sgor ni zhugs pa yin//'dod chags kun 'dzin yin pa dang //kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston
391b5(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin dbyur med rab shes na//kun 'dzin sgra ni slob pa yin//de bzhin 'dod chags gang mchod pa//da ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin//sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir//kun
391b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgra ni rdzogs par 'gyur//des ni zhe sdang sangs rgyas lam//rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni//rab tu rtogs par gyur pas ni//zhe sdang la ni zhon pa med//zhe sdang kun 'dzin
391b7(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang //kun 'dzin zhe sdang kun ston cing //rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na//kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin//de bzhin zhe sdang gang mchod pa//de ni sangs rgyas mchod pa yin//
392a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas la ni mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//des ni gti mug sangs rgyas lam//rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni//rab tu rtogs par
392a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas ni//gti mug lA ni zhen pa med//gal te gti mug nyid kyi mtha'//yang dag ji bzhin rtogs gyur na//de ni sangs rgyas lam bsgrubs pas//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs
392a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//gti mug kun 'dzin min pa dang //kun 'dzin gti mug yin ston zhing //rang bzhin dbyer med rab shes na//kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//

392a5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin//dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni

392a7(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gang mchod pa//brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa yin//brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//ngasngags
392b1(dkon brtsegs): bya brjod cing mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgro ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//sangs rgyas chos la mnod pa yin//sangs rgyas chos la mchod pa'i phyir//kun

392b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//zag pa med la mchod pa yin//zag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchad pa
392b6(dkon brtsegs): ci yang med la mchod pa yin/ci yang meng la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//dpag tu meng la mdzad pa yin//dpag tu med
392b7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//srid pa gsum la mchod pa yin//srid pa gsum la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin smon
393a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//rab dben la ni mchod pa yan//rab dpon la ni mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgro ni rdzogs par 'gyur//
393a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//'khor bar 'jug pa mchod pa yin//'khor bar 'jug pa mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa///
393a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa med la mchod pa yin//'jug pa med la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgron rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//yod pa min la mchod pa yin//

393a7(dkon brtsegs): ba med la mchod pa yin//'gro ba med la mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//'dus byas la ni mchod pa yin//'dus byas//

394a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa//zad pa'i yo shos mchod pa yin//zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa'i phyir//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur//de bzhin//
394a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dgu spong ba dang //dran pa nyer gzhag rdzu 'phrul dang //dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang //byang chub yan lag bdun po dong //yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dag dang //zhi gnas
394a3(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong la sogs pa//chos ni rnam pa dgu po rnams//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi

394b1(dkon brtsegs): mo shes pa dang /dus mi shes pa dang /tshod mi shes pa dang /lam mo shes pa dang //tshad mi shes pa dang /bdag dang gzhan mi shes pa dang /sangs rgyas dang chos dang /dge 'dun

394b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mi shis pa dang /bslab pa'i gnas mi shes pa dang /kha na ma tho ba lci bo dang /yang ba mi shes pa dang /tshul khrims nyams pa dang /ral ba mi shes pa dang /gzhan yangs

394b7(dkon brtsegs): yod par smra ba dang /srog yod par smra ba dang /gang zag yod par smra ba dang /bsam pa shin tu dman zhing 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug bskyed par byed pa dang /chad

397b1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi//'jig rten skyo ba'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//gang zhig mig gi sngon mtha' la//'gyur ba tha/

397b3(dkon brtsegs): pa//kun 'dzin sgro la gnas pa yin//gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' la//'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med//len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgro la gnas pa yin//

398a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid meng //len dang rnam rtog mod gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgro la gnas pa yin//rna ba ste lce lus dang yid//yul drug dang ni

398a3(dkon brtsegs): dri ma zug rngu dang //chu bo dkar nag las rnams dang //skye ba med dang 'gog pa med//'gro ba med dang 'od med dang //mi g.yo tha dad mi 'gyur dang //byas min spyod pa

398a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig gi zad mtha' yi//rab dang tha me'i bar shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin//gang zhig mig gi skye mtha' yi

398b2(dkon brtsegs): len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgro la gnas pa yin//gang zhig mig gi rab dben pa'i//rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun
398b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin sgro la gnas pa yin//gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa yi//rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin//grong
398b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig mig ni med pa yi//rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin//gang zhig mig gi skye bo yi//rab dang tha ma'i bar
398b5(dkon brtsegs): shes shing //ldan dang rnam rtog med gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yi ni//gang zhig mig ni nyer zhi ba'i//rab dang tha ma'i bar shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med
398b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin//rna ba ste lce lus dang yid//yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bani//'jig rten skyo ba'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin skyed bar bya//
398b7(dkon brtsegs): sa la 'gyur ba med pa dang //lan dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtags gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//sa ni mi skye 'du shes shi'i//len
399a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo na rdzogs par byeng //sa ni 'gag med 'du shes shing //len dang
399a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgra ni rdzogs par byed//sa la 'jug par 'du shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar
399a3(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//sA la nges 'byung 'du shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//
399a4(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//sa la smon med 'ju shes shing //len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs
399a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed//sa la gnas med 'du shes shing //'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang //mtha' med dang ni zad med dang //mtshungs par ldan dang mtshungs mi ldan//ming dang
399a6(dkon brtsegs): yi ge rtags bral dang //so sor brtags dang 'jug pa dang //gnyen pa mi mthun phyogs med dang //brjod du med cing bstan med dang //rab dben gnas pa
399a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang //dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong //rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs//byang chub yan lag mi 'jigs lam//de ltar sa yi chos rnams la//
399b1(dkon brtsegs): lon dang rnam rtog med par no//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal to bdag la 'jug med pas//lan dang rnam rtag med par na//
399b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la 'byung med pas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//da ltar blang zhig rtogs gyur pa//
399b3(dkon brtsegs): kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la mtshan med pas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtags gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//
399b4(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag la smon med pos//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la gnas med pas//
399b5(dkon brtsegs): len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la skye med pas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de
399b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzid sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la 'gag med pas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs
399b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag la yig med pas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgra na
400a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par byed//gal te bdag ni yig bral bas//len dang rnam rtog med par ni//de ltar gang zhib rtogs gyur pa//kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed//
400a2(dkon brtsegs): mig gri sngon gyi phyi mtha' dang //rtog chad dag ni spangs pa dang //rgyu rkyen rang bzhin stong par ni//'dres pa'i thabs kyis bstan rig byos//gal te chos ni ston po'i tshe//
400a3(dkon brtsegs): mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na//de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas//yang dag chos bstan zhes mi bya//gal te chos ni sems pa'i tshe//mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs/
400a4(dkon brtsegs): byed na//de ni mi bden rtog yin pas//chos sems pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te chos ni bsgom pa'i tshe//mig gi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na//de ni mi bden rtog yin
400a5(dkon brtsegs): pas//chos bsgom pa zhes mi bya'o//gang zhig mig gi stong nyid rtogs//byang chub gzhol bar mi byed na//sangs rgyas gang zag de dag la//rtag tu mngon sum chos ston
400a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad//gal te mig ni ma rtogs na//gzugs kyang rtogs par mi 'gyur pa//gal te mig ni rtogs gyur na//gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//gal te mig ni/
400a7(dkon brtsegs): rtogs gyur na//gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs gyur la//gal te gzugs ni rtogs gyur na//mig kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//yul drug dang //
400b1(dkon brtsegs): ni'abyung chen bzhi//'jig rten bskyed pa'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe/rgyu yi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na//de na ma bdun rtog
400b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe//'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rtags byed na//de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te chos ni
400b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'i tshe//lam gyi mtshan nyid rtogs byed na//de ni mi bden rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe//stong pa'i mtshan nyid rtog byed na//de ni mi
400b4(dkon brtsegs): bden rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe//bsregs pa dag tu rtog byed na//de ni mi bden rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//gal te
400b5(dkon brtsegs): chos ni ston pa'i tshe//rgyus kyi dngos por rtog byed na//de ni mi bden rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//dal te chos ni ston pa'i tshe//mig 'dzin par rtog byed do//de ni mi bden
400b6(dkon brtsegs): rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o//mag ni shes par ma gyur na//'dod chags dag ni skye bar 'gyur//gal te mig ni shes gyur na//'dod chags dgu ni skye mi 'gyur//rna ba sna
400b7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang yid//yul d+h+r-ig pa ni na mni//'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin sbyor bar bya//dal te chos ni bstan pa'i tshe//khams na sna tshogs rtag byed na//
401a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mi bden rtog yin pas//chos ston pa zhes m-i b+h+ya'o//yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing //nga bo nyid stong rtags pa dang //ting 'dzin sgo rnams thong gyur pa//de ni chos/
401a2(dkon brtsegs): legs ston par 'gyur//yi dam dag ni mi nyams shing //mig la rtog pa spangs pa ni//rnam rtog med par gyur pa'i phyir//des ni chos legs ston par 'gyur//mig nyid stong
401a3(dkon brtsegs): par ma shes na//migi rang bzhin dag la rmongs//'di ltar khong du ma chung phyir//des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya//gal te mig nyid stong shes ni//migi rang bzhin shes par
401a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur//'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir//des ni chos rab bstan par bya//mig nyid stong par mi shes na//mig rang bzhin dag la rmongs//'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir//des ni
401a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams bstan mi bya//gal te mig nyid stong shes na//tshig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur//'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir//des ni chos rab bstan par bya//mig nyid
401a6(dkon brtsegs): stong par ma shes na//yi ge'i rang bzhin dag la rmongs//'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir//des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya//gal te mig nyid stong shes na//mig gi rang
401a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin shes par 'gyur//'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir//des ni chos rab bstan par bya//mig nyid stong par ma shes na//mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs//'di ltar khong
401b1(dkon brtsegs): du ma chud phyir//des ni chos rnams bskrun mi bya//gal te mig nyid song shes na//mig rang bzhin shes par 'gyur//'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir//des na chos rab bstan par bya//mug
401b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid stong par ma shes na//gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag la rmongs//'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir//des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya//gal te mig nyid stong shes na//gzugs kyi rang bzhin
401b3(dkon brtsegs): shes par 'gyur//'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir//des ni chos rab bstan par bya//mig nyid stong par ma shes na//'jig rten mtshan gnas rtogs byed pas//rje su 'thun pa kho nar
401b4(dkon brtsegs): ni//sems can rnams ni gdul mi nus//mig gi yod par ma rtogs par//'khor gyi nang du chos ston pa//de ni rnyed la gdubs na//thams cad yid ches len mi byed//mig gi/
401b5(dkon brtsegs): yod med rtogs gyur na//'khor gyi nang du chos ston pas//des ni mngon zhen med pas na//thams cad yid ches ldan par byed//mig ni stong par ma rtogs par//chos kyi stan la
401b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dug nas na//dpe mang dag gis rab bstan kyang //thams cad yid chem ldan mi byed//gal te mig nyid stong shes na//chos kyi stan la 'dug nas ni//dpe rnams kyis ni
401b7(dkon brtsegs): ston byed na//thams cad yid ches len par byed//rna ba sna lce lus dang yid//yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi//'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar//thams cad de bzhin
402a1(dkon brtsegs): sgyur bar bya//ma ldan 'das kyis de spyad ces bka' stsam nas/zla 'ad gzhon nur gyur ba dang /lha dang /mo dang /lham yin dang /dA
402a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor 'dres pa chen po sa cad/com ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///'byugs pa dkon
402a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i le'u ste/'dus pa bcu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho/
402a4(dkon brtsegs): la ka stAng lnga brgya pa/bame pa lnga pa'o///ye d+harmA he ta pra b+ha wA he tune ShAn+te thA ga to h+yA wa g+ne/taiShAny+tsa yo ni ra d+ha e wa wAd+tha
